anya-e0812n0:18_0: Te me jayanti guravo guravo guṇehi.
anya-e0812n0:23_0: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:24_6: kimettha lakkhaṇakaraṇena adiṭṭhalakkhaṇāpi dissanti bandhantāti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:24_7: tathāpi te ghuṇakkharappakāsā tabbidūnaṃ payogānusārino vā siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:24_14: Tattha sarassatiyā yathā’sattā jātāya manosampīṇananti loko,
anya-e0812n0:25_8: tathā hi yo ubhayalokajānanena munīnaṃ paramissariyapuggalānampi paramissariyaṃ vatteti,
anya-e0812n0:25_11: Tathā hi tādisassa vadanāravindodare sambhavā sundarī,
anya-e0812n0:25_21: tathā ca vakkhati “guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttā” subodhālaṅkāra 14 gāthā iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:25_22: Tatovāyaṃ saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ sattānaṃ paṭibhānādiguṇavisesāvahattamattena paṭisaraṇabhūtā devatā.
anya-e0812n0:25_28: Sileso cāyaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā sabbattha siriṃ poseti.
anya-e0812n0:25_30: sileso tu siriṃ para”nti subodhālaṅkāra 172 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:26_3: pariyattimūlakattā yena kenaci pariyāyena tassā pariyattiyā atthāvabodhena “appeva nāma sādhujanaṃ paritoseyya”miti
anya-e0812n0:26_4: tadadhigamopāyabhūtamidaṃ pakaraṇamārabhanto ganthārambhe iṭṭhadevatāya paṇāmakaraṇaṃ satācārānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:26_6: visesato abhimataganthassānantarāyena parisamattiyā ca kāraṇamiti iṭṭhadevatānussaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:26_12: Tathā hi lokuttaradhammanissitapariyattisaṅkhātasabbaññubhāratiyā manosampīṇanāsīsanāpadesena attano nissesadhammaratane pasādo pakāsito.
anya-e0812n0:26_13: So pana dhammappasādo tadavinābhāvato buddhasaṅghesupi siddhoti ratanattayavisayaṃ paṇāmaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā dasseti.
anya-e0812n0:27_0: Puna santesu rāmasammādyalaṅkāresu piṭṭhapisanaṃ viya hotīdaṃ alaṅkārakaraṇanti vadantā viruddhavādino
anya-e0812n0:27_1: rāmasammādīnamatthibhāvaṃ ubbhāvetvā abhyupagametvā (ka.) te suddhamāgadhikā na vaḷañjentīti iminā paṭisiddhā.
anya-e0812n0:27_4: alaṅkārasaddassa saddālaṅkārādyabhidheyyañca suddhamāgadhikattaṃ vatvā alaṅkārasaddassa visesanabhūtaanurūpasaddopādānena
anya-e0812n0:27_5: buddhavacanassa upayogattaṃ māgadhikavohārena bhavatīti gamyamānattā karaṇappakārañca alaṅkāraganthappavattiyā
anya-e0812n0:28_0: Satthappayojanānaṃ sādhyasādhanalakkhaṇo sambandho pana sambandhassa nissayabhūtasatthappayojanānaṃ dassaneneva tannissitattā sayampi vutto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:31_3: taṃvuttiyāyeva tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ kathaneneva tannissito te nissāya pavatto sopi sambandho vutto bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:32_1: abhidheyyādikathanaṃ pana tehi yuttānaṃyeva ganthānaṃ subuddhipubbakādīnaṃ upādeyyattañca tabbiparītānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:35_4: siyā vākyaṃ sakārako”ti abhidhānappadīpikā 106 gāthā vuttalakkhaṇamajjhapatitavākyasamudāyopetaṃ mahāvākyasarūpasatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:35_6: ato paraṃ vuttalakkhaṇasatthato aññaṃ anadhigataṃ nādhippetanti.
anya-e0812n0:36_0: Loke padumagabbhe vasantiyā sabbaṅgadhavalāya yathicchitatthasādhikāya sarassatīnāmikāya devatāya “vāṇī”ti
anya-e0812n0:36_1: vohārato iminā atthena yojetvā abhinnapadasilesālaṅkāravasena vuttattā padattho evaṃ veditabbo –
anya-e0812n0:36_3: no ce mukhasaṅkhātaambhojassa gabbhe udare sambhavena pavattiyā uppattiyā vā sundarī niddosā,
anya-e0812n0:36_4: sobhanā vā pāṇinaṃ saraṇaṃ atoyeva ahitāpanayanahitāvahatthena sabbasattānaṃ paṭissaraṇabhūtā vāṇī yathāvuttaguṇopetā sarassatīdevatā,
anya-e0812n0:36_5: no ce sabbaññubhāratīti vuttasaddhammaratanaṃ mayhaṃ manaṃ ganthaviracane byāvaṭassa me cittaṃ pīṇayataṃ abhimatatthasampādanena pīṇayatūti.
anya-e0812n0:37_0: Ubhayalokajānanato muni ca so indabhāvapavattanato indo ceti kammadhārayena vā,
anya-e0812n0:37_1: agāriyamunianagāriyamunisekhamuniasekhamunīnaṃ catunnaṃ pañcamo hutvā indoti chaṭṭhītappurisena vā munindo.
anya-e0812n0:37_3: saddhammapakkhe ambhojamiva ambhojanti vadane ca upacārena gahite kammadhārayo.
anya-e0812n0:37_8: Vāṇiyā visesanattepi ekantanapuṃsakattā saraṇasaddassa na liṅgaparivattanabhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:37_11: Mayhanti ekavacanena attano sādhuguṇodayakāraṇaṃ niratimānataṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0812n0:37_12: Santesupi aññesu jinapariyāyesu munindasaddo iṭṭhamanosampīṇanaambhojatulyatāsundarittasaraṇattasaṅkhātānaṃ atthantarānaṃ ocityaṃ posetīti payutto.
anya-e0812n0:37_16: Tasmāyeva manosampīṇane paṭuttaṃ subyattamiti ocityaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:43_0: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0812n0:44_2: bhāvarūpitasaddhammaratanasso’ padassitanipaccakārena iṭṭhadevatāpūjaṃ dassetvā “nanu bandhalakkhaṇamatthiyeva pubbakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:44_7: Bhavati hi taṃsambandhato tabbohāro yathā kiñcipi vejjasatthaṃ “bimbisāro”ti.
anya-e0812n0:44_11: Dvepi purā pubbakāle bhavā purātanā, porāṇikā.
anya-e0812n0:44_21: asammissā vā aparicitattā te māgadhikā cāti suddhamāgadhikā, yatipotā.
anya-e0812n0:44_22: Te yathāvutte alaṅkāre ābharaṇavisese na vaḷañjenti,
anya-e0812n0:44_28: Suddhamāgadhikā attano parisuddhabhāvena pubbe sobhanāpi te alaṅkārā idāni malaggahitabhāvappattā “kiṃ
anya-e0812n0:44_29: tehi malaggahitehi amhādisānaṃ suddhasattāna”nti na vaḷañjentīti.
anya-e0812n0:50_1: Santo viññūhi pasatthattā sobhanā purātanā pubbakālasambhūtā rāmasammādyalaṅkārā rāmasammādīhi ācariyehi viracitattā,
anya-e0812n0:50_2: tesaṃ taṃsambandhato tabbohārasadisanāmattā vā rāmasammādayo nāma alaṅkārā kismiñci vejjasatthe “bimbisāro”ti vohāro viya.
anya-e0812n0:50_4: alaṅkārattapaṭipādanato alaṅkāranāmikā ganthavisesā vā santi kiñcāpi vijjanti,
anya-e0812n0:50_5: tathāpi tu evaṃ santepi suddhamāgadhikā sakkaṭapākatādīsu aññabhāsāsu paricayābhāvato kevalamāgadhikā
anya-e0812n0:50_6: te rāmasammādike alaṅkāre na vaḷañjenti pasādhanavasena,
anya-e0812n0:50_15: Tathā hi suddhamāgadhikā attano suddhattā tesaṃ vinyāsena sobhanatte satipi bhāsāya purātanattā aparisuddhoti avamaññamānā na vaḷañjentīti.
anya-e0812n0:50_16: Vatticchitassatthassa upatthambhakabhūto bhāvatthalesopi mahākavīnaṃ vacanesuyeva labbhatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:55_1: mahākavīnaṃ pūjitakavīnaṃ vāṇīsu vacanavisesesu patīyamānaṃ gammamānaṃ yaṃ kiñci vatthu yo koci atthaleso attheva atthi eva,
anya-e0812n0:55_2: taṃ vatthu aṅganāsu vanitāsu pasiddhāvayavātirittaṃ hatthapādādipākaṭasarīrāvayavato adhikaṃ lāvaṇyamiva
anya-e0812n0:55_3: manogocarībhūtasundarattaṃ viya pasiddhāvayavātirittaṃ pakāsasaddāvayavato adhikaṃ hutvā ābhāti dippatīti.
anya-e0812n0:60_6: ete yatipote esaṃ yatipotānaṃ anurūpena idāni viraciyamānattābhinavabhāvato,
anya-e0812n0:60_9: savanadhāraṇādivasena vā vaḷañjanena santuṭṭhe kareyyaṃ appeva nāma yannūnāti eso parissamo ayaṃ amhākaṃ tādisasantuṭṭhijanakālaṅkārapakaraṇappayogo.
anya-e0812n0:61_2: Alaṅkaronti bandhasarīramanenāti alaṅkārotiminā pana alaṅkārasaddena pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n0:62_1: tathā tappaṭipādakaṃ subodhālaṅkāranāmadheyyasatthaṃ alaṅkatapaṭipādakattena maṅgalasuttanti viya.
anya-e0812n0:65_14: sādhiyasādhanalakkhaṇo sambandho tu nissayapadassinā dassitoyeva. Yathāha –
anya-e0812n0:72_4: te virahite yehi ete suddhamāgadhike esaṃ suddhamāgadhikānaṃ anurūpena abhinavabhāvato māgadhikasarūpaṃ anugatarūpena,
anya-e0812n0:72_7: ganthavisese ganthavisaye (ka.) uggahaṇadhāraṇādikārāpanena vā santuṭṭhe kareyyaṃ apināma yaṃnūna sundaramiti,
anya-e0812n0:73_8: Iminā mukhyabhāvena pasādādisaddālaṅkārā ca sabhāvavutyādiatthālaṅkārā ca pavuccanti.
anya-e0812n0:73_10: tathā maṅgalasuttaratanasuttādivohāro viya alaṅkārapakāsakaṃ “sammā bujjhanti dvippakārā alaṅkārā anene”ti
anya-e0812n0:76_0: Ettha sāmatthiyaṃ nāma tadādhāratappaṭipādakattavohārato tadādheyyatappaṭipādanīyaṃ na bhavati ce,
anya-e0812n0:81_0: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi gurūnī’ha garūniha (ka.);
anya-e0812n0:83_1: Evaṃ lakkhaṇārambhapaṭikkhepakajanapaṭibāhanapubbakamabhidheyyādikaṃ dassetvā idāni satthatova sabbattha guṇadosavivecanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:85_0: Yaṃ karoti vinā satthaṃ, sāhasaṃ kimatodhika”nti.
anya-e0812n0:86_0: Tasmā guṇadosavibhāgavicāraṇaṃ nāma tabbidūnaṃyeva, nāsatthaññūnaṃ purisapasūnaṃ. Tathā cāha –
anya-e0812n0:89_6: nānāsantānavuttinīpi ekattanayena ekasmiṃ santāne na vāsitā naparibhāvitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kā sā?
anya-e0812n0:89_9: Anekasmiṃ tipiṭakatakkabyākaraṇālaṅkārasatthādike satthantare ucitā savanadhāraṇādivasena paricitā sāyaṃ paññā yesaṃ na sañcitāti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:89_11: Sammohabbhāhatāti yathāvuttāyātisayavatiyā paññāyābhāvato balappattena mohena abbhāhatā visesena pahatā,
anya-e0812n0:89_18: cirenapi kālena nānāvidhasatthantarakataparicayabalena pappoti tādisaṃ paññāveyattiyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:94_5: Ihāti imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā pādaparicariyā natthi,
anya-e0812n0:94_6: tehi janehi yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyarasānabhiññehi kiṃ payojanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:94_10: Ye pubbe katapuññatādisampattisampannā tappādarajehi tesaṃ gurūnaṃ pādadhūlīhi okiṇṇā onaddhā gavacchitā,
anya-e0812n0:94_11: teva sādhū yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyena abhiññātā sajjanā eva vivekino heyyopādeyyaguṇadosavibhāganiyamanapaññāsampattisamaṅgino honti,
anya-e0812n0:94_13: Sā cāyaṃ gurupādasussūsā visiṭṭhādarena karaṇīyāti vaṅkavuttiyā tadabhyāse sādhujane niyojeti.
anya-e0812n0:95_2: tesaṃ taddosanirākaraṇaṃ vinā padesāvabodhanamattena paṇḍitamānīnaṃ vacanassāgurukaraṇaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā
anya-e0812n0:95_3: dassento ca taṃdvāreneva attano anaññasādhāraṇagurugāravataṃ sādhujanehi paramādarena sampādetabbamiti
anya-e0812n0:95_6: Anekasatthānaṃ tipiṭakatakkabyākaraṇādīnaṃ anekesaṃ ganthānaṃ antare tatvatthasaṅkhātaabbhantare ucitā
anya-e0812n0:95_7: savanauggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena paricitā paññā sutamayā paññā yesaṃ yehi na sañcitā,
anya-e0812n0:95_9: pubbakālikapaññāya aparakālikapaññāya anantaraāsevanādipaccayalābhato avatthabāhullapavattito vā sañcitabbāpi na rāsikatā.
anya-e0812n0:95_10: Ete īdisapaññāpāṭavarahitā ime sammohabbhāhatā paññāpāṭavābhāvato balappattena mohena visesena pahatā eva kiñcipi heyyopādeyyaṃ nāvabujjhanti.
anya-e0812n0:95_12: te ca te satthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:95_14: tasmiṃ ucitāti ca sammohena abbhāhatāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:98_2: Tathā hi rūpabhedopaladdhiyaṃ nīlapītādirūpavisesāvabodhane andhassa adhikāro abhimukhakaraṇaṃ kiṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:100_0: Yaṃ karoti vinā satthaṃ, sāhasaṃ kimatodhika”nti.
anya-e0812n0:101_2: satthaṃ vinā satthocitatādisapaññaṃ vinā yaṃ karoti guṇāguṇavibhāgaṃ karoti,
anya-e0812n0:101_4: atodhikaṃ sāhasaṃ kiṃ āsuṃ kiriyā anupaparikkhanakiriyā nattheva.
anya-e0812n0:102_0: Iha imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ akatapuññānaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:107_0: Niddiṭṭhaguṇopetānaṃ ācariyānaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā pādaparicariyā natthi,
anya-e0812n0:107_2: Ye katapuññā janā tappādarajokiṇṇā tesaṃ gurūnaṃ pādarajehi gavacchitā,
anya-e0812n0:107_3: teva sādhū janā eva vivekino kalyāṇamittagurupāsanāhi adhigatavisiṭṭhavivekabuddhino bhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:107_6: taṃ nissāya kattabbapādaparicariyāpi tadatthiyā sussūsā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:107_11: Sissānaṃ sakalābhibuddhiyā gurupaṭibaddhattā attano guṇato adhikatarāyeva sevitabbā.
anya-e0812n0:118_4: Muttakādivākyasvamuttikādyavayavasabhāvā antaravākyasamudāyasampannaṃ vuttajātibhedabhinnaṃ pajjamayaṃ gajjamayaṃ pajjagajjamayaṃ campūnāmakañca,
anya-e0812n0:118_6: taṃ pana mahākabbaṃ saggehi sagganāmakehi paricchedavisesehi bandhyate karīyatīti saggabandhoti pavuccati.
anya-e0812n0:118_7: Tassa tu lakkhaṇaṃ “saggabandhassa mukhaṃ iṭṭhāsīsanaṃ siyā paṇāmo vā bandhasambandhino kassaci atthassa niddeso vā”tiādinā anekadhā vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0812n0:130_0: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:131_8: Caturodāttanāyakanti ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogena caturo kusalo cāgātisayādiyogena udātto udāro nāyako vipakkho,
anya-e0812n0:131_19: Piyavuttasusandhibhīti piyāni sutisubhagāni vuttāni indavajirādīni aññamaññasambandhasaṃsaggatāya sobhano sandhi aññamaññasaṅgahā yesaṃ saggānaṃ, tehīti.
anya-e0812n0:132_0: Punapi yathāvuttesu aṅgesu nagaravaṇṇanādīsu kiñca yathāsambhavaṃ madhupānādirahitampi taññūnaṃ mano rañjeti upādiyateva sabbhīti dassetumāha–
anya-e0812n0:139_0: Tajjayā nāyakukkaṃsa-kathanañca sukheti no”ti kābyādāsa 1.21 22 gāthā āhu.
anya-e0812n0:141_4: tesu nikkhittaṃ ṭhapitaṃ nettañca cittañca yehīti viggaho. Ke te? Kavino.
anya-e0812n0:141_5: Tattha nikkhittanettacittavacanena sutassa cintanañca ūhāpohamukhena yathuggahitaniyāmaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:141_11: Sute dassite tannissayaṃ sutamayañāṇampi dassitameva siyāti.
anya-e0812n0:141_12: “Kabbanāṭakanikkhittanettacittā”ti iminā sutacintābhāvanānukkamena sampāditapaññāpāṭavānaṃ kabbaracanāya sāmatthiyaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0812n0:146_1: Iminā pana aniyamavacanena attano tattha ādarābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0812n0:146_3: Etaṃ tehi racitaṃ bandhajātaṃ paraṃ accantameva vimhayakaraṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:146_5: Tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu racanāvisesaekantopāyabhūtesu avihitādarāapi sutādivasena akatādarāpi ye sappurisā
anya-e0812n0:146_6: paññavanto yena bandhavisesena viññū guṇadosaviduno satthaññuno paṇḍitajane tosenti pīṇenti.
anya-e0812n0:146_7: Tosentiyeva hi te tādise sābhāvikipaṭibhāvirahepi etādisesu atthesu sutacintābhāvanāvasena vāyamantā.
anya-e0812n0:151_3: tādisopāyantararahitānampi etādiso bandho siyā”ti vimhayena saha vattamānopi.
anya-e0812n0:151_4: Sova bandho tameva bandhanaṃ tādisopāyasampattivirahenopeyyasampattiyā sabbhāvato, nāññoti.
anya-e0812n0:152_1: Idāni kabbanāṭakesu aparicitānamamhākaṃ gantharacanāsabhāvāvabodhova kutoti osakkante “kabbanāṭakā”digāthādvayena samussāheti.
anya-e0812n0:152_3: kabbakārakā yaṃ kiñci attano abhimataṃ racayanti karonti,
anya-e0812n0:152_4: etaṃ bandhanaṃ paraṃ atisayena na vimhayakaraṃ acchariyakaraṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:152_11: kabbanāṭakesu nikkhittaṃ nettacittaṃ yehīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:152_12: Ye janā tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu avihitādarāpi savanadhāraṇādivasena akatasambhamā eva viññū yena gantharacanāvisesena tosenti pīṇenti,
anya-e0812n0:152_14: Sova bandho savimhayo aññesaṃ uppajjamānavimhayena sahito.
anya-e0812n0:152_18: Bāhirasatthābhiyogābhāvepi pubbavāsanābhāvepi iha nirantarābhiyogaṃ karonto tādisasāmatthiyaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:157_1: yadi pubbavāsanāguṇānubandhī atītajātiyā paricayavāsanāguṇassa anubalappadānavasena anubandho yassatthi,
anya-e0812n0:157_3: tathāpi sutena savanena ussahanena paguṇakaraṇādivācussahanena vā upāsitā katagurupāsanā vācā kamapi
anya-e0812n0:157_4: anuggahaṃ kiñcipi paññāpāṭavaṃ dhuvaṃ ekantena karoti evāti.
anya-e0812n0:158_0: Ettha kabbaṃ nāma muttakakulakādivākyavasena ca avayavasabhāvehi tesaṃyeva antaravākyāvayavasamūhehi
anya-e0812n0:158_1: paripuṇṇaṃ vuttavisesehi pabhedagataṃ kevalaṃ pajjamayaṃ vā gajjamayaṃ vā campūtikhyātapajjagajjamayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:158_4: Kabbañca idheva dassitalakkhaṇato ekadesayuttappakaraṇādinavarūpakāni ca nāṭikā ca bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:170_0: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:171_2: Assa lakkhaṇaṃ tu vuccateti sambandho kākakkhigoḷakanayena tammukhaṃ tassa kabbassa ādi pana paṇāmo devatānamassanaṃ vā,
anya-e0812n0:176_1: āsīsāpi “mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ mana” miccādiiṭṭhāsīsanaṃ vā bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:177_0: Itihāsakathubbhūtaṃ purāvuttakathāsannissayaṃ vā santasannissayampi sobhanānampi rājacariyādinissayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:177_5: sabbadukkhā nivattihetu mokkho cāti catuvaggaphalādhīnaṃ caturodāttanāyakaṃ ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogato
anya-e0812n0:177_6: caturo dakkho cāgātisayādiyogena udātto uḷāro sapakkho,
anya-e0812n0:177_13: indusavitūdayo candasūriyānaṃ udayo cāti imesaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ yattha, taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:177_16: taṃ vippalambhavivāhehi dārāviyogadārapariggahehi ca kumārodayavaḍḍhihi kumāruppattikumāravaḍḍhīhi ca
anya-e0812n0:177_21: sapakkhanāyakassa abhivaḍḍhisaṅkhāto abhyūdayo cāti imehi alaṅkataṃ sajjitaṃ asaṃkhitta…pe…
anya-e0812n0:177_22: ntaraṃ asaṃkhittā vitthārā rasā siṅgārādayo aṭṭha bhāvā ratiussāhādayo cāti imehi nirantaraṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:177_23: piyavuttasusandhibhi sutisubhagehi indavajirādīhi vuttehi pubbāparasambandhaparicchedatāya sobhanā sandhi
anya-e0812n0:177_25: tehi sabbattha sabbasmiṃ paricchede bhinnasaggantehi bhinnasaggā pariyosānā yesaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:177_26: tehi nātivitthiṇṇasaggehi nātivitthārasaggasaṅkhātehi paricchedehi upetaṃ yuttaṃ sādhvalaṅkati sobhanālaṅkāravantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:177_27: kabbaṃ lokarañjakaṃ taṃ samānaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi kappanirantaraṭṭhāyi kappantare ṭhāyi vā jāyate.
anya-e0812n0:177_28: Ettha madhupānādirahitapuravaṇṇanādayopi taññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti ce,
anya-e0812n0:180_1: atra imesu kabbaṅgesu majjhe kehici aṅgehi kehici avayavehi nyūnamapi ūnamapi,
anya-e0812n0:180_4: taṃ pana adussanaṃ bandhaṅgasampadā racitapuravaṇṇanādiaṅgasampadā taññū kabbaññū jane kāmaṃ icchānurūpaṃ ce ārādhayanti,
anya-e0812n0:180_6: Punapi nāyakavaṇṇanāsu sapakkhanāyakaṃ vaṇṇetvā tena nirākaraṇabhāvampi. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:180_7: paccatthikaṃ vaṇṇetvā attano nāyakena tassābhibhavanampi vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0812n0:186_0: Bandho ca nāma saddatthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0812n0:188_1: Evametehi sotujanasamussāhanaṃ dassetvā idāni kattumicchitabandhoti vuttaṃ bandhassa lakkhaṇaṃ kattumārabhate “bandho cā”tiādi.
anya-e0812n0:188_6: Vuttalakkhaṇā yehi te pubbācariyehi sahitā vuccanti.
anya-e0812n0:188_8: Iti dosavajjite sahite saddatthe pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā bandho nāma sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttialaṅkāravuttivasena
anya-e0812n0:188_9: tividhopīti appasiddhaṃ bandhasarīraṃ vidhīyate yathā “yo kuṇḍalī,
anya-e0812n0:189_0: Tattha jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇo saddānamattho mukhyo catubbidho hoti.
anya-e0812n0:189_1: Mukhyassatthassa catubbidhattā tividhesu saddesu tabbācako catubbidho hoti jātisaddo guṇasaddo kriyāsaddo dabbasaddoti.
anya-e0812n0:189_2: Tividho hi saddo vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjakoti byāpārabhedena.
anya-e0812n0:189_4: So hi tividho mukhyo lakkhaṇo byañjanasabhāvo ceti.
anya-e0812n0:189_7: Taṃbyāpāravā abyavahitajātyādisakehi tamatthaṃ mukhyabhāvena yo vadati goādiko,
anya-e0812n0:190_0: “Visesyaṃnābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:191_2: Tattha bandhanamocanāni na sambhavantīti attano nissayabhūtā gobyatti ākaḍḍhīyate,
anya-e0812n0:191_3: tathā mañcānamugghosanaṃ na sambhavatīti attano ugghosanakriyāsiddhyatthaṃ mañcasamaṅgino purisā ākaḍḍhīyanti.
anya-e0812n0:191_4: Tathā gaṅgāsaddavāccassa jalappavāhassa ghosappatyākaratā na sambhavatīti gaṅgāsaddo attanobhidheyyassodakappavāhassa nikaṭaṃ taṭaṃ lakkheti.
anya-e0812n0:192_1: Byañjanasabhāvo pana parapariyāyo saddassa tatiyo byāpāro.
anya-e0812n0:192_3: Iccetaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saddānaṃ vasena atthopi tividho hoti vācco lakkhaṇiyo byaṅgyoti.
anya-e0812n0:192_8: byaṅgyena vinā bandho nijjīvo siyāti pubbācariyānaṃ pavatti,
anya-e0812n0:193_4: tāva tappatī attano manosampīṇanaāsīsanā na saṃgacchatīti vākyasāmatthiyāyeva vāṇiyaṃ sāyamocityabhedena devatāsaddassa āropitottho lakkhaṇiyo.
anya-e0812n0:193_7: Manosampīṇanassa tu aññathā anupapattiyā passaddhyādikkamena yathābhūtāvabodhasambhavā anāyāsena vicittānekasaddatthapaṭibhānena
anya-e0812n0:193_10: Tabbācakā saddā vācakalakkhaṇikabyañjakā hontīti evaṃ sabbattha saddatthavicāro gantabbo.
anya-e0812n0:194_1: Ayaṃ yathāvutto bandho bandhasarīraṃ tidhā bhave tippakārena siyā,
anya-e0812n0:194_3: Pajjagajjavimissānaṃ bhedena pajjasabhāvādīnaṃ visesena tidhā bhaveti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:194_4: Tattha pajjaṃ nāma amhehiyeva viracitavuttodayākhye chandasi nirūpitā vuttajātippabhedā catuppadikatthā nirūpito muttakādipi vuttajātippakāroyeva.
anya-e0812n0:194_6: Tesu ekagāthā niṭṭhitatthā sappadhānā gāthantarānirapekkhā muttakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:194_7: ekakriyādānena aññamaññasāpekkhā niṭṭhitatthā paccekaṃ aniṭṭhitatthā gāthā kulakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:194_8: nānābhittiyo bhinnakiriyo sappadhānā gāthā koso viya ṭhapitā koso,
anya-e0812n0:194_9: ekabhittipadosādikaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ samudāyena pavattā bhinnakriyā gāthā saṅghāto,
anya-e0812n0:194_12: Tassa tu dve pakārā ākhyāyikā, kathāti.
anya-e0812n0:195_4: so devadatto”ti pasiddhakuṇḍalittānuvādena appasiddhassa devadattattavidhānaṃ viya dassento “bandho”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:195_5: Tattha bandho nāma ca bandhanaṃ pana.
anya-e0812n0:195_10: Evaṃpakārehi tu īdisasaddatthānaṃ viññūnaṃ tuṭṭhijanakaaññamaññānurūpaguṇasahitānaṃ bhāvoti vacanatthena “sāhicca”miti vadanti.
anya-e0812n0:195_12: Saddo pana atthappatītiyaṃ attano mukhyabyāpāraṃ lakkhaṇabyāpāraṃ byañjanasabhāvabyāpārañceti tividhaṃ byāpārabhedena.
anya-e0812n0:195_13: Kamato vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjanako ceti tividho.
anya-e0812n0:195_14: Tathā atthopi vācco lakkhaṇiyo byaṅgyo cebhi tividho.
anya-e0812n0:195_15: Atra tu vācako saddo attanā dīpetabbamukhyatthassa jātiguṇakriyādabbabhedena catubbidhattā sayampi jātiguṇakriyādabbasaddavasena catubbidho.
anya-e0812n0:195_18: Tathā hi “go nīlaṃ pācako visāṇi”ccādo goādisaddānaṃ mukhyabyāpāro gopiṇḍanīlapaṭapācakakattusiṅgīti
anya-e0812n0:196_0: “Visesyaṃ nābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:197_1: visesane visesanabhūtajātyādimhi khīṇasatti khīṇabyāpāravatī abhidhā mukhyabyāpārova visesyaṃ dabbaṃ na gacche na pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0812n0:198_0: Jātyādīnaṃ nissayagopiṇḍādikaṃ abhidhā na vadati ce,
anya-e0812n0:198_4: siṅgī dhāvati”ccādīsu jātyādivisiṭṭhagopiṇḍādīnaṃ goādisaddassa kathaṃ vācakattaṃ yujjatīti?
anya-e0812n0:198_5: Dabbādhīnajātiguṇādīsu vuttesu tabbisiṭṭhassa dabbassa pariyāyato vācakattā.
anya-e0812n0:198_14: gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso”tyādīsu jātiguṇakriyāsiṅgadabbamañcagaṅgādīnaṃ gamanādīhi yogāsambhavato jātiguṇādayo
anya-e0812n0:199_3: ettha āyuvaḍḍhanakāraṇabhūte ghate kāriyabhūtaāyuno vohāro āropito hoti.
anya-e0812n0:199_22: tassa tatiyabyāpārassa visayo tādisavākyameva vāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:214_0: Byañjako tu anaññattā, visuṃ tehi na vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n0:215_8: tato idha abhimatatthabādhakākusalanivāraṇañca kusalānamanubalappadānañca tato kāyacittapīḷāvigamo ca
anya-e0812n0:215_9: tato sukhappaṭilābho ca tato cittasamādhānañca tatoyeva anekavidhatthāvabodho ca tato abhimataganthaparisamatti
anya-e0812n0:216_1: Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo bandho pajjagajjavimissānaṃ bhedena gāthācuṇṇiyatadubhayamissānaṃ vasena tidhā bhave.
anya-e0812n0:216_7: Iha pajjaṃ nāma muttakakulakakosakasaṅghātavasena catuppabhedaṃ chandasi niddiṭṭhavuttavisesaviracitaṃ catuppadikagāthābandhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:216_8: Tattha muttakaṃ nāma niṭṭhitatthā sappadhānā ekā gāthā,
anya-e0812n0:216_9: kulakaṃ nāma paccekamaniṭṭhitatthā aññamaññasāpekkhā ekakriyādvārikā nānāgāthā,
anya-e0812n0:216_10: kosako nāma nānāvidhavaṇṇanābhūmikā bhinnakriyādvārappavattā sappadhānā gāthārāsi,
anya-e0812n0:216_11: saṅghāto nāma sañcyākālādiekavaṇṇanābhūminissitā bhinnakriyāsamudāyena pavattā gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:216_12: Gajjaṃ nāma aniyatapado ākhyāyikākathāvasena dvippabhedo syādyantatyādyanto vacanappabandho.
anya-e0812n0:216_13: Misso pana imehi dvīhi saṃmisso nāṭakapakaraṇādi ca jātakamālādicampū ca.
anya-e0812n0:218_0: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0812n0:220_1: Evaṃ tippakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ vatvā idāni aññathāpi dassetumāha “nibandhocā’nibandho ca,
anya-e0812n0:220_3: Puna bhiyyo yathāvutto pajjamayabandho dvidhā dvippakārena niruppate nicchīyate. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:220_4: Nibandho ca tadekadesabhūtehi muttakādīhi catūhi saggabandhādivasena bandho ca anibandho ca kevalaṃ muttakavasenāti evaṃ dvidhā niruppate iti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:220_5: Nanu tassetassa yathāvuttavātimayassa sakkaṭaṃ pākataṃ apabbhaṃso pesācikaṃ missañceti pañcavidhattaṃ vatvā “sakkaṭaṃ nāma devatābhāsā.
anya-e0812n0:220_6: Pākataṃ catubbidhaṃ sakkaṭehi vaṇṇaññattamattena uppannattā mahindasindhavādi tabbhavaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:220_14: Sabbesaṃ vasena missa”nti sakkaṭādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:220_18: viniyogabhedena vuttaṃ duvidhattañca idha kasmā na vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:221_0: Evamalaṅkārādhiṭṭhānabhāvena paṭhamaṃ bandhasarīraṃ dassetvā idāni hārakeyūrādinā purisasarīramiva bandhasarīraṃ
anya-e0812n0:221_1: saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi vindanīyataraṃ hotīti dassetumāha “taṃ tu” iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:221_3: Taṃ bandhasarīraṃ tu alaṅkārā alaṅkariyati taṃ bandhasarīrametehīti pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n0:221_4: sabhāvavutyādayo atthālaṅkārā ca vindanīyatarattanaṃ atisayena vindanīyabhāvaṃ assādanīyabhāvaṃ pāpenti nayanti.
anya-e0812n0:221_5: Sabbathā niddosabhūtānaṃ saddatthānaṃ aññamaññānurūpato sahitabhāvena paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ
anya-e0812n0:221_6: tādisapurisasarīramiva vindanīyampi samānaṃ alaṅkārehi pasādhite sati accantameva vindanīyaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:222_1: Punapi tasseva bandhassa bhedaṃ kathetuṃ “nibandho cā”dimāha.
anya-e0812n0:222_2: Puna nibandho ca muttakādīhi catūhi avinābhāvato mahākabbādisabhāvena nirantaraṃ katvā bandho ca anibandho
anya-e0812n0:222_3: ca kevalaṃ mahākabbādisabhāvena muttakattā anirantaraṃ katvā bandho cāti sova bandho dvidhā niruppate
anya-e0812n0:222_5: Punapi so bandho sakkaṭapākataapabbhaṃ sapesācikamissabhāsābhedena pañcavidho.
anya-e0812n0:222_7: tadaññaṃ kabbaṃ savanīyamiti vaḷañjanabhedato duvidho ca hoti.
anya-e0812n0:222_8: So sabbopi payojanābhāvato iha na gahito.
anya-e0812n0:222_10: Tato kehici akkharehi bhinnaṃ pākataṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:222_12: Tattha sakkaṭato vaṇṇaññattamattena nibbattaṃ tabbhavaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n0:222_21: Tehi sakkaṭādīhi sammissaṃ missaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:222_22: Idāni īdisappabhedavantabandhassa alaṅkārena sobhanattaṃ vattuṃ “taṃ tu”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:222_23: Taṃ tu taṃ pana vuttappakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ alaṅkārā pasādādisaddālaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n0:226_3: agarahitaṃ mukhambhojaṃ vadanāravindañca tathā anavajjā padādidosānabhibhūtāya sundarabhāvena agarahitā
anya-e0812n0:226_4: bhāratī ca vāṇī upacārato tappaṭipādanīyo attho cāti ete alaṅkatāva mukhaṃ tilakatāḍaṅkādinālaṅkārena,
anya-e0812n0:226_6: niralaṅkatā tathā apasādhitā asajjitā sobhante kiṃ nu,
anya-e0812n0:227_2: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādiavayavasampattiyā ca piḷakatilakakāḷakādidosarahitattā ca aninditaṃ mukhambhojañca anavajjā
anya-e0812n0:227_3: padadosavākyadosaatthadosehi amissattā agarahitā bhāratī vāṇī ca abhedopacārena tappaṭipādanīyattho cāti
anya-e0812n0:227_4: ime alaṅkatāva kuṇḍalatilakādiābharaṇehi ca saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi ca sajjitā eva,
anya-e0812n0:227_5: niralaṅkatā tehi avibhūsitā sobhante kiṃ nu,
anya-e0812n0:230_0: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0812n0:231_1: Alaṅkaraṇañca tesaṃ vinā gurūpadesena karonto vinā pahāsaṃ nāparaṃ visesamadhigacchatīti dassetuṃ silesālaṅkāramāha “vinā”tiādi.
anya-e0812n0:231_3: alaṅkārakāraṇopāyopadesakānaṃ vā upadesaṃ “ettha evaṃ kate sobheyyā”ti upadisanaṃ vinā pariccajja mukhassa,
anya-e0812n0:231_4: bandhassa ca alaṅkaraṇānabhiññatāya bālo aññāṇako yo koci puggalo taṃ mukhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:231_5: bandhaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ anurūpavasena sajjetuṃ icchati adhippeti,
anya-e0812n0:231_6: so tādiso aññāṇapuggalo viññūhi tabbidūhi paṇḍitajanehi hassabhāvaṃ avahāsaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena na sampāpuṇeyya.
anya-e0812n0:232_1: Idāni padādidosarahitabandhasarīrassa alaṅkārehi bhūsanamapi gurūpadesasahitameva seṭṭhanti dassetuṃ “vinā gurūpadesa” miccādisilesālaṅkāramāha.
anya-e0812n0:232_3: bandhālaṅkāre vā asamattho yo koci gurūpadesaṃ vinā sarīrālaṅkārakaraṇassa,
anya-e0812n0:232_7: so viññūhi tadubhayaññūhi hassabhāvaṃ avahasitabbataṃ kathaṃ na sampāpuṇe,
anya-e0812n0:232_9: tasmā gurūhi sādarato uggaṇhitvā kattabbanti bhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:236_2: atthagammā ca alaṅkārāti gantho kathanti āha “ganthopī”tiādi.
anya-e0812n0:236_4: paṭipādanīyatāya tabbacanīyānañca atthānaṃ alaṅkārappakāsako alaṅkārānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ vibhāvito ganthopi
anya-e0812n0:236_5: kiriyākappasaṅkhātaṃ satthampi tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vāccataṃ yāti upagacchati.
anya-e0812n0:236_8: tasmiṃ vā maṇḍanavisese pavattassa alaṅkāravohārassa upacaraṇaṃ soyamityabhedena parikappanaṃ upacāro. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:236_9: Paṭipādanīyapaṭipādakānaṃ abhedavasena kāraṇe kārīyassa upacariyatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:237_4: ganthoapi kiriyākappasaṅkhātaṃ satthampi tabbohārūpacārato tassa alaṅkāroti katavohārassa alaṅkārasaddassa
anya-e0812n0:237_5: kāraṇe kārīyūpacārena tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vattabbataṃ yāti.
anya-e0812n0:241_2: tappasaṅkañca taṃbandhasarīrañca heṭṭhā vuttampi ekato sambandhetvā dassetuṃ “dvippakārā”di āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:241_4: tasmiṃ vā bandhālaṅkārādhikāre alaṅkārā yathāvuttā dvippakārā honti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:241_7: saddālaṅkārā atthālaṅkārāti alaṅkārā dvippakārā hontīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:241_8: Yesaṃ bhedena te dvippakārā, te saddā, atthā ca.
anya-e0812n0:241_9: “Bandho” iti vuttaṃ nāmaṃ yassā āvaliyā sā bandhanāmā eva.
anya-e0812n0:241_10: Taṃsajjitatadāvali tehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā pakāsitā taṃsajjitā,
anya-e0812n0:241_16: taṃsajjitatadāvalikaṃ pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā appasiddhā saddatthā vidhīyante.
anya-e0812n0:242_1: Idāni yathāvuttaalaṅkārānaṃ avuttabhedañca tadādhārādhikataṃ yathāvuttabandhasarīrañca ekato dassetuṃ “dvippakāre”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:242_2: Tattha tasmiṃ kiriyākappasaṅkhāte alaṅkāraganthe, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:242_3: alaṅkārādhikāre vā alaṅkārā vakkhamānālaṅkārā saddatthabhedato saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārabhedena dvippakārā honti,
anya-e0812n0:242_7: tesaṃ saddatthānaṃ mahākabbādisamudāyarūpā paṭipāṭibandhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:245_0: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0812n0:246_1: Evaṃ guṇena alaṅkārena sajjitāpi sā saddatthāvali appakenapi dosena saṃyuttā satī asamphusitabbāva viññūhi siyāti dassetumāha “guṇa” iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:246_3: atthālaṅkārena ca saṃyuttāpi visesena sajjitāpi saddatthāvali dosalavena dosalesenāpi aṅkitā abhilañchitā
anya-e0812n0:246_4: satī viññūhi guṇadosavibhāgavidūhi paṇḍitapurisehi na pasaṃsiyā neva pasaṃsitabbā.
anya-e0812n0:246_6: Yathā hi kaññā dasavassikā sannaddhayobbanābhimukhabhāvena jananayanamanovilubbhinīguṇena,
anya-e0812n0:246_7: ābharaṇavisesena cālaṅkatā kenaci kuṭṭhadosalesena aṅkitā viññūnaṃ asamphusanīyā siyā,
anya-e0812n0:246_10: atthalakkhaṇena ca dosena kuṭṭhakappena vajjanīyā eva viññūnaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:247_1: Evaṃ saddatthānaṃ guṇībhūtehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā saddatthāvali kenaci padādidosena abhilakkhitā ce,
anya-e0812n0:247_4: atthālaṅkārena ca visesena yuttāpi sā saddatthāvali dosalavaṅkitā padadosādinā aṇumattenapi dosena aṅkitā
anya-e0812n0:247_5: yuttā sahitā tādisī guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttāpi dosalavaṅkitā kaññā viya dasavassikā yobbanappattā vanitāva
anya-e0812n0:247_6: viññūhi guṇadosaparikkhakehi na pasaṃsiyā na pasaṃsitabbā.
anya-e0812n0:247_7: Yathā hi dasavassikā itthī piyasabhāvasaṇṭhitā manuññehi guṇehi,
anya-e0812n0:247_8: sobhanānurūpagīveyyādiābharaṇavisesehi yuttāpi dissamānena kenaci setakuṭṭhalavena yuttā samānā guṇadosaparikkhakehi dassanīyā na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:247_9: evaṃ vuttappakārāpi bandhapaddhati kuṭṭhatulyena kenaci padādidosena yuttā viññūhi assādanīyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:247_12: sā viya dissatīti tādīsīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:250_0: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:251_2: tena tasmā kāraṇā mahussāhena mahatā vāyāmena dosānaṃ padadosādīnamanatthanimittānaṃ nirāsova satthadiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n0:251_5: Evaṃ dosanirāse ko guṇo upalabbhatīti ce.
anya-e0812n0:251_6: Sabbathā sabbappakārena niddosā dosehi niggatā sāyaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi guṇehi sahitā na bhaveyya kiṃ,
anya-e0812n0:252_2: tasmā mahussāhena adhikavāyāmena dosanirāsova padadosādīnaṃ nirākaraṇameva sādhiyo anekasatthavisayāya paññāya viññūhi sādhetabbo,
anya-e0812n0:252_3: evaṃ sati sabbathā sabbākārena niddosā dosarahitā sā ayaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi guṇehi yuttā na bhaveyya kiṃ,
anya-e0812n0:256_2: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttāpi satī niddosā sabbappakārena dosehi niggatā guṇehi saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0812n0:256_3: saṃyuttā janānamānandasandohābhisandanekahetutāya mano harati attano santikamākaḍḍhatīti manoharā hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:256_5: Yathā yena kenacipi dosena virahitā vadhū manāpacāritādīhi guṇavisesehi saṃyuttā satī kenaci ābharaṇena
anya-e0812n0:256_6: amaṇḍitā apasādhitāpi kinnāma madhurā kavīnaṃ pasādhanaṃ kinnāma manoharā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:257_2: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttā satīpi niddosā sabbappakārena dosarahitā guṇayuttā tatoyeva guṇībhūtā
anya-e0812n0:257_3: saddālaṅkārena yuttā dosarahitā dubbaṇṇadussaṇṭhānādidosehi pariccattā guṇayuttā hadayaṅgamaguṇayuttā
anya-e0812n0:257_4: vadhū viya aṅganā viya manoharā sādhujane ārādheti.
anya-e0812n0:259_0: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0812n0:261_5: Tesaṃ padānaṃ vākyānaṃ attho tadattho, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:262_1: Evaṃ alaṅkārayuttāpi appakena dosena yuttabandhassa anupādeyyattā,
anya-e0812n0:262_2: alaṅkāraalaṅkaraṇe asatipi dosarahite viññūhi upādeyyattā ca mukhyassa dosaparihārassa avassaṃ kattabbattā
anya-e0812n0:262_5: vākye “syādyantatyādyantānaṃ cayo vākyaṃ sakārakakiriyā”ti vuttalakkhaṇe vākye ca,
anya-e0812n0:262_6: tadatthe ca tesaṃ padavākyānaṃ atthe ca vividhā anekappakārā ye dosā viññūhi dosabhāvena matā ñeyyā,
anya-e0812n0:262_7: etesaṃ padādidosānaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ udāharaṇasahitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ahaṃ kathayāmi. Ettha ca–
anya-e0812n0:264_0: Nipātakañca taññūhi, asso khalvābhidhāvatī”ti rūpabhiddhiṭīkāyaṃ nāmakaṇḍe.
anya-e0812n0:280_2: Viruddhaṃ atthantaraṃ yassa taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Padaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:280_4: Adhiko attho visesyassa yena taṃ adhyatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:280_5: Nīyati avutto hetu ettha ānīyatīti neyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:280_6: Dosā padānanti yehi dosehi padāni duṭṭhāni,
anya-e0812n0:280_10: Bhaggā rīti kamo yasmiṃ taṃ bhaggarītikaṃ, vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:281_3: Kavīhi icchitatthato viruddho aññattho yassa padassāti taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:281_10: Attharahitattā anatthakaṃ nāmāti ime aṭṭha padanissitattā padadosā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:282_9: tena sahitaṃ sabandhapharusanti ime nava vākyānaṃ tathā dosā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:283_5: Dūsitālaṅkārattā duṭṭhālaṅkati nāmātime cha vākyatthanissitattā vākyatthadosā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:284_3: Evaṃ santepi samāsena padassa gahitattā napuṃsakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:284_7: Yathā hi malaggahito ādāso attano kiliṭṭhattā mukhādīnaṃ pakāsane avisado hoti,
anya-e0812n0:285_19: Duṭṭhā dūsitā alaṅkati alaṅkāro yattha taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:289_0: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:290_4: Yassa padassa añño adhippetato aparo attho adhippete vattumicchite atthe virujjhatīti anuvaditvā tasmā taṃ “viruddhatthantara”nti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:290_11: taṃ dadātīti visado megho vārivaho janaṃ lokaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti kavicchitattho.
anya-e0812n0:290_12: Visasaddo garaḷassa ca vācako siyāti garaḷado megho mārayati,
anya-e0812n0:291_2: Yassa padassa aññattho kavicchitatthato añño attho adhippete icchitatthe hi yasmā virujjhati,
anya-e0812n0:291_5: Tathā hesa appasiddhaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ “yassa aññattho adhippete virujjhatī”ti pakāsetvā tasmiṃ pakāsitatthavisaye vattati.
anya-e0812n0:291_6: “Taṃ hī”ti yojitattā “yassa aññattho adhippete virujjhatī”ti lakkhaṇaṃ pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā taṃ
anya-e0812n0:291_18: Megho ambudharo visado visasaṅkhātaṃ jalaṃ dadanto janaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti kavīhi adhippetattho.
anya-e0812n0:291_20: “visaṃ dadātīti visado”ti ettha visassa udakavisānaṃ sādhāraṇattā visadāyako megho nāsetiyeva,
anya-e0812n0:291_21: na sukhayatīti kavinā adhippetassa sukhakāraṇassa meghavisesanavisasaddassa viruddhaaññatthatāti visapadaṃ viruddhatthantaradosena duṭṭhanti.
anya-e0812n0:297_1: Yena padena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ aparaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ bhavatītyanuvaditvā etaṃ ajhatthaṃ bhaveti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:297_4: Obhāsitā dīpitā asesā nikhilā disāyena soyaṃ khajjoto virājate dippati.
anya-e0812n0:298_1: Yena visesanapadena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:298_2: etaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇopetaṃ padaṃ ajhatthaṃ bhave ajhatthaṃ nāma padadoso bhave.
anya-e0812n0:298_4: Obhāsitāsesadiso jotitasabbadiso ayaṃ khajjoto ayaṃ jotiriṅgaṇo virājate dippati.
anya-e0812n0:298_5: Ettha visesyassa khajjotassa sakaladisobhāsanassa ajhatthattā atyuttattā (ka.) “obhāsitāsesadiso”ti visesanapadaṃ ajhatthapadadoso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:304_8: tāya piyā vallabhāya soyaṃ sāmī āliṅgyate silissate.
anya-e0812n0:305_1: Yassa padassa atthāvagamo atthāvabodho pakatyādivibhāgato “ayaṃ pakati,
anya-e0812n0:305_7: Tāya piyā vanitāya so ayaṃ vallabho āliṅgyate silissate.
anya-e0812n0:305_12: Tāya piyā ettha piyāsaṅkhātāya vallabhāya kathane pīsaddassa avisadattā “piyā”ti padaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:309_6: Kiliṭṭhāni appatītadosasabhāve ṭhitatāya malitānyavisadāni padāni yassa taṃ kiliṭṭhapadaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:309_7: Mando appako abhidheyyo attho yassa taṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:309_8: tādisaṃ tampi yamakādikaṃ kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva yathāvutte anto abbhantare karīyati vidhīyati tattheva pakkhipīyati,
anya-e0812n0:310_1: Idāni anadhippetamapi yamakādiṃ kiliṭṭhadoseyeva antokaraṇabyājena āvīkaronto āha “yaṃ kiliṭṭhe”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:310_2: Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ appatītadosena missakattā avisadapadaṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ appakābhidheyyaṃ yaṃ yamakādikaṃ yaṃ yamakappaheḷikājātamatthi,
anya-e0812n0:310_3: tampi kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva yathāvuttakiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva anto karīyati abbhantare karīyati,
anya-e0812n0:314_3: Attano vacanīyatthappatītavasena vācakāpi saddā patītāyeva nāmāti patītehi pasiddhehi saddehi pāṭipadikehi racitaṃ kataṃ patītasaddaracitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:314_4: Siliṭṭhā aññamaññāliṅganena maṭṭhā padānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ sandhayo sandhanā yassa taṃ siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:314_5: Patītasaddaracitattāyeva pasādasaṅkhātena guṇena saddālaṅkārena saṃyuttaṃ sammadevopetaṃ edisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇāsayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:315_1: Idāni adhigatesu yamakesu īdisaṃ yamakamiṭṭhamiti sissānaṃ upadisanto āha “patīte”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:315_2: Patītasaddaracitaṃ “imassatthassāyaṃ vācako”ti patītehi pasiddhehi saddehi racitaṃ pāṭipadikehi kataṃ
anya-e0812n0:315_3: siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ siliṭṭhā syādyantādipadānaṃ sandhayo yassa taṃ pasādaguṇasaṃyuttaṃ patītasaddaracitattāyeva
anya-e0812n0:315_4: pasādasaṅkhātena saddālaṅkāraguṇena saṃyuttaṃ īdisaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ guṇādhikato ramaṇīyaṃ upari vakkhamānayamakasadisaṃ
anya-e0812n0:319_5: tathā ca vakkhati “vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā”ti subodhālaṅkāra 127 gāthā,
anya-e0812n0:319_13: taṃ aññaṃ aparaṃ abyapetabyapetanti tidhā yamakaṃ tāva vikappīyate.
anya-e0812n0:319_14: Tametaṃ tividhaṃ yamakaṃ visayavibhāganirūpanāyaṃ ādi ca majjho ca anto ca gocaro visayo yasseti ādimajjhantagocaraṃ viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:320_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhantabhāvīnaṃ yamakānaṃ yāvanto pakārā sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:320_9: Evaṃ paccekaṃ mūlabhūtā sattāti catūsu aṭṭhavīsati honti.
anya-e0812n0:321_2: Āvuttehi punappunaṃ vuttehi anekavaṇṇehi samudāyarūpattā anekehi sarabyañjanasarīrehi vaṇṇehi jātaṃ yamakaṃ aññehi vaṇṇehi abyavahitattā abyapetaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:321_4: ubhayamissakattā tehi aññaṃ abyapetabyapetañcāti tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:321_5: Tañca yamakaṃ visayavibhāganiyamena gāthāpādānaṃ ādigocaraṃ majjhagocaraṃ antagocaramiti tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:321_7: vattabbantaraṃ nāma yathāvuttaabyapetādibhedato aññaṃ vattabbatāya samukhībhūtaṃ pādānaṃ ādimajjhāvasānantaraṃ,
anya-e0812n0:321_15: ādi ca majjho ca anto ca,
anya-e0812n0:322_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhāvasānesu labbhamānayamakabhedā ekekasmiṃ pāde satta satta bhavanti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:322_1: Pādādiyamakaṃ pādamajjhayamakaṃ pādantayamakaṃ majjhantayamakaṃ majjhādiyamakaṃ ādyantayamakaṃ sabbatoyamakanti
anya-e0812n0:322_2: evaṃ paccekaṃ satta satta katvā catūsu mūlabhūtayamakā aṭṭhavīsa bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:322_3: Ettha pādādiyamakādikampi abyapetapaṭhamapādādiyamakaṃ tathā dutiyatatiyacatutthapādādiyamakamiti ca
anya-e0812n0:322_8: abyapetapaṭhamapādamajjhayamakaṃ tathā dutiyapādamajjhayamakamiccādinā majjhayamakampi vīsatividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:327_3: asujanā asajjanāti ete sabbe ubhayapakkhapātino visesā janā guṇena sīlādinā karaṇabhūtena,
anya-e0812n0:327_4: hetubhūtena vā vivekinopi sādhūsu labbhamānānamasādhūsvanupalabbhanato puthubhūtāpi avivekīnaṃ janānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:327_5: antike samīpe tesaṃ sannidhāne vivekaṃ vibhāgaṃ na samāyanti napāpuṇanti,
anya-e0812n0:327_6: vibhāgavijānanapaññāvekallena ca vivekinopi janā te ekato katvā passantīti.
anya-e0812n0:328_3: asujanā asādhujanā ceti sabbe ubhayapakkhikā sīlādinā,
anya-e0812n0:328_4: pāṇātipātādinā guṇena hetunā vivekino api sādhūsu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:328_5: asādhūsu sīlādīnaṃ appavattito guṇena puthubhūtāpi avivekijanantike vivekañāṇarahitānaṃ janānaṃ santike vivekaṃ vibhāgaṃ na samāyanti na pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0812n0:333_4: Apabalā tadabhāvato dubbalā ca sabbe kusalākusalā dhammā yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ ahosittaṃ vinā uppattimattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:333_5: phaladānāsambhavato kevalaṃ “ahosī”ti vacanīyatthanimittamattakammabhāvena ahosikammattaṃ no yātā na sampattā,
anya-e0812n0:333_6: tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ sukhañca dukkhañca taṃ padantīti sukhadukkhappadā siyuṃ.
anya-e0812n0:334_1: Pabalā āsevanādipaccayalābhena balavanto vā atha apabalā tadabhāvena dubbalā vā sabbe kusalākusalā ahosittaṃ
anya-e0812n0:334_2: phaladānābhāvato pavattimattataṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ no yātā appattā,
anya-e0812n0:334_3: tāva tattakaṃ sukhadukkhappadā yathākkamaṃ sukhadukkhapadāyino siyuṃ bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:337_0: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0812n0:339_3: tesaṃ bhājane ādhārabhūte ratijananādinā atthena ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye samūhabhūte ratanattaye
anya-e0812n0:339_4: sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ katvā mayā vihitā katā,
anya-e0812n0:339_5: vihitā alaṃsaṃsāradukkhavisaṭanirākaraṇato visesena hitā padhyā sā vandanā so paṇāmo daraṃ darathaṃ kāyacittapariḷāhaṃ hantu hiṃsatu.
anya-e0812n0:340_1: Vandanāmānabhājane dvārattayena vidhiyamānapaṇāmapūjānaṃ ādhārabhūte ratanattaye ratijananādiatthena
anya-e0812n0:340_2: ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye mayā yā vandanā sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ vihitā katā,
anya-e0812n0:340_3: vihitā lokiya lokuttara sampattisādhanato visesena hitā sā vandanā daraṃ mayhaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ hantu vināsetu.
anya-e0812n0:340_8: Karaṇañhi vihitāsaddassa vuttakammattepi aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato bhijjitvā vijjamānaṃ “akāsi”nti
anya-e0812n0:340_11: sattāya ekattā ekavacanañca tabbisesanattā sādarasaddopi napuṃsakadutiyekavacano hoti.
anya-e0812n0:344_0: Kātabbā tā visesane”ti sambandhacinto 15 gāthā bhedacintā 194 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:345_1: Evaṃ kriyāvisesane gahite sāmatthiyato “mayā”ti tatiyantassa paṭhamantattaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:349_0: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sahitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:350_2: Kamalaṃ aravindaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ sajjanatthāya hoti,
anya-e0812n0:350_5: Vanaṃ jalaṃ dadāti na tucchoti vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ jaladhārabhārabharitambarakuharassa dassanīyatāguṇayogato alaṃkattunti adhikataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:350_6: Sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuddhiṃ karaṃ karonto suṭṭhu gadatīti sugato mañjubhāṇī pubbabuddhā viya
anya-e0812n0:350_7: nekkhammādinā kāmacchandādike pajahanto gantvā arahattamaggena savāsanasakalakilese samucchinditvā sobhanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:350_8: nibbānapuraṃ gatoti vā sugatoti vutto so mahāmuni attano aparimitapāramitāsimpakacagalitatilakabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:350_10: sahitaṃ lokanti vā yojanīyaṃ alaṅkattuṃ alaṃkaraṇāyāti.
anya-e0812n0:351_1: Kamalaṃ padumaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ pañcavidhapadumasañchannassa udakassa ramaṇīyattā sajjetuṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:351_2: Avanado kāle vuṭṭhisampadāya sassasampadādīnaṃ kāraṇattā ārakkhaṃ dento vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ alaṅkattuṃ
anya-e0812n0:351_4: sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuḍḍhiṃ karaṃ karonto sugato citrakathī sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato vā so sugato so tathāgato lokaṃ lokattayaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:351_5: sahitaṃ lokaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ citrakathādikāraṇehi tādisassa aññassa ca lokarāmaṇeyyassābhāvā sajjetuṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:355_3: ādibhūtassa vā yamakassa eso yathāvutto leso kocideva bhedo nidassito vikappito.
anya-e0812n0:355_5: Imāya disāya iminā upāyena maggeneva aññāni vuttato aparāni dutiyapādādiyamakatatiyapādādiyamakacatutthapādādiyamakādīni
anya-e0812n0:357_0: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te”.
anya-e0812n0:365_0: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yo”.
anya-e0812n0:371_0: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvaṃ”.
anya-e0812n0:373_3: abyapetapādādiyamakassa vā eso leso “sujani”ccādiko appakodāharaṇanayo nidassito niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0812n0:373_4: Aññāni yamakānipi imāyeva disāya iminā nayeneva ñeyyāni viññūhi ñātabbāni.
anya-e0812n0:373_8: Evaṃ dassitena iminā kamena abyapetadutiyapādādiyamakādayo ñātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:376_0: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te.
anya-e0812n0:377_0: Bho nātha te tuyhaṃ citte sādhavo asādhavo te janā guṇāguṇena sakasakaguṇena aguṇena ca saha samaṃ ekajjhaṃ kathaṃ nu vigāhante,
anya-e0812n0:377_1: cittaṃ acchariyaṃ sujanadujjanesu samamettā acchariyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:380_0: Pādānate jinokāsi, so dhammo hantu vo’ppīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:381_0: Jino appiyabhāṇinopi sabbe jane piyena yena vacasā pādānate akāsi,
anya-e0812n0:381_2: Ettha apisaddapariyāyassa pisaddassa gahitattā yatibhaṅgo natthi.
anya-e0812n0:384_0: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yoti.
anya-e0812n0:385_3: “suciraṃ sucira”nti pubbaparayugaḷaṃ pubbaparayugaḷadvayaṃ (ka.) “jaye”ti bhinnavaṇṇehi ca byavahitattā byapetañca hoti.
anya-e0812n0:385_4: Suciraṃsuci sobhanaraṃsinā uci yutto yo jino saṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ samalaṃbhi alabhi,
anya-e0812n0:385_5: alaṃ accantaṃ atisayena suciraṃgaṃ visuddhadehaṃ taṃ jinaṃ samalaṃ jallikāsaṅkhātena,
anya-e0812n0:385_6: rāgādikucchitasaṅkhātena vā malena sahitaṃ saṃ attānaṃ alaṃkattuṃ nimmalaṃ katvā sajjetuṃ suciraṃ sucirakālaṃ raṃjaye attani abhiramāpeyya.
anya-e0812n0:387_0: Manohara hara klesaṃ, jina cetobhavaṃ mama;
anya-e0812n0:389_0: Manohara jina mama cetobhavaṃ klesaṃ santāpaṃ hara apanaya,
anya-e0812n0:392_0: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvanti.
anya-e0812n0:393_0: Yo jinavaro sādhunā jayaddhaninā veneyyajayaghosena mahiṃ āpūrayi,
anya-e0812n0:393_1: dhīraṃ taṃ jinavaraṃ tuvaṃ sappurisa ce atthakāmo asi,
anya-e0812n0:399_1: Kiṃ pana sākallena na vikappitānīti āha “accanti”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:399_2: Tesaṃ vikappānaṃ sambhedo saṅkaro missattamuccāraṇappakāro yoni pabhavo yesaṃ te sambhedayoniyo,
anya-e0812n0:399_3: bhedā pakārā accantabahavo atisayena bahulā yathāvuttanayena sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:399_4: tatthāpi tesu vikappesupi keci vikappā sukhena karīyanti payujjantīti sukarā,
anya-e0812n0:399_7: tesu sukarānaṃ kesañci abhimatayamakānaṃ mukhamattaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:399_8: Idāni dukkarānaṃ kesañci mukhamattaṃ na sabbamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:401_0: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n0:410_2: Tesaṃ yamakānaṃ sambhedayoniyo pabheduppattikāraṇabhūtā bhedā uccāvacapakārā accantabahavo,
anya-e0812n0:410_3: tatthāpi tesupi keci yamakā sukarā susādhiyā,
anya-e0812n0:414_0: Manaṃ manaṃ tena dadeyya ce na,
anya-e0812n0:417_0: Yo puggalo manaṃ attano cittaṃ satthu jinassa manaṃ khaṇamattampi dadeyya ce,
anya-e0812n0:417_1: satthu munindassa manaṃ cittaṃ assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ pīṇayati sampīṇeti,
anya-e0812n0:417_2: tena tasmā manaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ dadeyya ce na yadi no dadeyya,
anya-e0812n0:417_3: assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ manaṃpi muhuttampi sādhupujjaṃ sādhūhi pūjitabbaṃ na bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:419_0: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n0:423_0: Yato yena kāraṇena te tuyhaṃ satā sobhanena samunnatena sammā unnatena hetunā natepi avanatepi anatepi
anya-e0812n0:423_1: anavanatepi te te subhā te te sobhanā na na siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:423_3: ato tena kāraṇena te subhā te sobhanā nate avanate kathaṃ na siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:429_0: Paṇāmonatasajjanaṃ paṇāmitukāmonatasādhujanavantaṃ janaṃ veneyyajanaṃ asajja pamādamakatvā guṇe sīlādiguṇe
anya-e0812n0:429_1: nivesentaṃ niyojentaṃ veneyyanette añjanaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ guṇabhājanaṃ guṇānamādhārabhūtaṃ sajjanaṃjanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:429_2: iminā kāraṇena sādhujanānaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ janaṃ sādhujanaṃ khalu ekantena mamentaṃ mamāyantaṃ naṃ jinaṃ
anya-e0812n0:432_0: Sābhāya sā bhāti na ce kathaṃ na,
anya-e0812n0:435_0: Bhuvane sattaloke sābhāsu vijjamānābhāsu jinassa sābhā sobhanā ābhā sābhāya vijjamānāya,
anya-e0812n0:435_1: sobhanāya vā ābhāya ābhāto jātu ekantena bhāsatiyeva dippateva,
anya-e0812n0:435_2: sā jinābhā sābhāya vijjamānābhāto adhikā hutvā ce na bhāti yadi na bhāsati,
anya-e0812n0:435_3: sasābhānaṃ vijjamānasobhanābhānaṃ brahmādīnaṃ sābhā sobhanābhāyo aticca atikkamma kathaṃ na bhāti,
anya-e0812n0:441_0: Surāvinissaṭā surāpānato apagatā janā yathā surājanti,
anya-e0812n0:441_1: tathā vibhūsitā visesena alaṅkatā tepi surā te devā api na bhāsurā sobhamānā na honti,
anya-e0812n0:441_2: tathā evaṃ surāparājitā surāpānahetu parājitabhāvaṃ pattā bhūri asurā bahavo vepacittiādayo asurāpi na bhāsurā na sobhanti,
anya-e0812n0:441_3: tathā evaṃ surājito suṭṭhu alaṅkato rājāpi sabhāsu na bhāsuro.
anya-e0812n0:447_0: Ye sappurisā jināṇattiyaṃ buddhassa vinayapaññattisaṅkhātāṇattiyaṃ ohitāsā avītikkamavasena patiṭṭhitaāsā honti sitāsā parisuddhāsā,
anya-e0812n0:447_1: te sādhavo hatāsā anukkamena hatataṇhā avassaṃva ekanteneva atāsā bhayarahitā yato honti,
anya-e0812n0:447_2: ato tasmā sabbapāpe sabbākusale satāsā bhayasahitā vatāsāva niravajjavatābhilāsavanto sādhujanā santissitā
anya-e0812n0:451_1: Nanu yamakaṃ nāma kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyavisesasūcakanti tattha taṃ sopayogaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:451_2: paheḷikā ca sopayogā kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānamantane parabyāmohane paramabyāmohane (ka.),
anya-e0812n0:451_6: Paheḷikā pana pubbācariyehi soḷasa niddiṭṭhā samāgatāvañcitādikā.
anya-e0812n0:468_0: Dosattepi cesaṃ sabbesaṃ ukkantādīsu dosabhāve nāropitabbā.
anya-e0812n0:468_1: Esā hi manasoti (ka.) “bahuguṇe paṇamati”ccādinā subodhālaṅkāra 44 gāthā vākyasaṃkiṇṇanāmena na vuttā,
anya-e0812n0:468_2: pakappitā ca saṃsayadosaparihārena “yāte dutiyaṃ nilaya”nti subodhālaṅkāra 112 gāthā ādinā niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0812n0:475_0: Pamussitādayo tu lakkhaṇānusārena, tatthodāharaṇānusārena ca veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:476_0: Evaṃ pubbācariyehi parikappitā paheḷikā ceti etāni sabbāni ekantena niyamena na madhurāni attharasassa
anya-e0812n0:476_1: vā saddarasassa vā kassaci abhāvena assāditabbāni na hontīti iminā kāraṇena sissānamuppanno khedoyeva
anya-e0812n0:476_2: bhayaṃ tato tesaṃ khedato vā uppannabhayato mayā upekkhiyantīti sambandhanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:477_1: Evaṃ sukaradukkaravasena duvidhattaṃ vatvā kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyappakāsane sappayojanayamakānañca,
anya-e0812n0:477_2: kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānasammantane parabyāmohane cāti imesu sappayojanānañca paheḷikānamavacane kāraṇaṃ niddisati “yamaka”miccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:477_3: Taṃ yamakaṃ yathāvuttaṃ sukaradukkarādibhedaṃ yamakajātañca paheḷi ca pubbācariyehi niddiṭṭhā samāgabhādikā
anya-e0812n0:477_4: paheḷikā ca iti imāni sabbāni ekantamadhurāni na iti assādetabbassa attharasassa,
anya-e0812n0:477_5: saddarasassa vā niyamato abhāvā ekantena amadhurāni,
anya-e0812n0:477_6: iti iminā kāraṇena ca sissakhedabhayā sissānaṃ asahanasaṅkhātāya asahanena jātāya vā bhītiyā ca mayā upekkhīyanti.
anya-e0812n0:501_1: padasandhinā padānaṃ sandhānato guḷhatthā apākaṭatthā samāgatā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:501_4: Yattha paheḷikāyaṃ aññattha ruḷhena saddena aññasmiṃ atthe pasiddhena ruḷhisaddena vañcanā vañcitā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:502_0: Atibyavahitappayogā atisayena antaritapayujjamānapadayuttā tatoyeva mohakārinī sammohakārikā paheḷikā ukkantā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:502_1: Yassā paheḷikāya padāvali padapanti dubbodhatthā duranubodhābhidheyyā,
anya-e0812n0:503_0: Amukhyatthāropāhitapadā appadhānatthe mukhyatthapakāsakasaddānaṃ kiñci sadhammaṃ nissāya āropanato upaṭṭhitapadayuttā samānarūpā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:503_1: Paccayādīhi paccayādesādīhi kathañcipi yena kenaci pakārena jātasaddā nipphannasaddā pharusā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:504_0: Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ gaṇanaṃ vuttamapi byāmohakāraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:504_2: Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ vākyattho samudāyattho aññathā aññena pakārena ābhāsate viññāyate,
anya-e0812n0:505_0: Yassā paheḷikāya nāme payuttābhidhāne nānatthakappanā vividhābhidheyyakappanā sambhavati,
anya-e0812n0:505_2: Tulyatthasutihetuto samānatthasaddānaṃ payogahetuyā avaṭṭhitaññatthā patiṭṭhitaaññatthā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:506_0: Yā paheḷikā iṭṭhasaddapariyāyasādhitā icchitatthasaddassa vevacanehi nipphāditā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:506_2: Sādhukaṃ niddiṭṭhatthāpi dassitaatthayuttāpiyā mūḷhatāyeva sammohabhāvatthaṃ eva bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:507_0: Yassā paheḷikāya viracane nāmaṃ dassiyamānaṃ nāmaṃ sambandhabāhulyā sambandhassa bahulabhāvato bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:507_2: Yassā ādheyyaṃ byañja abhibyañjiya pakāsetvā nissayagopanā ādhāragutti bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:508_0: Yassā payoge ubhayagopanā ubhinnamādhārādheyyānaṃ gopanā bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:509_0: Idāni samāgatādīnaṃ lakkhiyaṃ kamena evaṃ ñātabbaṃ –
anya-e0812n0:513_0: Nātha tava pabhavato paṭṭhāya natavittiṇṇā oṇatavasena patthaṭā,
anya-e0812n0:513_3: Bho nātha tava tuyhaṃ mahatī satī mahantī samānā āṇā ānatavittiṇṇā attani natesu janesu patthaṭā pahutaphalasādhinī
anya-e0812n0:513_4: bahulatthanipphādanī cirāya cirakālaṃ jayataṃ ukkaṃsabhāvena pavattatu.
anya-e0812n0:517_1: bhaddajātikesu hatthīsu bhaddajātikahatthimeva upaseveyyāti vuttaṃ viya dissati.
anya-e0812n0:517_4: Hatthipakkhe danto sikkhito so hatthi attanisevitaṃ attānaṃ bhajitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ puraṃ nagaraṃ sampāpeti.
anya-e0812n0:517_5: Purisapakkhe pana danto damito so ariyapuggalo attanisevitaṃ attānamupasevitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ niddukkhaṃ puraṃ nibbānapuraṃ pāpeti.
anya-e0812n0:517_6: Ettha kavicchitauttamatthato aññena hatthiatthe ruḷhena saddena vañcanā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:525_0: Mukhaphullaṃ tilakādiṃ giṅgamakaṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ pasādhanaṃ niyuruggatthanunnataṃ niyuraṃ valayaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:525_3: mukhato unnatābharaṇañca dhārayantiyā bhīruyā itthiyā paṭaccarī jiṇṇavatthanivāsī poso puriso varaṃ uttamo.
anya-e0812n0:525_4: Ettha bahupayogarahitehi saddehi racitattā atthassa duravabodhatā.
anya-e0812n0:529_1: ettha imesu ratanesu aṭṭha ratanāni aṭṭhannaṃ purisānaṃ asādhāraṇāni,
anya-e0812n0:529_3: Imāni nava lokuttarāni cittīkatādiatthena “ratanānī”ti ca tappabhavo sammāsambuddho “ākaro”ti ca kappitoti
anya-e0812n0:531_0: Rasavante sare satta, na nāgāpi uposathā”ti.
anya-e0812n0:533_0: Himavantamahātale himālayassa matthake rasavante sodake satta sare anotattādike devagandhabbā vindanti sevanti,
anya-e0812n0:533_3: Himavantamahātale candaraṃsiyutte mahāpāsādatale devagandhabbā kīḷamānā gandhabbā rasavante madhuraguṇayutte
anya-e0812n0:533_4: satta sare vīṇāya chajjādike satta sare vindanti,
anya-e0812n0:533_5: nāgāpi ariyāpi uposathāpi upavutthāpi na vindanti nānubhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:533_8: Lakkhaṇakkamato pasiddhapacurapayogato aññadatthā yena kenaci lesena paccayādīnaṃ jātasaddassa atthitā.
anya-e0812n0:534_0: “Gītasadde sarā dve dve, dve chajjaññatra chassarā;
anya-e0812n0:535_0: Pañcavaṇṇaṃ yathā cakkhu, chabbaṇṇā nāsikā tathā”ti.
anya-e0812n0:537_1: chajja’ññatra chajjato aññatra chajjaṃ vajjetvā usabho gandhāro majjhimo pañcamo dhevato nisādoti.
anya-e0812n0:537_2: Ettha yugaḷato dve dve chassarā chasaravanto.
anya-e0812n0:537_5: gītasadde īkāraakārasaradvayasabbhāvato ca chajjaṃ ṭhapetvā usabhādīsu sarānaṃ tividhattā ca “cakkhū”ti
anya-e0812n0:537_6: sarabyañjanavasena pañcavaṇṇānaṃ sabbhāvato ca “nāsikā”ti channaṃ sabbhāvato ca evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:541_1: anurattaamaccamaṇḍalo vā sakantigahanakkhattasaṅghayutto sakassa attano ante samīpe gahanehi aviraḷehi
anya-e0812n0:541_2: khattasaṅghehi khattiyasamūhehi yutto saṃyutto sulakkhaṇo pasatthapurisalakkhaṇo udito pasiddho rājā
anya-e0812n0:541_3: narindo vo tumhe pātu rakkhatūti ayaṃ anadhippetattho.
anya-e0812n0:541_4: Sirimā “lakkhiyā vāsaṭṭhānattā”ti vuttattā sirimanto rattamaṇḍalo uggamane rattamaṇḍalo sakantigahanakkhattasaṅghayutto
anya-e0812n0:541_5: kantisahitehi gahanakkhattatāragaṇehi yutto sulakkhaṇo suṭṭhu sasalakkhaṇo udito uggato rājā cando vo
anya-e0812n0:541_6: tumhe pātūti ubhayapakkhassa sādhāraṇaguṇaguṇīpadapariggahena idha vākyatthassa aññathā dissamānatā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:543_0: Sanātano ca na isi, na sakhā na sanātano”ti.
anya-e0812n0:545_1: sumahantopakāravā atimahantopakārasamannāgato sanātano ca sassato ca hoti,
anya-e0812n0:545_2: tathāpi na isi isi nāma na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:545_6: Sumahā atimahanto eko ādo nāmādimhi isīti vuccati,
anya-e0812n0:545_12: so nātano tanaiti akkharadvayarahito na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:545_15: Tattha isipatananāmena isiādīnaṃ gamyamānatthattā nānatthakappanā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:549_0: Udayā udayato pabhuti atthaṃ yāva atthaṃ dhāvantaṃ javantaṃ muhuttaṃ muhuttakālaṃ na nivattati na punāvattati.
anya-e0812n0:551_0: Hitvā na sari so dhīro, karontopyu’yyamavhaya”nti karontomuttamavhayanti (ka.).
anya-e0812n0:553_0: Kittimahīnāmaṃ kittimahīnaṃ dvinnaṃ nāmena samannāgataṃ deviṃ aggamahesiṃ kaḷāratthavhayaṃ puriṃ kaḷāraatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:553_1: dvinnaṃ nāmena samannāgataṃ puriṃ nagarañca so dhīro hitvā pariccajitvā uyyamavhayaṃ uyyamanāmena samannāgataṃ
anya-e0812n0:553_2: karonto api na sari sampattiṃ nānusari,
anya-e0812n0:553_3: yasodharādeviñca kapilavatthupuriñca hitvā vīriyasaṅkhātapadhānaṃ karonto mahāsatto sampattiṃ na sari,
anya-e0812n0:557_0: Sindhavā cattāro assā catuddisāmukhā yathā catuddisāsammukhā honti,
anya-e0812n0:557_1: tathā bandhā majjhe nikkhittaṃ tiṇaṃ sayaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0812n0:557_2: aññamaññaṃ piṭṭhiṃ katvā bandhā viya khāyati,
anya-e0812n0:557_3: te pana sammukhaṃ katvā bandhā honti.
anya-e0812n0:557_4: Ettha “catuddisāmukhābandhā”ti niddiṭṭhattā piṭṭhiṃ katvā bandhāti sammuḷhatā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:561_0: Jīvanajānandakarabandhussa jīvanato udakato jātānaṃ padumānaṃ ānandakarassa sūriyassa bandhussa sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0812n0:561_1: bhāsitaṃ vacanaṃ sakkaronto pūjento jano puññārikkhayagocare puññānaṃ paṭipakkhattā puññārisaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:561_2: akusalānaṃ khayassa nimittabhūtaṃ nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā uppanne maggaphale pappoti pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0812n0:561_4: puññārīnaṃ khayanimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatteti ca iminā buddho maggaphalā ca pārampariyena sambandhena vuttāti sambandhānaṃ bāhullabhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:562_0: “Na gaṇhāti mahantampi, saddaṃ na ca vibhūsanaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:565_0: Kassāpi catuppadassa kaṇṇo mahantampi saddaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0812n0:565_3: Tathāpi ayaṃ kaṇṇo aphalo na kila,
anya-e0812n0:565_6: Ettha kaṇṇoti ādheyyaṃ katvā tadādhārassa avacanato nissayagutti.
anya-e0812n0:569_0: Sassiriko sadevakaṃ bhuvanaṃ alaṅkarontoti buddho viya khāyati.
anya-e0812n0:569_1: Bhuvanaṃ bhuvanasaṅkhātaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ sadā eva alaṅkaronto sassiriko lakkhiyasamannāgato kasmiṃ jale sañjātasaṃvaddho
anya-e0812n0:569_2: ko kataro kena jalena na upalimpati na limpati.
anya-e0812n0:569_5: Iha jalapadumānaṃ dvinnampi chāditattā ubhayacchannā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:573_3: siddhaṃ nipphannaṃ tādīsu ariyesu vattantaṃ asaṅkhatapadaṃ vada kathehīti ayamaparattho.
anya-e0812n0:573_4: Ādo ādimhi soyeva sakāro eva ante pariyosāne yo yakāroyeva,
anya-e0812n0:573_5: majjhimo majjhimavaṇṇo majjhimassa saddassa ādi makāro,
anya-e0812n0:573_6: siddhantādīsu matasamayakālādīsu vattantaṃ vācakabhāvena pavattantaṃ asaṅkhatapadaṃ saṅkhatato aññattā asaṅkhatabhūtaṃ paññattiṃ vada kathehīti.
anya-e0812n0:573_8: Ettha siddhantasaddena ādisaddassa saṅgahitattā tādiattho labbhatīti atthassa guḷhatāya samāgatālakkhaṇena
anya-e0812n0:573_9: ca “so”ti “yo”ti “asaṅkhatapada”nti aññattharuḷhasaddena vañcitattā vañcitālakkhaṇena ca samayasadde
anya-e0812n0:573_10: nānatthakappanato nāmantarikālakkhaṇena cāti tīhipi lakkhaṇehi missitoti.
anya-e0812n0:573_12: Tattha tattha vuttalakkhaṇānusāreneva samāgatādīnaṃ anvatthasaññatā veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:577_9: Tehi virodho assa atthīti desa…pe… virodhi.
anya-e0812n0:577_12: Etañca padaṃ udāharaṇato lakkhiyato phuṭaṃ pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:577_14: ratyādīsu sambhavantānaṃ kusumādīnaṃ divādīsu sambhavo ca,
anya-e0812n0:577_15: “naccagītādicatusaṭṭhiyā kalāsu bhinnachajjo nāma sattasaro”tiādinā kalāsatthābhihitalakkhaṇātikkamavirodho ca,
anya-e0812n0:577_19: yathāsakamāgamena virodho ca sukhena ca sakkā pākaṭattā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:578_1: Evaṃ yamakapaheḷikānamadassane kāraṇaṃ vatvā idāni uddesakkamena sampattavirodhidosaṃ “desakāli”ccādinā vadati.
anya-e0812n0:578_10: Tehi virodho assa atthīti desa…pe… virodhi.
anya-e0812n0:578_12: Etaṃ virodhipadaṃ udāharaṇato lakkhiyato phuṭaṃ paribyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:578_15: rattiādīsu labbhamānānaṃ kumudādīnaṃ divādīsu sambhavo ca,
anya-e0812n0:578_16: naccagītādicatusaṭṭhiyā kalāsu “chajjo usabho gandhāro majjhimo pañcamo dhevato nisādo”ti dassitasattasarānamekadesassa
anya-e0812n0:578_17: chajjassa bhinnasattasaro chajjo nāmāti samudāyavasena vohārakaraṇādīhi satthāgatataṃ,
anya-e0812n0:578_24: yathāsakamāgamamatikkamma kathanañcāti sabbesaṃ viruddhasabhāvassa pākaṭattā udāharaṇaṃ na dassayissāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:578_25: Imesameva desādivirodhīnamaviruddhattaṃ ettheva virodhipadadosaparihāre “bodhisattappabhāvenā”ticcādinā dissati. Desa…pe…
anya-e0812n0:581_0: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:582_6: Yaṃ kiñci padaṃ samānīya ānetvā vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:582_9: Sabbāpi sakalāpi disā pubbadisādayo dasa disā rattiyaṃ rajanyaṃ dhavalā ujjalā rocanti dippantīti ettake niddiṭṭhe candamarīcino ettha neyyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:583_6: Yathā tatthodāharaṇamīdisaṃ “sabbāpi dhavalā disā rocanti rattiya”nti.
anya-e0812n0:583_7: Sabbāpi disā pubbadakkhiṇādayo dasa disā dhavalā setā rattiyaṃ rajanyaṃ rocanti dippanti.
anya-e0812n0:583_8: Ettha disāya visesanaṃ dhavalaguṇaṃ kelāsakūṭasudhābhitticandaraṃsiādīsu kuto sañjātamiti anicchitattā
anya-e0812n0:583_9: aññanivattanatthaṃ candakiraṇādivācakapadaṃ ānetvā dhavalatā imineti vattabbattā dhavala padaṃ neyyadosena
anya-e0812n0:585_0: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0812n0:587_2: Īdisaṃ anantare vuttappakāraṃ neyyaṃ sabbepi viññuno ñeyyavidū sabbattha gajjādike na bahu maññanti na sambhāventi nappayujjanti.
anya-e0812n0:587_4: Tathā hi avagatī atthāvagamo saddaṃ vācakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:587_5: sāmatthiyañca ñāyaṃ vilaṅghayati cajati anupadassanatoti saddasāmatthiyavilaṅghinī dullabhā na labhyate.
anya-e0812n0:587_6: Ñāyopattho vā saddopattho vā yottho na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:587_7: So nappatīyate yathā manasi avaṭṭhitamattenāti attho.
anya-e0812n0:588_1: Imaṃ appatītapadaṃ viññūhi nābhimatanti dassento āha “nedisa”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:588_2: Īdisaṃ yathāvuttappakāraṃ neyyaṃ sabbe viññuno sabbattha gajjapajjādike na bahu maññanti na sambhāventi nappayojenti.
anya-e0812n0:588_3: Avagatī atthāvabodho saddasāmatthiyavilaṅghinī saddasaṅkhātavācakañca sāmatthiyasaṅkhātañāyañca atikkamma
anya-e0812n0:588_7: so kattuno manasi patiṭṭhitamattena patīto na hotīti taṃ padaṃ neyyadosamiti sabbe kavino pariharantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:594_2: Yaṃ padaṃ visesanaṃ patvā atthena saha vattatīti sātthakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:595_2: Yaṃ padaṃ visesanaṃ patvā sātthakaṃ atthasahitaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:595_5: Taṃ yathā tassodāharaṇamevaṃ “taṃ so bhiyyo passati cakkhunā”ti.
anya-e0812n0:595_6: So puriso taṃ purisaṃ bhiyyo yebhuyyasā cakkhunā passati.
anya-e0812n0:595_8: Cakkhunāti visesyapadaṃ visesanaṃ laddhāva sātthakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:595_10: saha atthena vattamānaṃ sātthakamiti ca samāso.
anya-e0812n0:597_0: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0812n0:599_2: Yaṃ visesanapadaṃ visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ hīnaṃ lāmakaṃ kare kareyya,
anya-e0812n0:599_3: taṃ visesanapadaṃ hīnatthaṃ hīno attho yassa taṃ hīnatthaṃ nāma bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n0:599_5: Nippabhīkato khajjoto yena so divākaro pabhākaro samudeti upagacchatīti.
anya-e0812n0:600_6: Pabhārahitakatā khajjotā yena so divākaro sūriyo samudeti uggacchati.
anya-e0812n0:600_7: “Nippabhīkatakhajjoto”ti iminā visesanena lāmakālokaladdhayuttassa khajjopanakassa abhibhavanappakāsanaṃ sahassaraṃsino nindāyeva,
anya-e0812n0:604_0: 39. Hi api casaddānaṃ pādapūraṇamattattā anatthakattaṃ. Visesanavisesyapadadoso.
anya-e0812n0:605_2: Yaṃ padaṃ pādapūraṇamattaṃ catutthaṃsasaṅkhātassa pādassa pūraṇamattameva hoti,
anya-e0812n0:605_6: Ettha hi apicāti imesaṃ samattanādiatthesu appavattito kevalaṃ pādapūraṇamattato anatthakattaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:609_0: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0812n0:611_2: Saddato vācakena tasmiṃyevatthe tasseva saddassa puna payogato atthato abhidheyyena pubbapaṭipādikasseva
anya-e0812n0:611_3: vatthussāvisesena puna paṭipādanato vuttaṃ payuttaṃ yaṃ padattharūpaṃ yattha yasmiṃ vākye bhiyyopi vuccati
anya-e0812n0:612_2: Saddato vācakena atthato abhidheyyena vuttaṃ payuttaṃ yaṃ padattharūpaṃ yattha yasmiṃ vākye bhiyyopi punapi vuccati yujjate,
anya-e0812n0:612_5: Vārido jaladāyako ayaṃ vārido megho ābhāti dippati.
anya-e0812n0:612_6: Sampattisādhakaṃ “jaladāyako”ccādivisesanaṃ vinā jaladānamattassa vuttattā saddato ekatthaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:617_1: Titthiyasaṅkhātānaṃ aṅkurānaṃ bījāni uppattihetubhūtāni diṭṭhigatāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo jahaṃ jahanto
anya-e0812n0:617_2: dūrīkaronto so mahāmuni sammāsambuddho iha loke attani pasanne pasādabahule mahājane pasādetīti aparamudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:617_3: Pasādasaṅkhātassa atthassa “pasanne pasādetī”ti vuttattā idamatthato ekatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:618_2: So mahāmuni titthiyaṅkurabījāni titthiyasaṅkhātānaṃ aṅkurānaṃ uppattikāraṇabhūtāni diṭṭhigatāni sassatādibhedabhinnā
anya-e0812n0:618_3: dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo jahaṃ jahanto apanento iha loke pasanne attani pasanne mahājane pasādeti.
anya-e0812n0:618_4: Pasannasaddena vuttappasādasaṅkhātassa atthassa pasādetīti kriyāpadenapi vuttattā sadde bhinnepi atthato ekanti atthato ekatthassudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:621_0: Kāpi paññā, kopi guṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0812n0:622_6: Mahāmuni tava te paññā kāpi sātisayattā aniddhāritaṃ sabhāvavisesā kāciyeva,
anya-e0812n0:622_8: Ettha kāpi kopīti sabbanāmapadakkamassa pakatīti ettha vicchinnattā bhaggarīti.
anya-e0812n0:623_2: Āraddhakkamavicchedā vatthumāraddhapadakkamassa vicchedahetu bhaggarīti bhave bhaggarītivākyadoso bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:623_4: Mahāmuni tava tuyhaṃ paññā sātisayabhūtā paññā kāpi vacanavisayātikkantattā kāpiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:623_5: Guṇo sīlasamādhiādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇasamūho kopi pamāṇapariggahassa kenaci lesenapi kattumasakkuṇeyyattā kopiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:623_6: Pakatīpi acinteyyabhūtā pakatīpi evameva aho vijjamānānaṃyeva paññādīnaṃ sabhāvāvabodhassa dukkaratā acchariyā.
anya-e0812n0:623_7: Kāpi kopīti padakkamassa “pakatī”ti ettha suññattā rītibhaṅgo.
anya-e0812n0:627_2: Yattha yasmiṃ vākye padānaṃ syādyantākhyātikānaṃ dubbinikkhepā duṭṭhapanato byāmoho saṃmuḷhatā jāyati uppajjati,
anya-e0812n0:628_2: Padānaṃ syādyantatyādyantapadānaṃ dubbinikkhepā duṭṭhapanato yattha vākye byāmoho saṃmoho jāyati,
anya-e0812n0:628_4: Tadudāharaṇaṃ tassa byākiṇṇadosassa lakkhiyaṃ yathā iminā vakkhamānanayena.
anya-e0812n0:632_1: Bahuanantattā bahubhūte guṇe sīlādike samanussaraṃ sammadeva uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya anussaranto guṇavisayasatiṃ
anya-e0812n0:632_2: paccupaṭṭhāpento teneva kāraṇena pamudito haṭṭhapahaṭṭho ayaṃ jano sabbopi loko dujjanānaṃ sujanetarānampi
anya-e0812n0:632_3: devadattādīnaṃ niccaṃ kālaṃ hitaṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ paṇamati namassatīti ayaṃ attho kavivañcito.
anya-e0812n0:632_4: Tattha “bahuguṇe paṇamatī”tyādi byavahitapadappayogā moho jāyatīti byākiṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:633_2: Bahuguṇe anantattā bahubhūte sīlasamādhiādiguṇe samanussaraṃ visesato anussaranto pamudito tatoyeva pahaṭṭho
anya-e0812n0:633_3: ayaṃ jano sattanikāyo dujjanānampi asappurisānampi niccaṃ satataṃ hitaṃ mittabhūtaṃ sugataṃ sabbaññuṃ
anya-e0812n0:633_5: Ettha padānaṃ aṭṭhānapayogato byākiṇṇattaṃ padatthānusāreneva gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:636_0: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃ nvi’daṃ.
anya-e0812n0:637_1: Visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthassa vacanato kathanato apetaṃ pariccattaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:637_5: idaṃ kiṃ nu iti gāmikajanavacanattā “kaññi”ccādikaṃ gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:638_2: Visiṭṭhavacanāpetaṃ piyabhūtena uttivisesena visesitabbassa kathanato parihīnaṃ vākyaṃ “gāmmadosa”nti kavīhi abhimataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:638_4: Kaññe he kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ icchayamānaṃ maṃ na kāmayasi tvaṃ na icchasi,
anya-e0812n0:642_0: Sa manmathonyatra gato mato nu”iti viya.
anya-e0812n0:643_0: Piyatthassa kathanābhāvato “kaññe”tyādikaṃ vacanaṃ milakkhukānaṃ vacanattā gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:643_1: Ettha kaññāsaddo dasavassikāya vattatīti niyamo natthi.
anya-e0812n0:647_2: Padasandhānato pubbāparānaṃ padānaṃ sandhivasena yaṃ kiñci vākyaṃ duṭṭhu asutisubhagaṃ patītimavabodhaṃ karotīti karaṃ bhave,
anya-e0812n0:647_5: Bhavato yā kāci vanitā piyā hotīti ekottho.
anya-e0812n0:648_2: Kiñci vākyaṃ padasandhānato pubbāparapadānaṃ ghaṭanato duppatītikaraṃ bhave asabbhabhūtaduṭṭhatthassa pakāsako hoti,
anya-e0812n0:648_3: tampi gāmmanti yathāvuttagāmmadosena dūsitanti duppasitanti (ka.) sabbehi kavīhi abhimataṃ ñātaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:648_5: Bhavato bhavantassa yā kāci itthī piyā bhavatīti ayaṃ kavinā icchitattho.
anya-e0812n0:650_0: Vuttesu sūcite ṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0812n0:651_0: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0812n0:652_2: Vuttesu chandosatthapariniddiṭṭhesu anuṭṭhubhādīsu sūcite ṭhāne “etthayatī”ti chandovicitiyā pakāsitaṭṭhāne
anya-e0812n0:652_3: padānaṃ syādyantānaṃ chedo vicchiti vibhāgo anuvādo yaṃ yati bhaveti vidhīyati.
anya-e0812n0:652_4: Tāya yatiyā hīnaṃ parihīnaṃ viruddhaṃ yaṃ vākyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:653_2: Vuttesu chandosatthe niddiṭṭhaanuṭṭhubhādīsu sūcite ṭhāne “ayamettha yatī”ti pakāsite ṭhāne padacchedo
anya-e0812n0:653_3: syādyantatyādyantādīnaṃ padānaṃ vicchedo yati nāma bhave,
anya-e0812n0:653_4: tāya yatiyā yaṃ vākyaṃ hīnaṃ abhimataṭṭhāne vaṇṇavicchedena parihīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:653_5: taṃ vākyaṃ yatihīnanti yatihīnadosena duṭṭhanti viññūhi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:655_0: Yati sabbattha pādante, vuttaḍḍhe ca visesato;
anya-e0812n0:657_2: Sabbattha pādante sabbasmiṃ catutthaṃsasaṅkhātānaṃ gāthāpādānaṃ ante avasāne ca visesato visesena ekantena
anya-e0812n0:657_3: vuttaḍḍhe ca vuttānaṃ pādadvayasaṅkhāte aḍḍhe ca,
anya-e0812n0:657_6: Nanu “padacchedo”ti vuttattā padamajjhe yati na hotevāti ceti āha “pubba”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:658_2: Sā pana yati sabbattha pādante catutthaṃsasaṅkhātagāthāpādānaṃ ante ca visesato niyamato vuttaḍḍhe ca vuttānaṃ pādadvayasaṅkhāte aḍḍhe ca,
anya-e0812n0:658_4: Katthaci kismiñci ṭhāne pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhepi pubbāparabhūtaanekavaṇṇasamannāgatapadānaṃ majjhe ca siyā.
anya-e0812n0:658_5: Padacchedassa “yatī”ti vuttattā padamajjhe na hotīti saṅkāpariharaṇatthaṃ “pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhe”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:663_3: Cāmīkarasseva suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassa taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā namāmi. Kīdisaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:663_4: Yo tathāgato sakalāpi disā sabbāyeva dasa disā soṇṇarasehi cāmīkaravaṇṇattā rasehi suvaṇṇarasehi siñcatīva siñcatīti maññe,
anya-e0812n0:663_6: Ettha pubbapādante vuttaḍḍhe ca niyatā yati.
anya-e0812n0:663_11: Siñcatīti ettha pana pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhattābhāvā siñcaityatra yati duṭṭhāti.
anya-e0812n0:664_1: Tattha pādantavuttaḍḍhesu yatiyā pākaṭattā tasmiṃ padamajjhe yatiyā udāharaṇapaccudāharaṇāni iṭṭhodāharaṇapaṭipakkhodāharaṇāni yathā.
anya-e0812n0:664_3: Yo tathāgato sakalāpi disā soṇṇarasehi suvaṇṇarasadhārāhi siñcatīva siñcati maññe,
anya-e0812n0:664_5: Cāmīkaravaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇasadisachavivaṇṇaṃ taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā name.
anya-e0812n0:664_6: Ettha “cāmīkaravaṇṇa”nti yatiyā cāmīti akkharadvayamatikkamma ṭhitattā antepi karaiti akkharadvayenānūnattā
anya-e0812n0:664_8: Siñcatīti pade siñcāti vaṇṇadvayamatikkamma yatiyā dissamānattepi tiiti parabhāge ekavaṇṇattā anekavaṇṇābhāvoti paccudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:664_10: Cāmīkarassa vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:666_0: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0812n0:668_2: Vibhattiyā lope sati sandhimhi saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ saro parapadādibhūto pubbanto viya pubbapadassa antabhūto yo saro,
anya-e0812n0:668_4: anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi tato vihitayatiyā nevatthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:668_5: Aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope tu sati saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ pubbapadantabhūto saro ce,
anya-e0812n0:668_8: Taṃ vibhattiyā saddhiṃ vihāya katayatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:668_9: Tattha tassaṃ yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kātabbo yakārādesādi parādiva parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti.
anya-e0812n0:668_10: Katayādesādisahitaṃ byañjanaṃ vihāya katāya yatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:669_1: Idāni heṭṭhā vuttassa viruddhattepi yatibhaṅgābhāvaṃ dassento āha “saro”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:669_2: Vibhattiyā lope sandhimhi sati saro sandhisaro pubbanto viya pubbapadassa anto viya hoti,
anya-e0812n0:669_3: aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ aññathā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:669_4: pubbapadantabhūto saro parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti.
anya-e0812n0:669_5: Tattha yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kattabbayakārādesādi parādiva parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti,
anya-e0812n0:669_7: yatiyā payuttāya sati anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi yatibhaṅgo na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:673_1: Niccaṃ anavarataṃ pubbapadaṃ sitā nissitā cādī cakārādayo nipātā pubbassa padassa antā avayavā viya honti,
anya-e0812n0:673_2: te anto katvā yati kātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:673_5: pādayo tu parādīva parapadassa ādī avayavā viya honti,
anya-e0812n0:673_6: taṃ vihāya pubbapadante yati kātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:674_2: Niccaṃ satataṃ pubbapadassitā pubbapadaṃ nissāya pavattā cādī cakārādinipātā pubbapadantāva pubbapadassa antā avayavā viya honti,
anya-e0812n0:674_3: parena parapadena niccasambandhā nirantarayogino pādayo tu pādiupasaggā pana parādīva parapadassa ādī avayavāviya honti.
anya-e0812n0:674_4: Cādayo āgamma te bahi katvāpi pādayo āgamma te anto katvāpi pavatto virāmo yatibhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:678_0: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta-sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0812n0:681_0: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
anya-e0812n0:682_8: Ettha “sabbā upamā”ti samāsaṃ katvā vibhattilope saṃhitāyañca katāyaṃ parapadādiukāro pubbapadantabbakāraṭṭhaakāro
anya-e0812n0:682_10: Pattassopamā iccatra yakārādesassa parādisadisabhāvo viya hoti,
anya-e0812n0:682_11: vibhattiyā alope saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ savibhattiyā akāro parapadādi ukāro viya hotīti taṃvibhattiyā pasiddhaṃ vihāya pattaiccatra pādantayati.
anya-e0812n0:682_12: Tathā vandāmyanantaiccatra yakārādesassa parādisadisabhāvo vihitoti myasaddaṃ vajjetvā vandāiccatra pādantayati.
anya-e0812n0:682_13: Pubbapadassitānaṃ cādīnaṃ pubbapadantasadisatā vuttāti mettā cāti casaddato yati,
anya-e0812n0:682_14: aparapadasambandhā pādayo parapadādisadisā hontīti nissīmāti ettha nisaddaṃ vihāya tato ādimhi yati.
anya-e0812n0:683_3: lokaggataṃ pattassa yassa buddhassa upamā na hi yujjati sakalapadatthānaṃ atikkamma ṭhitattā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0812n0:683_4: Sabbopamātītaṃ taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā name namāmi.
anya-e0812n0:683_5: Sabboti ettha okārassa pubbapadantasarasadisattā tato parāya yatiyā ca ssopamāti parapadādisadisaṃ vaṇṇamanatikkamma ṭhitāya yatiyā ca udāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:684_1: Yassa sambuddhassa paññā ca mettā canissīmā anantasattaanantañeyyavisayakaraṇato sīmārahitā ativijambhati.
anya-e0812n0:684_2: Anantamatiṃ udayabbayasambhavepi ñeyyassānantattā visayimhi visayavohārena anantapaññāya samannāgataṃ
anya-e0812n0:684_3: uttamaṃ tato eva pavaraṃ taṃ munindaṃ sadā vandāmi,
anya-e0812n0:684_5: Mettācanissīmāti ettha cādīnaṃ pubbapadantasadisattāca pādīnaṃ parapadādisadisattā ca “cā”ti “nī”ti imesampi yati bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:689_5: teneva pavaraṃ uttamaṃ taṃ jinanti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:689_6: Ettha pubbapadanissitaṃ cakāraṃ parapadādibhūtaṃ katvā tato pubbe katā yati ca,
anya-e0812n0:689_7: parapadādisambandhapakāraṃ pubbapadantabhūtaṃ katvā pakārato paraṃ katā yati ca viruddhāti ubhayattha paccudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:690_3: Yattha yasmiṃ jine mahāmettā ca mahāpaññā ca imā paramodayā ukkaṭṭhābhivuḍḍhiyo honti.
anya-e0812n0:690_4: Varaguṇālayaṃ uttamaguṇākaraṃ pavaraṃ tatoyeva uttamaṃ taṃ jinaṃ paṇamāmi.
anya-e0812n0:690_5: Ettha cakāraṃ parapadādiṃ katvā pakāraṃ pubbapadantaṃ katvā yatiyā pavattattā “ca yattha,
anya-e0812n0:693_0: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:694_2: Padānaṃ atthakkamato muttaṃ gaḷitaṃ kamaccutamidanti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:694_3: Khettaṃ vā iccādinā arucitoyaṃ yācanakkamo vattuno aviññutaṃ gameti.
anya-e0812n0:695_2: Padatthakkamato padānaṃ atthakkamato muttaṃ gaḷitaṃ idaṃ vākyaṃ kamaccutaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:695_4: Mama sobhanaṃ khettaṃ vā gāmaṃ vā desaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā dehi.
anya-e0812n0:695_5: Ettha khettamiccādi yācanakkamo vattuno aviññubhāvaṃ vinā ucitapadatthakkamaṃ nappakāseti,
anya-e0812n0:695_6: tathā hi khettamapi dātumanicchanto gāmanigamajanapadādiṃ kathaṃ dassatīti kamahāni.
anya-e0812n0:699_3: taṃ lokiyatthamabhidheyyaṃ atikkantaṃ ananuvuttaṃ yaṃ taṃ ativuttaṃ matanti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:699_5: Etissā vanitāya thanānaṃ payodharānaṃ jambhane byāpane ākāsaṃ gaganaṃ atisambādhaṃ accantappakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:700_2: Lokiyatthaṃ loke pasiddhamabhidheyyaṃ atikkantaṃ kathanākārena atikkamitaṃ vākyaṃ ativuttamiti mataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:700_4: Etissā thanajambhane thanānaṃ vijambhane ākāsaṃ atisambādhaṃ anokāsaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:700_5: Ettha payodharānaṃ mahantattaṃ vadāmāti loke mahantanti pasiddhaṃ gaganamapi atikkantattā vākyamativuttadosena dūsitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:703_0: Gāviputto balībaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:704_2: Samudāyassa pakaraṇato padasandhino vākyassa attho abhidheyyaṃ aṅgaṅgibhūtaṃ kriyākārakasambandhīvisesalakkhaṇaṃ saṃvohārikaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:704_4: vinā na (ka.) padatthamattena tassa katthaci byabhicārābhāvato etādisaṃ yaṃ tamapetatthakanti vidhi.
anya-e0812n0:705_2: Samudāyatthato visesanavisesyabhūtakriyākārakasambandhehi yuttavākyasaṅkhātapadasamudāyassa sambandhapadattā vohārānurūpaatthato apetaṃ apagataṃ,
anya-e0812n0:705_3: avayavatthamattassa vā sabbattha labbhamānattā samudāyatthato suññaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:705_5: Yathiccādinā udāharati “gāviputto balībaddho usabho tiṇaṃ khādi,
anya-e0812n0:705_7: Ettha avayavatthamattena vinā samudāyena gamyamānassa kassaci visesatthassa abhāvā samudāyatthato apagataṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:707_0: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
anya-e0812n0:708_0: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
anya-e0812n0:709_2: Kharāiccādikaṃ bandhapharusaṃ sutisubhagattābhāvato kharā kakkasā khilā khāṇukādayo parikkhīṇā khayaṃ pattā yato,
anya-e0812n0:709_3: tasmā khette kedāre khittaṃ vuttaṃ alamaccantaṃ phalati nipphajjati.
anya-e0812n0:710_2: Bandhe bandhasarīre pharusatā sutisukhatābhāvato pharusabhāvo yattha vākye bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:710_5: Kharā kakkasā khilā khāṇukādayo parikkhīṇā yasmā khīṇā honti,
anya-e0812n0:710_6: tasmā khette khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ alaṃ atisayena phalati nipphajjati.
anya-e0812n0:716_2: Apakkamādīnaṃ yathāuddiṭṭhānaṃ lakkhīyati udāharaṇamanenāti atthena lakkhaṇaṃ anvatthavasena apagato
anya-e0812n0:716_3: kamo yattha taṃ apakkamantiādinā atthānugamanavasena ñeyyaṃ viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:716_4: Idāni vākyadose niddisitvā avasarappatte imasmiṃ kāle etesaṃ apakkamādīnaṃ udāharaṇaṃ lakkhiyaṃ ahaṃ sandassayāmi pakāsessāmi.
anya-e0812n0:717_2: Apakkamādīnaṃ apakkamocityahīnādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ apakkamādivisayabuddhiyā aviparītavuttiyā pavattikāraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:717_3: anvatthavasena apagato kamo yatthiccādivacanatthānugatañāṇavasena ñeyyaṃ ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:717_4: visuṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na vadāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:717_5: Idāni ahaṃ etesaṃ apakkamādīnaṃ udāharaṇaṃ lakkhiyaṃ sandassayāmi.
anya-e0812n0:723_1: Tattha tesu apakkamādīsu apakkamaṃ yathā apakkamassodāharaṇamevaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:723_4: Iha imasmiṃ attabhāve sammā sampāditāni alobhādihetusampattiyā sakkaccaṃ sampāditāni rāsikatāni bhāvanādānasīlāni
anya-e0812n0:723_8: Na saṃsayo sadisavisadisavipākadāne saṃsayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0812n0:723_9: Ettha bhogasagganibbānānaṃ hetubhūtā pana kamato dānasīlabhāvanāyo bhavantīti phalakkamassa hetukkamaṃ viruddhamiti kamāpetaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:726_0: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
anya-e0812n0:727_2: Yato yasmā kāraṇā sabbe guṇā sīlādayo ekasmiṃ kevale mayi eva samuditā rāsibhūtā ahuṃ ahesuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:727_3: tasmā kāraṇā imasmiṃ sattaloke eko kevalo ahameva nirantaraṃ satataṃ pūjanīyataro atisayena pujjoti.
anya-e0812n0:728_2: Yato yasmā sabbe guṇā sīlādayo ekasmiṃ mayi adutiye mayi eva samuditā rāsibhūtā ahuṃ ahesuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:728_3: tasmā loke sattaloke eko adutiyo ahameva nirantaraṃ satataṃ pūjanīyataro atisayena pūjanīyo.
anya-e0812n0:728_4: Evaṃ attappasaṃsanato ucitatāya parihānīti ocityahīnaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:731_0: Yācitohaṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmyapi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:733_3: jīvitampi yācakānaṃ dajjāmī”ti dassitodāratāyānucitaṃ puttadāne hadayapavedhanakathanaṃ vessantarassa yajjevamavoca.
anya-e0812n0:734_2: Yācito yācakehi yācito ahaṃ jīvitamapi kathaṃ nāma na dajjāmi,
