anya-e0812n0:734_3: tathāpi evaṃ dānajjhāsaye satipi puttadānena mama hadayaṃ vedhate kampate.
anya-e0812n0:734_5: jīvitamapi yācakānaṃ dajjāmī”ti katapaṭiññāya puttadānena hadayakampanassa kathanaṃ cāgātisayayogasaṅkhātaudāraguṇassa ananucchavikanti ocityahīnaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:738_0: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhī ca.
anya-e0812n0:739_3: Ettha sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā pariccāgena viseiccādinā ādhāre sattamīniddeso attharītiyā bhaṅgo.
anya-e0812n0:739_4: Ādo majjhe ca cakārapariccāgā saddarītiyā bhaṅgo,
anya-e0812n0:740_2: Itthīnañca dujjanānañca vissāso sahavāsādīhi vissāso nopapajjate anatthasaṃsayānivattikāraṇattā na yujjati.
anya-e0812n0:740_3: Vise garaḷe ca siṅgimhi siṅgavati mahiṃ sādo ca nadiyañca roge vaḍḍhamānake roge ca rājakulamhi ca vadhabandhanādikārake
anya-e0812n0:740_5: Ettha ādo sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā ārabhitvā taṃ pahāya sattamiyā vuttattā attharīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:740_7: Casaddaṃ payuñjantena ādo eva vā ante eva vā paccekaṃ vā yojetabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:745_7: tena lolāni capalāni locanāni akkhīni yassa so jano avakkanto okkanto paviṭṭho pantho maggo yena avakkantapantho eva gunnaṃ raṃsīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:745_8: iṭṭhatthanipphattisūcakabhāvena gopadatthassa vā padassanena pīṇito muditoti ettha gorūpassa padassanenātipi viññāyatīti sandeho.
anya-e0812n0:746_2: Munindacandimālokarasalolavilocano munindasaṅkhātassa candimassa āloke dassane pātubhāve vā rasena ālayena
anya-e0812n0:746_3: cañcalanetto jano avakkantapanthova otiṇṇamaggova buddhassa dassanatthāya maggamotiṇṇoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:746_6: Ettha gopadassanenāti ca atthassa gamyamānattā viññātuṃ saṃsayo uppajjatīti sasaṃsayaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:750_2: Paraṃ sattuṃ hantvāna paharitvā vīriyavā sūro soyaṃ poso puriso vissami vissattho.
anya-e0812n0:750_4: Paraṃ accantaṃ hantvāna vīriyavā ucitasambhavo soyaṃ poso vissamīti duppatītoyamattho.
anya-e0812n0:751_4: Paraṃ sattuṃ hantvāna māretvāna vīriyavā sūro so ayaṃ poso vissami vigataparissamo ahosi,
anya-e0812n0:751_6: Paraṃ atisayena hantvāna vītikkamaṃ katvā vīriyavā upacitasambhavo upacitasukko so ayaṃ puriso vāyāmena vissami vigatavāyāmo ahosīti.
anya-e0812n0:751_8: Vīriyaṃ ussāho sambhavo vā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:755_2: Yattha yasmiṃ vākye alaṅkārānaṃ dūsanaṃ vikaṭatā,
anya-e0812n0:755_4: tassa duṭṭhālaṅkārassa rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ alaṅkāraniddese taṃnāmake paricchede āvībhavissati pakāsissati,
anya-e0812n0:756_2: Yattha vākye alaṅkāradūsanaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ virodho hoti,
anya-e0812n0:756_3: etaṃ vākyatthanissitaṃ etaṃ vākyaṃ duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ duṭṭhālaṅkāro nāma,
anya-e0812n0:756_4: tassa duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇadosopalakkhitavākyassa rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ lakkhiyaṃ alaṅkāraniddese alaṅkārānaṃ nidassanaṭṭhānabhūte paricchede āvībhavissati.
anya-e0812n0:756_5: Ettha vuttepi puna tatthāpi vattabbaṃ siyāti na vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:756_6: Uddese “duṭṭhālaṅkatī”ti vatvā idāni “duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇa”nti vacanaṃ alaṅkati alaṅkaraṇaalaṅkārasaddānaṃ tulyatthattā na virujjhati.
anya-e0812n0:765_2: lakkhaṇaṃ kathayāmyaha”nti katapaṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipajja dāni “katotri”ccādinā nikkhipananayaṃ saṅkhipati.
anya-e0812n0:765_4: paricchede vā esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ dosānaṃ padadosādīnaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo vibhajanaṃ saṅkhepanayā saṅkhepakkamena,
anya-e0812n0:765_6: yato aparisaṅkhyeyyānaṃ natthi pariyanto mayā kato niṭṭhāpito.
anya-e0812n0:765_7: Nanu “saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttattā purātanehi purātarehi (ka.) dīpitā santi bahū dosā,
anya-e0812n0:765_11: na pana sabbathā pariccāgena. Tathā hi–
anya-e0812n0:768_1: sogatāgamādīsu pasiddhaṃ rūpakkhandhādikamaññatra vuttaṃ appatītaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:768_4: ānetabbahetuttā hetvapekkhaṃ neyyato na byatiriccatīti ca.
anya-e0812n0:771_0: Ettha pana ocityahīnaduppatītikarānaṃ vākyatthadosattepi phandhapharusassa ca vākyadosatte padapadatthānaṃ dosato vākyameva duṭṭhaṃ siyā,
anya-e0812n0:771_2: pade duṭṭhe vākyattho ca duṭṭho siyā.
anya-e0812n0:771_3: Padadosato vākyavākyatthānaṃ nānābhāvābhāvañāpanatthaṃ asāmatthiyābhidheyyādikaṃ padaṃ ocityahīnādivākyatthadosādīsu anto kathitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:771_4: Tathā hi purātanehi viruddhatthantarādīhi padehi viracitaṃ vākyaṃ viruddhantiādinā bahūni duṭṭhāni vākyāni dassitāni.
anya-e0812n0:771_5: “Harisamānayī”ti ettha hapubbaṃ risa’mānayīti icchitatthā pari bhaṭṭhaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:772_3: vejjaṃ khādatyanārata”miccādikaṃ vākyasaṃkiṇṇañca byākiṇṇe samohitanti ca.
anya-e0812n0:775_5: vākyatthepi paduminīnaṃ rattiyamunniddatādikaṃ viruddhaṃ virodhinilīnanti ca nātyanuññātā,
anya-e0812n0:775_7: Esova evaṃ yathāvuttanayena niṭṭhāpito ayaṃ saṅkhepanayo eva kavīnaṃ paṇḍitajanānaṃ khedakaraṃ “kathaṃ
anya-e0812n0:775_8: nāma bandhepīdisaṃ sati santī”ti evamāsuhanopajanaṃ paraṃ padadose asādhusandiddhapariyāya ñeyyaappatītatthaappayojaka
anya-e0812n0:775_11: vākyatthadose upakkamopasaṃhāravisamañceti iccevamādikamaparampi dūsanaṃ atthi ce yadi bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n0:775_12: tampi bodhayitumavagametuṃ alaṃ samatthaṃ yathāvuttadosānusārena buddhimantehi sakkā ūhitunti.
anya-e0812n0:777_13: khādayo kani bhanti te” iccādiko dubbodho,
anya-e0812n0:780_2: lakkhaṇaṃ kathayāmyaha”nti katapaṭiññānurūpaṃ sampādetvā idāni “katotre”ccādinā nigamento dose saṅkhipati.
anya-e0812n0:780_4: paricchede vā esaṃ dosānaṃ yathāvuttapadadosādīnaṃ pavaro lakkhaṇāvirodhalakkhiyato uttamo vibhāgo asaṅkarato
anya-e0812n0:780_5: vibhajanaṃ saṅkhepanayā vitthārāpaniyasaṅkhepakkamena mayā kato vutto esova yathāvutto eso saṅkhepakkamo
anya-e0812n0:780_6: eva kavīnaṃ viracayantānaṃ khedakaraṃ bandhasarīre īdisaṃ īdisappayogaṃ kathaṃ nāma karomīti evaṃ pavattakhedamuppādayantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:780_8: taṃ sabbaṃ bodhayituṃ bodhetuṃ alaṃ samattho hoti.
anya-e0812n0:780_10: saṅkhepo ca so nayo cāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:783_1: ettha sūriyavācako pataṅgasaddo jotiriṅgaṇavācakopi hotīti vattumicchitaamittaggivināse asamatthaññattho hoti.
anya-e0812n0:784_1: Appayuttapadādidoso kiliṭṭhapadadose antogadho hotīti na vutto.
anya-e0812n0:785_1: Jināgamādīsu pasiddharūpakkhandhādikamaññatra payuttamappatītannāmātīdaṃ dvayaṃ yathākkamaṃ lokavirodhamāgamavirodhañca
anya-e0812n0:785_3: Hetvapekkhaṃ ānetabbahetuttā neyye antogadhanti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:787_0: Iccādikaṃ asamatthābhidhāyiccādi ocityahīne antogadhanti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:787_1: Ettha divākaro sayaṃ rāhugahito aññesaṃ kilesāpanayane asamatthoti tamasāmatthiyaṃ visesanabhūtena “rāhukhinno”ti padena ñāyati.
anya-e0812n0:788_0: Jigucchāvamaṅgalaasabbhānaṃ tiṇṇamaññatrassa jotakaṃ vācakaṃ vā atthantaraṃ vā gāmmaṃ duppatītikarattā vākyatthagāmmadoseyeva antogadhanti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:788_1: Duruccāraṇabhūtalakkhaṇaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ bandhapharusato abyatirittanti na vuttanti.
anya-e0812n0:788_2: “Harisamānayī”ti vattabbe hapubbaṃ risa’mānayiiccādikaṃ icchitatthato paribhaṭṭhattā bhaṭṭhañca “sakko
anya-e0812n0:788_3: sahassagū”iccādikaṃ apasiddhavisaye pariyuttaguḷhañceti ime atthaguḷhādayo pasādālaṅkāraviruddhattā pasādaguṇādāneneva
anya-e0812n0:788_5: Ettha hi sahassaṃ gāvo cakkhūni assāti sahassagūti sakkassa nāmaṃ guḷhaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:789_0: Vākyadosepi visandhivākyaṃ idha anupayogittā na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:791_0: Iccādikaṃ vākyasaṃkiṇṇañca byākiṇṇe antogadhanti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:791_1: Ettha eso bhisakko anārataṃ niccaṃ apāthyaṃ rogassa ahitaṃ dissati vadati.
anya-e0812n0:791_2: Eso rogī anārataṃ satataṃ apāthyaṃ ahitaṃ khādati.
anya-e0812n0:794_1: Nanu cettha attanā paheḷikāya adassitattā avācakassa pamussitāya antogadhakaraṇaṃ asiddhena asiddhasādhananti?
anya-e0812n0:794_5: na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā”ti ceti iminā purātanehi niddiṭṭhasoḷasapaheḷikāyopi dassitāti siddhena asiddhasādhanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:794_6: Tattha kavinā uyyānasaddena gehañca latāpariyāyavallarīsaddena aṅganā ca pallavasaddena karacaraṇādharā
anya-e0812n0:795_0: Vākyatthadosepi paduminīnaṃ rattiyaṃ pabujjhanādikaṃ viruddhaṃ virodhipadeyeva antogadhattā na vuttanti dassetuṃ “katotra saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:795_2: Ettha ocityahīnaduppatītikarānaṃ dvinnaṃ vākyatthadosatte sati bandhapharusassa vākyadosatte sati virodhino
anya-e0812n0:795_6: paduminīnaṃ rattiyaṃ phullatādi dunniddatādi (ka.) vākyatthañceti ime cattāro dosā bhinnajātikesu ocityādīsu kathaṃ saṅgahitāti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:795_7: tathāpi padānaṃ duṭṭhatte sati vākyavākyatthānamaduṭṭhatā nāma natthīti padadosena sandhivākyavākyatthadosānamanaññattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:795_8: sissānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ padadosādikaṃ vākyatthadosādīsu saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:795_9: Imināyeva purātanehi viruddhatthantarādipadehi vicaritaṃ vākyaṃ viruddhantiādinā duṭṭhāni bahūni vākyāni dassitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:796_0: Imāyeva imissāyeva (ka.) gāthāya “tamatthi ce khedakaraṃ parampī”ti ettha parasaddenaasādhusandiddhapariyāyañeyyāppatītatthaappayojaka-
anya-e0812n0:796_1: dubbodhadesiyādipadadose ca adhikaūnabhaggacchandādivākyadose ca upakkamopasaṃhāravisamasaṅkhāte vākyatthadose ca pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0812n0:796_3: Kriyānipphattikāraṇamupādāya atthantare pavattanāmaṃ visesanatthena vinā saññābhājane payuttaṃ sandiddhaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n0:796_5: Ettha himahā ravīti visesane kate doso natthi.
anya-e0812n0:796_8: Atisayā vinā bhāvitatthena visesyassa guṇavācakaṃ padaṃ appatītatthaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n0:798_0: Kani he kaññe te tavapāde manuññaddhanayo manoharasaddasamannāgatā khādayo gaggharikā bhanti dibbantīti.
anya-e0812n0:798_1: Kismiñci deseyeva siddhanāmaṃ desiyaṃ nāma. Yathā–
anya-e0812n0:800_0: He lolavilocane te tava ime gallā kapolā lāvaṇyatallā manuññatallā jalāsayavisesā bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:800_1: Kenaci lesena pakāsitamatthamupādāya payuttamadhikaṃ nāma. Yathā–
anya-e0812n0:803_1: nettamanañjana”nti imināyevathīnaṃ vidhavattaṃ gamyamānaṃ hotīti tappakāsanatthaṃ payuttaṃ “saggasevina”nti idaṃ adhikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:803_5: Idaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ chandānaṃ akkharagaṇanato ūnādhikavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:803_7: Idaṃ āraddhakkamaṃ pariccajitvā kamantarena niyamanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:813_2: Sakalopi ayaṃ virodho viruddhatthantarādikato na koci eko eva dosesu,
anya-e0812n0:813_3: dosānaṃ vā saṅkhyaṃ gaṇanaṃ dosabhāvaṃ atikkamma paricchijja guṇānaṃ vīthiṃ padaviṃ guṇasabhāvataṃ vigāhate abbhupagacchati kadāci,
anya-e0812n0:813_8: tena kāraṇena vuttānaṃ viruddhatthantarādīnaṃ virodhānaṃ yathā yena pakārena avirodho niddosatā siyā bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n0:813_9: tathā tena pakārena dosānaṃ parihāro dūrīkaraṇaṃ avabujjhati ñāyati etenāti avabodho,
anya-e0812n0:813_11: tannāmiko paricchedo idāni nīyate ānīyate vuccateti attho.
anya-e0812n0:814_1: Evaṃ dosavibhāgaṃ paricchinditvā idāni yathāvuttadosānaṃ parihāratthamārabhanto “kadācī”tyādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:814_2: Sakalopi ayaṃ virodho padadosādiko dosasaṅkhyaṃ dosānaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:814_3: dosesu vā gaṇanaṃ dosabhāvaṃ atikkamma kadāci kavikosallā kavino byākaraṇābhidhānachandoalaṅkatiādīsu
anya-e0812n0:814_4: paricayalakkhaṇena paññāpāṭavena yato guṇavīthiṃ guṇapadaviṃ kevalaṃ guṇasabhāvaṃ vigāhate abbhupagacchati,
anya-e0812n0:814_5: tena kāraṇena vuttavirodhānaṃ yathāvuttapadadosādivirodhānaṃ avirodho aviruddhatā yathā siyā yena pakārena bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n0:814_6: tathā tena pakārena dosaparihārāvabodho yathāvuttapadadosādisambandhino pariharaṇakkamassa avabodhakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n0:819_0: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:820_3: manuññānaṃ vā sālīnaṃ rattasāliādīnaṃ sālijātīnaṃ dassanā sukhaṃ cetasikaṃ somanassaṃ vindantaṃ taṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n0:820_4: visado ayaṃ megho ambudo kathaṃ nāma sukhayeti.
anya-e0812n0:820_5: Ettha tādisassa janassa asukhappadānaṃ garaḷassa meghassānurūpanti viruddhatthantaratā parihaṭā.
anya-e0812n0:821_4: manuññānaṃ vā sālīnaṃ rattasāliādīnaṃ dassanā dassanahetu sukhaṃ cetasikasomanassaṃ vindantaṃ anubhontaṃ
anya-e0812n0:821_5: taṃ janaṃ taṃ kassakajanaṃ visado jaladāyako ayaṃ megho kathaṃ nāma sukhaye,
anya-e0812n0:821_7: Tādisassa janassa dukkhadānaṃ garaḷadāyakassa meghassāpi anurūpamiti viruddhaññattho apanīto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:828_7: pakkhantare tvaviruddhaṃ bhagavato āgussa rāgādino abhāvato.
anya-e0812n0:828_8: Imesaṃ gunnaṃ atisayena go gotamo hīnapasu,
anya-e0812n0:828_10: Hīnapasu ca tvaṃ mahāmati asīti viruddhaṃ accantahīnapasuno mahatiyā paññāya abhāvato.
anya-e0812n0:828_15: bhagavato tu rasehi siṅgārādīhi apetoti yujjati. Me mama.
anya-e0812n0:828_17: Te tava gati pavatti cittā abbhutāti.
anya-e0812n0:828_18: Ettha viruddhatthantaraṃ virodhālaṅkāraṃ silāghanīyanti tena taṃ parihaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:829_1: Yathā vā uttadosassa parihāro īdiso vā.
anya-e0812n0:829_3: He sāmi tvaṃ vināyakopi garuḷopi nāgosi pannago asi. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:829_4: vināyakopi satte vinento eva nāgosi nikkileso asi.
anya-e0812n0:829_5: Gotamopi pasutamopi mahāmati mahāpaññavāsi. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:829_7: Paṇītopi madhuropi rasāpeto madhurarasato apagatosi. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:829_8: paṇītopi uttamo eva rasāpeto siṅgārādirasato apagatosi.
anya-e0812n0:829_9: Te tuyhaṃ gati pavatti me mayhaṃ cittā acchariyā.
anya-e0812n0:829_10: Ettha garuḷassa nāgattañca pasutamassa paññavantattañca paṇītassa nirasattañca viruddhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:829_11: tathāpi aññapakkhassa aviruddhattā viruddhatthantaradoso pasatthena viruddhālaṅkārena nirākato.
anya-e0812n0:829_14: Natthi āgu ago (ka.) etassāti nāgo, buddho.
anya-e0812n0:836_3: tādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ attani abhāve sati lokaṃ sattalokaṃ kathaṃ toseti,
anya-e0812n0:836_5: Vuttamevatthantarena sādheti “khajjoto nāma obhāsitā dīpitā asesadisā yena tathāvidho kiṃ bhave,
anya-e0812n0:836_7: Ettha khajjotassa adhikatthabhāvena sito obhāsitāsesadisattadoso “kathaṃ tādiguṇābhāve”tiādivacobhaṅgiyā parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:837_4: Dujjano guṇahīnajano tādiguṇābhāve santosajananakāraṇānaṃ tādisānaṃ sīlādiguṇānaṃ attani avijjamānatte sati lokaṃ sattalokaṃ kathaṃ toseti,
anya-e0812n0:837_6: tathā hi khajjoto nāma obhāsitāsesadiso kiṃ bhave,
anya-e0812n0:837_9: Tādī ca te guṇā ceti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:840_0: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka-māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0812n0:841_2: Kiliṭṭhatā kiliṭṭhapadadoso paheḷikāya visaye āruḷhā sahī na hi no duṭṭho siyā.
anya-e0812n0:841_5: Piyā vallabhāya āliṅgitaṃ kaṃ janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca no āliṅgati na saṃyujjati nu.
anya-e0812n0:841_7: Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhaṃ paheḷikāya samāropena parihaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:842_2: Kiliṭṭhatā kiliṭṭhapadadosasaṅkhātā paheḷikāyaṃ visaye āruḷhā ce,
anya-e0812n0:842_3: na hi duṭṭhā duṭṭhā na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:842_5: Piyā sukhāliṅgitaṃ kamāliṅgati nu no iti,
anya-e0812n0:842_6: itisaddassa nidassanatthattā sesaudāharaṇānametamupalakkhaṇanti ñātabbaṃ. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:842_8: Piyā vallabhāya āliṅgitaṃ upaguhitaṃ kaṃ nāma janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikamānasikaṃ no āliṅgati nu,
anya-e0812n0:842_10: Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhapadaṃ paheḷikāyamāropanena nirākataṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:846_4: Etaṃmayaṃ viyāti etena kiliṭṭhapadena nibbattaṃ viya.
anya-e0812n0:847_2: Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ icchite yamake iṭṭhayamake no payojeyya nappayujjeyya,
anya-e0812n0:847_3: tato iṭṭhayamakato aññaṃ sabbaṃ yamakaṃ pana etaṃmayaṃ viya iminā kiliṭṭhapadadosena kataṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0812n0:852_2: Bodhisattassa māyādeviyā sutassa vakkhamānassa visesassa taduppannadine sambhavā pabhāvena puññappabhāvato
anya-e0812n0:852_3: jalajāni ambujāni thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ acintanīyattā puññappabhāvassa.
anya-e0812n0:852_4: Kiṃ pana vāpyādīsu kiṃ karontāva tahiṃ tasmiñca jale suciraṃ sabbadāva āvasanamāvāso tena jāto kleso taṃ nudantāniva dūrato jahantāniveti.
anya-e0812n0:852_5: Acintanīyattā puññappabhāvassa īdisampi acchariyamahosīti na desavirodho.
anya-e0812n0:853_1: Bodhisattappabhāvena bodhisattassa acinteyyānubhāvena jalajāni jalajasadisattā tannāmakāni padumakeravādīni
anya-e0812n0:853_2: tahiṃ jale visayattena pasiddhe tasmiṃ udake sucirāvāsaklesaṃ aticiraṃ nivāsato jātaāyāsaṃ nudantāni
anya-e0812n0:853_3: iva cajantāni iva thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:853_5: Ettha jalajānaṃ thaluppattikathanasaṅkhātaṃ desavirodhaṃ acinteyyapuññappabhāvena īdisānaṃ acchariyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:858_2: Mando mudubhūto māruto ayaṃ sabbotukaṃ sabbesu utūsu pupphanakaṃ kusumaṃ pupphaṃ samaṃ ekato katvā dhunanto
anya-e0812n0:858_3: vikiranto munino munisadisattā bhavissantamunibhāvena ca bodhisattassa,
anya-e0812n0:858_4: muninoyeva vā sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye mahānubhāvassa pisuno sūcako vāyi pavāyatīti.
anya-e0812n0:858_5: Ettha yadyapekadā sabbotukāsambhavo nānāutūsu nānākusumassa sambhavā,
anya-e0812n0:858_6: tathāpi bhagavato mahānubhāvapisunamīdisamekapadikaṃ sambhavatīti kālavirodho iminā parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:859_2: Ayaṃ mandamāruto acaṇḍasamīraṇo sabbotukaṃ vasantādīsu sabbautūsu vikasantaṃ kusumaṃ pupphajātaṃ samaṃ
anya-e0812n0:859_3: ekato katvā dhunanto kampento munino ekantabhāvittā munisaṅkhātassa bodhisattassa,
anya-e0812n0:859_4: sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye bhūtattā munino sabbaññuno vā mahānubhāvapisuno mahantaṃ puññappabhāvaṃ pakāsento vāyi sampavāyīti.
anya-e0812n0:859_5: Ettha nānākāle sambhavantānampi kusumānaṃ ekakāle sambhavassa kālavirodhattepi bhagavato puññānubhāvo
anya-e0812n0:859_6: tādisamacchariyamekakkhaṇe janetuṃ samatthoti kālavirodhaṃ “mahānubhāvapisuno”ti iminā nirākaroti.
anya-e0812n0:863_0: Tantissaravirodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:864_2: Buddhassa guṇe sīlādike aparimāṇe nimuggaṃ ogāḷhaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ yassa tassa pañcasikhassa gandhabbadevaputtassapi
anya-e0812n0:864_3: vīṇāya tantiyā saro kiriyākālamānalakkhaṇavilambitadutamajjhabhedabhinno chajjādiko tassa virodho kalāsatthapariniddiṭṭhakamavesamaṃ
anya-e0812n0:865_2: Buddhaguṇe sabbaññuno vimhayajanakasīlādiguṇasambhāre nimuggamanaso otiṇṇacittassa pañcasikhassapi gandhabbadevaputtassāpi
anya-e0812n0:865_5: hatthādīnaṃ sannivesalakkhaṇo mānoti imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi yuttassa mandasīghamajjhimappamāṇehi bhinnassa
anya-e0812n0:865_6: chajjādisattasarassa kalāsatthāgatakkamassa vināsasaṅkhāto virodho kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇeti,
anya-e0812n0:865_8: Ettha akantiyā kāraṇabhūto kalāsatthāgatakkamabhaṅgo lokuttarabuddhaguṇānugatabuddhiyā jātoti so bhaṅgo
anya-e0812n0:865_9: “nimuggamanaso buddhaguṇe”ti vuttattā pītiyā kāraṇameveti na virodho.
anya-e0812n0:870_2: Candanāya api sītalaṃ gaṇaye cintesi. Kintaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:870_4: Sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe sattaṃ paribaddhaṃ hadayaṃ cittaṃ yassa so.
anya-e0812n0:870_5: Sabbaññutaññāṇānubandhabuddhino hi tādiso manobandhoti na lokavirodho.
anya-e0812n0:871_2: Sambodhisattahadayo sabbaññutaññāṇe āsattacitto so bodhisatto padittaṅgārapūritaṃ ādittaṅgārehi paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:871_3: cakkavāḷaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ candanāyapi candanato api sītalaṃ atisītalaṃ katvā gaṇaye cinteyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:871_4: Iṭṭhatthaluddhassa cittappavattiyā īdisattā aggino candanatopi adhikasītattakappanā “candanaṃ sītalaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:871_5: aggi uṇho”ti pavattalokasīmāya viruddhā na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:876_2: Munipuṅgava munīnaṃ uttama pariccatto visaṭṭho bhavo sugatiduggatisaṅkhāto yenāti pariccattabhavopi tvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:876_3: upanīto ānīto pavattito bhavo vuḍḍhi yenāti upanītabhavo asi.
anya-e0812n0:876_4: Tasmā kāraṇā acintyaguṇasārāya te namo atthūti seso.
anya-e0812n0:877_2: Munipuṅgava muniseṭṭha tvaṃ pariccattabhavopi apanītasugatiduggatibhavopi upanītabhavo lokassānītaabhivuddhiko asi bhavasi,
anya-e0812n0:877_3: acintyaguṇasārāya tato eva cintāvisayātikkantasāraguṇassa te tuyhaṃ namo atthūti sabbākārato bhavassa
anya-e0812n0:877_4: pariccattattā attani avijjamānaṃ sugatibhavaṃ lokassa detīti etaṃ ñāyāgataṃ na hotīti paṭibhāti,
anya-e0812n0:877_5: tathāpi ca sabbaññūnaṃ pavatti īdisāyevāti ñāyavirodho nirākato.
anya-e0812n0:882_2: Yatīti bhikkhu kenāpi saha nevālapati na vadatyeva,
anya-e0812n0:882_3: tathāpi vacīviññattito copanavācāsaṅkhātena vacīviññattihetunā pavattito sampajānantassa musāvādato kāraṇā
anya-e0812n0:882_5: Ettha anālapato vacīviññattiyā kathaṃ musāvādoti abhidhammāpannavirodho natthi,
anya-e0812n0:883_2: Yati samaṇo kenāpi kenaci saddhiṃ nevālapati no bhāsati,
anya-e0812n0:883_3: tathāpi vacīviññattito copanavācāsaṅkhātaviññattikāraṇā pavattanato sampajānamusāvādā sampajānantassa
anya-e0812n0:883_5: Ettha anālapantassa vacīviññattito musāvādo kathaṃ sambhavatīti abhidhammāpannavirodho,
anya-e0812n0:883_7: sampajānamusāvāda’ssa hotī”ti nidānuddese niddiṭṭhavacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā dukkaṭāpatti hotīti āgamavirodho nirākato.
anya-e0812n0:883_9: Yathā kāle avassamānameghato sañjātadubbhikkhaṃ “meghakataṃ dubbhikkha”nti vattabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:883_10: evaṃ kathetabbakāle akathanato sañjātā vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā dukkaṭāpattipi tato sañjātāti vattabbā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:887_0: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:888_2: Sītamarīcino candassa marīciyo dīdhitiyo eva candanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:888_4: tassa lābhena imā sabbāpi disā nibbharamatisayaṃ dhavalā setā rocantīti natthettha neyyatā marīciyā saddopāttatthāya tu.
anya-e0812n0:889_2: Sītamarīcino candassa marīcicandanālepalābhā marīcisaṅkhātacandanālepassa paṭilābhato imā sabbāpi disā
anya-e0812n0:889_4: Disānaṃ dhavalakāraṇassa “marīcicandanālepalābhā sītamarīcino”ti vuttattā neyyadoso na patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0812n0:894_3: māraṅganānaṃ siṅgārakato vibbhamo vilāso jinena asamanuññāto abbhupagato mārassa vasavattino hadayānalo hadayaggi jāto.
anya-e0812n0:894_4: Soko cettha analatthe niruppito tassa tādisatthānativattanato,
anya-e0812n0:894_7: tathāpi “siṅgāravibbhamo mārassa hadayaggī”ti vutte sāmatthiyā māraṅganāparājayo gamyate,
anya-e0812n0:895_2: Manonurañjano dassanasavanānussaraṇaṃ karontānaṃ janānaṃ cittamattani anurañjanto māraṅganāsiṅgāravibbhamo
anya-e0812n0:895_4: asamanuññāto anabbhupagato asampaṭicchito mārassa vasavattino hadayānalo hadayaggi ahosīti.
anya-e0812n0:895_5: Analattena kappitakāriyabhūto soko māraṅganāsiṅgāravibbhamasaṅkhātakāraṇena saddhiṃ abhedakappanāya analattakappanāya (ka.) “guḷo semhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:895_6: tipusaṃ jaro”tiādīsu viya tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:895_7: Ettha kiñcāpi māraṅganānaṃ parājayavācako saddo natthi,
anya-e0812n0:895_8: tathāpi “siṅgāravibbhamo mārassa hadayānalo”ti vutte māraṅganāparājayaṃ vinā tādisasokuppattikāraṇassa
anya-e0812n0:895_9: anadhigatattā aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyena tāsaṃ parājayo pakāsito hotīti īdisavaṅkavuttiyā bandhaguṇattā
anya-e0812n0:900_2: Ayaṃ verī jano apayātāparādhampi jananti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:901_2: Ayaṃ verī jano apayātāparādhampi apagatāparādhampi janaṃ kodhapāṭalabhūtena kodhena bhūtasetalohitavaṇṇayuttena cakkhunā bhiyyo yebhuyyena passatīti.
anya-e0812n0:908_2: Budho paṇḍitaposo appakānaṃ pāpānampi kimutamadhikānaṃ pabhāvaṃ ānubhāvaṃ nāsaye appavattiṃ pāpeyya.
anya-e0812n0:908_4: Bhāṇumā sūriyo nippabhataṃ ānīto khajjoto yena tathāvidho api hoti.
anya-e0812n0:909_2: Budho paññavā appakānampi atimandānampi pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ pabhāvaṃ vipākadānasāmatthiyasaṅkhātānubhāvaṃ nāsaye ahosikammatāpādanena nāseyya,
anya-e0812n0:909_5: Bhāṇumā sūriyo nippabhatānītakhajjoto api nippabhatamāpāditajotiriṅgaṇehi samannāgatopi hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:909_6: Hīnapabhāvo hoti khajjopanake pahāya attano ālokaṃ karonto na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:909_7: Ettha api nippabhaticcādivacanavilāsavasena hīnapakkhaṃ gahetvāpi sūriyaudārattasseva positattā “nippabhatānītakhajjoto”ti
anya-e0812n0:909_11: taṃ ānītā khajjotā yeneti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:914_0: 85. “Na pāde”ccādi. Ettha vandeiccādo heṭṭhā viya pādapūraṇassa kassaci abhāvena anatthābhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:915_2: Pādapūraṇatthāya gāthāpādānaṃ pūraṇasaṅkhātapayojanatthāya padaṃ nāmādikaṃ katthaci na yojeyya viññūti,
anya-e0812n0:915_3: yathā niratthakapadāyojane udāharaṇamevaṃ “munindassa varaṃ pādapaṅkeruhaṃ vande”ti.
anya-e0812n0:915_4: Heṭṭhā duṭṭhodāharaṇe viya pādapūraṇatthaṃ kassaci padassa ayojitattā sātthakapadehi niratthakadoso nirākatoti.
anya-e0812n0:921_2: Bhayañca cittutrāso kodho ca doso pasaṃsā ca thuti,
anya-e0812n0:921_3: tā ādi yassa turitādino so tādiso viseso yadi vattuṃ kāmīyate icchīyate,
anya-e0812n0:921_4: tattha tasmiṃ bhayādivisese visaye ekatthatāya ekatthabhāvena kato doso natthi.
anya-e0812n0:922_2: Bhayakodhapasaṃsādi cittutrāsapaṭighathutiādīhi samannāgato tādiso viseso vattuṃ yadi kāmīyate ce viññūhi icchīyate,
anya-e0812n0:922_3: tattha bhayakodhādike visese ekatthatākato ekatthabhāvena kato doso vākyadoso na bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:922_4: Bhayādivisese vattumicchite pubbuccāritapadassa punuccāraṇe ekatthadoso na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:922_5: Bhayañca kodho ca pasaṃsā cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:922_6: tā ādi yassa turitakotūhalaaccharāhāsasokapasādasaṅkhātassa atthavisesasseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:922_7: Tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaaññapadatthasamāsattā bhayādīsu kathitamapi gahetvā punappunaṃ kathanamavirodhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:922_8: Eko attho yesaṃ padādīnaṃ te ekatthā,
anya-e0812n0:925_0: Sappo sappo ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato;
anya-e0812n0:927_2: “Ayaṃ sappo sappo”ti bhayenāmeḍitaṃ handāti khede tato tamhā ṭhānā,
anya-e0812n0:927_3: sappato vā bhavaṃ bhavanto nivattatu gatamaggābhimukho āvattatu.
anya-e0812n0:928_3: ayaṃ sappo sappo bhavaṃ tato ṭhānato,
anya-e0812n0:928_4: sappato vā nivattatu āvattatu yadi jīvitukāmo asi,
anya-e0812n0:937_3: atisayo ādhikkaṃ vācāgocarabhāvātikkamena avacanīyattā yo kociyeva.
anya-e0812n0:937_4: Mano anekalokassa cittaṃ haratīti manoharā cittamavaharantī kanti sobhā kāpi avacanapathā kāpiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:937_6: tasmā buddhassa mahanto udayo abhivuḍḍhi aho abbhutoti.
anya-e0812n0:937_7: Ettha kiṃsaddenāraddhā rīti na katthaci bhaggā.
anya-e0812n0:938_3: alaṅkatassa byāmappabhāketumālāhi ujjalassa rūpakāyassa ādhikyaṃ yo kociyeva manogocarabhāvaṃ vinā vacanavisayātikkantattā
anya-e0812n0:938_5: Manoharā lokassa cittaṃ harantī kanti sobhā kāpiyeva vacīvisayātikkantattā kāpiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:938_6: Vilāsātisayo visayabhūtapiyabhāvasaṅkhātassa gamanādivilāsassa ādhikyampi kopiyeva vuttakāraṇenevakopiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:938_7: Tato buddhamahodayo buddhassa mahābhivuddhisaṅkhāto udayo aho acchariyoti.
anya-e0812n0:938_8: Ettha sabbanāmikena kiṃ saddena vattumāraddhakkamo na katthaci bhinnoti bhaggarītidoso natthīti.
anya-e0812n0:942_4: tesaṃ vinyāso yāthāvato ṭhapanaṃ yassa taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:942_6: So abyākiṇṇatāya eva manoharo cāti abyākiṇṇaṃ manoharaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:942_7: Teneva “ayamettha attho ayaṃ vā”ti evaṃ byāmohaṃ na karotīti abyāmohakaro, taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:943_2: Adūrapadavinyāsaṃ nāmādipadānaṃ vohārakāle adūrasambandho yathā siyā,
anya-e0812n0:943_5: tatoyeva viññūnaṃ cittamārādhentaṃ abyāmohakaraṃ “imassattho imassattho eso eso vā”ti saṃsayamanuppādentaṃ
anya-e0812n0:943_6: bandhaṃ pasādālaṅkārasaṃyuttaṃ bandhanaṃ kavissarā kavīnaṃ padhānā paṇḍibhajanā,
anya-e0812n0:943_14: tesaṃ vinyāso ṭhapanaṃ yassa bandhassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:950_2: Yassa jinassa nayanaṃ nettaṃ nīluppalābhaṃ indīvaradvayanibhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:950_3: adharo adharoṭṭho bandhukamiva bandhukakusumamiva ruciro kanto,
anya-e0812n0:950_5: tena kāraṇena ayaṃ jino piyaṃ madhuraṃ dassanamassāti piyadassano.
anya-e0812n0:951_5: tena kāraṇena ayaṃ jino piyadassano manuññadassano hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:951_7: Ābhāsaddo nibhāsaddo viya ivattho. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:951_11: Iha dassanassa kattubhūtasādhujanasambandhattepi visayatteneva jinasambandho hotīti aññapadatthena tathāgato gahitoti.
anya-e0812n0:955_4: Yāsaṃ kantānaṃ madhurānaṃ vācānaṃ tāhi abhisaṅkhataṃ racitaṃ bandhanaṃ rasassa mādhuriyassa hetuttā kāraṇabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:956_2: Samatikkantagāmmattakantavācābhisaṅkhataṃ visesato atikkantagāmmabhāvāhi kantavācāhi racitaṃ bandhanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:956_3: muttakādibandhanaṃ rasahetuttā paṇḍitānaṃ pītirasassa kāraṇattā yathāvuttagāmmadosaṃ ativattati atikkamma
anya-e0812n0:963_2: Kāmāturā kāci vanitā attano piyaṃ patiṃ viravati “dunoti”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:963_3: Dayāya saha pavattīti sadayaiti anunayavasena piyassa āmantanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:963_5: so kāmo kandappo eva caṇḍālo akaṇḍo vā asayhopatāpāvahattā.
anya-e0812n0:963_6: Kāme caṇḍālattāropanañca ucitameva yatonena kayiramānamasahanamupatāpamasahamānā taṃ paribhavantaṃ vippalapati,
anya-e0812n0:963_16: Ekākittāyevāhamappaṭisaraṇattānena dusāmīti duññāmīti (?) tava kāmaṃ tvaṃ sukhī hosi.
anya-e0812n0:963_17: Sanāthānaṃ tādisī vuttīti evaṃ sukhīpi tvaṃ īdisaṃ byasanamāpannaṃ kiṃ kasmā upekkhaseti.
anya-e0812n0:963_19: taṃ visayamanubhavantassa ca vimukhattaṃ nidassetītīdisaṃ na gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:964_2: Kāmataṇhābhibhūtā aṅganā attano vallabhaṃ nissāya evaṃ vilapati “sadaya he kāruṇika so kāmacaṇḍālo so
anya-e0812n0:964_3: anaṅganīco niddayo nikkāruṇiko maṃ dunoti pīḷeti,
anya-e0812n0:964_4: sukhīpi mama viya anāthabhāvābhāvato sukhitopi tvaṃ īdisaṃ byasanāpannaṃ evaṃ kāmacaṇḍālena akāruṇena
anya-e0812n0:964_6: Attano dukkhāturattā dukkhadūrīkaraṇaṃ kāruṇikānaṃyeva visayanti “sadaye”ti anunayavasena āmantanucitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:964_7: attano dukkhāturataṃ posetuṃ pīḷākārake kāme caṇḍālattāropanañca niddayattakathanañca ucitameva attani
anya-e0812n0:964_9: Sukhīpīti iminā tassa paravisayāsattatāya aticāraṃ abbhupagameti.
anya-e0812n0:964_10: Evaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā attano vallabhe sānurāgattañca attani tassa tadabhāvattañca dassetīti.
anya-e0812n0:964_12: na kāmayasi kiṃnvida”nti ettha viya iha gāmmadoso natthīti gāmmadosaparihāramidaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:967_0: Yato na savanubbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yetaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:969_2: Yato yasmā savanubbegaṃ “dosānamuddesakkamena dosaparihārakkamo na vutto”ti evaṃ viññūnamuppajjamānaṃ imassa ganthassa savanāsahanaṃ natthi,
anya-e0812n0:969_3: tato yatihīnaparihāro yatihīnadosassa pariharaṇavasena pavattamudāharaṇaṃ idāni puna na nīyate nāharīyateti.
anya-e0812n0:969_5: Heṭṭhā yetaṃ vicāritanti evaṃ yatihīnadosapariharaṇaṃ heṭṭhā anantaraparicchede vicāritaṃ “taṃ name sirasā cāmī-
anya-e0812n0:969_7: Ādo yatihīnadosapātubhāveyeva parihārakkamassāpi dassitattā ihādassanepi ganthassa ūnatā natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:973_0: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:974_2: Udāraṃ udārattaṃ cāgātisayasambandhato caritaṃ atiguṇapavatti yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:974_3: Ettha ucitattā desādīnaṃ yācanakkamassa kamaccutassa parihāroyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:975_3: teneva tena kāraṇeneva ārādhanā mama yācanā tvayi hoti.
anya-e0812n0:975_5: gāmaṃ vā saṃvasathaṃ vā, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:975_6: sobhanaṃ khettaṃ vā kedāraṃ vā mama dehīti anupubbaṃ hīnapadatthayācanā dāyakassa dānassāpi yācakassa
anya-e0812n0:982_7: Vijambhane byāpane nāvakāso tādisattā tāsaṃ marīcinanti nātivuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:983_3: vijambhane byāpane ayaṃ sakalopi ākāso nāvakāso na okāso hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:983_4: Hetuphalādiekekakāraṇenāpi appameyyānaṃ sabbaññuguṇānaṃ pavattiyā appameyyasāmaññabhūtākāsassa niravakāsassa
anya-e0812n0:983_5: iva kathanamucitanti ativuttadoso iha na bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:983_8: tato sambhūtānaṃyeva yasānaṃ rāsī ca tā marīciyo cāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:987_2: Byāpannaṃ naṭṭhaṃ ayathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ, tesaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:987_4: Apeto apagato suñño attho abhidheyyaṃ saṃvohārikaṃ yassa, taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:987_8: so ādi yesaṃ bālādīnaṃ tesaṃ vacanā asaṅgatāya vācāya aññatra aññasmiṃ abyāpannacittavisaye dussati duṭṭhaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n0:988_2: Byāpannacittānaṃ viruddhabhāvamāpannacittānaṃ vākyaṃ syādyantatyādyantapadasamudāyarūpaṃ vākyaṃ apetatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:988_3: apagatasamudāyatthaṃ aninditaṃ viññūhi garahitaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:988_4: tena kāraṇena ummattādikānaṃ ummattavedanaṭṭādīnaṃ vacanāññatra vacanaṃ vinā anummattādivacane taṃ samudāyatthasambandharahitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:993_2: Na hettha “samuddo pīyate”iccādino padasamudāyassa koci eko attho gayhati,
anya-e0812n0:993_4: Avayavatthā eva tu ayosalākākappāpaṭibhantīti īdisamapetatthamaninditaṃ viññeyyaṃ byāpannacittānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:994_2: So ayaṃ samuddo pīyate yena kenaci pīyate,
anya-e0812n0:994_7: Idaṃ vākyaṃ avayavatthamantarena samudāyato gamyamānatthassābhāvā apetatthaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:994_8: Īdisaṃ vākyaṃ ummattakādīhi vuttamappītikaraṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:994_9: aññehi vuttaṃ pana kaṇṇe ayosalākā viya appītikaraṃ.
anya-e0812n0:998_5: tena pabhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ saṃyuttaṃ taṃ bandhanaṃ bandhapharusadosaṃ saṃdūsayeyya nāsayeti attho.
anya-e0812n0:999_3: vaṇṇānaṃ aññamaññasaṅgabhilakkhaṇena dittabhāvena piyabhāvena anubrūhitaṃ taṃ bandhanaṃ bandhapharusadosaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1004_0: 99. “Yathe”tyudāharati “passantā”iccādi. Keḷiyā kīḷāya parammukhā vigatacchandā carantīti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:1005_2: Sādhū sajjanā sambuddhakāle sambuddhassa dharamānakāle rūpavibhavaṃ tassa rūpasampattiṃ passantā cakkhuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1005_3: santappetvā olokentā madhuraṃ giraṃ tasseva bhagavato aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ madhuravacanaṃ suṇantā keḷiparammukhā
anya-e0812n0:1005_4: kīḷāya vimukhā kīḷābhiratirahitā caranti gacchanti pavattantīti.
anya-e0812n0:1005_7: Keḷiyā parāni parivattitāni mukhāni etesanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1005_10: Loko pana visuṃ eko padatthoyevāti voharati.
anya-e0812n0:1012_2: Ettha bhāvanādīni niddisitvā yathākkamaṃ nibbānādīnaṃ niddesena apakkamadoso parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:1013_2: Iha manussaloke sammā sampāditāni kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā yathāvidhi sampāditāni attano santāne pavattāpitāni
anya-e0812n0:1013_6: Iha bhāvanādayo uddisitvā uddesakkamaṃ anatikkamma nibbānādīnamanuddesassa katattā apakkamavākyatthadosassa okāso na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1015_0: Uddiṭṭhavisayo koci kopi, viseso tādiso yadi;
anya-e0812n0:1017_2: Uddiṭṭhā paṭhamaṃ yuttā atthā visayo gocaro yassa uddesānuddesasambandhavijānanalakkhaṇassa visesassa
anya-e0812n0:1017_3: so tādiso koci viseso anuddiṭṭhesu yathākkamamuddesakamānamatikkamena puna atthantaranissayena parāmaṭṭhesu
anya-e0812n0:1017_5: kamassa yathoddiṭṭhesu anukkamassa vilaṅghane atikkame doso nevatthi.
anya-e0812n0:1018_2: Uddiṭṭhavisayo paṭhamaṃ payuttatthavisayo tādiso koci viseso uddesānuddesānaṃ “idamassa pubbakathanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1018_4: atthantaraṃ nissāya puna vuttesu yadi “bhaveyyā”ti seso.
anya-e0812n0:1018_5: Kamavilaṅghane uddesānuddesānaṃ kamātikkame doso satthaññūnaṃ sutikāle asahanakāraṇaṃ nevatthīti.
anya-e0812n0:1018_6: Uddiṭṭhā paṭhamuccāritā atthā visayo gocaro asseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1023_4: abyākataṃ vipākakriyāsaṅkhātamiti etesu tīsu pacchimaṃ abyākataṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1024_2: Kusalaṃ kāmāvacarādiekavīsatikusalañca akusalaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ akusalañca abyākataṃ vipākakriyārūpanibbānavasena
anya-e0812n0:1024_3: catubbidhamabyākatañca iccesu evametesu tīsu pacchimaṃ uddesakkamena pacchimamabyākataṃ pākadaṃ na vipākadāyakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1024_4: paṭhamadvayaṃ kusalākusalaṃ pākadaṃ yathāsakaṃ vipākadāyakaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1024_7: pacchā uccārito iccattho “samānaṃ”iti sambandhechaṭṭhī (katvabodhinī) vuttattā uddiṭṭhehi samānamanuddiṭṭhānameva
anya-e0812n0:1024_9: Ettha pana kusalādisabhāvato tividhattepi vipākadānādānavasena duvidhakusalākusalādivisayabhūtavisesassa
anya-e0812n0:1024_10: pavattiyā vatticchāto paṭhamaṃ vattabbataṃ vinā kamena nissayanaṃ nāma natthīti apakkamadoso na hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1028_2: Sotūnaṃ attatthanipphādanādike tādise kāraṇe hetumhi sati bhūtaṃ yathāpavattaṃ atthaṃ attano caritalakkhaṇaṃ saṃsino vadantassa sassa attano,
anya-e0812n0:1028_3: sānaṃ vā guṇānaṃ āvikaraṇe adhikāravasena “pūjanīyataro loke”iccādikathane ocikyahīnatāya āpatti pāpuṇanaṃ sambhavo natthi.
anya-e0812n0:1029_2: Tādise kāraṇe sati sotūnaṃ attatthanipphādanādike tādise hetumhi vijjamāne bhūtatthasaṃsino attani vijjamānakāyādisaṃvaralakkhaṇaguṇasaṅkhātamatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1029_3: “pūjanīyataro loke ahameko”iccādinā tādisāvasare vadantassa saguṇānaṃ sassa attano,
anya-e0812n0:1029_4: sānaṃ vā sakānaṃ guṇānaṃ āvikaraṇe pākaṭīkaraṇe ocityahīnatāpatti ocityahīnasaṅkhātadosassāpatti natthīti.
anya-e0812n0:1029_5: Sasaddassa attaattaniyavācakattā sassa attano guṇā se ca te guṇā ceti vā viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1033_2: Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ pasiddhaṃ ābālajanaṃ ābālajanānaṃ (ka.) yathāsakamanurūpaṃ vijānanato ocityaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1033_3: ucitabhāvo nāmeti pasiddhiyaṃ ādarā ādarena ussāhena tato paramādaraṇīyassābhāvato,
anya-e0812n0:1033_4: na hi anucitaṃ kiñci kenāpyādaraṇīyaṃ sabbathā anassādanīyattā,
anya-e0812n0:1033_6: Tattha tasmiṃ ocitye upadesassa paṭhamuccāraṇassa uggaṇhāpanavasena pavattassa pabhavā uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā suṭṭhujanā kavipuṅgavā uttamā,
anya-e0812n0:1034_2: Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ ābālapasiddhaṃ ocityaṃ nāma ādarā gāravena viññeyyaṃ viññūhi ñātabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1034_3: tattha ocityavisaye upadesapabhavā paṭhamuccāraṇassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā sādhujanabhūtā kavipuṅgavā uttamakavayo bhavantīti,
anya-e0812n0:1034_6: pumāno ca te gāvo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1040_2: Viññāto avabuddho yathāvuttakavivarapasādā ocityameva vibhavo sampatti yena so ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare parivajjeyya.
anya-e0812n0:1040_3: Tato tasmā parihārato hetuto ocityassa sampose suṭṭhu vaḍḍhibhāve vaḍḍhane kate rasassa assāditabbatāsaṅkhātassa mādhuriyassa samposo siyā bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n0:1041_2: Viññātocityavibhavo tādisakavīnamanuggahena viññātaocityasaṅkhātasampattisamannāgato kavi ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare nirākareyya,
anya-e0812n0:1041_3: tato dosaparihārato ocityassa sampose upabrūhane kate sati rasaposo mādhuriyasaṅkhatassa assādetabbassa pūraṇaṃ siyā bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1041_6: rasassa poso puṭṭhabhāvo vuddhabhāvo (ka.) posetabbabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1045_0: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0812n0:1046_2: Vijayo parābhibhavo āsanno vijayo eva ussavo abbhudayo nippaṭipakkhā pavatti yassa ediso yo āsannaṃ attano
anya-e0812n0:1046_3: samīpamupagataṃ mārasenaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññittha tiṇampi na maññittha,
anya-e0812n0:1046_5: so jino māraji vo tumhākaṃ jayaṃ detūti vidadhātu.
anya-e0812n0:1046_9: “Mārasenamāsannaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññitthā”ti idaṃ panettha atisamucitaṃ yato samīpamupagatampi tādisaṃ mārasenaṃ tiṇatopi hīnaṃ maññi,
anya-e0812n0:1047_1: Iha satthe sabbattha saṅkhepakkamamicchantopi ācariyo ocityaṃ nāma ādarena saggarūhi uggaṇhitvā payujjitabbamiccevaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1047_2: vitthārena sisse anusāsitvā idāni ocityahīnapariharaṇatthaṃ “yo mārasenamāsanne”ccādinā lakkhiyamudāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1047_4: atha vā accāsannapaṭipakkhavirahappavattisaṅkhātaabhivuddhiyā samannāgato yo jino āsannaṃ anekappakārabhiṃsanakarūpena
anya-e0812n0:1047_5: attano samīpamāgataṃ mārasenaṃ mārabalaṃ tiṇāyapi tiṇalavaṃ katvāpi na maññittha sallakkhaṇaṃ nākāsi,
anya-e0812n0:1047_6: so jino so jitapañcamāro vo tumhākaṃ jayaṃ detūti.
anya-e0812n0:1047_7: Ettha yo pañcamāre jitattā jino nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1047_8: so parābhibhavane asahāyakiccattā paresaṃ jayadāne sāmatthiyayuttoti “jayaṃ detū”ti kataṃ jayāsīsanamatiucitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1047_10: “Mārasenamāsannaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññitthā”ti idaṃ vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0812n0:1051_2: Kattā ca kammañca tāni ādīni yesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ āraddhāni vattuṃ paṭṭhapitāni kattukammādīni tesaṃ kamo tassa atikkamo pariccāgo tassa laṅghane sati,
anya-e0812n0:1051_4: Ayaṃ yathāvutto bhaggarītivirodho kvāpi katthacipi ṭhāne gatiṃ na vindati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhate.
anya-e0812n0:1052_3: kvāpi katthacipi ṭhāne gatiṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na vindati na labhateti.
anya-e0812n0:1052_4: Āraddhāni ca tāni kattukammādīni yesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ tesaṃ kamassa atikkamo tassa laṅghananti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1060_4: Bahūnamatthānañhi samuccayatthaṃ vākye eko vā cakāro kātabbo paṭipadaṃ vā.
anya-e0812n0:1061_2: Sujanaññānaṃ sajjanehi aññesaṃ dujjanānañca itthīnañca visassa jīvitaharaṇasamatthassa siṅgino visāṇavato
anya-e0812n0:1061_3: ca roganadīrājakulassa ca vissāso saṃsaggo na upapajjate kiñcikāle virujjhanato na yujjateti.
anya-e0812n0:1061_4: Ettha āraddhassa chaṭṭhuntakkamassa sabbattha apariccāgato attharītibhaṅgo ca,
anya-e0812n0:1061_5: yuttaṭṭhāne ekasseva cakārassa yuttattā saddarītibhaṅgo ca natthi.
anya-e0812n0:1062_2: Vihite pathye bhesajje osadhe ca suddhabuddhādiratanattaye ca sajjane sādhujane ca api punapi saguṇe
anya-e0812n0:1062_3: vijjamānaguṇe ca pasādaṃ attano cittapasādaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ ācare sappuriso kareyya seveyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1070_3: ettha raṃsisaddena suṇantānaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayena sasaṃsayabhūtaṃ bandhadosamohatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1074_3: kīḷādihetunā yaṃ kiñci saṃsayāyeva yadi payujjateti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:1075_2: Kīḷādihetunā kīḷāsambādhasammantanādikāraṇena yaṃ kiñci saṃsayuppādanasamatthaṃ yaṃ kiñci padaṃ saṃsayāya
anya-e0812n0:1075_3: eva sotūnaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayatthameva yadi payujjate tasmiṃ bandhane vattārehi payujjate ce,
anya-e0812n0:1075_4: sasaṃsayasamappito sasaṃsayadosasahito bandho na dosova aduṭṭhovāti.
anya-e0812n0:1080_2: Gurumhi ajjhāpake sakagehato attano mūlanilayato dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ gharaṃ yāte sati niyatamekantamajjhayanādinā
anya-e0812n0:1080_4: Gurumhi surācariye suraccācariye (ka.) sakagehato attano jātarāsito dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ rāsiṃ yāte
anya-e0812n0:1080_5: sati niyatamajjhayanādinā sukhaṃ pāpuṇeyyāmāti ayamettha icchitattho.
anya-e0812n0:1081_2: Gurumhi ācariye sakagehato attano vāsāgārato dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ gharaṃyāte sati,
anya-e0812n0:1081_4: Gurumhi surācariye sakagehato attano jātarāsito dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ rāsiṃ yāte gate sati anukūlattā
anya-e0812n0:1081_8: Ettha ajjhayanasaddasannidhānena payuttagurusaddassa ācariyatthavācakattepi icchitatthagopanatthaṃ payuttattā aduṭṭhoti.
anya-e0812n0:1086_2: Etassa purisassa sā ayaṃ bhaginī subhagā sundarāti iccevamādikaṃ sakalehi kavīhi api na gāmmamiti gāmmadosena na duṭṭhamiti niddiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0812n0:1086_3: Subhaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ gatāti “subhagā”ti aggahetvā bahubbīhisamāse kate labbhamānatthassa asabbhabhāvepi kavīnaṃ cittakhedaṃ na janetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1086_4: Iti evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi assa īdisassa vākyassāti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1090_0: 114. “Duṭṭha”iccādi. Duṭṭhālaṅkārassa dosadūsitassa alaṅkārassa vigame apagame sati.
anya-e0812n0:1091_2: Duṭṭhālaṅkāravigame dosaduṭṭhassa alaṅkārassa apagame sati sobhanālaṅkatikkamo pasatthānamalaṅkārānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1091_3: pavattiākāro alaṅkāraparicchede alaṅkārapakāsakattā tannāmake paricchede āvibhāvaṃ pakāsattaṃ gamissati
anya-e0812n0:1091_6: Alaṅkārapakāsakattā tadatthena alaṅkāro ca so paricchedo ceti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1101_2: Dose yathāvutte padadosādike pariharituṃ pariccajituṃ eso varo uttamo upadeso satthantarānaṃ bahūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1101_3: anusaraṇena anugamena anupagamena (ka.) mayā evaṃ kato nipphādito,
anya-e0812n0:1101_4: imaṃ upadesaṃ guruvarānaṃ adhikappasādā mahatā pasādena na appakena,
anya-e0812n0:1101_6: viññāya jānitvā ādarato kareyya dose yathāvutte dose yaso parisuddhabandhanaṃ kriyālakkhaṇato ekantena kittihetuttā,
anya-e0812n0:1101_8: taṃ abhilasati sīleneti yasobhilāsī paraṃ accantameva parihareyya dūrato kareyya.
anya-e0812n0:1104_2: Dose yathāvuttapadadosādike pariharitumapanetuṃ varo uttamo eso upadeso satthantarānusaraṇena bahūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1104_3: bāhirasatthānaṃ anussatiyā mayā evaṃ anantaruddiṭṭhakkamena kato viracito,
anya-e0812n0:1104_4: imaṃ upadesaṃ guruvarānaṃ adhikappasādā adhikappasādena viññāya sabhāvato ñatvā yasobhilāsī yasapaṭilābhakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n0:1104_5: kāraṇe kāriyopacārena dosāpagamena parisuddhabandhanaṃ vā tādisabandhanahetu uppajjamānakittiṃ vā icchanto
anya-e0812n0:1104_6: paññavā dose yathāvuttadose paraṃ atisayena parihareyya dūrato kareyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1114_1: Evaṃ dosaparihāropadesaṃ dassetvā idāni dosaparihārā samupagataguṇaṃ upadassitumadhikāraṃ viracayanto āha “sambhavanti”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1114_2: Dosānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ padadosādīnaṃ evaṃ yathāvuttanayena atikkame sati guṇā dhammā saddālaṅkārasabhāvā
anya-e0812n0:1114_4: tañca “pasādo kiliṭṭhādīnaṃ vajjanā sambhavatī”tyādinā yathāyogaṃ viññeyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1114_5: tato tasmā kāraṇā ye guṇā sadde sambhūsayanti alaṅkaronti,
anya-e0812n0:1114_6: te saddālaṅkārasaṅkhāte guṇe idāni dassessaṃ upadisissāmi.
anya-e0812n0:1115_1: Evaṃ dosaparihārapavesopāyaṃ dassetvā idāni yathāvuttadosānaṃ parihārena “bandhanissitaguṇā ete”ti dassetuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1115_3: Dosānaṃ niddiṭṭhapadadosādīnaṃ evaṃ anantaraparicchede niddiṭṭhakkamena atikkame sati guṇā pasādādisaddālaṅkārasaṅkhātā
anya-e0812n0:1115_5: tato ye saddadhammā sadde sambhūsayanti sajjanti,
anya-e0812n0:1122_1: Idāni te vibhajati “pasādo”iccādinā pasatthi pasādo pakāsatthatā,
anya-e0812n0:1122_8: udāratā ukkaṃsatā kenaci atthena sanāthatā visiṭṭhavisesanayuttatā ca,
anya-e0812n0:1122_10: atthabyatti siddhena ñāyena vā abhidheyyassa gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1123_1: Idāni “pasādojo”iccādinā te saddālaṅkāre kamena vibhajituṃ uddisati.
anya-e0812n0:1123_2: Pasādo pasannaphaḷikāvali attani āvunitarattakambalasuttamiva saddānaṃ atthassa pasādanasaṅkhāto pasādālaṅkāro ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_5: samatā pajje pādassa sutito sadisatā ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_6: gajje padānaṃ tatheva sadisatāti evaṃ pādānaṃ padānañca tulyaguṇatā ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_7: sukhumālatā vaṇṇānaṃ atipharusaatisithilabhāvaṃ vinā samappamāṇamuduguṇo ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_9: udāratā ukkaṭṭhena kenaci atthena bandhassa sajjitabhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_12: atthabyatti icchitatthassa siddhena vā nyāyena vā supākaṭabhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_13: samādhayo lokappatītianatikkantaaññadhammāropanena amukhyatthatā cāti ime saddatthaguṇā dasa honti.
anya-e0812n0:1123_18: ete sabbepi alaṅkaronti bandhamanenāti vākyena alaṅkārā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1128_2: Etehiyeva vuttehi dasahi guṇehi dhammehi saddālaṅkārasabbhāvehi sampanno yutto samiddho vā kavīnaṃ mano
anya-e0812n0:1128_3: harati savase vattetīti kavimanoharo kavihadayahilādakārī bandho kattūnaṃ bandhantānaṃ kavīnaṃ accantanimmalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1128_4: atisayaparisuddhaṃ aguṇalesenāpa’nālimpattā kittiṃ guṇaghosaṃ sampādayati nipphādeti.
anya-e0812n0:1129_2: Etehi guṇehi imehi saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātadasavidhasaddadhammehi sampanno samannāgato samiddho vā bandho
anya-e0812n0:1129_3: pajjādibandho kavimanoharo attano niravajjattā kavīnaṃ cittaṃ pīṇento kattūnaṃ racayantānaṃ accantanimmalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1129_4: appakadosenāpi asammissattā atiparisuddhaṃ kittiṃ bandhanavisayabhūtayasorāsiṃ sampādayati nipphādetīti.
anya-e0812n0:1129_5: Iminā kāraṇena bandhassa yathāvuttadasavidhaguṇapariggaho saussāhaṃ kātabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1134_1: Idāni yathoddesānamesaṃ niddesaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ karonto āha “adūra”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1134_2: Adūre āsanne adūrena vā adūrāhitakriyākattukammādipadavasena āhito ṭhapito kato sambandho anvayo,
anya-e0812n0:1134_3: tena subhagā manoharā supasiddho suppakāso sugammo abhidheyyo attho yassā sāti tathā,
anya-e0812n0:1139_0: Tādisā yā padāvali padapanti ayaṃ pasādaṃ tannāmakaṃ guṇaṃ janaye uppādayati. Yathāti tamudāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1140_1: Idāni uddesakkamena etesaṃ saddālaṅkārādīnaṃ niddesaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ dassento āha “adūrāhite”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1140_2: Adūre āsannapadese tadupacārena āsanne vā āhito kriyāya,
anya-e0812n0:1140_4: no ce vinyāsavasena ṭhapito vā sambandho icchitatthapatītikkamena aññamaññāpekkhalakkhaṇakriyākārakayogo tena subhagā manoharā,
anya-e0812n0:1140_5: supasiddho pasiddhatthavisaye saddapayogato atipākaṭo abhidheyyo saddattho yassā sā ayaṃ padāvali padapanti
anya-e0812n0:1140_9: upacaritattā adūro ca so āhito cāti vā,
anya-e0812n0:1140_10: so ca so sambandho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1145_1: asaddagocaraṃ saddassa avisayaṃ hutvā mudukamhi pade kevalaṃ visuṃ phurantaṃ cāpentaṃ kavīnadhippāyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1145_2: kavīnamajjhāsayaṃ katassamā saddatthavisaye kataparicayā paṇḍitā bhāvāvagamā padatthāvabodhena visanti
anya-e0812n0:1145_4: tādisā ākatiyo tu saddasaddatthānaṃ ākārā pakāsayanti adhippāyatthaṃ jotentīti.
anya-e0812n0:1149_2: Munino sammāsambuddhassa vadanaṃ sabhāvamadhurapakatimukhaṃ alaṅkarontā sajjantā sobhayamānā adharānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1149_4: Ambujodare tā kālopanatapupphakāsaramaṇīye padumabbhantare sampatantā pavattamānā aruṇaraṃsīva bālasūriyaraṃsiyo viya sobhante virājanti.
anya-e0812n0:1150_2: Munino vadanaṃ pakatisundaramukhaṃ alaṅkarontā sajjantā adhararaṃsiyo tasseva munino oṭṭhadvayato nikkhantakantisamūhā
anya-e0812n0:1150_3: ambujodare vikasanānurūpakālābhimukhe padumagabbhe upaḍḍhavikasiteti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1150_4: Sampatantā pavattamānā aruṇaraṃsī iva bālasūriyaraṃsīva sobhante dibbantīti.
anya-e0812n0:1150_5: Ettha adūrasambandhaṃ pasiddhatthañca nissāya pasādaguṇo pākaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:1150_6: Adhararaṃsīnaṃ munisambandho sutānumitasambandhesu sutasambandhassa balavattā sutānumitesu sutasambandho balavā (paribhāsendusere 112),
anya-e0812n0:1156_2: Samāsassa ekatthavuttiyā bāhulyaṃ bhiyyobhāvo ityanuvaditvā puna ojo vidhīyate,
anya-e0812n0:1156_3: eso ojo samāsabāhullalakkhaṇo gajjassa vuttirūpassa jīvitaṃ hadayaṃ sāraṃ tappadhānattā gajjassa,
anya-e0812n0:1156_5: soyaṃ ojo anākulo agahano atoyeva kanto hadayaṅgamo,
anya-e0812n0:1156_6: pajjepi na kevalaṃ gajje kāmīyate payujjate.
anya-e0812n0:1157_2: Ojo nāma samāsabāhulyaṃ bhinnatthesu pavattasaddānaṃ ekatthapavattilakkhaṇassa samāsassa bahulatā,
anya-e0812n0:1157_3: eso ojo gajjassa gajjabandhassa jīvitaṃ hadayaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1157_5: So ayaṃ ojo anākulo nibyākulo kanto tatoyeva viññūnaṃ piyabhūto pajjepi pajjabandhepi kāmīyate kavīhi payujjateti.
anya-e0812n0:1161_2: Munindassa mandaṃ īsakaṃ sañjāto pavatto taṃsabhāvattā bhagavato hāsassa yasassa (ka.) hāso hasitaṃ sova candanamiva candanaṃ dhavalattarūpattā,
anya-e0812n0:1161_3: tena limpitā upadehitā pallavā sabbāni kilasayāni “idameve”ti niyamābhāvato,
anya-e0812n0:1161_4: dhavalā pakativaṇṇapariccāgena sukkā ahesuṃ gāhāpitattā saguṇassa tādisavisiṭṭhassa paṭilābhato,
anya-e0812n0:1161_5: evaṃ santepi tassa munindasseva eko aññassa tādisassābhāvā adharapallavo na dhavalo dhavalo nāhosi.
anya-e0812n0:1164_0: Kiṃ tena vo na vihitaṃ hita’muggadugga-
anya-e0812n0:1166_4: tasmā kathaṃ “tasseveko nādharapallavo”ti ettha yasaddābhāvoti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1166_7: anubhūtavisayo ca tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhate. Yathā –
anya-e0812n0:1172_0: Yadi vakkhati kattabbaṃ, ñātakārīhi so jino”.
anya-e0812n0:1178_0: Yasaddo tuttaravākyaṭṭho pubbavākye tasaddameva gamayati. Yathā –
anya-e0812n0:1184_0: Pubbavākyopātto tu yasaddo uttaravākyetasaddopādānaṃ vinā sākaṅkhe vākyassa ūnattaṃ janeti.
anya-e0812n0:1185_1: Munindassa mandaṃ īsakaṃ sañjāto pavatto hāsoyeva sitaṃ candanacuṇṇamiva tena limpitā ālepitā pallavā
anya-e0812n0:1185_2: rukkhalatādīnaṃ pakatirattāni kisalayāni dhavalā saguṇapariccāgena setā ahesuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1185_3: tathāpi tasseva tathāgatassa eko atulo asahāyo vā adharapallavo dantāvaraṇasaṅkhātapallavo na raṃsisaṃsaṭṭhopi samīpaṭṭhopi dhavalo seto nāhosi.
anya-e0812n0:1188_0: Kiṃ tena vo na vihitaṃ hita’muggadugga-
anya-e0812n0:1190_2: kumatayo he aññāṇā! Pemāvabandhahadaye sabbesu tumhesu niccaṃ pavattitadaḷhapemānubandhacitte sadaye
anya-e0812n0:1190_3: tatoyeva dayāsahite tasmiṃ jinasmiṃ visayabhūte kiṃ nu kasmā appasannā bhavatha,
anya-e0812n0:1190_4: tathā hi vo tumhākaṃ tena jinena uggo dāruṇo ca,
anya-e0812n0:1190_6: soyeva saṃsārasāgaro tassa samuttaraṇaṃ pariyantappattiyeva avasānaṃ yassa taṃ na vihitaṃ akataṃ hitaṃ vuddhi nāma kiṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1190_8: Etthāpi samāsassa pākaṭattā ojo guṇo kanto hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1191_1: tasaddānaṃ niccasambandhoti kathaṃ “tasseveko”ti ca “tasmiṃ nu kiṃ kumatayo”ti ca iccādīsu heṭṭhā vuttayasaddo natthīti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1194_0: Evamādīsu “so”ti niddiṭṭhatasaddo “buddhānussatimādito”ti ettha atītena buddhasaddena vacanīyavisayo hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1196_0: Yadi vakkhati kattabbaṃ, ñātakārīhi so jino”ti.
anya-e0812n0:1200_1: tasmā tīsupi ṭhānesu tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhate.
anya-e0812n0:1200_3: Apica uttaravākye ṭhito yasaddo pubbavākye tasadde asatipi tameva dīpeti.
anya-e0812n0:1205_0: Yo budhānaṃ cakkhusotasatīnaṃ gocarataṃ visayabhāvaṃ sameto patto,
anya-e0812n0:1205_1: tesaṃyeva dosārīnaṃ kilesapaccatthikānaṃ dappamathane dappamaddane ekaraso padhānakicco samiddhivanto vā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1205_3: Pubbavākye payojito yasaddo uttaravākye tasaddopādāne asati saṃsayamuppādayamāno vākyassa ūnattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0812n0:1211_2: Padassa abhidheyyo attho so visayo yassa.
anya-e0812n0:1211_5: Yatthappakehi padehi abhidheyyattho pacurapadehi vuccate, so byāso.
anya-e0812n0:1211_7: Taṃ tathāvidhaṃ yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ pariṇatabhāvo hotīti anuvaditvā sopi iha sasatthe ojovāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:1212_2: Padānaṃ bahūnaṃ appakānaṃ vā padānaṃ abhidheyyavisayaṃ vitthārasaṃkhittatthavisayavantaṃ samāsabyāsasambhavaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1212_3: yathākkamaṃ saṅkhepavitthāradvayena nipphannaṃ nipphattivantaṃ vā yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ kattūnaṃ ganthavisaye
anya-e0812n0:1212_6: sopi iha subodhālaṅkāre ojo nāma saddaguṇo atthaguṇo.
anya-e0812n0:1212_8: padānaṃ abhidheyyo visayo yassa pāriṇatyasseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1212_12: pariṇatassa kattuno ganthassa eva vā bhāvoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1212_13: Kattu pāriṇatyapakkhe tappakāsakaganthassa tadatthena pāriṇatyaṃ siddhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1218_0: 124. “Jotayitvāne”ccādi. Iminā heṭṭhā pacurapadābhihito buddhavaṃso saṅkheparūpena vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1219_2: So tathāgato saddhammaṃ sapariyattikaṃ navalokuttarasaddhammaṃ jotayitvāna ñāṇālokena obhāsetvā sadevake
anya-e0812n0:1219_3: satte santāretvā saṃsārasāgarapariyantamupanetvā aggikhandhova mahātejena aggikkhandho viya jalitvā anaññasādhāraṇarūpakāyasampattiyā
anya-e0812n0:1219_4: pajjalitvā ante sasāvako sāvakehi saha nibbuto khandhaparinibbānena parinibbutoti.
anya-e0812n0:1219_5: Iminā sakalabuddhavaṃse bahūhi padehi vuttattho saṅkhepakkamena vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1222_0: Yato puññena te senti sentu (ka.), jenapādambujadvaye.
anya-e0812n0:1223_2: Matassāpi maraṇamāpannassāpi me matthake muddhani aṭṭhī rajobhāvaṃ dhūlittaṃ vajantu pāpuṇantu.
anya-e0812n0:1223_4: Yato yasmā kāraṇā puññena kusalena kammena hetunā te rajā jinassa ime jenā, pādā,
anya-e0812n0:1223_9: Ettha “kathamahaṃ bhagavato pāde niccaṃ sirasā paṇamāmī”tyadhippāyo vitthārena vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1224_2: matassāpi me mayhaṃ matthakaṭṭhī muddhani aṭṭhīni rajobhāvaṃ atisukhumarajattaṃ vajantu pāpuṇantu.
anya-e0812n0:1224_4: Yato yasmā kāraṇā puññena mayhaṃ tathāvidhena kusalakammena hetunā te rajā jenapādambujadvaye jinapaṭibaddhacaraṇapadumayugaḷe senti pavattanti,
anya-e0812n0:1224_5: buddhassa siripāde kiñcipi rajojallaṃ na upalimpateva,
anya-e0812n0:1224_7: Ettha “kathamahaṃ bhagavato siripāde muddhanā niccaṃ paṇamāmī”tyabhilāso vitthārena vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1224_11: jenā ca te pādā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1228_2: Iccevaṃ atra gāthāyaṃ paṇatiyaṃ paṇāme gedho adhikacchando sādhu sundaraṃ padissati viññāyate,
anya-e0812n0:1228_3: ayaṃ yathāvutto ojo guṇo pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhāto tikkhapaññānaṃ sātisayamatīnaṃ evaṃ santepi abhiyogato
anya-e0812n0:1229_2: Iti iminā anantaragāthāyaṃ vuttakkamena atra imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ niccaṃpaṇatigedho nirantarapaṇāme adhikakattukāmatākusalacchando
anya-e0812n0:1229_3: sādhu vibhūto vibhūtaṃ vā padissati paññāyati,
anya-e0812n0:1229_4: ayaṃ guṇo yathāvutto ayaṃ pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhāto ojo nāma saddatthaguṇo tikkhapaññānaṃ sukhumabuddhimantānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1229_6: vattu pāriṇatyeneva bhavanato yesaṃ kesañci yena kenaci pakārena na sijjhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1229_10: abhi punappunaṃ yogo yuñjananti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1232_0: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā.
anya-e0812n0:1233_4: tesaṃ āsatti ṭhānādināyathākathañci samasutīnaṃ āsannatā padāsatti,
anya-e0812n0:1233_9: Pubbā paṭhamābhihitā padāsatti samā yena kenaci ṭhānamattāsaṃyogādinā padantarena suti vaṇṇo yassā sā siyā bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n0:1233_10: paro pacchimo anuppāso tu vaṇṇassa sarabyañjanalakkhaṇassa āvutti punappunuccāraṇaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1233_11: Evaṃ katthaci bandhe samānapadāsatti katthaci anuppāso katthaci tadubhayaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1233_12: dvayena rahito viraso bandho nassādīyate kavīhi,
anya-e0812n0:1233_14: silesasamatānvitantuccantameva ramaṇīyaṃ siyāti lakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā “yathe”ti lakkhiyamubhayatthodāharati “yade”ccādinā,
anya-e0812n0:1234_3: padānaṃ vākyāvayavasaṅkhātānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ uparūparipadehi samānānaṃ āsatti ṭhānakaraṇādinā yena kenaci pakārena aññamaññaṃ āsannatā,
anya-e0812n0:1234_4: anuppāso pubbuccāritavaṇṇānaṃ puna pakkhipanañcāti dvinnaṃ vasā vibhāgena dvidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1234_7: paro anuppāso pana vaṇṇāvutti sarabyañjanasabhāvānaṃ pubbuccāritavaṇṇānaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1234_9: Evaṃ katthaci bandhe padāsatti katthaci anuppāso katthaci tadubhayaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1234_10: dvīhi vinimutto pana bandho viññūhi assādanīyo na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1234_11: Upari vakkhamānāhi silesasamatāhi yuttaṃ madhurattaṃ pana visesato assādanīyaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1240_1: Eso munipuṅgavo yadā yato pabhuti abhisambodhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sampatto samadhigato,
anya-e0812n0:1240_2: tadā pabhuti tato ārabbha dhammassa catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedassa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātassa mahussavo
anya-e0812n0:1240_3: mahanto abbhudayo nippaṭipakkhā pavatti loke tividhe jāto ahosīti.
anya-e0812n0:1241_2: Eso munipuṅgavo yadā abhisambodhiṃ sabbaññutaṃ sampatto sasantāne uppādanavasena sampāpuṇi,
anya-e0812n0:1241_3: tadā pabhuti tato paṭṭhāya dhammassa kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānādipabhedassa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammassa
anya-e0812n0:1241_8: “bhi dhi”nti dhanitato āsannatāti iccādinā padāsatti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n0:1241_12: mahanto ca so ussavo cāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1245_3: munindassa mandahāsā manuññā hasitāni candassa kantiyo sobhāyo hasantā viḍambayantā disantamanudhāvanti anuvicaranti.
anya-e0812n0:1249_2: Kundasandohavibbhamā supupphitakundakusumarāsisadisalīlāvantā te munindamandahāsā buddhassa manuññā hasitā
anya-e0812n0:1249_3: candakantiyo nimmalacandakiraṇe hasantā nindantā disantaṃ taṃ taṃ disaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1249_7: Mandā ca te hāsā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1253_0: Tattha indanīladaladvandasundaraṃ indanīlamaṇisakalikāyugaḷamiva manoharaṃ sirimandiraṃ tatoyeva sobhāya
anya-e0812n0:1253_1: nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ munindanayanadvandaṃ indīvarajjutiṃ nīluppalakantiṃ vindati anubhoti,
anya-e0812n0:1257_3: Sabbehi komalehi sukumārehi vaṇṇehi akkharehi anuppāso na pasaṃsiyo silāghanīyo na hoti silesavirodhittā.
anya-e0812n0:1257_5: Ayaṃ mālatīmālā jātikusumadāmaṃ linānaṃ byādhitānaṃ lolānaṃ kusumarasārabbha lolupānaṃ alīnaṃ bhamarānaṃ mālā panti sā assā atthīti linalolālimālinī.
anya-e0812n0:1258_1: Vuttānuppāsopi sabbakomalavaṇṇehi viracito na pasaṃsiyoti dassetuṃ “sabbakomalavaṇṇehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:1258_2: Sabbakomalavaṇṇehi sabbehi sukumārakkharehi kato anuppāso vaṇṇāvuttilakkhaṇo na pasaṃsiyo silesālaṅkāraviruddhattā pasattho na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1258_4: Ayaṃ mālatīmālā esā jātisumanamālikā linānaṃ byāvaṭānaṃ patantānaṃ lolānaṃ gandhaluddhānaṃ alīnaṃ bhamarānaṃ mālinī pantiyuttāti.
anya-e0812n0:1258_7: lolā ca te alayo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1258_8: linā ca te lolālayo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1264_2: Kevalehi kevalaphuṭādibhāvāpavattehi sakalehi mudūhi catūsupi pādesu sajātiyehi asithilakomalehi vā kakārādīhi
anya-e0812n0:1264_3: vā sithilakomalassa silesapaṭipakkhattā kevalehi phuṭehi vā adhimattasutīhi bhakārādīhi rāgādīhi (ka.)
anya-e0812n0:1264_4: vā akicchavacanīye kicchavacanīyassa sukhumālavipariyayattā missehi vā majjhimasutīhi mudubhūtasaṃsaṭṭhehi
anya-e0812n0:1264_5: vā vaṇṇehi akkharehi karaṇabhūtehi samatā tidhā hoti gajje pajje vā.
anya-e0812n0:1265_2: Kevalehi phuṭamissehi aññattā sakalehi mudūhi sithilakomalehi vaṇṇehi kakārādīhi vā kevalehi phuṭehi
anya-e0812n0:1265_3: kevalakomalavaṇṇarahitattā sakalehi akicchuccāraṇīyehi adhimattasutīhi bhakārādīhi vaṇṇehi vā missehi
anya-e0812n0:1265_4: yathāvuttamuduphuṭasammissehi vaṇṇehi vā karaṇabhūtehi samatā gajje vā pajje vā tidhā hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1265_6: kicchuccāraṇīyehi phuṭavaṇṇehi kataṃ sukhumālālaṅkārassa ca virujjhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1272_5: munindassa ālāpo visaṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgiko saro tassa vibbhamo vilāso sataṃ sappurisānaṃ hadayaṅgamataṃ manonusāritaṃ madhurabhāvaṃ yāti,
anya-e0812n0:1273_2: Kokilānaṃ karavīkasakuṇānaṃ ālāpaṃ nādalīlaṃ saṃvādī pakāsanasīlo,
anya-e0812n0:1273_4: munindassa sabbaññuno ālāpassa visaṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgikanādassa vibbhamo vilāso sataṃ sappurisānaṃ hadayaṅgamataṃ cittārādhitabhāvaṃ yāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1273_5: nibbutiṃ sutasambandhena tesaṃyeva sādhūnaṃ nibbānaṃ deti ca dentopi hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1273_6: Ettha kokilālāpasaddena nissite nissayavohārena līlā gahitā.
anya-e0812n0:1280_3: Sadevake loke santo sobhano bhāvo adhippāyo yassa taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1281_2: Sambhāvanīyasambhāvaṃ sadevakena lokena ādaraṇīyasobhanādhippāyaṃ bhavantaguṃ bhavassa antasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1281_3: nibbānaṃ gataṃ vibhuṃ pabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ bhavantasādhanākaṅkhī nibbānasādhanābhilāsī
anya-e0812n0:1281_4: ko katamo saṃsāravattijano na sambhāvaye ādaraṃ na kareyya,
anya-e0812n0:1281_6: Santo ca so bhāvo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1286_2: Laddho candanatarūnaṃ saṃsaggo paricayo tena sobhano gandho assāti sugandhī surabhi malayānilodakkhiṇapavamāno
anya-e0812n0:1286_3: munindassa mukhamārutā bhītova tādisamuduttasītalattasugandhasampattiyā attano dūratarattā āyāti anuvattati.
anya-e0812n0:1287_3: malayadesato āgacchamānamāluto munindamukhamārutā buddhassa mukhasurabhivāsitapavanato bhīto iva tādisamudusurabhisītalattassa
anya-e0812n0:1287_4: attani asambhavato bhītova mandaṃ saṇikaṃ yāti abhimukhametīti.
anya-e0812n0:1287_12: Ettha tividhasamatāyaṃ “kokilālāpasaṃvādi”ccāditividhalakkhiyassāpi “mudūhi vā kevalehi”ccādinā dassitalakkhaṇattayena tulyatā supākaṭāvāti.
anya-e0812n0:1291_2: Aniṭṭhurāni apharusāni akkharāni vaṇṇāni pāyāni bahūni yassā sā tathā,
anya-e0812n0:1291_4: tatoyeva sabbehi kevalehi komalehi sithilehi laghūhi akkharehi nissaṭā niggatā kicchena dukkhena uccāraṇā
anya-e0812n0:1291_5: tato apetāni apagatāni byañjanāni yassā sāti anuvaditvā sukhumālatā vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:1292_5: Aniṭṭhurāni akkharāni pāyāni bahūni yassanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1292_6: sabbe ca te komalā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1296_2: Rūpavibhavaṃ rūpasampattiṃ passantā madhuraṃ giraṃ vācaṃ suṇantā sādhavo keḷiparammukhā kīḷāya nicchantā carantīti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:1301_2: Alaṅkārehi vihīnāpi edisī sukhumālatā sataṃ paṇḍitajanānaṃ sammukhataṃ abhimukhabhāvaṃ vācāgocarattaṃ ārohati upagacchati,
anya-e0812n0:1301_4: Tena sabhāvavutyādinā alaṅkārena ujjalā dittā pana visesenātisayena ramaṇīyā manuññāti.
anya-e0812n0:1302_2: Edisī evaṃvidhā sukhumālatā alaṅkāravihīnāpi atthālaṅkāravirahitāpi sataṃ paññavantānaṃ sammukhataṃ abhimukhabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1302_4: Tadujjalā tena sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttisambhūtena atthālaṅkārena jotamānā visesena atisayena ramaṇīyā manuññā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1306_2: Romañcā lomahaṃsā iva romañcā eva vā,
anya-e0812n0:1306_3: piñchāni barihāni parihārāni (ka.) tesaṃ racanā chattākārena vidhānaṃ yesaṃ te tathā,
anya-e0812n0:1306_5: āhito dhani kekāsaṅkhāto yesaṃ te tathā,
anya-e0812n0:1306_6: munimeghena munisadisena munisaṅkhātena vā vāridena ummadā mattā sādhusadisā sādhu eva vā sikhāvalā mayūrā laḷanti līlopetā vicaranti,
anya-e0812n0:1307_2: Romañcapiñcharacanā lomahaṃsasadisā romā eva vā piñchānaṃ barihānaṃ racanā chattākārena vitthāravantā
anya-e0812n0:1307_3: sādhuvādāhitaddhanī “sādhū”ti vacanasadisehi sādhuvādehi vā pavattakekāninnādehi samannāgatā munimeghummadā
anya-e0812n0:1307_4: munisadisena munisaṅkhātena vā meghena sañjātamadā ime sādhusikhāvalā sajjanasadisā sādhuno eva vā mayūrā
anya-e0812n0:1307_6: Idaṃ asesavatthuvisayaṃ samāsarūpakaṃ amukhyapakkhe “romañcā viya sādhuvādo viya muni viya sādhavo viyā”ti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1307_7: mukhyapakkhe “piñcharacanā viya āhitaddhanī viya megho viya sikhāvalā viyā”ti upacaritabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1307_11: āhito ca so dhani ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1311_6: Matādisaddesu vattabbesu kittisesādīnaṃ saddānaṃ kittanaṃ kathanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1312_3: Sukhumālattamattheva padatthavisayampi ca padābhidheyyagocarampi sukhumālattaṃ attheva,
anya-e0812n0:1312_7: Mato itiādi yesaṃ “jīvitakkhayaṃ patto” iccādīnamiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1318_2: Siliṭṭhānaṃ bandhalāghavābhāvena aññamaññaṃ siliṭṭhānaṃ padānaṃ saṃsaggena ramaṇīyo manuñño guṇo tassa ālayo pavattiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1318_4: saha tena vattatīti sabandhagāravoti anuvaditvā soyaṃ sileso nāmāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:1319_2: Siliṭṭhapadasaṃsaggaramaṇīyaguṇālayo ṭhānakaraṇādīhi āsannavaṇṇānaṃ vinyāsahetu aññamaññanissitānaṃ padānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1319_3: samavāyena manuññaguṇassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūto sabandhagāravo bandhagāravasaṅkhātaracanāya asithilabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:1319_4: saha pavatto so ayaṃ bandho sileso nāmāti.
anya-e0812n0:1319_7: Siliṭṭhā ca te padā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1323_2: Bālinduno pañcamī pañcamīcandassa (?) pañcadasakalassa vibbhamo manoharattaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1323_3: taṃ chindati sīlenāti bālinduvibbhamacchediyo pañcamīcandassa kalāsannibhānaṃ nakharānaṃ nakhānaṃ āvaliyo
anya-e0812n0:1323_4: tāsaṃ kantibhi sobhāhi saha valitā saṃyuttā sā,
anya-e0812n0:1323_5: munindassa padāniyeva ambhojāni padumāni tesaṃ kanti.
anya-e0812n0:1324_2: kantibhi taruṇacandavilāsavināsanasabhāvasamannāgatanakhapantisobhāhi saha valitā saṃyuttā sā munindapadambhojakanti
anya-e0812n0:1324_3: sā sambuddhapādapadumasobhā vo tumhe avataṃ rakkhatūti.
anya-e0812n0:1324_4: Bālo ca so indu cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1324_9: bālinduvibbhamacchediyo ca tā nakharāvalikantiyo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1330_2: Yo koci “idameve”ti niyamābhāvā guṇo cāgātisayādiko ukkaṃsavanto adhimatto yadi patīyate viññāyate bandheti
anya-e0812n0:1330_7: Tena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandhapaddhati racanakkamo nāthabhūtena udāraguṇena saha vattatīti sanāthā,
anya-e0812n0:1331_2: Ukkaṃsavanto atisayavā yokoci guṇo cāgātisayādiko saddāvaliyā paṭipādanīyo ānubhāvo yadi patīyate sace katthaci bandhe viññāyate,
anya-e0812n0:1331_5: Bandhabandhati padāvali tena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena sanāthā sappatiṭṭhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1334_0: Aho te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1335_4: tehi littāni upadehitāni gattāni yesanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1335_5: Ye janā te jantavo sabbappakārena rajolavenāpyanupalittattā rajehi kilesasaṅkhātehi niggatā nirajā,
anya-e0812n0:1335_6: tesaṃ bhāvo nirajattanaṃ nikkilesabhāvaṃ yanti pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0812n0:1335_7: Aho acchariyaṃ yato rajasā littā nāma saṃkiliṭṭhāyeva siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1335_8: bhavaṃ pana pādarajasā vilepane jane niraje karoti.
anya-e0812n0:1336_2: Bho gotama ye sattā tava tuyhaṃ pādambhojarajolittagattā pādapadumareṇulittamatthakanalāṭādisarīrāvayavayuttā
anya-e0812n0:1336_3: te jantavo sattā sabbathā kilesasaṅkhātarajojallehi anupalittattā sabbappakārena nirajattanaṃ vigatakilesarajobhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1336_7: tvaṃ pana pādarajasā upalittepi satte niraje karosīti bhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:1340_1: Ko panettha ukkaṃsavanto guṇo yena bandho sanātho siyāti ce?
anya-e0812n0:1340_3: Evamiti jinānubhāvassa sammāsambuddhapabhāvassa samukkaṃso atisayo dissati padissate atra bandhe,
anya-e0812n0:1340_4: tasmā jinānubhāvena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandho sanātho siyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1340_6: Paññavā paññāsampanno anena vidhinā iminā pakārena edisaṃ evarūpaṃ paraṃ aññaṃ cintaye vitakkeyya.
anya-e0812n0:1341_2: Atra imissaṃ anantaragāthāyaṃ evaṃ yathāvuttakkamena jinānubhāvassa tathāgatappabhāvassa samukkaṃso ādhikkaṃ dissati padissate,
anya-e0812n0:1341_3: tasmā jinānubhāvasaṅkhātena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandho sanātho bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n0:1341_4: Paññavā pasatthañāṇavanto anena vidhinā iminā kamena īdisaṃ paraṃ aññaṃ cintaye kappeyya.
anya-e0812n0:1347_3: sopi na pana yathāvuttova udāro viññeyyo.
anya-e0812n0:1348_12: tāni ādīni yesaṃ kusumadāmamaṇimekhalādīnanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1355_3: taṃ lokiyaṃ atthaṃ abhidheyyaṃ anatikkantā anatītā sabbesaṃ kavīnamitaresaṃ vā janānaṃ eva kantā manoharā kanti nāmāti vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:1355_4: Ayaṃ pana saddaguṇo ativuttassa vākyadosassa pariccāgena sambhavati.
anya-e0812n0:1356_2: Lokiyatthānatikkantā loke pasiddhasaddatthamanatikkantā sabbajanānaṃ sakalakavīnaṃ kantā manuññā kanti nāma vuccate,
anya-e0812n0:1356_3: sā ativuttassa ativuttadosassa parihārato vuttā dosaparihāraparicchede kathitā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1356_4: Ativuttadosaparihārato eva kantiyā siddhattā tassa lakkhiyo eva etissā hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1356_6: so ca so attho ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1363_2: Abhidheyyassa sambandhaatthassa saddato atthato vā sāmatthiyato vā aneyyatā patīti aññathā vagamo gatyantarābhāvā,
anya-e0812n0:1363_7: Tadubhayā jātā sāyaṃ aneyyatā neyyaparihāre padassitā pakāsitā.
anya-e0812n0:1364_2: Abhidheyyassa atthassa saddato atthato atthasāmatthiyato ca aneyyatā tattheva vijjamānattā saddassa atthassa
anya-e0812n0:1364_3: vā āharitvā vattabbassa abhāvo atthabyatti nāma,
anya-e0812n0:1364_4: tadubhayā tehi dvīhi jātā sā ayaṃ aneyyatāsaṅkhatā atthabyatti neyyaparihāre neyyadosaparihārapadese padassitā pakāsitāti.
anya-e0812n0:1364_6: sāmatthiyavilaṅghinī”ti vuttattā atthapatīti pana vinā saddañca sāmatthiyañca aññathānupalabbhatīti iha “saddato atthato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1364_8: natthi neyyaṃ āharitabbaṃ assa abhidheyyassāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1364_10: te ca te ubho saddatthā cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1371_2: Te tava pādanakhesu sabhāvāmalatā pakatiparisuddhatā mudhā tucchā.
anya-e0812n0:1371_4: Yato yasmā kāraṇā te pādanakhā avanatassa sannatassa anantassa nāgarājassa moḷino kirīṭassa avanatānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1371_5: vā naramarānaṃ anantānaṃ moḷīnaṃ chāyā chaviyo no jahanti na pariccajanti,
anya-e0812n0:1371_7: Ettha nakhesu sañchavittā pādanakhassa moḷīnaṃ nirantarappaṇāmābyabhicārānaramarādīnaṃ bhagavato pādāravindavandanaṃ sāmatthiyā phuṭaṃ gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1372_2: Dhīra te tava pādanakhesu sabhāvāmalatā pakatiparisuddhatā mudhā tucchā.
anya-e0812n0:1372_4: Yato yasmā te caraṇanakhā avanatānantamoḷicchāyā pādānatassa anantanāgarājassa kirīṭassa sambandhinī,
anya-e0812n0:1372_5: avanatānaṃ vā anantānaṃ devamanussānaṃ moḷīnaṃ chāyā kantiyo no jahanti na vijahanti,
anya-e0812n0:1372_7: tasmā ettha candakiraṇasannibhānaṃ nakharaṃsīnaṃ samīpe moḷīnaṃ nakharaṃsīhi amadditasakakantiyuttabhāvamāpajjanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1372_8: tādisānaṃ nirantarappaṇāmābhāvābhāvato khattiyādīnaṃ munindapādāravindadvande nirantarappaṇāmo sāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:1372_13: paṭhamapakkhe avanato ca so ananto cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1372_16: dutiyapakkhe anantā ca te moḷī ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1376_2: Yanti yaṃ samādhiṃ bandhassa gajjapajjamissabhāvassa sāroti sabbassa jīvitaṃ tapparāyattā bandhassa samaggāpi
anya-e0812n0:1376_3: viññuno sabbepi kavino maññanti cintenti jānanti,
anya-e0812n0:1376_4: ayaṃ samādhi nāma samādhikhyo guṇo dassane pakāsane avasaraṃ okāsaṃ anottarattā parassa sampatto uddiṭṭhānukkamenāti.
anya-e0812n0:1377_2: Samaggā api viññuno sabbepi kavayo yaṃ samādhiṃ “bandhasāro”ti pajjagajjavimissasaṅkhātassa bandhassa jīvitamiti maññanti,
anya-e0812n0:1377_3: ayaṃ samādhi nāma guṇo dassanāvasaraṃ patto uddiṭṭhānukkamena dassanokāsaṃ patto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1383_2: Aññassa vatthuno pakatāpekkhāya dhammo guṇo pasiddho,
anya-e0812n0:1383_3: tato tasmā mukhyavisayā aññattha amukhye visaye lokasīmānurodhato lokappatītyanuvattanena sammā sādhu
anya-e0812n0:1383_5: iti iminā kāraṇena eso evaṃvidho dhammo “samādhī”ti niruccatītidha sammā ādhīyatīti evaṃ nīharitvā vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1384_1: “Samādhī”ti ayaṃ vohāro bandhavisaye kathaṃ pavattatīti āsaṅkāyaṃ paṭhamaṃ nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ āha “aññi”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1384_2: Yasmā aññadhammo samādhānassa visayabhūtaamukhyato aññassa mukhyavatthuno pasiddhaguṇo,
anya-e0812n0:1384_3: tato mukhyavisayato aññattha amukhyavisaye lokasīmānurodhato lokavohāramariyādāvirodhabhāvena lokappatītyanuvattaneneva sammā ādhīyati ṭhapīyati,
anya-e0812n0:1384_4: iti iminā kāraṇena eso yathāvuttaguṇo “samādhī”ti niruccati vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1387_0: Apāṇe pāṇinaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci;
anya-e0812n0:1392_2: Kvaci ṭhāne pāṇinaṃ pāṇavantānaṃ padatthānaṃ dhammo guṇo apāṇe pāṇavirahite vatthuni sammā lokapatītyanuvattanena ādhīyate āropyate,
anya-e0812n0:1392_6: Asarīre aghane asaṃhate vatthuni kaṭhinassa daḷhassa,
anya-e0812n0:1392_7: tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ samādhīnaṃ rūpaṃ udāharaṇaṃ kamā uddiṭṭhānukkamena.
anya-e0812n0:1393_2: Kvaci kismiñci ṭhāne pāṇinaṃ dhammo indriyabaddhānaṃ guṇo apāṇe pāṇarahitavatthumhi sammā lokapatītianusārena ādhīyate āropyate,
anya-e0812n0:1393_3: kvaci rūpayuttassa rūpavantavatthuno dhammo nirūpe rūparahitavatthumhi,
anya-e0812n0:1393_4: kvaci sarasassa rasavantassa vatthuno dhammo nirase rasarahite ca,
anya-e0812n0:1393_5: kvaci dravayuttassa dravavantavatthuno dhammo adrave dravarahite ca,
anya-e0812n0:1393_7: kvaci kaṭhinassa thaddhassa vatthuno dhammo asarīrepi sarīrarahitepi sammā ādhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:1393_8: Tesaṃ channaṃ samādhīnaṃ rūpaṃ udāharaṇaṃ kamā “apāṇe pāṇina”nti uddiṭṭhānukkamena siyā bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1399_3: Tava uṇṇāromadhātusaṅkhātena puṇṇindunā saha saṅgamā saṃyogena kumudinī kumudiniyo kumudākarā divāpi
anya-e0812n0:1399_4: viniddā vigatasoppā sampamodanti maññe suṭṭhuyeva pamodantīti parikappemīti.
anya-e0812n0:1399_5: Ettha pāṇidhammassa suratarūpassa saṅgamassa viniddāya sampīṇanassa ca apāṇini āropitapumbhāve uṇṇāpuṇṇindumhi,
anya-e0812n0:1399_6: tathā āropitaitthibhāvāsu kumudinīsu lokasīmānurodhena samādhānato soyaṃ pasiddho dhammo “samādhī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:1399_7: Tadabhidhāyī saddo ca upacārato atthānugāmittā saddikavohāraṃ dasseti,
anya-e0812n0:1400_2: Nātha tava tuyhaṃ uṇṇāpuṇṇindunā uṇṇāromamaṇḍalasaṅkhātapuṇṇacandena saha saṅgamā aññamaññasamavāyahetunā
anya-e0812n0:1400_3: kumudinī keravākarasaṅkhātā kumudiniyo divāpi viniddā vikasitā sampamodanti maññe atisantuṭṭhā hontīti
anya-e0812n0:1400_5: Ettha pāṇidhammasaṅkhāto suratasaṅgamo ca niddāpagamo ca sampamodanañcāti tiṇṇaṃ uṇṇāpuṇṇindukumudinīsaṅkhātesu
anya-e0812n0:1400_6: apāṇesu lokavohārānatikkamma buddhiyā āropanena pāṇidhammato pasiddhā tayo atthā idha samādhayo nāma,
anya-e0812n0:1400_8: Puṇṇo ca so indu ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1405_2: Nātha te pādambujesu ānatā paṇāmavasena janā tilokakuharapavattino sattā amatarasesviva pīyūsarasesu viya dayārasesu karuṇārasesu guṇesu.
anya-e0812n0:1405_4: guṇe rāge drave raso”ti amarakosa 3.3.226 hi nighaṇṭu.
anya-e0812n0:1405_5: Mujjantā nimujjamānā hatā naṭṭhā dosā vātādayo amatapakkhe,
anya-e0812n0:1405_6: aññattha tu hatā naṭṭhā dosā rāgādayo yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0812n0:1405_7: tatoyeva sukhitā sukhaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ itā pattā gatāti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1406_2: Nātha te tava pādambujānatā caraṇapadume paṇatā janā devamanussā amatarasesu iva sudhājalesu viya dayārasesu
anya-e0812n0:1406_3: anaññasādhāraṇakaruṇāguṇesu mujjantā nimujjamānā hatadosā vinaṭṭhavātapittādayo vinaṭṭharāgādidosā vā
anya-e0812n0:1406_5: Ettha rūpayuttajale labbhamānaṃ mujjanaṃ nirūpe dayāguṇe āropitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1406_8: hatā vātādayo rāgādayo vā dosā yesanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1407_0: “Siṅgārādovise vīriye, guṇe rāge draveraso”ti amarakosa 3.3.226 ettha rasasaddo guṇajalesu vattati.
anya-e0812n0:1410_0: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, nappasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0812n0:1412_3: bho dhīra tava madhurepi manoharepi guṇe karuṇādike ye nappasīdanti pasādaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0812n0:1412_4: khāraguṇānaṃ amadhuraguṇānaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ manaso vutti cittappavatti kīdisīti kimiva dissati,
anya-e0812n0:1413_2: Bho dhīra tava te madhure api guṇe pakatisundare karuṇāpaññāguṇepi ye hīnādhimuttikā janā nappasīdanti,
anya-e0812n0:1413_3: khāraguṇānaṃ amadhuraguṇānaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ manaso vutti cittappavatti kīdisī kathaṃ ruhati.
anya-e0812n0:1413_7: Ettha samādhi nāma rasahīne āropitarasayuttadhammabhūtaṃ madhurakhāraguṇadvayaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1418_2: Sabbatthasiddhassa mahāmunino cūḷakapuṭena peyyā pātabbā kundasobhāsalakkhaṇā kundakusumassa sobhāsavantā
anya-e0812n0:1418_3: jutivijambhino mahāguṇā samantā parito disā disantāni dhāvanti.
anya-e0812n0:1419_3: nipphannehi sabbatthehi vā samannāgata he tathāgata tava cūḷakapuṭapeyyā cūḷakapuṭena pātabbā kundasobhāsalakkhaṇā
anya-e0812n0:1419_4: kundasobhāhi samānalakkhaṇā kundasobhāsadisā vā mahāguṇā saṅkhyāmahantattā ānubhāvamahantattā vā mahantā
anya-e0812n0:1419_5: vā arahattādayo guṇā samantā samantato disā dasadisāsu dhāvantīti.
anya-e0812n0:1419_6: Ettha dravayuttaguṇabhūto cūḷakapuṭapeyyabhāvo dravarahite guṇe āropito samādhi nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1419_7: Sabbe ca te atthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1419_11: mahantā ca te guṇā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1419_13: tāhi samānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yesanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1424_4: tassa vā balena senāya vissaṭṭhā abhimukhaṃ chaḍḍitā nānāvidhā anekappakārā āyudhā bhindivāḷādayo kuṇṭhā
anya-e0812n0:1424_6: evarūpaṃ jāta”nti lajjantā aññavesena “kathaṃ nāma pare amhe na jāneyyu”nti attano āvudhavesaṃ parivattitvā
anya-e0812n0:1425_2: He jina mārāribalavissaṭṭhā mārasattunā attano sattiyā vissaṭṭhā,
anya-e0812n0:1425_3: mārārino vā senāya vissaṭṭhā abhimukhe pātitā nānāvidhāyudhā anekappakārabhindivāḷaususattitomarādayo
anya-e0812n0:1425_4: āvudhā kuṇṭhā atikhiṇā lajjamānā “kasmā evaṃ lokapasiddhānubhāvānamamhākampi īdisaṃ vippakāramahosī”ti
anya-e0812n0:1425_5: lajjantā aññavesena “kathamamhe pare na jāneyyu”nti āvudhavesaṃ hitvā tadaññabhūtena pupphavesena tava
anya-e0812n0:1425_7: Ettha kattudhammabhūtaṃ lajjanañca aññavesena parivattanañca ānatañceti ime lajjanādīnaṃ akattubhūtesu visayesu āropitā samādhayo nāma honti.
anya-e0812n0:1425_10: mārārinā balavissaṭṭhāti ca mārārino balaṃ senāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1425_14: añño ca so veso cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1432_2: Bodho sabbaññutaññāṇasadiso soyeva vā udayācalo udayapabbato tasmiṃ kāle rattipariyante abhinikkhantasamaye
anya-e0812n0:1432_3: udito pātubhūto munindo munindasadiso soyeva vā bhāṇumā sūriyo andhatamaṃ andhakāraṃ mohaṃ vā paraṃ accantameva
anya-e0812n0:1432_4: saddhammaraṃsinā saddhammasadisena saddhammasaṅkhatena vā raṃsinā bhindaṃ padālento bhāti sobhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1433_2: Bodhodayācale sabbaññutaññāṇasadise sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhāte vā udayapabbate kālodito rattikkhaye māraparājitasamaye
anya-e0812n0:1433_3: vā udito pātubhūto munindabhānumā munindasadiso munindoyeva vā sūriyo andhatamaṃ pakatighanandhakāraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1433_4: bahalamohandhakāraṃ saddhammaraṃsinā saddhammasadisena saddhammabhūtena vā kiraṇena paramatisayena bhindaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1433_6: Ettha thaddhadhammabhūtaṃ bhedanaṃ asarīrabhūte andhakāre buddhiyā āropitaṃ samādhi nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1437_5: Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ guṇā padhānetarā pasiddhavisayā visayantarapariggahalakkhaṇā vutti payogarūpā,
anya-e0812n0:1437_6: tato apariccutaṃ aparigaḷitaṃ santaṃ amukhyabhūtaṃ atisundaraṃ accantamanoharamalaṅkārarūpattā,
anya-e0812n0:1437_7: aññaṃ tu itaraṃ pana mukhyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1437_8: Kāmaṃ ekantena gāmmataṃ asabbhasabhāvaṃ bandhe tassānucitabhāvato vindati paṭilabhati pasavatīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1438_1: Idāni imesuyeva pāṇidhammādīsu koci dhammo amukhyavisaye payutto pasattho,
anya-e0812n0:1438_3: Etaṃ vamanuggiranādi vamanauggiranavirecanādikaṃ guṇavutyapariccutaṃ amukhyapayogato agaḷitaṃ amukhyabhūtaṃ atisundaraṃ sabbesaṃ atipiyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1438_4: aññaṃ tu uttato byatirekaṃ mukhyavisaye payuttaṃ vamanuggiranādikaṃ pana kāmaṃ ekantena gāmmataṃ sabhāvaappiyagāmmadosataṃ vindati sevatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1442_2: Munino sammāsambuddhassa pādanakhānaṃ āvalī seṇiyo kantīnaṃ attano nirantaraṃ nissarantīnaṃ sobhāvisesānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1442_3: vamanabyājā uggiranalesena candakantī candacchaviyo sabbattha patthaṭattā pivantīva pānaṃ karontīti takkemi.
anya-e0812n0:1442_5: Taṃ candaṃ nippabhaṃ pabhāvirahitaṃ karontiyo vidahamānā.
anya-e0812n0:1442_6: Idañhi kappanābījaṃ yato nakhasobhāliṅganena candassa sobhāvato nippabhattaṃ passitvā mahattañca tassā
anya-e0812n0:1442_7: nakhāvaliyo candakantī pivantīti parikappeti kantīnañca vamanabyājaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1443_2: Munipādanakhāvalī munipādanakhaseṇiyo kantīnaṃ attano candamarīcisadisasobhānaṃ vamanabyājā uggiranalesena
anya-e0812n0:1443_3: taṃ nimmalacandaṃ nippabhaṃ karontiyo attano sabbattha patthaṭattā nippabhaṃ karontiyo candakantī candaraṃsiyo
anya-e0812n0:1443_5: Nakharaṃsīnaṃ sabbattha patthaṭattā sappabhassāpi candassa nippabhattañca nakharaṃsīnaṃ adhikattañca
anya-e0812n0:1443_6: disvā candakantī pivanti iveti nakhāvalīnaṃ candakantipivanañca sakakantivamanañca pakati na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1443_8: Ettha bhattasitthādimukhyavisayato aññakantisaṅkhataamukhyavisaye payuttaṃ vamanaṃ guṇavuttīti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1447_2: Iccevaṃ acitto kattā yassa taṃ acittakattukaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1448_1: Anantarodāharaṇassa pasatthattañca kammani guṇe sati sacittakattukavamanādikañca iṭṭhamiti dassento “acittakattuka”miccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:1448_2: Iccevaṃ iminā pakārena acittakattukaṃ nakhāvalisaṅkhātaaviññāṇakakattuvantaṃ guṇakammaṃ nakhakantisaṅkhātaappadhānakammavantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1448_3: vamanādikaṃ rujhaṃ racanāya ucitattā rucijanakaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1448_4: etaṃ vamanādikaṃ sacittakattukampi saviññāṇakakattuvantampi yadi guṇakammaṃ amukhyakammaṃ ce,
anya-e0812n0:1448_6: “kantīna”nti bhāvasambandhe chaṭṭhiyā satipi vamanakriyāya kammattaṃ nātivattati.
