anya-e0812n0:1448_12: atha vā vacanavacanīyānaṃ vacanavacanīyādīnaṃ (ka.) nigamārambhe nipātasamudāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1451_0: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sampīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1452_2: So jinavaro jane sakalasattanikāye sneharasaṃ attano pemasaṅkhātaṃ anurāgaṃ uggirantova vamanto viya
anya-e0812n0:1452_3: madhuraṃ atipaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsanto kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇaye,
anya-e0812n0:1453_2: So jinavaro jane sakalasattanikāye sneharasaṃ attano pemasaṅkhātaanurāgaṃ uggiranto iva vamanto viya
anya-e0812n0:1453_3: madhuraṃ ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ saddhammaṃ bhāsanto desento yathāsayaṃ vadanto kaṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1453_6: Ettha uggiranaṃ jinavarasaṅkhatasacittakakattuvantampi sneharasasaṅkhātaamukhyakammayuttattā pasatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1462_2: tadanubandhapaṭibhāne cāvijjamānepi sutena abhiyogabalena kavitā kitti ca tadanugatā samupalabbhatīti samanusāsati “yo”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1462_3: Saddasatthe byākaraṇe kismiñci “idameve”ti niyamābhāvā kusalo cheko nighaṇṭumhi abhidhānasatthe ca chandasi
anya-e0812n0:1462_4: vuttijātippapañcapakāsakachandovicitisatthe ca alaṅkatisu alaṅkārasatthe ca kusalo na kevalaṃ saddasattheyeva,
anya-e0812n0:1462_5: atha ca pana niccamanavarataṃ divā ca ratto ca kato abhiyogo vāyāmo racanāvisaye yassa soyaṃ kavittavikalopi
anya-e0812n0:1462_6: bandhakaraṇasaṅkhātakaviguṇaparihīnopi kavīsu kaviguṇopetesu saṅkhyaṃ gaṇanaṃ ogayha paṭilabhitvā amandarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1462_7: atibahuṃ kittiṃ parisuddhabandharacanālakkhaṇaṃ tappabhavaṃ khyātaṃ vindati paṭilabhatevāti.
anya-e0812n0:1466_1: Idāni uddesakkamena saddālaṅkāre niddisitvā byākaraṇanighaṇṭuchandoparivārite imasmiṃ nirantarābhiyogo
anya-e0812n0:1466_3: Yo theranavamajjhimesu koci saddasatthakusalo saddānusāsanabyākaraṇavisaye pakatipaccayādivibhāgakappanāya
anya-e0812n0:1466_4: cheko nighaṇṭuchandoalaṅkatīsu abhidhānachandoalaṅkārasatthesupi kusalo taṃtaṃvibhāgabuddhīnaṃ paṭipādanena
anya-e0812n0:1466_5: cheko niccakatābhiyogo dhāraṇamanasikāravasena niccaṃ katussāho hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1466_6: So ayaṃ appamādī kavittavikalopi pakatisiddhakabbaracanaguṇarahitopi kavīsu saṅkhyaṃ kabbakattūsu gaṇanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1466_7: ogayha kabbakaraṇaṭīkākaraṇādipakārena ogāhetvā taṃ gaṇanaṃ pāpuṇitvā amandarūpaṃ anappakasabhāvaṃ atibahuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1471_0: Tattha sābhāvikī sabhāvasiddhā paṭibhā ca paññā ca bahu nimmalaṃ anappakaṃ nijjaṭaṃ sutañca amando abhiyogo
anya-e0812n0:1471_1: ca anappako abhyāso ceti ayameso sabbopi iha bandhane imissaṃ kabbaracanāyaṃ hetu hoti kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1471_2: Sadde sāsati ettha etenāti imasmiṃ atthe tappaccayañca tassa thādesañca katvā saddasatthanti ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1471_4: nighaṇṭu ca chando ca alaṅkati alaṅkārañceti ca viggaho,
anya-e0812n0:1471_9: amandaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1478_2: Saguṇā yathāvuttehi pasādādīhi saddaguṇehi sahitā bandhapaddhati kabbaracanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1478_3: Alaṅkarīyati kantiṃ nīyati bandho etehi sarīramiva hārādīhīti alaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n0:1478_4: tehi atthālaṅkārehi jātyādilakkhaṇehi sahitā saṃyuttā satī saguṇā patibbatādiguṇopetā atthena dhanena
anya-e0812n0:1478_5: alaṅkārena ābharaṇena sahitā yuttā kantāva aṅganā viya.
anya-e0812n0:1478_7: tato tena kāraṇena ye atthālaṅkārā avasaraṃ pattā,
anya-e0812n0:1479_1: Evaṃ saddālaṅkāravibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni tannissayaṃyeva atthālaṅkārabandhamārabhanto “atthālaṅkāri”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:1479_2: Saguṇā yathāvuttapasādādisaddaguṇayuttā bandhapaddhati pajjagajjādipabhedā racanāvali atthālaṅkārasahitā
anya-e0812n0:1479_3: sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttisaṅkhātena atthālaṅkārena saṃyuttā saguṇā atthālaṅkārasahitā kantā iva patibbatādīhi
anya-e0812n0:1479_4: guṇehi yuttā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādidhanehi gīveyyakaṭakanūpurādīhi ābharaṇehi ca yuttā aṅganāva accantakantā
anya-e0812n0:1479_6: tato tasmā te atthālaṅkārā adhunā dāni vuccante.
anya-e0812n0:1479_7: Alaṅkaronti bandhaṃ sarīraṃ vā etehīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1483_2: Sabhāvavutti vaṅkavuttīti imesaṃ bhedā pabhedena alaṃkriyā atthālaṅkārādvidhādvippakārā.
anya-e0812n0:1483_4: Tattha tāsu paṭhamā sabhāvavutti vatthūnaṃ padatthānaṃ jātiguṇakriyādabbasabhāvānaṃ nānā vicittā,
anya-e0812n0:1483_5: na dvekāva avatthā avasarā vibhāvinī pakāsikā viññeyyā.
anya-e0812n0:1483_6: Jātyādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ yathāsabhāvamanekappakāraṃ sammadeva vivarantī sabhāvaṃ padatthānaṃ vicittaṃ vadatīti sabhāvavutti nāmāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0812n0:1483_7: sāva jātiyā padatthasarūpassa tathātathāpaṭipādakattena vuttiyā dattiyā (ka.) jātipi vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:1484_2: Alaṃkriyā atthālaṅkārā sabhāvavaṅkavuttīnaṃ bhedā pabhedato dvidhā dvippakārā honti.
anya-e0812n0:1484_3: Tattha tāsudvīsu paṭhamā sabhāvavutti vatthūnaṃ jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇānaṃ padatthānaṃ nānāvatthāvibhāvinī anekappakārassa pakāsinī hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1484_4: Ettha jātyādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ anekappakārasabhāvapakāsinī sabhāvavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1484_5: Esāva jāti guṇādicatubbidhapadatthānaṃ sarūpasaṅkhātajātiyā tehi ākārehi paṭipādanato upacārato jāti nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1484_6: Jātyādipadatthānaṃyeva yathāsabhāvaṃ hitvā vatthuparikappitaatisayopamārūpakādisarūpasaṅkhātaṃ vaṅkasabhāvaṃ pakāsentī vaṅkavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1484_10: nānā anekā ca sā avatthā cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1491_2: Līlāya vilāsena vihitāya vikantiyā gamanena sattapadavītihārasaṅkhātena subhago sundaro disāsu dasasu
anya-e0812n0:1491_3: thiramacalaṃ vilokanaṃ yassa so bodhisattaṅkuro tadahujāto mahābodhisatto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ “aggohamasmī”tiādikamuttamaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1491_4: nibbhayavacanaṃ bhāsaṃ vadanto viroci visesena ramaṇīyattaṃ patto.
anya-e0812n0:1492_3: Līlāvikantisubhago vilāsagamanena sattapadavītihārena sundaro disāthiravilokano dasadisāsu acalaolokano
anya-e0812n0:1492_4: bodhisattaṅkuro mahābodhisattaṅkuro āsabhiṃ vācaṃ “aggohamasmī”tiādinā abhītavacanaṃ bhāsaṃ vadanto viroci asobhīti.
anya-e0812n0:1492_5: Iha bodhisattasaṅkhātassa dabbassa līlāvikantidisāthiravilokanavaconicchāraṇasaṅkhatānaṃ avatthānaṃ pakāsitattā dabbasabhāvavuttīti ñātabbā.
anya-e0812n0:1492_15: Usabhassa bhāvasaṅkhātā akampanīyā ṭhiti āsabhaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n0:1492_16: akampabhāvato tena samāpi vācā upacārato āsabhī nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1496_2: Vatthuno jātyādirūpassa padatthassa sabhāvo yassaṃ avatthāyaṃ yādisaṃ rūpaṃ tassa aññathābhāvena tassa rūpassa tathetaṃ dabbāpanena vutti vacanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1496_3: Parā bhave aññā vaṅkavutti nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:1496_4: Kiṃ sā sākallena vattuṃ sakkāti āha “tassā”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1496_5: Tassā vaṅkavuttiyā anantavikappattā aparimitabhedakattā bījassa kāraṇattā sakalabyattibyāpisāmaññarūpassa yato pare vicittālaṅkārā pasavanti,
anya-e0812n0:1497_2: Vatthusabhāvassa jātyādipadatthasambandhino tāsu tāsu avatthāsu yo sabhāvo vijjati,
anya-e0812n0:1497_3: tassa sabhāvassa aññathā vijjamānākāraṃ hitvā vattuparikappitena atisayaupamārūpakādiaññapakārena yā vutti yaṃ kathanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n0:1497_4: sā parābhave sabhāvavuttito aññā vaṅkavutti nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:1497_5: Tassā vaṅkavuttiyā anantavikappattā appamāṇapakkhattā kathanena parisamāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā nayato tassa
anya-e0812n0:1497_6: anantapakkhassa pariggahaṇatthaṃ bījopadassanaṃ kāraṇamattassa nidassanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1497_7: Vakkhamānabhedato ekamekampi attanā sadisaṃ anantabhedapariggahajānanatthaṃ pahotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1517_0: Vaṅkavuttīsu poseti, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1518_2: Tatthāti tassaṃ vaṅkavuttiyaṃ “ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā”ti iminā sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:1518_7: jīvitamuccateti tadabhāve bandhassa chavasseva heyyattā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1518_8: sileso tu vaṅkavuttīsu sabhāvavuttiṃ hitvā vatthusabhāvato aññathā yathā tathā parikappanarūpāsu atisayādīsu
anya-e0812n0:1518_9: vuttīsu paraṃ siriṃ kantiṃ poseti taṃ pūreti āvahatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1519_1: Bhedavantānaṃ padatthānaṃ sabhāvakathanaṃ uddesakkamena pākaṭaṃ hotīti vattamānehi alaṅkārehi uddisanto “tatthātisaya…pe…
anya-e0812n0:1519_3: Tattha tatthāti tissaṃ vaṅkavuttiyaṃ iti evaṃ ete pañcatiṃsa bhedā samuddiṭṭhā saṅkhepena vuttāti.
anya-e0812n0:1519_4: Etesaṃ pana padānaṃ attho niddese āvibhavissati.
anya-e0812n0:1519_5: Iminā bhāvo ca sileso ca atippasatthoti dīpeti.
anya-e0812n0:1519_6: Bhāvo bhāvālaṅkāro jīvitaṃ bandhassa pāṇabhūtoti vuccate,
anya-e0812n0:1519_8: sileso tu silesālaṅkāro pana vaṅkavuttīsu atisayopamādivaṅkavuttīsu paramukkaṃsabhūtaṃ siriṃ sobhaṃ poseti pūreti.
anya-e0812n0:1526_2: Visesassa vatthugatassātimattassa pakāsikāyāti anuvaditvā sā atisayavutti siyāti vidhīyate,
anya-e0812n0:1526_3: atisayassa vatthuno ukkaṃsassa paṭipādikā vutti atisayavutti.
anya-e0812n0:1526_5: Lokaṃ lokappatītiṃ atikkanto visayo gocaro yassā sā lokātikkantavisayā ca loke bhavā lokaṭhitimanatikkantattāti
anya-e0812n0:1526_6: lokiyā cāti atisayavutti dvidhā dvippakārā bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:1527_5: lokātikkanta visayāti ca lokiyāti ca yathāvuttalokamanatikkamma pavattanato lokiyāti cevaṃ dvidhā dvippakārā honti.
anya-e0812n0:1527_10: “Visesassa pakāsikā”ti pasiddhaguṇānuvādena sā atisayavutti siyāti apasiddhaṃ atisayavuttividhānaṃ karoti,
anya-e0812n0:1533_1: Ayaṃ dvippakārā atisayavutti sabhāvavutyādīhi bhinnāti ce?
anya-e0812n0:1533_3: Jātiādayo yato padatthassa vicittaṃ sarūpaṃ vadatīti vicittasarūpapaṭipādikā sabhāvavuttipi alaṅkāro,
anya-e0812n0:1533_16: tato lokātikkantavisayā ca visuṃ dassanīyāti āha “paṭī”tiādi.
anya-e0812n0:1533_18: Ajja tu idāni pana lokātikkantagocarā paṭipādīyateti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:1534_1: Idāni esā dvippakārāpi atisayavuttisabhāvavutyādīhi anaññāti dassetuṃ “lokiye”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:1534_2: Jātiādayo jātiguṇādipadatthagatavicittasarūpassa pakāsanato nissayavohārena “jātyādayo”ti niddiṭṭhā jātisabhāvavuttiguṇasabhāvavutyādayo
anya-e0812n0:1534_7: Evaṃ lokiyātisayavuttiyā “līlāvikantisubhago”ti udāharaṇassa gamyamānattā vakkhamānaṃ paṭijānāti “paṭipādīyate”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1534_8: Ajja tu idāni pana lokātikkantagocarā atisayavutti paṭipādīyate udāharaṇato nipphādīyati.
anya-e0812n0:1540_2: Jina te dehakantī sarīrasobhāyo ye janā nettañjalipuṭena attano nayanadvandasaṅkhātena añjalipuṭena pivanti,
anya-e0812n0:1540_3: esaṃ janānaṃ taṇhaṃ pipāsaṃ lobhameva vā harati anupatati apanayati (?).
anya-e0812n0:1540_4: Taṇhāharopi samāno tvaṃ hantuṃ nivattituṃ kiṃ nālaṃ kasmā asamatthosi.
anya-e0812n0:1540_6: Atra hanantāmapiha sampanudati lokaṭhitiṃ atikkamma dehakantiyā bahuttanadhammo vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1541_2: Bho jina te tuyhaṃ dehakantī sarīrasobhāyo ye janā nettañjalipuṭena nettasaṅkhātena hatthapuṭena pivanti,
anya-e0812n0:1541_3: esaṃ sādhujanānaṃ taṇhaṃ pipāsaṃ lobhameva vā taṇhāharopi tvaṃ sabbesaṃ taṇhāvināsakopi hantuṃ nivāretuṃ kiṃ nālaṃ kasmā asamatthosīti.
anya-e0812n0:1541_4: Ettha pivanaṃ nāma pipāsaṃ vinetīti lokasabhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:1541_7: tassa vutti pana taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nālamiti lokātikkantaatthaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavatto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1541_8: Sā pana kathetumicchitaṃ kantīnaṃ adhikapiyataṃ taṇhāhanane asamatthaṃ vatvā dīpetīti vaṅkavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1541_9: Vuccamānānaṃ upamārūpakādīnampi vaṅkavuttitā icchitatthassa pakārantarena pakāsanatoyeva.
anya-e0812n0:1541_10: Yathā nāma sarīrasahajaṃ pīnattādisundarattaṃ uddīpanākārena ṭhitā kaṭakauṇhīsahārādayo alaṅkārā nāma bhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:1541_11: evaṃ bandhasarīrasaṅkhāte alaṅkaraṇīyavatthumhi vijjamānaatipiyatādimeva uddīpetvā alaṅkurumānā “taṇhāharosi
anya-e0812n0:1541_12: tvaṃ esaṃ kantī pivantānaṃ taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nāla”miti vācābhaṅgī alaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1541_14: Uttaripi alaṅkāraalaṅkāriyavibhāgo ca anurūpato yojanakkamo ca evameva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:1545_9: Sadhammattanti samāno dhammo kantimantatā yassa so sadhammo,
anya-e0812n0:1545_10: tassa bhāvo sadhammasaddassa pavattinimittasamānena dhammena saha sambandho sadhammattaṃ upamānopameyyapatiṭṭhitaṃ upamā siyā,
anya-e0812n0:1545_17: Tassa attho visayo gocaro yassā vākyatthavisayāti ca sā upamā tividhā saddagammaatthagammavākyatthavisayāti tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1546_2: Upamānopameyyānaṃ candanīluppaladalābhādīnaṃ ānananayanādīnañca padatthānaṃ sadhammattaṃ kantimantatāpīnatāditulyadhammasambandho upamā nāma siyā,
anya-e0812n0:1546_3: sā alaṅkaraṇīyavatthuno ādhikkapaṭipādanappakārā upamā saddatthagammā saddagammā ca atthagammā ca vākyatthavisayā ca,
anya-e0812n0:1546_6: padatthānaṃ upamatthassa patiṭṭhitattā upaṭṭhānatāya upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1546_7: tannissayacandādayo pana nissitavohārena upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1546_8: upamānabhūtacandādiatthapaṭipādako candimādisaddopi tadatthena upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1546_10: Upamīyate anenāti upamānanti katvā candādi upamānaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0812n0:1546_13: samāno ca so dhammo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1546_18: so visayo yassā upamāyāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1550_2: Samāso ca paccayo ca ivādi ca,
anya-e0812n0:1550_5: Tesaṃ samāsādīnaṃ vasā saddagammā tidhā hoti samāsasaddagammā paccayasaddagammā ivādisaddagammāti,
anya-e0812n0:1550_6: samāsena samāsasaddena gammā upamā vuccatīti seso.
anya-e0812n0:1550_8: candimā viya ruciramānanaṃ mukhaṃ yassa so candimānano.
anya-e0812n0:1550_13: tesu sādhāraṇadhammavācakassa viyasaddassa copamājotakassāppayogo samāseneva vuttattā,
anya-e0812n0:1550_14: ettha pana viyasaddo candimāsaddena upamānavācakena sambandhamupagato candagatameva sadisattaṃ vadati,
anya-e0812n0:1551_1: Tesu yathāvuttesu saddagammassa tividhattaṃ dassetuṃ āha “samāse”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1551_5: tesaṃ samāsādīnaṃ vasā bhedena saddagammā tidhā samāsasaddagammā paccayasaddagammā ivādisaddagammāti tividhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1551_7: Munindo sammāsambuddho candimānano candasamānamanoharamukhamaṇḍalena yutto hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1551_8: samāso ca paccayo ca ivaiti idaṃ ādi yesaṃ vādīnanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1551_11: candimā viya ruciraṃ ānanaṃ mukhaṃ yasseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1551_15: “viyā”ti saddo candānanānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānanagatarucirattaṃ cande ca,
anya-e0812n0:1551_16: candagatarucirattaṃ ānane ca atthīti samānadhammasambandhaṃ joteti,
anya-e0812n0:1551_18: tulyadhammasaṅkhātopamājotakassa viyasaddassa ca appayogo tesaṃ atthānaṃ samāsena vuttattā.
anya-e0812n0:1551_19: Ettha upamānavācakena candimāsaddena yutto viya saddo candagatasadisattaṃ joteti,
anya-e0812n0:1551_21: Tathā hi mukhaṃ candasamānamāgacchantaṃ candassa mukhasadisattaṃ vinā na bhavatīti aññathānupapatti sāmatthiyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1555_10: Tattha rucira ivasaddānaṃ pubbe viyāppayogo paccayena vuttattāti sabbattha viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1556_2: Āyādī “āya īya ka”itiādayo paccayā paccayasaddā nāma,
anya-e0812n0:1556_5: Vadanaṃ mukhaṃ paṅkajāyate padumamiva ruciraṃ ācarati.
anya-e0812n0:1556_6: Munindanayanadvandaṃ sabbaññuno nettayugaḷaṃ nīluppaladalīyati nīluppalapattamiva ruciramācarati.
anya-e0812n0:1558_0: Ivādī iva vā tulya-samāna nibha sannibhā;
anya-e0812n0:1570_0: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0812n0:1575_2: Ivo ca vā ca tulyo ca samāno ca nibho ca sannibho cāti dvande iva…pe… sannibhā.
anya-e0812n0:1576_1: Ivādisaddagammopamādhikāre paṭhamaṃ tāva “ivādayo nāma ete”ti dasseti “ivādi”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1576_2: Ivādīti padassa chaṭṭhamagāthāya imeti iminā sambandho,
anya-e0812n0:1576_3: tassa cāti casaddaṃ yujjanaṭṭhāne yojetvā sannibhā cātiādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0812n0:1576_7: “Jayati akkosati hasati”iccādikaṃ taṃtaṃkriyāpadasaṅkhataanukāriyānaṃ anukaraṇanti katvā dvandoyeva,
anya-e0812n0:1576_8: “sandhisamāsā addhassā”ti sandhisamāso tadaddhassāti (ka.) vuttattā sandhisamāsānaṃ gāthaddhassa vinā
anya-e0812n0:1576_9: ubhayaddhamajjhe alabbhanato dūbhatipadato pubbeyeva samāso kātabbo, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:1576_11: Tassa coreti sobhaggamiccādikampi vākyānukaraṇanti katvā tattha samāso,
anya-e0812n0:1576_13: Imesaṃ sabbesampi iva saddapariyāyattā sadisatthāti sabbattha bhāvattho,
anya-e0812n0:1580_1: Ivādīnaṃ viniyogavisayaṃ dassetvā upamābhedaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “upamāna”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1581_4: Imehi ivādīhi saddehi jānitabbā keci upamābhedā apariyantattā sampati dāni laddhāvasare niyyanti udāharaṇamattena paṭipādīyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1585_2: Sugatānanaṃ munindassa vadanaṃ atisundaraṃ accantaramaṇīyaṃ. Kimiva?
anya-e0812n0:1585_4: Iti ayamevaṃvidhā dhammopamā nāma hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:1585_5: Ānanapadumānaṃ samānassa dhammassa guṇassa sundarassa lakkhaṇassa nidassanā sundarattanti paṭipādanato.
anya-e0812n0:1586_2: Sugatānanaṃ bhagavato mukhaṃ vikāsipadumaṃva bujjhamānapaṅkajamiva atisundaraṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1586_3: Iti īdisā upamā tulyadhammanidassanā atisundaramiti samānaguṇadassanena dhammopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1586_4: Padumānanānaṃ sādhāraṇaguṇassa pakāsanato atisundaramiti tulyadhammo nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1586_5: Ettha padumagatatulyadhammasambandhasaṅkhātāya upamāya ivasaddena jotiyamānattepi atisundaranti vuttattā
anya-e0812n0:1586_6: yathāvuttopamāya dhammena yuttattā dhammopamā nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1590_2: Munino sammāsambuddhassa mukhaṃ ambhojena padumena sadisaṃ samānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1590_3: Iti ayaṃ dhammahīnopamā nāma sundarasaṅkhātassa guṇassa aniddiṭṭhattā,
anya-e0812n0:1590_6: Ettha pana sadisasaddo upameyyassa mukhassa visesananti mukhagatameva sadisattaṃ vadati,
anya-e0812n0:1590_11: bho muni tava ānanena mukhena ambujaṃ tulyanti ayaṃ viparītopamā.
anya-e0812n0:1591_6: Ettha mukhassa ambhojasamānattaṃ mukhambhojānaṃ sādhāraṇadhamme asati kathaṃ bhavatīti?
anya-e0812n0:1591_8: ivapariyāyo sadisasaddo mukhassa visesanaṃ yasmā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1591_11: He muni tava tuyhaṃ ānanena ambhojaṃ tulyaṃ samānanti ayaṃ viparītopamā.
anya-e0812n0:1591_12: “Ambujena ānanaṃ tulya”nti lokappasiddhiyā vipariyayena “ānanena ambujaṃ tulya”nti vuttattā dhammahīnatte satipi viparītopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1591_13: “Sutānumitesu sutasambandho balavā”ti paribhāsendusekhara 112 vuttattā ettha “munī”ti avijjamānepi pubbaddhe
anya-e0812n0:1591_15: Ettha ivapariyāyo tulyasaddo ambujavisesanabhūto ambujagatasadisattaṃ vadati,
anya-e0812n0:1591_16: ānanagatasadisattañca ambujānanānaṃ sādhāraṇadhammo ca sāmatthiyā ñāyaticcādikaṃ vuttanayena ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1595_2: Aññamaññopamānatoti aññamaññassa mukhassa ambhojassa ca aññamaññena taṃdvayena upamānato.
anya-e0812n0:1596_4: Aññamaññopamānato aññamaññassa upamānattā aññamaññopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1596_9: Samāsalakkhaṇena aññatthassa apekkhāsiddhattā mukhāpekkhāya aññaṃ ambhojañca,
anya-e0812n0:1596_10: ambhojāpekkhāya aññaṃ mukhañca kamena upameyyā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1602_5: Tamīdisamambhojaṃ tava mukhasobhaṃ vadanakantiṃ dhāretuṃ nisijjhate.
anya-e0812n0:1602_6: Kiṃ nvacchariyamīdisanti abbhutatthavibhāvanena vadanamambujenopamīyatīti ayamabbhutopamā ñātabbāti.
anya-e0812n0:1603_2: Locanabbhamuvibbhamaṃ locanabhamūnaṃ līlāvantaṃ kiñci ambhojaṃ kiñci acchariyaṃ padumaṃ yadi bhave ce siyā,
anya-e0812n0:1603_3: tamambhojaṃ tava mukhasobhaṃ vadanakantiṃ dhāretuṃ samattho hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1603_4: Iti īdisī upamā abbhutopamā abbhutadhammapakāsakattā abbhutopamā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1603_5: Ettha avijjamānopi vijjamānattena parikappito padumagato locanabbhamuvibbhamasambandho ambhojavisesanena “locanabbhamuvibbhama”nti iminā jotito.
anya-e0812n0:1603_7: mukhaṃ upameyyanti mukhagato locanabbhamuvibbhamasambandho yadi mukhe na bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n0:1603_8: tādisaṃ mukhasobhaṃ dhāretuṃ kathaṃ samatthoti sāmatthiyā ñāyati.
anya-e0812n0:1603_10: tāsaṃ vibbhamo yasmi”nti ca viggahe nipphannena bhinnādhikaraṇaaññapadatthasamāsena guṇībhūtassapi gahitattā viññāyati gahaṇassa viññāyamānattā (ka.).
anya-e0812n0:1607_2: Tava mukhaṃ ambhojamiva sisiraṃsunocandassa virodhi paccanīkaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1607_6: Sugandho assa atthīti sugandhi ca dvayamapīti evaṃ silesapariggahena mukhambujānaṃ upamāyogato sā yathāvuttā silesopamā matā.
anya-e0812n0:1608_2: Tava mukhaṃ ambhojamiva sisiraṃsuvirodhi candassa viruddhaṃ hoti tulyattā.
anya-e0812n0:1608_3: Padumaṃ pana candodayena attano saṅkocanattā tassa viruddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1608_6: Sugandhi ca catujjātisugandhavahanato …vamanato (ka.) sugandhi ca hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1608_8: Iti īdisī upamā silesopamā ekapadātihitaubhayatthalakkhaṇena silesavasena vuttattā silesopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1608_9: Sisirā sītalā aṃsu kanti asseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1608_11: paccayasāmatthiyavasena dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ labbhanato silissati aparopi attho ettha alaṅkāreti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1608_13: Ettha sugandho ca sotasambandho ca sisiraṃsuvirodhittañceti ime upamānopameyyānamambujamukhānaṃ tulyadhammo,
anya-e0812n0:1608_14: tesu ambujagatatulyadhammasambandho sadhammattā upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1608_16: mukhagatatulyadhammo pana assatthitassīlatthe katapaccaye satipi sāmatthiyāyeva gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1612_3: Sālakānanasobhinī bālā tāva sahālakena kesasannivesavisesena vattate sālakamānanaṃ tena sobhate.
anya-e0812n0:1612_4: Sālakānanasobhinī uyyānamālāpi sālānaṃ rukkhavisesānaṃ kānanena gahanena sobhate,
anya-e0812n0:1612_5: evarūpā sā tādisī santānopamā ākhyāyate, kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:1612_6: Silesopamattasabhāvepi sarūpena sadisena saddena “sālakānanasobhinī”tvevaṃvidhena saddasantānena visesabhūtena vāccattā pakāsiyattā tassāiti gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1613_2: Sarūpasaddavāccattā tulyasutiyā acchinnasambandhavacanamālāya vuccamānattā sā upamā santānopamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1613_3: silesatte satipi katasamāsehi padasantānehi vuccamānattā santānopamā nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1613_5: Ayaṃ uyyānamālā esā uyyānapanti sālakānanasobhinī alakasaṅkhātakesasannivesasahitena mukhena sobhamānā
anya-e0812n0:1613_6: bālāva aṅganā iva sālakānanasobhinī sālavanehi sobhamānā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1613_8: sarūpā ca te saddā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1615_0: Khayī cando bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1617_3: padumaṃ bahurajaṃ bahūni rajāni parāgāvayavā yasminti,
anya-e0812n0:1617_4: tehi evaṃbhūtehi candapadumehi kantiādinā samānampi sadisampi santaṃ tava mukhaṃ samukkaṃsi paramukkaṃsavantaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1617_5: khayasaddassa ca rajassa ca dosepi vattanato,
anya-e0812n0:1617_6: saddacchalena khayassa dosarūpassa bahurajattassa ca tatthābhāvatoti.
anya-e0812n0:1617_7: Iti evarūpā ayaṃ nindopamā matā ninditena candādinā khayassopamitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1618_2: Cando khayī pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya dine dine ekamekāya kalāya sūriyassa āsannahetu khīyanasabhāvayutto hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1618_4: tehi candapadumehi samānampi kantisugandhādīhi sadisampi te mukhaṃ tavānanaṃ samukkaṃsi khayarajasaddehi
anya-e0812n0:1618_5: dosassāpi vāccattā saddacchalehi gamyamānassa tādisassa dosassa mukhe avijjamānattā adhikukkaṃsaguṇavantaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1618_6: iti īdisī ayaṃ upamā nindopamā ninditānaṃ candapadumānaṃ mukhassa upamitāti nindopamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1618_7: mukhavisesanena ivasaddapariyāyena samānasaddena mukhagatasadhammo jotito hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1622_2: Jina te mukhena jaḷo sīto akusalo ca kalaṅko migalañchanalakkhaṇo doso assa atthīti kalaṅkī.
anya-e0812n0:1622_4: Tādiso indu cando paṭigajjituṃ vivadituṃ asamattho,
anya-e0812n0:1622_5: mukhantu visadaṃ alaṅkatañceti kathamanenāyaṃ sadisoti nisedhadvārena sadhammatāva gammate,
anya-e0812n0:1623_2: He jina te tuyhaṃ mukhena paṭigajjituṃ vivadituṃ jaḷo sītalo avisado kalaṅkī sasalakkhaṇo vā sadoso vā indu cando asamattho hotīti,
anya-e0812n0:1623_5: Ettha visadena kalaṅkarahitena mukhena sītalo avisado sadoso cando samāno bhavitumasamatthoti evaṃ paṭisedhadvayena
anya-e0812n0:1623_6: indamukhasaṅkhātānaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ tulyadhammasambandhassa pakāsitattā satipi nindopamābhāve paṭisedhopamā
anya-e0812n0:1627_2: Candassa aravindassa ca kacchaṃ padaviṃ atikkamma avatthariya tesa’mavakaṃsato avatthuyatesamaṇaṃsato (ka.),
anya-e0812n0:1627_3: tava mukhaṃ attano sarūpeneva samaṃ jātamiti evarūpā asādhāraṇatābhidhānena sadisattapatītiyā asādhāraṇopameti nigadyate.
anya-e0812n0:1628_2: He muni tava mukhaṃ candāravindānaṃ lokapūjitānaṃ sasiambujānaṃ kacchaṃ padaviṃ avatthaṃ vā atikkamma
anya-e0812n0:1628_3: attano atulyattena attanā eva samānattavatthuno abhāvā samaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1628_4: iti īdisā upamā asādhāraṇopamā atulyadhammabhāvassa pakāsanato asādhāraṇopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1628_5: Iha upamābhūtānaṃ candāravindānaṃ mukhassa hīnabhāvapaṭipādanadvārena candāravindehi mukhaṃ tulyanti
anya-e0812n0:1632_2: Katthaci ekaṭṭhāne rāsibhūto sabbesamambhojānaṃ pabhāsārova tavānanaṃ vibhātīti evaṃbhūtā ayaṃ abhūtopamā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1633_2: Katthaci ṭhāne rāsibhūto sabbambhojappabhāsārova sakalapadumānaṃ uttamakantipuñjo viya tavānanaṃ vibhāti visesena pabhāti,
anya-e0812n0:1633_3: iti īdisī upamā abhūtopamā avijjamānavatthuno upamitattā abhūtopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1637_2: Atthagammā tu’pamā kvaci kismiñci ṭhāne samāsādisaddānaṃ yogaṃ vinā api saddānaṃ payogavisesādigāḷhena
anya-e0812n0:1638_1: Tividhaṃ saddagammopamaṃ dassetvā idāni atthagammopamaṃ dasseti “patīyate”tyādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1638_2: Atthagammā tu atthagammopamā pana kvaci ṭhāne samāsapaccayevādisaddayogaṃ vināpi tesaṃ saddānaṃ sambandhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1638_3: hitvāpi saddasāmatthiyā sambandhe payuttāvasesasaddānaṃ atthasattiyā patīyate.
anya-e0812n0:1642_5: kintu mukhamevidanti evarūpā sā sarūpopamā matā bhiṅgādīnamaviparītasarūpassa dīpanato.
anya-e0812n0:1642_7: Subyattena bhiṅgacakkhūnaṃ ambujamukhānañca pariphuṭena sadisattena cañcalattakantyādilakkhaṇena tenevābhedasaṅkāpubbameva
anya-e0812n0:1642_9: tassa paccakkhānato upamājotakānamivādīnamabhāvepi bhiṅgalocanādīnaṃ sadisattaṃ patīyate sāmatthiyato.
anya-e0812n0:1643_4: Ambujaṃ na idaṃ padumaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1643_6: Īdisī sā upamā subyattasadisattena supākaṭena bhiṅgalocanānaṃ ambujamukhānañca tulyabhāvena sarūpopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1643_8: viparītapavattabuddhiṃ paṭisedhetvā cakkhumukhavidhānato cañcalattakantimattādīsu subyattaṃ tulyattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1643_9: vinā cakkhumukhesu bhiṅgambujabuddhiṃ kīdisamuppajjatīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyā upamānabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1643_13: samānaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassā upamāyāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1643_14: sā ca sā upamā cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1647_4: nāññatrāti evarūpā vikatthanā atthapasaṃsanena alamiti paṭisedho. Kimiti?
anya-e0812n0:1647_5: Yato yasmā kāraṇā sā mukhasobhā ambujepi na kevalamindumhi atthi,
anya-e0812n0:1647_6: no natthīti asatopi tathā vikatthanassa parikappanato vadanamindunopamīyatīti evarūpā ayaṃ parikappopamā.
anya-e0812n0:1648_2: He indu assa imassa lokasāmino mukhasobhā vadanakanti ekake mayi eva,
anya-e0812n0:1648_5: Yato sā mukhasobhā ambujepi atthi, tasmāti.
anya-e0812n0:1648_6: Iti īdisā ayaṃ upamā parikappopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1648_7: Yatoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhakāraṇaṃ pana ambujepi sā atthīti dassiyamānaṃ padumepi tassa atthittameva.
anya-e0812n0:1648_9: Idha candassa avijjamānavikatthanassa vijjamānattena parikappanato sadhammajotakasaddantare asatipi upamānabhūtainduno
anya-e0812n0:1648_10: ca upameyyabhūtamukhassa ca sadisattaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sadisattaṃ vinā vattuno tādisakappanā kathaṃ hotīti
anya-e0812n0:1654_6: Jina tavedaṃ mukhaṃ kinti mama cittaṃ dolāyate dolevācarati.
anya-e0812n0:1655_2: Antobhantāli abbhantare bhamamānabhamaravantaṃ ambujaṃ kiṃ vā,
anya-e0812n0:1655_3: tuyhaṃ lolanayanaṃ cañcalanettaṃ mukhaṃ kiṃ vāti mama cittaṃ dolāyate ubhayasambhamajananato dolā viya hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1655_4: Iti ayaṃ evarūpā upamā saṃsayopamā dvinnaṃ sadisattassa saṃsayena pakāsitattā saṃsayopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1655_9: Ihāpi sadhammapakāsake saddantare asatipi yathāvuttavisesanadvayena visiṭṭhānaṃ dvinnaṃ ambujamukhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1655_10: saṃsayanimitte tulyatte asati kathaṃ saṃsayo uppajjatīti iminā sāmatthiyeneva tulyadhammasambandho gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1661_2: Kiñci vatthumicchitaṃ sambuddhādikaṃ upadassetvā sadhammassa tena vatthunā kenaci ākārena sadisassa aññassa
anya-e0812n0:1661_3: vatthuno abhidhānato sāmyassa tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sadisattassa patītiyā avasāyassa sambhāvā vijjamānattena
anya-e0812n0:1662_2: Kiñci vatthumicchitaṃ jinādikiñcipadatthaṃ upadassetvā paṭhamaṃ nidassetvā sadhammassa paṭipādanīyaatthena
anya-e0812n0:1662_3: saha kiñci ākārena sadisabhāvassa kassaci vatthuno abhidhānato kathanato sāmyappatītisabbhāvā sadisatāsambandhino
anya-e0812n0:1662_4: parijānanassa vijjamānattā pativatthūpamā vatthuno upaṭṭhitassa jinādipadatthassa tulyatthapakāsanato
anya-e0812n0:1662_6: Samāno dhammo yassa vā pārijātādino iti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1668_2: Jāyamānesu janesu majjhe ekopi jano guṇavā jinasādiso sammāsambuddhasamāno na vijjatītyekaṃ tāva vatthu upadassitaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1668_5: pārijātassa dibbarukkhavisesassa dutiyo samāno pādapo nattheva.
anya-e0812n0:1669_2: Jāyamānesu janesu ekopi jinasādiso sambuddhasadiso natthi,
anya-e0812n0:1669_3: pārijātassa rukkhassa dutiyo tena samo dutiyo pādapo rukkho natthi eva nanu,
anya-e0812n0:1669_6: Iha pārijātarukkhassa aññehi rukkhehi uttamattañca buddhassa aññesu sattesu uttamattañcāti idaṃ dvayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1669_8: etaṃ sāmyaṃ vuttatthassa samatthanavasena pativatthubhūtapārijātassa rukkhehi asamānattakathaneneva jotitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1675_3: na padatthamattena vākyattho vuttalakkhaṇo koci vattumicchito koci yadi upamīyate sadiso kathyate,
anya-e0812n0:1676_2: Vākyattheneva kriyākārakasambandhavisesasaṅkhatasamudāyabhūtena vākyatthena koci vattumicchito yo koci
anya-e0812n0:1676_3: vākyattho vuttalakkhaṇo yadi upamīyate sadisabhāvena kathīyate,
anya-e0812n0:1676_6: Ettha “ivā”ti ivādīnamatthassa gahitattā ivasaddopi tappariyāyasaddāpi gayhante.
anya-e0812n0:1683_2: Saṃklesehi dasavidhehi tattānaṃ santāpaṃ anuppattānaṃ janānaṃ ayaṃ jino sammāsambuddho āvibhūto katakiccattā sammāsambodhādhigamena loke pātubhūto.
anya-e0812n0:1683_5: Ghammasantāpena tattānaṃ janānaṃ ghammakāle gimhānasamaye ambudo megho viyāti dutiyavākyamupamānabhūtamityayamivayuttā vākyatthopamā.
anya-e0812n0:1684_2: Ayaṃ jino eso jitapañcamāro satthā saṃklesatattānaṃ anekappakāra kilesasantāpatattānaṃ janānaṃ āvibhūto
anya-e0812n0:1684_5: Ghammasantāpatattānaṃ janānaṃ ghammakāle gimhasamaye ambudoviya megho iva.
anya-e0812n0:1684_8: Evaṃ vākyabhede satipi vākyattho ekoveti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:1684_10: Uttaravākye ivasaddo tasmiṃyeva guṇaguṇīpadatthānaṃ sadisattaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0812n0:1684_11: pubbavākye guṇaguṇīnaṃ sadisattaṃ pana uttaravākyatthassa pubbavākyena samānattaṃ vinā aññathānupapattiyā ñāyati.
anya-e0812n0:1688_0: Uddhaṃ samuggatassāpi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0812n0:1689_2: Vilāsena ekamatulyaṃ manoharaṃ dutiyassa tādisassābhāvato munindānanaṃ ābhāti atisayena sobhateti ekaṃ tāva vākyamupameyyabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1689_3: Bho canda uddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ samuggatassāpi abbhuṭṭhitassāpi te tava vijambhanā sāhaṃkāraparibbhamanena kiṃ payojanaṃ na kiṃpi,
anya-e0812n0:1689_5: Asadisattaṃ munindānanassa tassa tatopi uddhamuggacchato vilāsamattameva piyāsamattameva (ka.) phalasambhavatoti dutiyavākyamupamānabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1689_6: Tathā hettha sabbathā sadisatāpatītiyā kariyamānānamuggamanavijambhanānaṃ paṭikkhepena kathañcipi mukhacandānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1690_2: Vilāsekamanoharaṃ līlāya atulyaṃ tatoyeva manoharaṃ munindānanaṃ sabbaññuno vadanaṃ ābhāti atidibbati,
anya-e0812n0:1690_3: tasmā he canda uddhaṃ uccaṃ nabhaṃ samuggatassāpi te tuyhaṃ vijambhanā ahaṃkārena paribbhamanena kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1690_4: Iha pubbavākyatthassa uttaravākyattho ivaviyuttopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1690_5: Tathā hi “sabbathā mukhena sadiso bhavāmī”ti mānaṃ karontassa candassa gaganatalārohopi vijambhanañceti
anya-e0812n0:1690_6: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭikkhepena mukhacandānaṃ vilāsekamanoharattaṃ kantimattasaṅkhātasadisattaṃ ivādīnamabhāvepi
anya-e0812n0:1690_7: viññāyatīti katvā uttaravākyattho pubbavākyatthassa upamā ca visesanañca hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1694_7: etaṃ bhinnaliṅgadikaṃ katthaci na sabbattha upamādūsanāya virodhatthaṃ alaṃ samatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1698_1: Yaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ tu vakkhamānaṃ yaṃ bhinnaliṅgavacanādikaṃ pana dhīmantaṃ paññavantaṃ kaviṃ samubbejeti
anya-e0812n0:1698_3: etaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ upamādūsanāya yathāvuttaupamāvināsanatthaṃ katthaci “itthīvāyaṃ jano yāti”iccādivattabbavisayato aññattha alaṃ samatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1704_4: “Bhaṭo adhipe sāmini sāva bhatto”ti hīnā hīnopamā kukkurassa hīnena jātyādinā adhikassa upamitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1705_2: Ayaṃ sasī cando haṃsī iva haṃsidhenūva hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1705_3: Iccādikopamā bhinnaliṅgā upameyyato bhinnaliṅgattā bhinnaliṅgopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1705_4: Ākāsaṃ nabhaṃ sarānivāti ayaṃ vijātivacanā upameyyena visadisavacanattā vijātivacanopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1705_5: Adhipe sāmini bhaṭo sevako sāva sunakho iva bhattoti ayaṃ hīnā jātihīnena sunakhena uttamassa purisassa upamitattā hīnopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1705_8: vijāti vacanaṃ assā upamāyāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1711_2: Khajjoto bhānumālīva sūriyo viya vibhātītyadhikopamā adhikena hīnassa upamitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1711_3: Balambhodhi senāsāgaro sāgaro viya saṃkhubhīti aphuṭṭhatthopamā “balambhodhī”ti rūpakena senāya mahantattāvagamato
anya-e0812n0:1711_4: puna “sāgaro viyā”ti upamāya kassaci visesatthassa asaṃphuṭṭhattā.
anya-e0812n0:1712_2: “Khajjoto bhānumālīva vibhātī”ti ayaṃ adhikopamā adhikāya upamāya upamitattā adhikopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1712_3: “Balambhodhi senāsamuddo sāgaro viya saṃkhubhī”ti ayaṃ aphuṭṭhatthā senāya mahattaṃ “balambhodhī”ti tirobhūtaupamāyeva avagataṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1712_4: tasmā puna “sāgaro viyā”ti upamāya phusitabbatthassābhāvā aphuṭṭhatthopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1718_2: Kalaṅko bhiṅgo viyātyayamupamā “cande kusumagacchasadise” ityupamantaramapekkhateti yato cande bhiṅgo na sambhavati,
anya-e0812n0:1718_4: Sakalaṅko sasalakkhaṇo nisākaro cando keravākāro kumudasannibhoti khaṇḍitopamā keravassa antokaṇhattaṃ paṭipādetuṃ “sabhiṅgakeravākāro”ti vattabbattā.
anya-e0812n0:1719_2: “Cande kalaṅko bhiṅgo ivā”ti ayaṃ upamāpekkhinī candassaupamābhūtapupphagacchakādiapekkhanato upamāpekkhinī nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1719_3: Cande bhiṅgapavattiyā abhāvato tassa visayabhūtapupphagacchakādi candassa upamattena gahetvā avuttattā duṭṭhāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1719_4: Sakalaṅko kalaṅkasahito nisākaro cando keravākāro kumudasadisoti ayaṃ khaṇḍitā candagataṃ kaṇhattaṃ pakāsetuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1719_5: “sabhiṅgakeravākāro”ti vattabbe bhiṅgopamābhāvassa khaṇḍitattā khaṇḍitopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1722_0: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvacideva tu.
anya-e0812n0:1723_3: Vigato apagato ādaro sambhāvanā yesaṃ tathā bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:1723_5: aniyameneti niyameneti (ka.) ce gayhūpagampi atthīti āha “karonti”ccādiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1723_6: Kvacideva tu payoge dhīrā kavayo ādaraṃ karonti cāti.
anya-e0812n0:1724_2: Iti anantaraṃ niddiṭṭhesu evamādirūpesu payogesu dhīrā vigatādarā bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:1724_3: Imeyeva dhīrā kvacideva tu payoge bhinnaliṅgādike ādaraṃ karonti ca.
anya-e0812n0:1724_4: Iti evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi yesamiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1724_5: tāni ca tāni rūpāni ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1730_3: Esā itthī pumāva puriso viya vadati tādisassa pāgabbhiyayogato.
anya-e0812n0:1730_5: Ayamicchito koci me pāṇā iva piyo iṭṭho,
anya-e0812n0:1730_6: vijjā byākaraṇādayo dhanamiva accitā rāsikatāti vacanabhedo.
anya-e0812n0:1731_2: Ayaṃ jano itthīva avisadagamanena mahilā viya yāti.
anya-e0812n0:1731_3: Esā itthī pumā viya tādisapāgabbhiyayuttattā puriso viya vadatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1731_4: Iha dvinnaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ liṅgabhede satipi kavayo ādaraṃ karonti.
anya-e0812n0:1731_5: Ayaṃ puriso me mama pāṇā iva pāṇā iva jīvo iva (ka.) āyavova piyo.
anya-e0812n0:1731_6: Accitā sañcitā vijjā byākaraṇanighaṇṭuādayo dhanamiva hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:1731_7: Ettha upamānopameyyānaṃ vacanato visesatte satipi iṭṭhameva.
anya-e0812n0:1735_5: Evaṃvidhe samucite visaye liṅgavacanabhedādikaṃ nopamaṃ dūsetīti dassetīti (ka.).
anya-e0812n0:1736_3: devarājā sakko devarājā bhavaṃ viya virājateti.
anya-e0812n0:1736_5: Ayaṃ rājā aṃsumato sūriyassa kacchaṃ padaviṃ tejasā ārohituṃ pattuṃ alaṃ samatthoti.
anya-e0812n0:1736_6: Ettha tejasā adhikopi sūriyo upamābhūto iṭṭhova,
anya-e0812n0:1740_2: Upamānopameyyānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ abhedassa nānattābhāvassa nirūpanā āropanena upamānopameyyānamabhedaṃ rūpayati dassetīti rūpakamuccate.
anya-e0812n0:1740_3: Upamānassa upamānopameyyānamabhedāropanena tirobhūto apākaṭo bhedo nānattaṃ yassāti tādisī upameva yathāvuttalakkhaṇā rūpakamuccate “rūpaka”nti.
anya-e0812n0:1740_5: Ityupameyyopamānabhūtānaṃ padambujānamabhedāropanena upamānopameyyagatasādhammasaṅkhātāyapi upamāya bhedo vijjamānopi tirohito.
anya-e0812n0:1740_7: Sā copamā tathāvidhā upamānopameyyānamabhedamāyāti nāmāti rūpakamuccateti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1741_2: Upamānopameyyānaṃ anantaraniddiṭṭhaupamānopameyyānaṃ abhedassa sabhāvato bhede satipi vibhūtasadisattaṃ nissāya “so eso,
anya-e0812n0:1741_3: eso so”ti vattārehi parikappitassa abhedassa nirūpanā upamānopameyyapadatthesu buddhiyā āropanaṃ nissāya
anya-e0812n0:1741_4: tirobhūtabhedā “padaṃ ambujamivā”ti evaṃ pākaṭanānattaṃ vinā “padambuja”nti tirohitabhedā upameva padatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1741_5: sādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva rūpakaṃ iti vuccate.
anya-e0812n0:1741_7: Tesamabhedaggahaṇeneva te nissāya pavattamānabhinnasādhammasaṅkhātāya upamāyapi bhedo tirohito hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1741_8: Evaṃ tirobhūtanānattavantasādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva vatthūnamabhedaṃ dīpetīti rūpakaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1744_0: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
anya-e0812n0:1745_3: ekadese avayave vivattatīti ekadesavivatti ceti taṃ rūpakaṃ dvidhā,
anya-e0812n0:1745_4: puna paccekaṃ visuṃ visuṃ samāsādivasā upamānopameyyānaṃ katasamāsattā samāsarūpaka asamāsarūpaka samāsāsamāsarūpakavasena tidhā siyā.
anya-e0812n0:1746_2: Taṃ rūpakaṃ asesavatthuvisayaṃ ekadesavivatti cāti dvidhā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1746_3: puna paccekaṃ taṃ dvayampi samāsādivasā samāsarūpakaṃ asamāsarūpakaṃ samāsāsamāsarūpakañceti imesaṃ bhedena tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1751_2: Aṅgulīhiyeva upamānagammattā siniddhatambāhi dalehi pattehi saṃsobhiṃ accantaṃ virocamānaṃ nakhānaṃ dīdhitiyo
anya-e0812n0:1751_3: kiraṇā eva kesarāni yattha tādisaṃ munindassa padameva ambujaṃ sirasā muddhanā ke nāma janā na piḷandhanti
anya-e0812n0:1751_5: Idamasesavatthuvisayaṃ samāsarūpakaṃ aṅgino padassa aṅgānamaṅgulyādīnamasesānaṃ rūpanato.
anya-e0812n0:1752_2: Aṅgulīdalasaṃsobhiṃ aṅgulisaṅkhatehi pattehi saṃsobhiṃ nakhadīdhitikesaraṃ nakharaṃsisaṅkhatakesaraṃ munindapadambujaṃ sirasā ke na piḷandhanti.
anya-e0812n0:1752_3: Visesyabhūtaṃ caraṇaṃ visesanabhūtā aṅgulī nakhadīdhiti ceti imesaṃ upamābhūtehi ambujadalakesarehi abhedakappanāya
anya-e0812n0:1752_4: ekattaṃ gahetvā samāseneva niddiṭṭhattā idaṃ asesavatthuvisayasamāsarūpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1752_8: tā eva kesarāni asseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1755_0: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1757_3: paccakkho na parokkho amhākaṃ ambudhi sāgaro. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:1757_4: Ye tassa bhūrī bahavo guṇā mettādayo,
anya-e0812n0:1758_2: Ayaṃ jino amhākaṃ paccakkho ambudhi sāgaro,
anya-e0812n0:1758_3: tathā hi tassa bhūrī guṇā sīlasamādhiādayo ratanāni cittīkatādisādhammato ratanāneva,
anya-e0812n0:1758_4: karuṇā anaññasādhāraṇakaruṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ santāpavinodanasādhammena sītalajalameva hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1758_5: gambhīrattaṃ lābhālābhādīsu ekākāratā agādhattaṃ gambhīratā eva hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1763_3: te vadanameva indu vadaninduno iti samāsarūpakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1764_2: He munindate tuyhaṃ vadaninduno mukhacandassa mandahāsā mandamihitabhūtā candikā candakantiyo,
anya-e0812n0:1764_9: Mandā ca te hāsā cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1769_2: Asesavatthuvisaye rūpake ayaṃ “aṅgulīdalasaṃsobhiṃ”iccādikaṃ udāharaṇattayaṃ pabhedo hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1769_3: Idāni ekadesavivattimhi rūpake bhedo viseso pavuccati.
anya-e0812n0:1773_0: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1774_4: Tādisaṃ munino mukhaṃ passantā ke nāma janā sukhaṃ na vindanti sabbepīti.
anya-e0812n0:1774_5: Idaṃ aṅgāni hāsādīni rūpayitvā mukhamaṅgi na rūpitanti ekadesavivattisamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1775_3: mukhaṃ passantā ke vā ke nāma janā sukhaṃ na vindanti pītisukhaṃ nānubhonti,
anya-e0812n0:1775_5: Visesanabhūtānaṃ hāsaadharānaṃ upamābhūtakusumapallavehi abhedaṃ dassetvā visesyabhūtassa mukhassa aññataraupamāvatthunā
anya-e0812n0:1775_6: abhedena avuttattā abhedāropanaṃ ekadeseyeva vivattīti idaṃ ekadesavivattisamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1775_9: ruciro ca so adharo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1780_2: Munindassa vijayino pādadvandaṃ tava vijayaṃ paṭipakkhaparābhavaṃ dadātu. Kīdisaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:1780_3: Yassa paramaccantaṃ kantā manuññā nakharaṃsī pāpānaṃ lobhādīnaṃ jaye ussitā dhajā ketavoti.
anya-e0812n0:1781_2: Yassa sambuddhassa paraṃ atisayena kantā manuññā nakharaṃsī caraṇanakhakantiyo pāpajayaddhajā pāpavijaye ussāpitadhajāyeva honti,
anya-e0812n0:1781_3: tassa munindassa pādadvandaṃ caraṇayugaḷaṃ tava tuyhaṃ vijayaṃ paṭipakkhaparābhavaṃ dadātūti.
anya-e0812n0:1781_4: Nakharaṃsīnaṃ upamābhūtadhajehi abhedamāropetvā “pādadvanda”miti anirūpitattā ekadesavivattiasamāsarūpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1786_3: tassa munindavadaninduno sādhūnaṃ pabuddhaṃ dhammāvabodhavasena vikasitaṃ hadayaṃ cittaṃ keravakānanaṃ jātanti ekadesavivattisamāsāsamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1787_2: Sunimmalakapolassa munindavadaninduno sādhuppabuddhahadayaṃ sajjanānaṃ catusaccāvabodhena pasannamānasaṃ keravakānanaṃ kumudavanaṃ jātanti.
anya-e0812n0:1787_3: Vadanahadayānaṃ upamābhūtehi indukeravehi abhedāropanaṃ katvā kapolassa maṇḍalādīhi upamāvisesehi anirūpitattā ekadesavivattisamāsāsamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1787_6: Tathā hi rūpakavisaye samāsāsamāsattaṃ upamānopameyyapadānaṃ dvinnamevāti.
anya-e0812n0:1795_0: Kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manohara”nti.
anya-e0812n0:1796_0: Yuttarūpakaṃ yuttattā pupphabhiṅgānaṃ, tadanusārena ayuttarūpakādipi viññeyyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1797_2: Rūpakāni yuttāyuttādibhedato yuttarūpakaayuttarūpakādibhedena bahūni eva honti,
anya-e0812n0:1797_4: Iti tasmā kāraṇā tāni visuṃ na vuttāni.
anya-e0812n0:1799_0: Kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manohara”nti.
anya-e0812n0:1801_0: He dhīra sitapupphujjalaṃ mandahasitasaṅkhātehi kusumehi vijotantaṃ lolanettabhiṅgaṃ manoharaṃ tavānanaṃ kassa nāma mano nākaḍḍhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1805_2: Ettha ākāsassa taḷāke rūpite candassa padumattaṃ rūpakaṃ yuttanti etaṃ khaṇḍarūpakaṃ duṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1806_1: Rūpake dosādosaṃ upamāyaṃ viya parikappetvā gahetabbanti upadisanto āha “candimi”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1806_2: “Candimā cando ākāsapaduma”nti etaṃ khaṇḍarūpakaṃ ākāsassa taḷākattena anirūpitattā khaṇḍarūpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1810_3: Rūpakassa upamāya ca vikappānaṃ pabhedānaṃ pariyanto avasānaṃ natthi yaṃ yasmā kāraṇā,
anya-e0812n0:1810_4: tena kāraṇena avuttaṃ ihānupātaṃ vikappajātaṃ sabbavikappabyāpakasāmaññalakkhaṇānugatarūpakavikappānusārena viññeyyaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:1811_1: Idāni imesameva upamārūpakānaṃ avuttānantabhedo vuttānusāreneva ñātabboti dassetumāha “pariyanto”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1811_2: Rūpakassa ca rūpakālaṅkārassa ca upamāya ca upamālaṅkārassa ca vikappānaṃ vividhākārena kappitapakkhānaṃ pariyanto koṭi yaṃ yasmā natthi,
anya-e0812n0:1811_3: tena kāraṇena avuttaṃ imasmiṃ subodhālaṅkāre avuttapakkhaṃ samūhaṃ anumānato anumānañāṇena viññeyyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1811_4: Upamārūpakānaṃ sakalamavuttapakkhaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ anatikkamitvā vuttehi tehi tehi
anya-e0812n0:1811_7: Rūpakassa pana upamantogadhattā upamāya niddiṭṭhadosādosaṃ dvinnamapi uttānuttapakkhassa sādhāraṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1815_2: Atthassa abhidheyyassa padassa saddassa ca ubhayesaṃ atthapadānañca punappunaṃ bhiyyo bhiyyo yaṃ uccāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1816_2: Atthassa saddābhihitaatthassa ca padassa ca ubhayesaṃ atthapadānañca yaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1816_3: sā ayaṃ tividhā nāmato āvutti iti viññeyyā.
anya-e0812n0:1819_0: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
anya-e0812n0:1821_2: Jinassa ayaṃ yasorāsi sabbesaṃ janānaṃ mano cittaṃ harati,
anya-e0812n0:1821_3: dasa disā ādadāti sabbadā sabbadhā (ka.) taṃvisayattā,
anya-e0812n0:1821_5: ettha gahaṇalakkhaṇassa dasagahaṇalakkhaṇassa (ka.) atthassa anekehi pariyāyavacanehi āvattitattā ayaṃ atthāvutti.
anya-e0812n0:1822_2: Jinassa ayaṃ yasorāsi sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ mano cittaṃ harati gaṇhāti,
anya-e0812n0:1822_6: gaṇhātī”ti aññehi pariyāyavacanehi āvattitattā ayamatthāvutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1826_0: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
anya-e0812n0:1827_2: Munino dehakantiyo sabbā disā vibhāsenti visesena dīpenti,
anya-e0812n0:1827_3: yato evaṃ tasmā kāraṇā candādīnaṃ sabbāpi vibhā sobhā hatā pahatā viya senti pavattantīti padāvutti.
anya-e0812n0:1828_2: Munino dehakantiyo sabbā disā vibhāsenti yasmā visesena pakāsenti,
anya-e0812n0:1828_3: tasmā candādīnaṃ sabbāpi vibhā kantiyo hatā pahatā viya senti pavattanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1831_0: Jitvā viharati klesa-ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1833_2: Ayaṃ jino klesaripuṃ jitvā loke viharati pavattati,
anya-e0812n0:1833_3: ayaṃ tena jito arivaggo sattusamūho dujjane rāsībhūto viya tato aladdhappatiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0812n0:1834_2: Ayaṃ jino klesaripuṃ jitvā loke viharati,
anya-e0812n0:1834_3: ayaṃ arivaggo klesaripusamūho dujjane rāsībhūtova viharatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1834_4: Vāsasaṅkhatassa atthassa ca “viharatī”ti padassa ca puna punappunaṃ (?) uccāraṇato ayaṃ ubhayāvutti nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1838_2: Ekattha vākyassādo majjhe ante vā vattamānampi kriyājātyādikaṃ sabbassa abhimatassa kassaci vākyassa
anya-e0812n0:1838_3: kriyākārakasambandhābhidhāyino padasantānassa upakārakaṃ vākyatthānvayavasena dīpakaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n0:1838_4: dīpo viya ekadese vattitopi sakalapadatthavasena sabbavākyaṃ dīpayati pakāsetīti.
anya-e0812n0:1838_5: Tañca dīpakaṃ ādi ca majjhañca antañca visayo gocaro yassa tādisaṃ tidhā ādidīpakaṃ majjhadīpakaṃ antadīpakanti tividhaṃ hotīti attho,
anya-e0812n0:1838_6: tampi kriyādīnaṃ vasena paccekaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1839_2: Ekattha vākyassa ādimajjhāvasānesvekasmiṃ vattamānampi kriyājātiguṇattayaṃ sabbavākyopakārakaṃ vattumicchitakriyākārakasambandhappakāsakapadasantānasaṅkhātavākyassa
anya-e0812n0:1839_3: vākyatthāvabodhavasena payojanaṃ dīpakaṃ nāma ekaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā visayībhūtasabbaṭṭhānagatadabbapakāsakapadīpasamānattā
anya-e0812n0:1839_5: Tañca dīpakaṃ ādimajjhantavisayaṃ vākyassa ādivisayaṃ majjhavisayaṃ antavisayañceti tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1839_6: Etesu ekekamapi kriyājātiguṇabhedena punapi tividhaṃ hotīti viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1839_9: Vākyassa ādi ca majjhañca antañceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1844_2: Buddho veneyyā vinetabbāyeva bandhavo tesaṃ amitamaparimitaṃ udayamabhivuddhiṃ akāsi.
anya-e0812n0:1844_4: sabbapāpehi samaṃ ekato anekānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanañca akāsīti.
anya-e0812n0:1844_5: Iha “akāsī”ti kriyāpadenādivattinā sabbameva vākyaṃ dīpayatīti kriyādidīpakametaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1845_5: Vākyādimhi kriyāya ṭhitattā idaṃ kriyādidīpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1845_6: Amito ca so udayo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1845_7: anekā ca te titthiyā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1850_2: Munino dassanaṃ sādhujanānaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ nāma jāyate amatassa sādhanato,
anya-e0812n0:1850_3: tehi sādhujanehi aññesaṃ jantūnaṃ niccamupatāpetīti niccopatāpanaṃ visaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n0:1851_2: Munino dassanaṃ sādhujanānaṃ amataṃ amatasaṅkhātanibbānassa ekantakāraṇattā kāriyopacārena amataṃ bhūtaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n0:1851_3: tadaññesaṃ tehi sādhujanehi aññesaṃ jantūnaṃ tu niccopatāpanaṃ satatamupatāpakaraṇato visaṃ jāyate visatulyapaṭighakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n0:1851_6: Sādhavo ca te janā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1855_0: Jinānanindu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0812n0:1856_2: Accantaṃ kantaṃ manuññaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ piyabhāvo, tameva,
anya-e0812n0:1856_4: tena manoharo jinānanindu indu cando ca kassa janassa ānandako na bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1857_2: Accantakantalāvaṇyacandātapamanoharo atisayena manuññapiyabhāvasaṅkhātavilāsanāmakena candakiraṇena, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:1857_3: atisayena manuññapiyatāsaṅkhātavilāsasadisena candakiraṇena manoharo jinānanindu sambuddhassa mukhacando
anya-e0812n0:1857_4: ca indu ca pakaticando ca kassa ānandako na bhave.
anya-e0812n0:1857_5: Idaṃ kriyāya ante ṭhitattā kriyāntadīpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1857_13: candapakkhe accantakantalāvaṇyamiva ca so candātapo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1864_4: so avippaṭisāro pāmojjassa uppannamattāya pītiyā hetu hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1864_5: taṃ pāmojjaṃ pītiyā balavabhūtāya hetu hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1864_6: sā cāyaṃ pīti passaddhādīnaṃ passaddhisukhādīnaṃ pasiddhiyā nipphattiyā hotīti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1865_1: Idāni navasu dīpakesu payogavisesena sādhetabbe aññappakāre dasseti “hoti”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1865_3: so avippaṭisāro pāmojjahetu hoti uppannamattāya taruṇapītiyā kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:1865_5: sā ayañca pīti passaddhādipasiddhiyā kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhiādīnaṃ siddhiyā hetu hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1869_4: Yajjapyādidīpakametaṃ pubbaṃ pubbaṃ vākyaṃ “hotāvippaṭisārāya sīla”ntiādikaṃ apekkhinī apekkhamānā vākyānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ mālā paramparā pavattāti.
anya-e0812n0:1870_2: Ādidīpakattepi kriyādidīpakabhāve satipi vākyamālā anekavākyena sambajjhamānā paramparā pubbaṃ pubbaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1870_6: visayopacārena ādi ca taṃ dīpakañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1874_2: Aneneva anantarā vuttena pakārena vidhinā dīpake dīpakavisaye dīpakavisese (ka.) sesānamavuttānaṃ vikappānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1874_3: jātyādidīpakādibhedānaṃ anugati avabodho suddhabuddhibhi parisuddhamatīhi kavīhi vidhātabbā kātabbāti.
anya-e0812n0:1875_2: Aneneva pakārena yathāvuttadīpakappakārena dīpake dīpakavisaye sesānaṃ api vikappānaṃ avuttajātidīpakaguṇadīpakasaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1875_3: pakkhānaṃ jātyādidīpakaguṇādidīpakādīnaṃ channaṃ mālādīpakānañca anugati avabodho suddhabuddhibhi kavīhi
anya-e0812n0:1881_2: Visesassa yassa kassaci vacanicchāyaṃ yaṃ nisedhassa paṭisedhassa vacanaṃ vutti,
anya-e0812n0:1881_3: so akkhepo nāma akkhipanaṃ paṭisedhoti katvā.
anya-e0812n0:1881_4: Soyamakkhepo ca kālappabhedato atītādito tidhā tippakāro.
anya-e0812n0:1882_2: Visesavacanicchāyaṃ tu yassa kassaci padatthavisesassa kathanicchāya eva yaṃ nisedhavacanaṃ paṭisedhavacanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n0:1882_3: so paṭisedho akkhepo nāma akkhepālaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1882_4: Ayañca akkhepo kālappabhedato atītādikālavisesena tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1882_9: kālassa kriyāya vā pabhedoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1887_2: So jino ekākī eko samāno anekasenaṃ taṃ māraṃ vijayi parājesi,
anya-e0812n0:1887_5: yato tassa jinassa pāramī samatiṃsavidhā pāramitā eva balaṃ īdisaṃ yādisaṃ tassa vijayakāraṇanti.
anya-e0812n0:1887_6: Ettha ekākittakāraṇasāmatthiyā māravijayāyogabuddhi “sasenaṃ māraṃ vijitavāti kathaṃ yujjatī”ti evamākārā atītā akkhittāti atītakkhepoyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1888_2: Sa jino so sabbaññū ekākī asahāyo adutiyo anekasenaṃ taṃ māraṃ vijayī ajinīti,
anya-e0812n0:1888_5: tassa jinassa pāramībalaṃ samatiṃsapāramībalaṃ samatiṃsapāramītāsaṅkhatasenā īdisamīdisāti.
anya-e0812n0:1888_6: Buddhassa adutiyabhāvañca mārassa saparivārabhāvañca nissāya kassaci uppannā “ekākinā kathamanekaseno
anya-e0812n0:1888_7: māro jito”ti viparītabuddhi atītamāravijayavisayattā atītā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1888_8: “tassa pāramībalaṃ īdisa”nti atthavisesassa kathanicchāya “atha vā”ti niddiṭṭhapaṭisedhavacanena akkhittanti atītassa akkhepanato atītakkhepo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1895_2: Citta ejāya taṇhāya samugghātaṃ sabbathā appavattiṃ appattosmīti kiṃ khijjase,
anya-e0812n0:1895_4: Sugate sakimpi ekavārampi kato paṇāmo soyeva taṇhāya samugghātoyeva nanu ekantakāraṇattā tassāti vattamānakkhepoyaṃ vattamānassa khedassākkhitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1896_2: He citta ejāsamugghātaṃ ejāsaṅkhatāya taṇhāya samucchedapahānaṃ appattosmīti kiṃ khijjase,
anya-e0812n0:1896_4: Tathā hi sugate buddhavisaye sakimpi kato paṇāmo soyeva nanu taṇhāsamucchedassa ekantakāraṇattā kāraṇakāriyānamabhedabuddhiyā
anya-e0812n0:1896_7: “Paṇāmo”tyādivisesakathanādhippāyena “kiṃ khijjase”ti cittassa vattamānakhedassa paṭisedhitattā ayaṃ vattamānakkhepo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1898_0: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1901_2: Sujanagocaraṃ sivaṃ santipadaṃ te saccaṃ niyataṃ na gamissanti.
anya-e0812n0:1901_3: Ye micchādiṭṭhiyā sassatādikāya parikkantaṃ abhibhūtaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ tādisā suṭṭhu atisayena dujjanāti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1903_0: Gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā kanta, mamāvatthā niveditā”ti kābyādāsa 2.139.
anya-e0812n0:1905_2: Sujanagocaraṃ sādhūnaṃ visayagataṃ sivaṃ santipadaṃ te saccamekantena na gamissanti. Ke?
anya-e0812n0:1905_4: “Micchādiṭṭhī”tiādivisesassa kathanādhippāyena “te na gamissantī”ti titthiyānaṃ bhāvino nibbānagamanassa
anya-e0812n0:1905_6: Micchā viparītā ca sā diṭṭhi cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1905_7: tāya parikkantaṃ mānasaṃ yesanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1907_0: Gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā kanta, mamāvatthā niveditā” –
anya-e0812n0:1908_0: Tyādiko anādarakkhepopi dassitātītakkhepādīhi anaññattā visuṃ na vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1908_2: he kanta vallabha mama jīvitāsā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1908_6: “Ettha mamāvatthā niveditā”ti visesassa kathanādhippāyena “gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā”ti iminā anādaravacanena
anya-e0812n0:1908_7: attano vallabhassa vattamānassa anāgatassa vā gamanassa paṭisedhitattā vattamānakkhepo vā anāgatakkhepo vā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1914_2: Aññavākyatthasādhano aññassa vattumicchitassa kassaci vākyatthassa sādhano samatthako kassacideva atthassa parassa nyāso yo,
anya-e0812n0:1914_3: so atthantaranyāso ñeyyo atthantarassa kassaci vatthuno nyāso payogoti katvā.
anya-e0812n0:1914_5: Assa atthantaranyāsassa bhedato vikappato hivisiṭṭhā hisaddena visesitā sabbabyāpī ca visesaṭṭho cāti ime bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:1914_6: Nanu pativatthūpamāya imassa ca ko bhedoti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1914_7: tathāpi ubhayattha atthantaranyāsamattena sadisattepi yattha mukhyato sāmyappatītisabbhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:1915_4: so atthantaranyāso sādhiyavākyatthato aññatthassa ṭhapanaṃ kathanaṃ “atthantaranyāso”ti ñeyyo,
anya-e0812n0:1915_5: assa atthantaranyāsassa bhedato pabhedena sabbabyāpī visesaṭṭho ca,
anya-e0812n0:1915_7: Attho ca so antaro añño ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1918_0: Tepi lokahitāsattā, sūriyo candimā api candimārapi (sī.);
anya-e0812n0:1919_0: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0812n0:1920_2: Lokassa hite abhivuddhiyaṃ āsattā abhirattā sūriyo candimā apīti te mahantāpi atthaṃ udayavipariyāsa’mabhāvaṃ gamissanti,
anya-e0812n0:1920_5: Tathā hi niyamo “bhāvo nāma na pāyini.
anya-e0812n0:1920_7: Kena nāma vatthunā laṅghyate atikkamituṃ sakkāti.
anya-e0812n0:1920_8: Ayaṃ hisaddarahito sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso tādisassa niyamassa sabbagatattā.
anya-e0812n0:1921_2: Lokahitāsattā lokābhivuddhiyaṃ laggā sūriyo api candimā api tepi mahānubhāvā atthaṃ vināsaṃ gamissanti,
anya-e0812n0:1921_4: Tathā hi niyamo “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti sabbapadatthamanatikkamma pavattaniyamo kena laṅghyate paccayasamuppannena kena padatthena atikkamyateti.
anya-e0812n0:1921_5: Ayaṃ hisaddarahito atthagamanasaṅkhāto niyamo sabbattha gatoti sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n0:1921_6: Pativatthūpamāya ca atthantaranyāsassa ca atthantaranyāsattena tulyattepi tattha sādhammapakāsattasabhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:1921_7: ettha vuttatthassa sādhanasabhāvoti evamimesaṃ nānattaṃ subyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1925_0: Gatova nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0812n0:1926_2: Devamanussānaṃ devānañca manussānañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena satthā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi paramatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti,
anya-e0812n0:1926_3: vasī pañcahi vasitāhi atisayavasīhi vasippatto sopi munissaro nibbutiṃ khandhaparinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ gato pattoyeva,
anya-e0812n0:1926_5: Sabbe saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā na sassatā na niccā uppādavayadhammattā aniccā.
anya-e0812n0:1927_2: Devamanussānaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena satthā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi yathārahamanusāsako vasī vuṭṭhānaadhiṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0812n0:1927_3: pañcasu vasibhāvesu sātisayaṃ issariyavā so munissaro api nibbutiṃ khandhanibbānaṃ gato eva.
anya-e0812n0:1927_6: Ayaṃ hisaddasahito aniccatāya sabbagatattā sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n0:1932_3: tato janaṃ sakalampi lokaṃ nibbutiṃ pāpeti.
anya-e0812n0:1933_2: Jino janaṃ sattalokaṃ saṃsārakantārā nibbutiṃ pāpeti,
anya-e0812n0:1933_3: sā ayaṃ gati pavatti vesārajjasamaṅgīnaṃ catuvesārajjaguṇasamannāgatānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ yuttā nanūti.
anya-e0812n0:1933_4: Ayaṃ janānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpanā vesārajjasamaṅgīnaṃyeva āveṇikattā visesaṭṭho hisaddarahito atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n0:1937_0: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.

anya-e0812n0:2041_2: Uddiṭṭhānaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ padatthānaṃ vatthūnaṃ kesañci yathākkamaṃ uddesakkamānatikkamena anuddeso
anya-e0812n0:2042_2: Uddiṭṭhānaṃ paṭhamakathitānaṃ padatthānaṃ yathākkamaṃ uddiṭṭhakkamamanatikkamma anuddeso atthantaraṃ nissāya punakathanaṃ “saṅkhyāna”miti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2042_5: Ettha pasiddhaṃ anuddesaṃ pubbaddhena anuvaditvā appasiddhaṃ kamampi kamapariyāyaṃ saṅkhyānayathāsaṅkhyadvayampi aparaddhena vidadhāti.
anya-e0812n0:2042_6: Ettha vidhātabbaṃ dassetuṃ anuvādassa āhariyamānattā anuvādo appadhāno,
anya-e0812n0:2042_12: yathāsaṅkhya”nti dvayaṃ apekkhāya (tassa appadhānattā) idaṃ padadvayaṃ sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ na dissati napuṃsakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2046_2: Muninda tava ālāpahāsā ca tesaṃ līlāhi,
anya-e0812n0:2046_4: Vijayā kokilakumudānaṃ parābhavena kokilā karavīkā kumudāni ca,
anya-e0812n0:2046_10: Iti vatthuto eva sambhavo iveti parikappate.
anya-e0812n0:2046_14: Tatthuddesānurūpānuddesasambhave saṅkhyānamevālaṅkāro voharīyate tasseva mukhyato vattumicchitattā.
anya-e0812n0:2047_2: He muninda te tava ālāpahāsalīlāhi madhurasaralīlāhi saddhiṃ mandahasitalīlāhi sañjātā vijayā jayahetu
anya-e0812n0:2047_3: kokilā karavīkā ca kumudāni keravāni ca vanaṃ jalañca kamena upasevante iva nissayaṃ karontīti maññeti.
anya-e0812n0:2047_7: tatvato īdisavijayena kokilādīnaṃ vanādinissayakāraṇābhāvato ivasaddapayogena niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0812n0:2047_8: Evaṃ sati ayaṃ parikappanā na bhavati. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:2047_9: Nānālaṅkārasannipāte sati yo yo alaṅkāro vattunā icchito,
anya-e0812n0:2047_11: Evaṃ parikappanālaṅkārasaṃsagge satipi uddesakkamena dassitassa anuddesassa mukhyattā ayaṃ kamālaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2051_2: Atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanamākhyānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2052_2: atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanaṃ kathanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2052_3: etaṃ paṭipādanaṃ piyataraṃ nāma piyatarālaṅkāro nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2052_5: attho eva rūpaṃ sabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2054_0: Pīti yā me samuppannā, santa sandassanā tava;
anya-e0812n0:2055_0: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, taveva puna dassanā.
anya-e0812n0:2056_2: Santa sappurisa mahāmuni tava sandassanā cakkhupathāpāthamattena madhurakathāsavanā yā pīti me mama samuppannā,
anya-e0812n0:2056_3: ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisena sukhena sukhaṇane (?) taveva nāññassa kassaci,
anya-e0812n0:2057_2: He santa sappurisa tathāgata tava sandassanā mama nette āpāthagamanato yā pīti me samuppannā,
anya-e0812n0:2057_3: ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisakkhaṇena tayā sadisassa aññassābhāvā taveva puna dassanā dassanato bhaveti.
anya-e0812n0:2057_4: Ettha pītiyā’tisayahetubhūtaṃ atiiṭṭhārammaṇañca dassane atigedhañca pakāsanena atipītīti padatthaṃ atipiyaṃ pībhipadatthaṃ (ka.),
anya-e0812n0:2057_6: “Ayaṃ pīti bhave”ti pubbakāle uppannapītiyā punāsambhavato taṃsadisāyeva pīti gahitā yathā “soyeva vaṭṭako vaddhako,
anya-e0812n0:2061_2: Vaṇṇitena pasaṃsitena upamānena adhippetassa manasi nihitassa vatthuno atthassa vutyā kathanena ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti nāma. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:2061_3: Atthassa vattumicchitassa saṅkhepo saṅkhipitvā kathanaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2061_4: tasmā tatoyamanvatthasaññā saṅkhepavutti samāsavuttīti katvā. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:2062_2: Vaṇṇitena pasaṃsitena upamānena upamānavatthunā karaṇabhūtena adhippetavatthuno icchitatthassa vutyā
anya-e0812n0:2062_3: kathanena atthasaṅkheparūpato vattumicchitatthassa saṅgaharūpattā ayaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti
anya-e0812n0:2062_5: Ettha vattumicchitatthaṃ saṅgahetvā manasi katvā tassa upamābhūtatthassa vaṇṇanāya manasi katassa pakāsanato ayaṃ samāsavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2066_2: Sā ayaṃ samāsavutti yaṃkiñci vatthu sāmaññākārappatītaṃ “īdisamidaṃ nāññathā”ti kutoci byavacchijjate kenaci guṇādinā vavatthāpīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2066_6: Abhinnaṃ tulyākāraṃ visesanaṃ yassaṃ sā abhinnavisesanāpi attheva.
anya-e0812n0:2067_2: Sā ayaṃ samāsavutti visesyamattena guṇādisadisadhammena karaṇabhūtena kenaci upamānavatthunā manasi kataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2067_3: “idaṃ upameyyavatthu īdisa”nti sāmaññāvatthato visuṃ katavisesyena bhinnā visuṃ jātā,
anya-e0812n0:2067_5: abhinnavisesanā tulyavisesanayuttā attheva bhinnābhinnavisesanā atulyatulyavisesanayuttā bhinnavisesyayuttā aparāpi atthi.
anya-e0812n0:2067_8: avayavena sambhavabhedasabhāvassa samudāyepi pavattattā bhinnāti vuttā.
anya-e0812n0:2074_2: Ayamambhodhi sāgaro puññena cirānucitakusalamūlena hetunā mayā āpādito patto, kīdiso?
anya-e0812n0:2074_3: Visuddhaṃ lokavohārato devāsurānaṃ mathane visenāsammissattā amataṃ pīyūsaṃ sandadātīti visuddhāmatasandāyī, ambhodhi.
anya-e0812n0:2074_4: Visuddhaṃ dosalesenāpyasamphuṭṭhattā accantanimmalaṃ amataṃ maraṇābhāvena amatasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ
anya-e0812n0:2074_13: Gambhīro ca agādhattā sāgaro saddhammo ca ayamāpāditoti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2074_14: Ayaṃ visesyamattabhinnā abhinnavisesanā visesyassa ambhodhino vivacchitā saddhammā bhinnattā,
anya-e0812n0:2075_2: Visuddhāmatasandāyī lokavohārato devāsurānaṃ samuddamathane visena amissattā visuddhabhūtapīyūsadāyako,
anya-e0812n0:2075_3: upamābhūtasamuddavaṇṇanāya buddhiyaṃ vattamānassa saddhammassa pakāsanato visuddhāmatasandāyī kāmāmisādidosalavenāpi
anya-e0812n0:2075_4: amissitattā atinimmalaṃ jarāmaraṇarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ upadesadānena veneyyānaṃ dāyako,
anya-e0812n0:2075_5: pasattharatanālayo niddosattā pasatthānaṃ muttāmaṇiādīnaṃ ratanānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhūto samuddapakkhe,
anya-e0812n0:2075_6: saddhammapakkhe pana pasattharatanālayo buddhādīhi pasatthānaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhataratanānaṃ pavattidesabhūto,
anya-e0812n0:2075_8: ekattanayādicatubbidhanayehi gambhīro ayaṃ ambhodhi ca eso samuddo ca,
anya-e0812n0:2075_9: cittena gahitasaddhammo ca puññena bhavantaropacitakusalakammena mayā āpādito pattoti visesyabhūtassa
anya-e0812n0:2075_11: “visuddhāmatasandāyī”ti iccādikānaṃ visesanānaṃ ubhayavisesyepi yathāvuttanayena abhinnattā ca ayaṃ samāsavutti
anya-e0812n0:2082_2: Ayamapubbova vuttaguṇayogena acchariyarūpattā kapparukkho samuṭṭhito, kīdiso?
anya-e0812n0:2082_3: Icchitaṃ lokiyaṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ padadātīti icchitatthapado,
anya-e0812n0:2082_5: Icchitaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ padadātīti icchitatthapado, jino.
anya-e0812n0:2082_13: Jino tu pubbe vuttāya kāyakantādirūpāya chāyāya yuttoti sacchāyoti.
anya-e0812n0:2082_14: Ayaṃ visesyamattabhinnā bhinnābhinnavisesanā jinato visesyassa kapparukkhassa bhinnattā,
anya-e0812n0:2082_16: icchitatthapadatthassa sāratāya sacchāyatāya ubhayattheva bhāvato vuttavidhināti.
anya-e0812n0:2083_2: Icchitatthapado sattehi icchitānaṃ lokiyaaviññāṇakavatthābharaṇādīnaṃ dāyako kapparukkhavaṇṇanāya citte
anya-e0812n0:2083_3: patiṭṭhitassa jinapadatthassa kathetukāmatāya icchitatthapado sattehi patthitānaṃ lokiyalokuttarānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2083_4: sakalatthānaṃ anurūpavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ dāyako,
anya-e0812n0:2083_10: apubbo pubbe asañjāto ayaṃ kapparukkho eso paccakkho kappapādapo samuṭṭhito sattānaṃ puññānubhāvena loke pātubhūtoti.
anya-e0812n0:2083_13: phalapupphopasobhitatāya rukkhasseva visesanattā ca ayaṃ samāsavutti visesyabhinnāva bhinnābhinnavisesanā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2083_14: Icchito ca so attho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2089_2: Saddhammo sambuddhabhāsito sāgarattena sāgaraguṇasadisattā sāgararūpena uditoti sambandho,
anya-e0812n0:2089_4: Jino rukkhattena yathāvuttanayena udito taṃ patto anupekkhitassa kakkhavuttiyā ambhodhiādisaddānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2089_7: Bhedo tu ayaṃ pubbatra “visuddhāmatasandāyi”ccādike sabbe ye keci tatropāttā visuddhāmatasandāyittādayo
anya-e0812n0:2089_8: sādhāraṇā tulyā dhammā visesanāni ubhayatrāpi sambhavā,
anya-e0812n0:2089_9: aññatra tu anantaravutta “icchitatthapado”iccādo pana tayaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dvayaṃ sādhāraṇañca (ka.),
anya-e0812n0:2090_1: Idāni tehi dvīhi samāsavuttehi vuttatthadvayaṃ pakāseti “sāgari”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2090_2: Sāgarattena sāgararūpena saddhammo sammāsambuddhena desitapariyattisaddhammo udito kathito,
anya-e0812n0:2090_4: Sāgarakapparukkhādisaddā attano abhidheyyabhūtasāgararukkhādike atthe mukhyabhāvena apavattitvā buddhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2090_7: Tathā hi yadi ete mukhyatthena na pavattanti,
anya-e0812n0:2090_8: ambhodhikapparukkhasaddā saddhammajinapadatthe kathaṃ pakāsentīti tesu dvīsu udāharaṇesu pubbatra “visuddhāmatasandāyī”iccādipubbudāharaṇe
anya-e0812n0:2090_9: sabbe dhammā “visuddhāmatasandāyī”ti sabbe visesanadhammā sādhāraṇā ambhodhisaddhammānaṃ samānā,
anya-e0812n0:2090_10: aññatra tu “icchitatthapado”tiādike aññasmiṃ udāharaṇe pana tayaṃ “icchitatthapado, sāro,
anya-e0812n0:2090_14: Tathā hi iminā rukkhadhammabhūto koci viseso pakāsito na hotīti visesanattaṃ aññesuyeva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2094_2: Vatthuno sajīvassa nijjīvassa vā vutti avatthā aññappakārena vattumicchitappakārāpekkhāya aññeneva rūpena ṭhitā,
anya-e0812n0:2094_3: tasseva tato yathāvaṭṭhitappakārato aññathā aññena pakārena parikappīyate yattha vuttiyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2094_5: parikappīyate aññathā karīyate vatthuṭṭhiti etissanti katvā.
anya-e0812n0:2095_2: Vatthuno yassa kassaci saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakapadatthassa vutti pavatti aññappakārena kappanīyappakārato aññena vijjamānappakārena ṭhitā pavattamānā,
anya-e0812n0:2095_3: tadaññathā tato vijjamānappakārato aññenāvijjamānappakārena yattha vuttiyaṃ parikappīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2095_5: Parikappīyate aññathā karīyate vatthuṭṭhiti etissamiti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2099_4: kiriyādivasena ca vividhā nānappakārā parikappanā idāni kamena udāharissāmi.
anya-e0812n0:2100_2: Upamābbhantarattena upamāya abbhantare vijjamānattā ca kiriyādivasena ca vividhā parikappanā kamena udāharissāmi.
anya-e0812n0:2100_5: aneke vidhā pakārā yāsamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2107_2: Icchābhaṅgena “buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ vase vattessāmā”ti bodhimūle katābhilāsavināsena āturā dukkhitā atiniccalasabhāvappattā
anya-e0812n0:2107_3: atiniccalaṃ nāsikagge nayane katānatāvasena accantamakriyamāsīnā nisinnā tā accharā yoginisaṅkāsā māraṅganāti
anya-e0812n0:2107_4: yathāvaṭṭhitāya sacetanānaṃ māraṅganālakkhaṇānaṃ māraṅganāvalakkhaṇānaṃ (ka.) vatthūnaṃ vutti vuttā,
anya-e0812n0:2107_9: tattha abhiyogato yuñjanena vasamattano āyattabhāvaṃ tadā nentīva vahanti maññeti.
anya-e0812n0:2107_10: Ettha iva saddasutiyā upamāsandeho na kātabbo,
anya-e0812n0:2107_11: savasānayanamakubbantiyo māraṅganā vasaṃ nentīvāti parikappīyante. Hoti ca–
anya-e0812n0:2110_2: tathābhūtāya copavesanakriyāya dhīrassāpi tādisassa bhagavato avasānayanattanti parikappanatoti.
anya-e0812n0:2111_2: Icchābhaṅgāturā ajapālanigrodhamūle nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ “palobhessāmā”ti māraṅganā attanāyeva katāya icchāya anibbattiyā pīḷitā,
anya-e0812n0:2111_3: atiniccalaṃ hutvā nāsikagge patitadiṭṭhehi samannāgatānaññavuttiyā kriyantaravirahato.
anya-e0812n0:2111_4: Āsīnā jhāyamānā nisinnā tā accharā yoginisadisā taṇhāaratiragāsaṅkhātā māraṅganāyo dhīraṃ siṅgārādhippāyena
anya-e0812n0:2111_5: katānekalīlāvilāsenāpi akampamānaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ yogābhiyogato mantajappanasaṅkhātayoge yuñjanena vasaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2111_6: attano vasaṃ tadā attano parājitakāle nentīva pāpenti maññeti.
anya-e0812n0:2111_8: Puna aparaddhena tesameva avijjamānayogābhiyogena vasīkaraṇaṃ kappitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2111_9: Māraṅganānaṃ niccalanisajjāya yoginīnaṃ mantajjhayanasadisattā māraṅganānaṃ yoginīnaṃ upamānopameyyattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2111_11: “Nenti ivā”ti payoge katepi kriyāparikappanaṃ na hoteva.
anya-e0812n0:2111_14: niggataṃ calaṃ calanaṃ asmā āsanasmāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2112_0: “Nenti ivā”ti idha ivasaddasutiyā upamājotanatthaṃ ceti saṃsayo na kātabbo,
anya-e0812n0:2115_0: “Vasaṃ nentīva dhīra”nti ettha nayane gamyamāne pāpane upamānatā upamānabhāvo natthi,
anya-e0812n0:2115_2: kattukriyāya kattusambandhiyā kriyāya upamānopameyyatā upamānabhāvo upameyyabhāvo natthīti ayaṃ hetthattho.
anya-e0812n0:2120_2: Yuddhāya accantamatisayena unnatamuccaṃ gajaṃ hatthiṃ samāruḷho māro vasavattī taṃ jinātīti atthena jinato
anya-e0812n0:2120_3: bhīto palāyituṃ kiñci nilīyanaṭṭhānaṃ maggaṃ pathaṃ anvesati nūna maññe.
anya-e0812n0:2121_2: Yuddhāya yuddhatthaṃ accantaṃ atisayena unnataṃ diyaḍḍhasatayojanāyāmānurūpauccaguṇasamannāgataṃ gajaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2121_3: girimekhalaṃ samāruḷho māro jinā bhīto palāyituṃ maggaṃ nibbhayaṃ pathaṃ anvesati nūna gavesati maññe.
anya-e0812n0:2121_4: Yuddhatthaṃ kurumāno gajārohanaṃ maggānvesanatthamiti kavinā parikappitattā esā kriyāparikappanā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2121_5: Accantamiti asaṅkhya sasaṅkhyabhāvepi pakaraṇato ādhikke eva vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2126_1: Muninda te cāru ca taṃ rājīvaṃ padumañca tamiva sundaraṃ tasmiṃte pādadvande soṇimā lohitattaguṇo,
anya-e0812n0:2126_2: iti yathāvaṭṭhitā acetanassa lohitattalakkhaṇassa vatthuno vutti vuttā,
anya-e0812n0:2126_4: Pāpānaṃ kilesārīnaṃ abhisammaddena atisayaṃ sampisanena jātaṃ soṇaṃ rudhiraṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2127_2: He muninda te tava cārurājīvasundare manuññapadumasundare pādadvande soṇimā rattavaṇṇaṃ pāpābhisammaddajātasoṇena
anya-e0812n0:2127_3: maññe saparasantānagatapāpānaṃ sammaddanena jātena rudhirenāti maññe.
anya-e0812n0:2127_4: Sabbaññuno pāde bhavantarasiddhapuññakammānubhāvena jātarattavaṇṇaṃ “pāpābhisammaddanenā”ti parikappitattā ayaṃ guṇaparikappanā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2130_0: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvāpi, kvāpi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:2131_6: tehi sāyaṃ parikappanā kvāpi yathāvutte byañjīyate pakāsīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2131_7: kvāpi katthaci pana vākyena gamyate maññeiccādīnamabhāvepīti.
anya-e0812n0:2132_1: Vohārasukhatthaṃ parikappanāpakāsake sadde dasseti “maññe”ccādinā. Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, iva,
anya-e0812n0:2132_2: evamādīhi saddehi sāyaṃ parikappanā kvāpi ettha viya katthaci byañjīyate pakāsīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2132_3: kvāpi katthaci vākyena kriyākārakasambandhasahitapadasamudāyena gamyate ivādisaddayogābhāvepi kevalaṃ vākyasāmatthiyeneva ñāyate.
anya-e0812n0:2132_5: Iti evaṃ pakāro saddasamudāyo ādi yesaṃ “takkemi,
anya-e0812n0:2136_0: Pīṇentā jina te sādhu-janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2137_6: Jina te dehā sarīrato nikkhantakantiyo sādhujanaṃ pīṇentā tappentā tameva janaṃ sarasataṃ sapemataṃ nayuṃ pāpesuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2137_8: Gammamānaparikappanāyaṃ yato kantiyo laddhasarasasarīrasaṃsaggā sayampi sarasā iva attānaṃ sevamānampi sādhujanaṃ sarasataṃ nentīti gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:2138_2: He jina te dayāsañcārasarasā dukkhitasattavisayāya karuṇāya savisaye nirantarappavattiyā sañjātasnehato
anya-e0812n0:2138_3: dehā sarīrato nikkhantakantiyo dasadisāsu niggatā nīlādichabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo sādhujanaṃ katapuññaṃ uttamajanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2138_4: pīṇentā sarasataṃsasnehabhāvaṃ pemasahitattaṃ nayuṃ tameva sādhujanaṃ pāpesuṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2138_6: Karuṇāsinehasommadehasaṃsaggato kantiyo sayampi nissayaguṇato sommabhūtā attānaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattajanepi
anya-e0812n0:2138_8: Ettha acetanānaṃ kantivatthūnaṃ janapasādasaṅkhātavatthuṭṭhiti “dayāsañcārasarasā ivā”ti evamādiaññappakārena parikappito.
anya-e0812n0:2138_12: nikkhantā ca tā kantiyo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2138_13: sādhu ca so jano ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2140_0: Ārabhantassa yaṃ kiñci, kattuṃ puññavasā puna;
anya-e0812n0:2142_2: Yaṃ kiñci kāriyaṃ kattuṃ sattubhaṅgādikaṃ ārabhantassa sajjībhūtassa yassa kassaci pumuno puññavasā kusalabalena
anya-e0812n0:2142_3: kāraṇena kusalasāmatthiyena puna sādhyate sādhiyamaneneti sādhanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2143_2: Yaṃ kiñci amittavijayādikaṃ kattuṃ ārabhantassa yassa puññavasā kusalabalena puna yo sādhanantaralābho
anya-e0812n0:2143_3: tasseva kāriyasiddhiyā upakārakassa aññasādhanassa yo lābho atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2143_4: taṃ kāraṇalābhaṃ samāhitaṃ vadanti tasseva kāriyassa samādhānattā patiṭṭhitattā samāhitaṃ iti kavino kathenti.
anya-e0812n0:2147_2: Mārārino mārasattuno bhaṅge abhibhave abhimukhaṃ na parammukhaṃ manaṃ yassa tassa satthuno upakārikā
anya-e0812n0:2147_3: āraddhamārabhaṅgakriyānuggāhikā mahāmahī ayaṃ mahārāvaṃ mārāridussahaṃ mahānādaṃ ravī akāsi.
anya-e0812n0:2147_5: tassa puññavaseneva mahīrāvo aparaṃ sādhanaṃ samāpannanti lakkhaṇaṃ yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2148_2: Mārāribhaṅgābhimukhamanaso mārasaṅkhātassa sattuno maddane abhimukhacittassa tassa satthuno upakārikā
anya-e0812n0:2148_3: āraddhamāravijayassa upatthambhikā ayaṃ mahāmahī mahārāvaṃ mārassa hadayavatthuṃ maddanto maddantī (?)
anya-e0812n0:2148_6: tasseva siddhiyā hetubhūtaṃ aññakāraṇaṃ nāma mahīrāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2148_10: mahantī ca sā mahī ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2152_2: Abhimataṃ kiñci atthaṃ dhanadānādilakkhaṇaṃ avatvā añjasā vācakabyāpārena anākhyāya tassābhimatassatthassa
anya-e0812n0:2152_3: siddhiyā nipphādanatthaṃ aññathā aññena pakārena tannibbattianuguṇena yaṃ dassanaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2153_2: Abhimataṃ iṭṭhaṃ dhanadānādisarūpaṃ dhanadhaññādiṃ (sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ) yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ avatvā ujumakathetvā
anya-e0812n0:2153_3: tassa abhimatatthassa siddhiyā nipphattiyā aññathā vattumicchitatthassānurūpenāññappakārena dassanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2157_2: Dhanaṃ vivaṭe kenaci anāvaṭattā aṅgaṇe pakāsappadese nikkhittaṃ atha ca pana ārakkhavajjitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2157_4: Tuvaṃ yadi icchasi gantuṃ dhanaṃ vā,
anya-e0812n0:2157_5: yathākāmaṃ gaccheti dhanāvaharaṇamicchitamañjasā avatvā taṃsiddhiyā byājena vadati.
anya-e0812n0:2158_2: Dhanaṃ muttāmaṇiādi vivaṭaṅgaṇanikkhittaṃ pākārādiparikkheparahitattā nirāvaraṇaṭṭhāne yena kenaci ṭhapitaṃ apica ārakkhavajjitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2158_3: Bho dhanakāma tuvaṃ yadicchasi dhanaṃ gamanaṃ vā,
anya-e0812n0:2158_4: yathākāmaṃ gacchāti cittenicchitadhanāvaharaṇavidhānaṃ “dhanamāharā”ti ujumavatvā evaṃ byājena vuttattā idaṃ pariyāyavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2158_9: kāmaṃ taṇhaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ vā cittamanatikkammāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2160_0: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:2162_2: Nindanto viya dosaṃ nidassento viya thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0812n0:2162_5: Atra vuttivisese dosā viya ābhāsanti paṭibhanti.
anya-e0812n0:2162_6: Tādisapadādinā dosābhāsā guṇā eva iddhimantatādayo na dosopi koci sannidhimavaṭṭhānaṃ yanti.
anya-e0812n0:2163_2: Nindanto viya dosaṃ dassento viya thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇanaṃ karoti,
anya-e0812n0:2163_5: Atra asmiṃ vuttivisese dosābhāsā dosā viya paṭibhāsamānā guṇā eva tādisapadappayogena iddhimantatādayo
anya-e0812n0:2163_8: dosā iva ābhāsanti paṭibhāsantīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2166_0: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha, guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2167_2: Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ uppalaṃ pathavīvalayañceti siliṭṭhaṃ sañcāletuṃ bhamayitumito cito ca bhusamaccantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2167_3: alaṃ samatthopi tāvatā taṃmattena te guṇānaṃ visesaṃ atisayalakkhaṇaṃ kiṃ kena kāraṇena vadāma.
anya-e0812n0:2167_5: tāva nikhilabhūmaṇḍalasañcālāvikaraṇato paramāya thutiyā saṃyojitoyaṃ bhagavā mahānubhāvaṃ vicitavāti bhuvanamaṇḍalasikhāmaṇīti.
anya-e0812n0:2168_2: Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ nissesaṃ nīluppalavanaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ vā sañcāletuṃ kampetuṃ bhusamatisayena alaṃ samattho,
anya-e0812n0:2168_3: tāvatā te guṇānaṃ visesamatisayaṃ kiṃ vadāma kathaṃ bhaṇāmāti.
anya-e0812n0:2168_5: tasseva saddassa pathavīmaṇḍalavācakattā “iddhimato tava idaṃ kiṃ visesa”nti uttamaguṇavaṇṇanā katā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2168_7: sā ca sabbathā silesaṃ nissāya pavattatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2172_2: Visese atisaye kismiñcipi kāriyavisese icchāyaṃ dabbādīnaṃ yatra vekallassa abhāvassa dassanaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2172_3: ayaṃ viseso nāma visesavutti nāma bhave.
anya-e0812n0:2173_2: Visesicchāyaṃ atisaye kāriyavisese icchāyaṃ sati dabbassa ca kriyājātiguṇassa ca yatra yasmiṃ vuttivisese vekalladassanaṃ abhāvakathanamatthi,
anya-e0812n0:2173_3: ayaṃ viseso nāma bhave visesavutti nāma siyāti.
anya-e0812n0:2175_0: Na rathā na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā na padātayo;
anya-e0812n0:2179_2: Rathā tayo antamaso saparivārānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rathānaṃ anīkavohārato tādisā tayo rathā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n0:2179_3: Mātaṅgā tayo vuttanayena anīkasaṅkhātā tayo mātaṅgā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n0:2179_4: Na hayā tayo tādisā anīkasaṅkhātā tayo assā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n0:2179_5: Padā na antamaso sāyudhānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ anīkavohārato tādisā cattāro purisā padā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n0:2179_6: Tathāpi muninā sambhārāvajjanena hi samatiṃsapāramidhammānaṃ ābhogakaraṇeneva mārāri mārapaccattiko jito abhibhavito.
anya-e0812n0:2179_7: Iha jayopakaraṇabhāvena ṭhitānaṃ rathānīkādīnaṃ dabbānaṃ vekallaṃ dassetvā sattuvijayasabhāvānaṃ sambhārānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2179_16: Iha rathādīsu ṭhitā viya sīghaṃ pādabalena gantvā yujjhamānā purisā pādopacārena “pādā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0812n0:2179_17: Rathādīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ tayoti anīkaṭṭhāne dassetvā purisapamāṇassāvuttepi antamaso cattāro purisā anīkaṃ nāma hontīti pakaraṇato cattāroti ñāyati. No ce?
anya-e0812n0:2179_21: Dabbavisesavutti dabbena dabbapaṭisedhanato visesakathanaṃ visesassa vuttīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2184_2: Bhūkuṭi bhamubhaṅgo kopajanito na baddhā na racitā,
anya-e0812n0:2184_3: dasanacchado cādharo neva phurito neva kampito kopena.
anya-e0812n0:2184_4: Tathāpi ca varo uttamo munivīro sayaṃ mārārino bhaṅgaṃ parājayaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0812n0:2185_2: Bhūkuṭi kopavikārabhūto bhamubhaṅgopi na baddhā na katā,
anya-e0812n0:2185_3: dasanacchado dantāvaraṇo neva phurito na kampāpito.
anya-e0812n0:2185_4: Tathāpi varo uttamo munivīro muniguṇavīraguṇayutto tathāgato sayaṃ mārāribhaṅgañca akāsīti.
anya-e0812n0:2185_5: Ettha bhamubhaṅgaracanādikaṃ kriyaṃ akatvā nibbikārassa mārabhaṅgasabhāvavisesassa nibbikāramārabhaṅgassa (ka.) vuttattā esā kriyāvisesavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2192_2: Disāsu dasasu byattā patthaṭā raṃsi na bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:2192_3: Loke sakalasmiṃ patthaṭo vitthato ālokona bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:2192_5: tajjātikattābhāvepi sādhūnaṃ subhāsitaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ paramaccantameva andhatamaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhāvekallato
anya-e0812n0:2192_7: Raṃsiyā andhakārāpahārasamatthāya nivattiyā viseso subhāsitassa dassito.
anya-e0812n0:2193_4: Tathāpi sādhusubhāsitaṃ saddhammo paramaccantaṃ andhatamaharaṃ atthānatthatīraṇakkhamassa paññācakkhussa andhakārakamohatamaṃ haraṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2193_5: Idha andhakāraviddhaṃsane samatthaṃ raṃsijātyādikaṃ paṭisedhetvā subhāsitassa andhakārāpaharaṇasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n0:2195_0: Na kharaṃ na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0812n0:2198_2: Muninda tava vacanaṃ na kharaṃ na lūkhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2198_3: na thaddhaṃ vā kaṭhinañca na hi.
anya-e0812n0:2198_4: Tathāpi tādisakharattādiguṇābhāvepi janatāya janasamūhassa madaṃ gāḷhaṃ daḷhaṃ taṇhaṃ (ka.) katvā nimmūlaṃ khanatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2199_2: He muninda tava vacanaṃ kharaṃ kakkasaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2199_4: Tathāpi janatāmadaṃ janasamūhassa jātyādiṃ nissāya pavattaṃ gabbaṃ gāḷhaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā nimmūlaṃ mūlamasesetvā khanatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2199_5: Khaṇanakkhamaayosaṅkuādīsu labbhamānaṃ kharattādiguṇaṃ paṭisedhetvā buddhavacanassa madakhaṇanasabhāvasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n0:2199_6: visesassa vuttattā ayaṃ guṇavisesavutti nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2199_10: “Gāḷhaṃ nimmūla”nti khaṇanakriyāya visesanattā gāḷhaṃ nimmūlaṃ khaṇanaṃ karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0812n0:2206_2: Sūravīrattanaṃ sūrabhāvavīrabhāvaṃ atidittaṃ tu atisayena pana dittaṃ yahiṃ vākye dassīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2206_3: īdisaṃ vacanaṃ viññū kavayo ruḷhāhaṅkāramiti vadantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2206_6: ruḷho uggato ahaṅkāro ettha vuttiviseseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2212_2: Nandopanandassa nāgarājassa appameyyamahānubhāvassa dame damane me mama niravadhisarantippameyyappabhāvānucaritakittinopi
anya-e0812n0:2212_3: parassa byāpāradassanā payogapaṭipādanena kiṃ payojanaṃ, na kimpi,
anya-e0812n0:2212_4: yato me pādasambhattā pādāvanatā tādise kammani sajjā baddhakacchā santeva vijjanteva,
anya-e0812n0:2213_2: Nandopanandassa nāgarañño dame damakaraṇe byāpāradassanā bhuvanattaye pavattamānaānubhāvena ca sampavattitakittisamūhena
anya-e0812n0:2213_3: ca samannāgatassa mayhaṃ tādisapayogadassanena kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2213_4: Yasmā me pādasambhattā mayhaṃ caraṇāvanatā tādise kicce sajjā sannaddhā puttā bahavo santi eva, tasmāti.
anya-e0812n0:2213_5: Cetovasitāya sūravīrabhāvo iha atiditto dassito hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2219_3: Ekena samānena padena sarūpena āyutamanvitaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttīti anuvaditvā so silesoti vidhīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2220_2: Anekābhidheyyaṃ ekapadāyutaṃ ubhayattha sādhāraṇattā tulyena saddarūpena yuttaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2220_4: So pana yena kenaci sādhammarūpena upamānopameyyabhūtānamatthānaṃ siliṭṭhattā aññamaññaṃ phusitvā ṭhitattā sileso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2220_5: Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo sileso abhinnapadavākyādivasā akatavikārānaṃ syādyantatyādyantapadasamannāgatānaṃ
