anya-e0812n0:2225_6: sūriyo mahodayaṃ mahantaṃ udayaṃ pabbataṃ samāruḷho,
anya-e0812n0:2225_7: mahāmuni tu mahodayaṃ mahantamabbhudayaṃ sammāsambodhisamadhigamarūpaṃ samāruḷho patto.
anya-e0812n0:2225_11: Jane bodhayaṃ niddāpagamanena kilesaniddāpagamanena vā pabodhayanto rājate dibbatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2226_6: ñāṇalocanassa andhakaraṇato andhakāroti vuttamohassa vā viddhaṃsako,
anya-e0812n0:2226_7: hārī teneva manuñño raṃsimālī attano raṃsimālāya samannāgato jane pakatiniddāya kilesaniddāya vā samannāgate
anya-e0812n0:2226_8: satte bodhayaṃ bodhayanto ayaṃ bhagavā divākaro,
anya-e0812n0:2226_9: chahi bhagadhammehi samannāgato buddho vā rājate dibbatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2226_10: Dvīsu pakkhesu padānaṃ samānabhāvena ṭhitattā ayaṃ abhinnapadavākyasileso.
anya-e0812n0:2226_11: Andho ca so tamo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2226_13: mahanto ca so udayo pabbato cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2226_14: mahanto ca so udayo abbhudayo abhivuddhi cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2226_17: bhago sirī assa sūriyassa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2226_18: bhago sirīkāmapayatanādippakāro assa satthuno atthīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2231_3: Sobhanā sabbaññutaññāṇarūpaṃ buddhi assa atthīti sudhī,
anya-e0812n0:2231_5: Sārado saradakāle sambhūto amalako nimmalo ābhā sobhā yassa so, cando.
anya-e0812n0:2231_8: amalakassa hatthāmalakasseva vā ābhāso asesañeyyāvabodho yassa so,
anya-e0812n0:2231_10: Saṃ sammā kamenānīyamānattā ānīto parikkhayo kaṇhapakkho yena so, cando.
anya-e0812n0:2231_11: Samaṃ vūpasamaṃ ānīto parikkhayo hāni kilesasattukato adhigatakkhayattā yenaso,
anya-e0812n0:2231_13: Kumudākarassa kumudassa raṃsiyā sambodhi vikāso yassa raṃsiyo sambodhi vikāsa’ssa (ka.) so, cando.
anya-e0812n0:2231_14: Kuyā pathaviyā mudaṃ pītiṃ karotīti kumudākaro,
anya-e0812n0:2231_18: Ayaṃ bhinnapadavākyasileso vuttena vidhinā padānaṃ bhinnattā.
anya-e0812n0:2232_9: Samānītaparikkhayo kaṇhapakkhe suṭṭhu kamena ānīto parikkhayo paripuṇṇo vā cando,
anya-e0812n0:2232_16: Ubhayapakkhesu padaṃ bhinditvā atthassa yojanato ayaṃ bhinnapadavākyasileso.
anya-e0812n0:2232_23: sārado amalako ābhāso yassa candassa bhagavato vāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_24: sārado āmalakassa viya ābhāso ñeyyāvabodho assa bhagavatoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_25: saṃ sammā ānīto parikkhayo kalāhāni aneneti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_26: samaṃ vūpasamaṃ ānīto parikkhayo hāni kilesasattuto yeneti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_32: sudhā amataṃ assa candassa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_33: su sobhanā dhī buddhi assa sambuddhassāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2235_0: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0812n0:2237_2: Saṃ sammā āhito patiṭṭhāpito attassa vinayo vinayanaṃ sabbattha savisaye appaṭihatacāravasena yassa so, garuḷo.
anya-e0812n0:2237_10: Sundaraṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ samuddaṃ bhinditvā jalasaṅgamato paṭhamamevauggamanasāmatthiyayogato yassa so, garuḷo.
anya-e0812n0:2237_15: Visaṃ dadātīti visadaṃ pāṇinaṃ nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pālayatu,
anya-e0812n0:2238_2: Samāhitattavinayo sammā āhitāya ṭhapitāya sarīrassa savisaye gatiyā samannāgato,
anya-e0812n0:2238_3: sammā āhitena ṭhapitena cittadamanena samannāgato vā,
anya-e0812n0:2238_6: sugato pakkhavātavegena samuddajalaṃ dvidhā katvā tasmiṃ jale anekībhūteyeva nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā nāge gahetvā gamane samatthattā sundaragamano,
anya-e0812n0:2238_8: vināyako pakkhīnaṃ nāyako so garuḷarājā visadaṃ ghoravisattā visadāyakaṃ pāṇinaṃ nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pāletu. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:2238_9: vināyako veneyye vinento so sammāsambuddho pāṇinaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ visadaṃ visāradaṃ katvā pātu ahitāpanayanahitopanayanena rakkhatūti.
anya-e0812n0:2238_10: Ubhayapakkhesu “ahīnamadamaddano”iccādikehi bhinnehi ca “samāhitattavinayo”iccādikehi abhinnehi ca padehi
anya-e0812n0:2238_13: samāhito attavinayo yassa garuḷassa tathāgatassa vāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2245_10: Virodho asaṅgati ettha vijjatīti virodhi, sopi.
anya-e0812n0:2245_15: Esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ nidassanesu payogesveva rūpaṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ āvibhavissatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2246_2: Viruddhāviruddhābhinnakammā api ubhayatthassa viruddhena ca aviruddhena ca abhinnena ca kammena samanvitā tayo silesā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_3: paro añño niyamavāpi avadhāraṇena yuttasileso ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_7: padajādi padena jāto vākyena jāto ocityasamposakādisilesopīti esaṃ silesānaṃ nidassanesveva nidassanasaṅkhataudāharaṇesveva
anya-e0812n0:2246_8: rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vā āvibhavissati,
anya-e0812n0:2246_9: nidassiyamānaudāharaṇeneva lakkhaṇassa gammamānattā visuṃ na kathessāmīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2246_10: Viruddhāni ca aviruddhāni ca abhinnañceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_11: tameva kammaṃ kriyā yesaṃ silesānamiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_13: niyamassa akkhepo paṭisedho assa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_14: taṃ vacanaṃ abhidhānaṃ yassa silesassāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_19: so ādi yassa vākyassāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2249_0: Savase vattayaṃ lokaṃ, akhilaṃ kallaviggaho kalaviggaho (sī.);
anya-e0812n0:2251_2: Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ mārāri dhammarājā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2251_3: kallo manuñño viggaho kalaho yassa mārārino,
anya-e0812n0:2251_5: tesu mārāri parābhavati parābhavamapeti bodhiyaṃ paṭiladdhaparājayavasena,
anya-e0812n0:2251_6: dhammarājā samantabhaddo tu vijambhate lokattayabyāpisamullapitavijayaddhanipavattivasena samaṃ bhavatīti
anya-e0812n0:2252_2: Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ anatthe yuñjanato attano vase vattayanto, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2252_3: sakalalokaṃ hite yuñjanato attano vase vattayanto kallaviggaho manuññakalaho, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2252_4: manuññasarīrasampattiyutto mārāri parābhavati bodhimūle laddhaparājayavasena parābhavaṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0812n0:2252_5: dhammarājā tathāgato pana vijambhate lokattaye patthaṭajayaghosavasena vijambhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2252_8: kallo manuñño viggaho vivādo deho vā yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2256_0: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2257_8: tassayaṃ amatañca tassa ca nissayaṃ amatanti (ka.) passantīti ayamaviruddhakammasileso savanadassanānaṃ aviruddhattāti.
anya-e0812n0:2258_2: Sabhāvamadhuraṃ “vācāmadhuraṃ karissāmī”ti kattabbapayogaṃ vināpi madhurattā pakatimadhuraṃ, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2258_3: kenaci paccayena anuppannattā saṅkharavisesaṃ vināpi pakatipaṇītaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2258_4: puññavisesodayasambhavaṃ puññavisesadesakassa munino kassaci kusalavisesassa abhivuddhiyā sambhūtaṃ, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2258_5: veneyyajanānaṃ nibbānādhippāyena katakusalavisesassa abhivuddhiyā ārammaṇattena paṭiladdhaṃ munino vācaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ suṇanti,
anya-e0812n0:2265_2: Andhakāraṃ mohasaṅkhātaṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharatīti andhakārāpahārā, vācā, bhā ca.
anya-e0812n0:2265_4: sobhāya ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ pīṇetīti ayamabhinnakammasileso pīṇanalakkhaṇāyekāya kriyāya vācāya bhāya ca sampannoti.
anya-e0812n0:2266_2: Andhakārāpahārāya mohandhakāraṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharaṇāya sabhāvamadhurāya ca sabhāvato kaṇṇasukhāya,
anya-e0812n0:2266_3: sabhāvato nettābhirāmāya vācāya bhāya sarīrakantiyā ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ dhinoti pīṇetīti.
anya-e0812n0:2266_4: Pīṇayanasabhāvāya ekāya kriyāya saddhiṃ karaṇabhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ vācābhānaṃ yojitattā ayaṃ abhinnakammasileso.
anya-e0812n0:2272_8: “Kesakkhīnaṃvā”tiādīsu niyamasaṅkhātaavadhāraṇapadassa vijjamānattā kaṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ pāpattassa ca,
anya-e0812n0:2272_10: rattaguṇena saddhiṃ rāgassa ca siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ niyamavantasileso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2272_14: pāṇayo ca pādāni ca adharāni cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2277_2: Nātha tava pāṇipādādharesveva sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo dissati, na citte,
anya-e0812n0:2277_6: yato so ayaṃ sārāgo sādhūnaṃ guṇesveva virāgalakkhaṇo dissate iti.
anya-e0812n0:2278_2: He nātha tava sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo pāṇipādādharesveva dissati,
anya-e0812n0:2278_4: Atha vā so ayaṃ sārāgo kattukamyatākusalacchandabhūto sādhuguṇesvapi sajjanānaṃ sīlādiguṇesupi dissati.
anya-e0812n0:2278_5: “Evā”ti dassitaniyamassa paṭisedhakena “atha vā”ti vacanena samannāgatattā rattavaṇṇasaṅkhātarāgena lobhassa
anya-e0812n0:2285_2: Saha lakkhaṇena sasarūpena dvattiṃ savarapurisalakkhaṇena vā vattamāno salakkhaṇo,
anya-e0812n0:2285_6: niyato patidinamudayo pabhālakkhaṇo yassa so niyatodayo, sūriyo,
anya-e0812n0:2285_7: niyato thiro udayo sammāsambuddho sambodhirūpo yassa so niyatodayo, munindo,
anya-e0812n0:2285_9: jito saṃkleso jhānarativasena kāyacittābādho yena so, brahmā,
anya-e0812n0:2285_10: jito saṃkleso dasavidho aggamaggaññāṇalābhā yena so.
anya-e0812n0:2286_3: atisubhago atisundarāya lakkhiyā samannāgato, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2286_6: niyatodayo patidinaṃ pubbaṇhakāle niyamitagaganuggamano, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2286_11: samaṇissaro so uttamo maṇi vibhāti sobhati, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2286_14: paṭhamapāde candena dutiye sūriyena tatiye brahmunā catutthe maṇinā ca sabbaññupadatthassa siliṭṭhattā ca ayaṃ avirodhisileso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2286_16: atisobhano bhago sirī vā sirīkāmapayatanādiko vā assāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2286_21: maṇīnaṃ samaṇānaṃ vā issaroti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2293_6: tadā loke samoti viruddhaṃ asamattā tassa.
anya-e0812n0:2293_9: loke devadattādīnaṃ virodhisattānaṃ rāhulādīnaṃ avirodhisattānañca samattā,
anya-e0812n0:2293_18: Tattha puriso dāyako pāpe jane kathamadayoti virujjhati.
anya-e0812n0:2293_20: Tasmā munino ayaṃ yathāvuttā gati pavatti cittā abbhutāti ayaṃ vuttanayena virodhisileso udāhaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:2294_2: Asamopi atulyopi koci rājādiko loke samo tulyo, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2294_3: sadisapuggalarahito eva rāhulabhadradevadattādisabbaloke anunayapaṭighābhāvena samo hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2294_4: Lokesopi brahmabhūtopi naruttamo naravaro hoti, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2294_6: Sadayopi yācakesu dayasaṅkhātena dānena yuttopi pāpe pāpiṭṭhe adayo dānarahito, no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2294_8: Munino ayaṃ gati pavatti cittā vicittāti rājādino asamasamatā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2294_10: dānasahitassa kassaci purisassa dānarahitabhāvo ca viruddho hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2294_11: Tasmā rājabrahmapurisehi munino siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ virodhisileso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2294_16: naro ca so uttamo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2294_17: saha dayena dayāya vā vattamānoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2294_18: natthi dayo dayā vā asseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2299_2: Saṃsāro abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā khandhapaṭipāṭiyeva dukkhaṃ dukkhamattādinā,
anya-e0812n0:2299_4: amataṃ sukhaṃ amataṃ vā nibbānaṃ dadātīti amatandadāti āmantanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2299_5: tvayi avanatā paṇāmavasena icchitamatimataṃ dukkhāpagamanibbattaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ accantaṃ vindati paṭilabhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2299_7: amatandado dukkhopahate sukhayatīti ucitanti “amataṃ dadātī”ti padamadhigate vatthuni ocityaṃ samposayatīti ocityasamposako padasilesoyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2300_2: Saṃsāradukkhopahatā khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ nirantarapavattisaṅkhātena dukkhena upahatā janatā,
anya-e0812n0:2300_4: nibbānadāyaka tathāgata tvayi avanatā paṇamanavasena onatā icchitaṃ abhimataṃ sukhaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ accantaṃ atisayena vindati sevatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2300_5: Amatadāyakā dukkhite sukhite karontīti idaṃ ucitameveti ubhayatthassāpi vācakaṃ “amataṃ dadātī”ti padaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2300_6: tādisajanassa sukhadāne ocityaṃ posetīti ayaṃ ocityasamposakapadasileso.
anya-e0812n0:2300_9: amataṃ sudhaṃ nibbānaṃ vā dadātīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2303_0: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0812n0:2304_3: tena yuttehi vatthūhi saha samaṃ katvāna vatthuto asāmyepi tathābhāvamāropya kassaci purisādino thutinindatthaṃ yaṃ kittanamākhyānaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2304_5: vattumicchitena guṇena tādisānaṃ tulyayogitāpaṭipādanato tadatthiyena tulyayogitā tathā dvidhā vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2305_2: Guṇayuttehi sundarāsundarehi yehi kehici guṇehi yuttehi vatthūhi,
anya-e0812n0:2305_3: samaṃ katvāna tatvato asamānesupi samānattabuddhiyā āropanaṃ katvā,
anya-e0812n0:2305_4: kassaci purisādino thutiṃ nindaṃ vā nissāya yaṃ saṃkittanaṃ guṇāguṇakathanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:2305_10: Ettha tulyaguṇayuttapadatthānaṃ tagguṇasambandhassa tulyayogitābhāvato tappaṭipādako uttiviseso tadatthiyena tulyayogitāti ñeyyā.
anya-e0812n0:2311_4: atha vā sammāsambuddho cāti ubhohi karaṇabhūtehi hetubhūtehi vā loko sattaloko,
anya-e0812n0:2311_5: sampatto sammado pīti yena tathāvidho ca,
anya-e0812n0:2311_6: sampatto ālokassa sampadā yena tathāvidho cāpīti.
anya-e0812n0:2311_7: Ettha pītidānādiguṇayuttena raṃsimālinā samaṃ katvā bhagavato thutivasena kittananti lakkhaṇaṃ yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2312_2: Tamonudo andhakāraṃ paharanto raṃsimālī ca bhagavā ca ubhohi karaṇabhūtehi hetubhūtehi vā,
anya-e0812n0:2312_3: loko sattaloko sampattasammado paṭiladdhapītiko ca sampattālokasampadā ca hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2312_4: Ettha pītidānālokakaraṇasaṅkhātaguṇayuttena sūriyena tulyaṃ katvā bhagavato thutivasena guṇakathanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2312_9: Udāharaṇe adassitepi asādhuguṇayuttena kenaci vatthunā samaṃ katvā kassaci kātabbanindāpi evameva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2315_0: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2316_2: Atthantaraṃ nidassetabbāpekkhāya aññaṃ kiñci ucitaṃ kāriyaṃ sādhayatā kenaci vatthunā hetubhūtena,
anya-e0812n0:2316_3: tena atthantareneva sadisaṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ kiñci asantaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ vā santaṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā dassīyate paṭipādīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2317_3: (ka.) sādhayatā sādhayantena kenaci vatthunā taṃsadisaṃ tena atthantarena samānaṃ asantaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ vā
anya-e0812n0:2317_4: santaṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā kiñci phalaṃ dassīyate vatthūhi paṭipādīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2317_6: Attho ca so antaro añño cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2322_2: Samaṇindassa mahāmunino udayā pātubhāvena pāpā lobhādayo parābhavaṃ nidhanaṃ yanti,
anya-e0812n0:2322_11: taṃ sūcayantāti dhammarājavirodhahetukaṃ asantaphalametaṃ nidassanaṃ parābhavassāniṭṭhattā.
anya-e0812n0:2323_2: Samaṇindassa munindassa udayā loke pātubhāvena pāpā lobhādayo dhammarājaviruddhānaṃ rājadhammehi samannāgatarājūhi,
anya-e0812n0:2323_3: dhammādhipatinā munindena vā viruddhānaṃ durantataṃ aniṭṭhāvasānataṃ sūcayantā pakāsento parābhavaṃ parihāniṃ yanti pāpuṇantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2323_4: Ettha pubbaddhena udayapubbako pāpaparābhavanasaṅkhāto atthantaro dassito,
anya-e0812n0:2323_8: dhammena yutto rājāti vā dhammesu rājāti vāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2323_10: duṭṭho virūpo anto pariyosānaṃ yesamiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2330_2: Acchariyānaṃ bhagavato caraṇāravindadvandasampaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā samuggatānamacchariyaguṇopetānamambujānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2330_3: sirasi matthake nikkhittā caraṇā yena so jino.
anya-e0812n0:2331_2: Ayaṃ jino acchariyānaṃ attano pādapaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā uggatattā accharāpaharaṇayoggānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2331_3: ambujānaṃ sironikkhittacaraṇo matthake ṭhapitapādo loke sattaloke attano paramabbhutataṃ atiacchariyaguṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2331_5: Ettha acchariyapadumānaṃ matthake caraṇanikkhepasaṅkhātena atthantarena paramabbhutataṃ viññāpetīti ayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2331_9: paramo uttamo abbhuto guṇo asseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2335_2: Vibhūtiyā sampattiyā adhippāyassa vā ajjhāsayassa vā paramukkaṃsataṃ paramātisayabhāvaṃ yātaṃ upagataṃ mahantattaṃ nāma īritaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2336_2: Vibhūtiyā sampattiyā vā adhippāyassa ajjhāsayassa vā paramukkaṃsataṃ atyukkaṃsabhāvaṃ yātaṃ yaṃ mahantattaṃ siyā,
anya-e0812n0:2341_2: Abhinikkhamā purā pubbe bodhisatto māyādeviyā putto paramukkaṭṭhaṃ anāññasādhāraṇaṃ siriṃ vibhūtiṃ vindi paṭilabhi. Kīdiso?
anya-e0812n0:2341_3: Kirīṭe makuṭe ratanānaṃ chāyāhi sobhāhi anuviddho churito ātapavāraṇo setacchattaṃ yassa so tādisoti
anya-e0812n0:2342_2: Bodhisatto antimajātiyaṃ mahābodhisatto abhinikkhamā abhinikkhamanato purā pubbe kirīṭaratanacchāyānuviddhātapavāraṇo
anya-e0812n0:2342_3: moliratanaraṃsīhi rañjitasetacchatto paramukkaṭṭhaṃ siriṃ vibhūtiṃ vindi anubhavīti.
anya-e0812n0:2342_4: Ettha moliratanakantiyā setacchattassa oviddhabhāvakathanena vibhūtiyā mahantattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2342_7: tāhi anuviddho churito ātapavāraṇo yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2349_2: Snehena piyabhāvena jātena rasena rāgena ābaddhamattani rāhulamātaraṃ bimbādevimpi,
anya-e0812n0:2349_4: hitvā anapekkhitvā anāsatto hutvā sattānaṃ hitāya lokiyalokuttarāya vaḍḍhiyā bodhisatto siddhattho sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeyeva satto āsatto,
anya-e0812n0:2350_2: So bodhisatto sneharasābaddhaṃ piyabhāvasaṅkhātarāgena ābaddhaṃ rāhulamātaraṃ api bimbādevimpi hitvā
anya-e0812n0:2350_3: sattahitāya sattānaṃ lokiyalokuttaratthāya sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeyeva satto laggoti.
anya-e0812n0:2350_4: Tādisaitthiratanepi alaggatākathanena bodhisattassa ukkaṭṭhajjhāsayamahantattaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2350_8: snehena piyabhāvena jāto raso rāgoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2356_2: vaṇṇanīyaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ gopetvā niraṃkatvā tassa vaṇṇanīyassa asamaṃ visamaṃ visadisaṃ paramaññaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2356_3: kiñci vatthu yadi dassīyate kavināti anuvaditvā sā vañcanā matāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:2357_2: Vaṇṇanīyaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ gopetvā tassa vaṇṇanīyassa samaṃ sadisaṃ vā asamaṃ visadisaṃ vā paraṃ yaṃ kiñci vatthu yadi dassīyate kavinā,
anya-e0812n0:2364_2: Māro kāmo tādino lobhādīsu tādisattā munino purato sammukhe sahassaṃ isavo assāti sahassesu ca na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2364_3: Pañca isavo assāti pañcesu ca na hotīti vaṇṇanīyo mārotra gopyate.
anya-e0812n0:2364_5: Paresu aññasattesu sarāgesu esamisūnaṃ dasavaḍḍhitaṃ dasahi guṇitaṃ sahassaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2364_6: kathamaññathābhuvanattayaṃ jayeyyāti māraṃ gopetvā dasasahassopalakkhitavatthantarassa dassitattā asamavañcanāyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2365_2: Māro tādino lābhālābhādīsu avikārino tathāgatassa purato abhimukhe sahassesu ca sahassasaropi na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2365_3: pañcesu pañca isu ca tādise ṭhapetvā pañca isu na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2365_4: Paresu sugatasammukhe īdisesupi aññesu saṃkilesesu tassa tilokajetuno mārassa esaṃ sarānaṃ dasavaḍḍhitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2365_5: dasagaṇanāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sahassaṃ hoti dasasahassaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2365_6: Vaṇṇanīyaṃ māraṃ gopetvā dasasahassasaṅkhyāhi gaṇitassa aññassa sarasaṅkhātavatthuno dassitattā ayaṃ asamavañcanā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2373_2: Munindavadanindunā sabbaññuno mukhacandena vivādaṃ anuyuñjanto sampuṇṇo ayaṃ paccakkho candimā na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2373_3: Kiñcarahi etaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ manobhuno anaṅgassa ubbhūtiyaṃ chattaṃ samussitasetacchattanti.
anya-e0812n0:2373_4: Vaṇṇanīyaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ṭhapetvā tato aññassa candasadisassa chattassa dassitattā ayaṃ vutti samavañcanā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2377_3: tamādi yesaṃ tehi nibbindena virattena appakate asannihite buddhivisayeyeva iha kismiñci vatthumhi katā yā thuti saṃrādhanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2378_2: Parānuvattanādīhi aññassa yassa kassaci anuvattanādīhi nibbindena ubbegaṃ pattena appakate anadhigate
anya-e0812n0:2378_3: buddhivisaye eva iha imasmiṃ kismiñci vatthumhi katā yā thuti saṃrādhanasaṅkhātā pasaṃsā atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2382_5: Paramaññaṃ kiñci na sevanti sīleneti aparasevino.
anya-e0812n0:2382_6: Paracittārādhanabyasanaparammukhā hariṇā vanesu sukhaṃ nirākulaṃ jīvantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2383_2: Hariṇā migā aparasevino vuttiṃ nissāya paraṃ asevamānā anāyāsopalābhehi parapariggahābhāvato parasevāparissamaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2383_3: vinā labbhanīyehi jaladabbaṅkurādibhi udakadabbaṅkurarukkhalatāpallavādīhi vanesu icchiticchitāraññesu
anya-e0812n0:2383_5: Ettha rājasevābyasanappattena kenaci anadhigatāpi migajīvikā pasaṃsitā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2383_11: tāni ādi yesaṃ pallavādīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2387_2: Yattha vuttiyaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ upariṭṭhānamupariṭṭhānaṃ pubbassa pubbassa visesanaṃ vidhinisedhanavasena ekāvali nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2387_3: Ayaṃ ekāvali vidhinisedhato vidhivasena nisedhanavasena ca dvidhā.
anya-e0812n0:2388_2: Yattha uttiyaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ uparūparibhavaṃ padaṃ pubbapubbavisesanaṃ pubbapubbapadassa vidhinisedhanavasena visesanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2388_4: Ayaṃ ekāvali vidhinisedhato vidhinisedhavasena dvidhā hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2388_5: Uttaraṃ pubbanti ṭhānūpacārena ṭhānībhūtaṃ padameva vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:2388_7: ekato āvaliyanti saṃvaliyanti padāni etāyāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2388_8: vidhividhānañca nisedho paṭisedho cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2388_9: Ettha “uttaraṃ uttara”nti ca “pubbassa pubbassa”iti ca kamena visesanavisesyaguṇena byāpanicchāyaṃ nibbacanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2395_2: Ettha pādādīnaṃ visesyānaṃ nakhālirucirattādividhānena visesanena visesitabbattā ayaṃ vidhiekāvali.
anya-e0812n0:2396_2: Satthuno pādā nakhālirucirā nakhapantīhi manuññā nakhālī nakhapantiyo raṃsibhāsurā raṃsīhi dibbamānā
anya-e0812n0:2396_3: raṃsī kantiyo tamopahānekarasā andhakāravidhamane asahāyakiccā hutvā sobhantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2396_4: Ettha pādādīnaṃ pubbapadānaṃ nakhālirucirattādividhāyakehi uttarauttaravisesanehi visesitattā ayaṃ vidhiekāvali nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2396_9: so eko raso kiccaṃ etāsaṃ raṃsīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2403_2: Asantuṭṭho catupaccayasantosavasena yo koci yati nāma neva siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2403_5: Yo jantūnaṃ sattānaṃ anantabyasanāvaho na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2403_7: Asantuṭṭhādīnaṃ yatittādinisedhanavasena visesanānaṃ pavattiyā nisedhaekāvali ayaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2404_2: Asantuṭṭho cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu dassitadvādasavidhasantosānaṃ aññatarena asantuṭṭho yati na eva bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2404_3: Ālayāhato taṇhāya pahato santoso na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2404_4: Yo jantūnaṃ anantabyasanāvaho na yo sattānaṃ apariyantapīḷāpāpako na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2404_6: Asantuṭṭhādīnaṃ yatibhāvādipaṭisedhavasena visesanānaṃ pavattattā ayaṃ nisedhaekāvali nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2404_8: yati na bhavatīti yatito aññesu sakalasattasaṅkhātesu avayavesu patiṭṭhāpanato “asantuṭṭho”ti visesyo,
anya-e0812n0:2404_14: tāni ca tāni byasanāni ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2408_2: Yahiṃ sadisattaṃ vinā eva vatthunaṃ padatthānaṃ aññamaññaṃ bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2409_2: Yahiṃ alaṅkāre sadisattaṃ vinā eva vatthunaṃ aññamaññaṃ tu bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2409_8: sasaṅkhye ceti “bhūsiyabhūsatta”nti imassa visesanaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2412_0: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2414_2: Byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ byāmapabhāmaṇḍalaṃ lokabandhunā tena muninā karaṇabhūtena mahantiṃ mahatiṃ pūjanīyaṃ vā kantiṃ sobhaṃ vindati sevati,
anya-e0812n0:2414_3: sopi muni tena eva byāmaṃsumaṇḍalena tādisiṃ kantiṃ vindatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2414_4: Aññamaññaṃ asadisānaṃ byāmaṃsumaṇḍalamunisaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ paṭhamavākye alaṅkāriyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2414_6: Aparavākye ime dve vipallāsena alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2416_0: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca guṇassa ca;
anya-e0812n0:2419_2: Kriyāya guṇassa cāti dvinnaṃ sahabhāvassa sahattassa kathanaṃ sahavuttīti viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2419_3: Tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā tassa udāharaṇaṃ evaṃ vakkhamānanayena daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0812n0:2419_8: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ taṃsahattaṃ yassaṃ kriyāyaṃ guṇe vā bhavatīti sahattaṃ kriyāguṇānaṃ hotīti katvā “kathanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2419_9: sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2424_5: Ettha jalanavijambhanānaṃ ubhayasādhāraṇānaṃ kriyānaṃ sahabhāvo vihitoti kriyāsahavutti ayanti.
anya-e0812n0:2425_2: Satthu satthuno nakhaṃsavo nakhakiraṇā candaraṃsīhi samaṃ jalanti,
anya-e0812n0:2425_4: Ettha ubhayapadatthānaṃ sādhāraṇabhūtajalanavijambhanakriyānaṃ sahabhāvassa vuttattā esā kriyāsahavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2430_3: hetubhūtena vā dujjanacetasā saha pāpaṃ malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2430_4: sajjanacetasā saha disā dasavidhāpi suvimalā accantanimmalā suvimalayasomālāvalayitattā sajjanaceto pāpāpagameneti.
anya-e0812n0:2430_5: Ettha malinattassa ca suvimalattassa ñāyasambandhino sahabhāvo vuttoti ayaṃ guṇasahavutti.
anya-e0812n0:2431_3: karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena vā pāpaṃ lobhādidhammaṃ dujjanacetasā dujjanānaṃ cittena saha malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2431_4: Imināyeva jinodayena disā dasa disāyo sajjanacetasā saha suvimalā sajjanacetasantānato pāpānaṃ apagamena
anya-e0812n0:2431_6: guṇassa sahabhāvassa vuttattā esā guṇasahavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2431_11: santo ca te janā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2435_2: Virodhīnaṃ aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ kriyādīnaṃ yattha vuttivisese saṃsaggassa sannidhino dassanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2436_2: Yattha uttivisese samukkaṃsābhidhānatthaṃ vaṇṇanīyavatthugataadhikakathanāya virodhīnaṃ aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2436_3: padatthānaṃ kriyāguṇādīnaṃ saṃsaggadassanaṃ sanniṭṭhānadassanaṃ sambandhadassanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2440_2: Lokekabandhuno lokanāthassa sabhāvamadhurā sādhujanasampīṇanekacāturā api guṇā arahantatādayo sevitā
anya-e0812n0:2440_3: pāpasevīhi tesaṃ pāpasevīnaṃ mānasaṃ sampadūsenti dosaduṭṭhāpādanavasenāvikaronti “tādiso guṇātisayo tassā”ti.
anya-e0812n0:2440_4: Ettha guṇānaṃ sabhāvamadhurānaṃ pītivisesuppādanayoggānaṃ sampadūsanena saha virodhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2441_2: Lokekabandhuno buddhassa guṇā arahattādayo sabhāvamadhurā api pakatimadhurā api sevitā pāpasevīhi sevitā
anya-e0812n0:2441_3: samānā pāpasevīnaṃ mānasaṃ sampadūsenti atisayena kopentīti.
anya-e0812n0:2441_4: Evaṃ hīnādhimuttikehi sahitumasakkuṇeyyo tassa guṇātisayo vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2441_5: Nanu sabhāvamadhuro guṇo pītiṃ vinā sampadūsanaṃ na kareyya,
anya-e0812n0:2441_6: sampadūsanampi tādisasabhāvamadhuraṃ vinā na bhaveyyāti aññoññaviruddhānamesaṃ madhuraguṇasampadūsanakriyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2441_10: eko ca so bandhu cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2443_0: Yassa kassaci dānena, yassa kassaci vatthuno;
anya-e0812n0:2446_2: Yassa kassaci vatthuno khuddakavatthuno yassa kassaci paṭiggāhakassa dānena hetubhūtena visiṭṭhassa uttamavatthuno yaṃ ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2449_0: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0812n0:2450_2: Ettha nayanādidānena sabbaññutāsiriyā ādānanti parivutti ayaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2451_2: Muninā purā pubbe paresaṃ manuññaṃ nayanādikaṃ datvāna idāni sabbaññutāsirī sabbaññutāsaṅkhātā anaññasādhāraṇā sirī samanupattāti.
anya-e0812n0:2451_3: Iha yassa dinnaṃ tato eva gahaṇe parivuttisaddassa niruḷhattā nayanādīnaṃ dānena sabbaññutāsiriyā ādānato,
anya-e0812n0:2451_4: dānābhāve ādānābhāvato ca paṭiggāhakajane avijjamānepi sabbaññutā vijjamānattena parikappitāti parivutti hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2453_0: Ciraṃ citābhaṭo tesaṃ, yaso kumudapaṇḍaro”ti kābyādāsa 2.356.
anya-e0812n0:2454_0: Imasmiṃ udāharaṇe paccatthikānaṃ āyudhappahāraṃ datvā tava bāhunā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ ciraṃ rāsikato keravanimmalo yaso ābhaṭoti.
anya-e0812n0:2454_1: Dadāti kammayuttato eva ādānaṃ dassetvā parivuttiphuṭā katā.
anya-e0812n0:2460_2: Viññātā puriso kiñci disvā ujjalanādikaṃ disvāna taṃsamaṃ tassa pure dissamānassa padatthassa sadisamaññaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2460_3: vatthuṃ saṃsayāpagataṃ asannidhiṃ katvā paṭipajjati jānāti yattha visese,
anya-e0812n0:2461_2: Yattha uttivisese viññātā avabodhakārako kiñci disāvilocanādikaṃ disvāna taṃsamaṃ vatthuṃ tena dissamānavatthunā
anya-e0812n0:2461_3: tulyamaññaṃ vatthuṃ saṃsayāpagataṃ nissaṃsayaṃ katvā paṭipajjati jānāti,
anya-e0812n0:2465_2: Jinassa pādesu nakhaṃsunā disāsu sabbāsu samaṃ ekato ujjalāsu sajotīsu tā ujjalā disā passantā janā,
anya-e0812n0:2466_2: Jinapādanakhaṃsunā karaṇabhūtena disāsu dasasu samaṃ ekakkhaṇe ujjalāsu tā ujjalā disā passantā janā
anya-e0812n0:2466_4: Vijjamānanakhamarīciyaṃ buddhimakatvā candātape buddhiyā pavattāpanato bhamo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2473_2: Kavīnaṃ vattūnaṃ bhāvabodhanaṃ adhippāyapakāsakaṃ yaṃ nāmādi nāmapadavisesanapadādi yena kenaci vaṇṇena
anya-e0812n0:2473_3: ākārena sāgarādiatthantaraṃ paṭisedhetvā vā no vā pavuccate,
anya-e0812n0:2473_7: Kavīnaṃ adhippāyasaṅkhātabhāvapakāsako uttiviseso tadatthena bhāvo nāma,
anya-e0812n0:2473_8: tassa nissayabhūtaṃ nāmādipadasantānaṃ iha nissitopacārena bhāvo nāmāti īritaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2479_6: Ettha na ime pakatisamuddādayo samuddādayo honti,
anya-e0812n0:2479_7: ye palayakāle attano velānullaṅghanasaṅkhātaṃ acalattasaṅkhātañca mariyādaṃ pariccajanti.
anya-e0812n0:2479_11: Koci vipattiṃ patto niratisayaṃ dhīrattamattanovabodhetīti aññanisedhena kathitaṃ nāmaṃ kavisabhāvaṃ yathāvuttaṃ bodhetīti bhāvoyamiti.
anya-e0812n0:2480_2: Sāgarā saṃvaṭṭakāle tīramariyādaṃ atikkamentā pakatisamuddā sāgarā na bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:2480_3: Kulācalā tādisakāle acalasaṅkhātamariyādamatikkamentā satta kulapabbatā kulācalā nāma na bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:2480_5: Ye sādhavo saṃvaṭṭepi sabbavatthuvināsakakappavināsakālepi mariyādaṃ attano ācāramariyādaṃ manampi īsakampi no jahanti.
anya-e0812n0:2480_6: Santā eva te sāgarādayo nāma honti nanūti.
anya-e0812n0:2480_7: Koci byasanaṃ patto attano anaññasādhāraṇaṃ dhīrattaṃ pakāsetīti iha sāgarādiatthantarapaṭisedharūpena
anya-e0812n0:2480_8: dassitasāgarādinā vattuno akampanādhippāyaṃ avabodhetīti ayaṃ bhāvālaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2484_4: tesaṃ bhāvo aṅgaṅgibhāvo sādhiyasādhanattaṃ, tato ca.
anya-e0812n0:2484_6: tesaṃ bhāvo aṅgaṅgibhāvamantarena appadhānabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ tato ca hetuto.
anya-e0812n0:2485_3: sādhiyasādhanabhāvaṃ vinā samānabalavantabhāvena ca bandhane pajjādibandhanavisaye alaṅkatīnaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2485_6: Aṅgaṃ sādhanaṃ assa sādhiyassa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2489_0: Aho gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0812n0:2490_2: Munino pādesu nakhā tesaṃ raṃsi eva mahānadīsadisattā mahānadī,
anya-e0812n0:2490_3: sā pasatthā acchariyappattisabbhāvato gāḷhamaccantaṃ nimuggepi te jane sukhayatyeva,
anya-e0812n0:2490_5: “Ayaṃ attani gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi sukhayatī”ti ettha “nimuggepī”ti samādhino sādhiyattenaṅgitāyāvaṭṭhitassa
anya-e0812n0:2491_2: Munino pasatthā acchariyattā pasaṃsanīyā pādanakharaṃsimahānadī caraṇanakhakiraṇasaṅkhātamahāgaṅgā gāḷhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2491_3: atisayena nimuggepi te jane sādhusappurise sukhayati eva sukhite kato eva.
anya-e0812n0:2491_6: sādhanabhāvena aṅganti katvā aṅgāaṅgībhāvena imesaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ missitā.
anya-e0812n0:2491_9: mahatī ca sā nadī ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2491_10: mahānadī viya mahānadī pādanakharaṃsiyo eva mahānadīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2491_14: Sukhasamaṅgino janā sukhite sukhe karotīti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2495_0: Madhūvamunino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2497_2: Munino sabhāvamadhuro pakatimadhuro veso jināveṇiko buddhaveso ca nettarasāyanaṃ rūpaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasampannaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2497_3: rūpañca madhūva madhurattena madhusamānā vācā bhāratī ca kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇetīti.
anya-e0812n0:2497_6: “madhūvā”ti upamālaṅkāro cāti ime tayo pīṇane aññamaññāpekkharahitattā tulyabalāti imesaṃ missattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2497_9: raso rasabhūto āyanaṃ gati pavatti assāti rasāyanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2503_2: Iṭṭhassa abhimatassa vatthuno āsīsanaṃ patthanamityanuvaditvā āsī nāma siyāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:2503_4: Tilokassa lokattayavattino janassa ekagati asahāyagati paṭisaraṇabhūto nātho lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu pāletūti.
anya-e0812n0:2504_2: Iṭṭhassa atthassa icchitavatthuno āsīsanā patthanā āsī nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2504_4: Tilokekagati tibhavassa asahāyasaraṇabhūto nātho lokasāmi lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu rakkhatūti.
anya-e0812n0:2508_2: Yaṃ vibhūsanamalaṅkaraṇaṃ rasābhāsādino patītijanakaṃ avagamasampādakaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n0:2508_3: taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato sampādanato “rasavanta”nti viññeyyaṃ yathā atthappatīti janako saddo “atthavā”ti.
anya-e0812n0:2509_2: Yaṃ vibhūsanaṃ vuttālaṅkārānamantare yo koci alaṅkāro rasappatītijanakaṃ siṅgārādinavavidharasesu ekassa
anya-e0812n0:2509_3: rasassa vā tasseva rasābhāsassa vā avabodhanaṃ sampādento jāyate,
anya-e0812n0:2509_4: taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato attano rasasahitabhāvassa pakāsanato rasavantanti rasīti ñeyyanti.
anya-e0812n0:2509_6: evaṃ rasappatītijanako alaṅkāro rasavanto “rasī”ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:2515_6: Dutiye tu rāgānatañca taṃ abbhutasarojaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā sirīpādasampaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ uṭṭhahamacchariyapadumañca,
anya-e0812n0:2515_13: raṃsinā vā gāḷhaṃ ādāya gahetvā satataṃ niccaṃ āhito sambhamo ādaro,
anya-e0812n0:2515_24: Tatra pādānaṃ kāmukattaṃ dharāya kāminittañca vākyasāmatthiyā viññāyate.
anya-e0812n0:2515_27: ratyukkaṃsābhāso yadi kavinā paṭipādetabbo na bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n0:2515_28: tadā gāthāyamananupapannaṃ siyāti evaṃvidhavacanatova pādā ratyābhāsavantoti gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:2515_30: rammadesādivisesābhāve acchariyapadumuggamanābhāvato abbhutasarojasaddasavanena gammamānā rammadesādayo uddīpanavibhāvābhāsā,
anya-e0812n0:2515_32: Tathā hi “niccasarasena karena gāḷhaṃ ādāyā”ti karassa sarasatāgāḷhaggahaṇakathanena harisādayo gamyante.
anya-e0812n0:2515_33: “Satatāhitasambhamenā”ti iminā ussukkattādayo pahīyantīti evaṃ bandhavuttīti vibhāvādīhi bandhatthābhāsānaṃ manasi yo uppajjati ānandābhāso,
anya-e0812n0:2516_1: Idāni udāharaṇaṃ dassento uttaripi dassetabbasiṅgārahassakaruṇādirasuddesassa anurūpato siṅgārarasayuttameva dasseti “rāgā”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2516_2: Dharāya mahīaṅganāya rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ rāgena anurāgena abhimukhaṃ katvā namitaṃ acchariyaguṇopetapadumasadisānanaṃ no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2516_3: rattavaṇṇaṃ ānataṃ abbhutasarojasaṅkhatamukhaṃ tilokaguruno bhuvanattayānusāsakassa sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0812n0:2516_5: pubbakammena kataadhikarattavaṇṇā niccasarasena karena satatānurāgayuttena hatthena no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2516_6: avikalattā satatasampattisahitena kiraṇena gāḷhaṃ ādāya gāḷhaṃ gahetvā no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2516_7: phusitvā satatāhitasambhamena niccaṃ katādarena no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2517_2: tena sadisatāya abbhutasarojañca taṃ mukhañceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2517_10: rāgo anurāgo rattavaṇṇo vā yesamiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2517_11: rasena anurāgena sampattiyā vā saha vattamānoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2517_12: āhito vihito ca so sambhamo ādaro tadabhimukhabhāvo vā ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2518_0: Ettha “rāgānatā”tiādikena silesālaṅkārena ca “abbhutasarojamukha”nti rūpakālaṅkārena ca sambhogasiṅgārarasābhāso uppādīyati.
anya-e0812n0:2518_2: tadākārena ca kappitattā rasābhāso nāmāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:2518_3: Siṅgārassa āyogavippayogasambhogavasena tividhattepi āyogavippayogadvayaṃ vippalambhamevāti vippalambho,
anya-e0812n0:2518_8: Evaṃ sante payogaṃ katvā kurumānāya vaṇṇanāya ucitabhāvena ihādhigatasambhogasiṅgārarasābhāsena rasibhūtālaṅkārassa
anya-e0812n0:2518_10: Pādānaṃ kāmukabhāvābhāse ca dharāya kāminībhāvābhāse ca vācakapadena avuttepi “dharāya pādā tilokaguruno”ti
anya-e0812n0:2519_0: Dvinnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ratiābhāso “adhikabaddharāgā rāgānata”nti imehi vutto.
anya-e0812n0:2519_1: Ayaṃ ratiābhāso idha ṭhāyībhāvo purisaratiyā itthiyā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2519_2: itthiratiyā purisassa ca ālambaṇattā pādakāmukadharākāminiyo dve aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvābhāsā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2519_3: Rammadesādivisesaṃ vinā acchariyapadumodayassa abhāvato abbhutasarojasaddassa uccāraṇena gammamānā rammadesādayo
anya-e0812n0:2519_5: “Niccasarasena karena gāḷhamādāyā”ti iminā karassa sarasabhāvassa ca gāḷhaṃ gahaṇassa ca vuttattā harisādayo ñāyante.
anya-e0812n0:2519_8: Te byabhicārībhāvābhāse pakāsentāni yathāvuttakavivacanāni anubhāvābhāsā nāmāti evaṃ bandhe dissamānaṭhāyībhāvabyabhicārībhāvavibhāvaanubhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2519_9: atthāvabodhaṃ karontānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ uppajjamāno yo santosābhāsasaṅkhāto rasābhāso atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2529_1: Evamuddesānukkamena yathāpaṭiññātaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni nigamanapubbakaṃ bahuttamesaṃ niddisitumāha “icci”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2529_2: Iti iminā vuttappakārena purimānaṃ daṇḍīādīnaṃ ācariyānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ bandhalakkhaṇāni anugamma anugantvā
anya-e0812n0:2529_3: alaṅkatīnamalaṅkārānaṃ ayaṃ bhedo saṅkhepato nigadito kathito.
anya-e0812n0:2529_6: Uparūpari dīghakālamārabbha yāvedāni matthakamatthake kavīhi vikappiyānaṃ pabhediyamānānaṃ tāsamalaṅkatīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2529_7: antaṃ pariyantaṃ passituṃ khalu ekantena ko nāma jano alaṃ samattho.
anya-e0812n0:2532_1: Evaṃ uddesakkamena yathāpaṭiññāte atthālaṅkāre niṭṭhapetvā idāni nigamanamukhena esaṃ atthālaṅkārānaṃ bahubhāvaṃ dasseti “iccānugamma”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2532_2: Iti yathāvuttanayena purimācariyānubhāvaṃ pubbakālikānaṃ daṇḍībhaddapāṇādīnaṃ alaṅkārasatthasaṅkhātānubhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2532_3: anugamma alaṅkatīnaṃ ayaṃ bhedo saṅkhepato nigadito mayā vutto saṅgahito.
anya-e0812n0:2532_5: Uparūpari dīghakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā kavīhi racanākattārehi vikappiyānaṃ anekappakārato kappiyamānattā
anya-e0812n0:2532_6: puthakkariyamānānaṃ tāsamalaṅkatīnaṃ antaṃ pariyantaṃ passituṃ khalu ekantena ko nāma puggalo alaṃ samatthoti.
anya-e0812n0:2532_7: Saṅgahamanādiyitvā kenāpi pariyantaṃ adhigantuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2532_9: purimā ca te ācariyā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2539_1: Tadeva yathāpaṭiññātamalaṅkāravibhāgaṃ bodhetvā sampati rasavantālaṅkārappasaṅgenādhigataṃ rasaṃ sakala
anya-e0812n0:2539_12: Yato ocityaṃ nāma kavīnaṃ paramaṃ rahassaṃ lokavohārepi ucitaññūyeva pasaṃsīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2539_13: samucitalokavohārānusāreneva ca vakkhamānānukkamena viracitā racanā sacetanānaṃ rasassādāya sampajjate,
anya-e0812n0:2539_14: tasmā ocitye samullasattaṃ dittaṃ phuṭameva bandhanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0812n0:2540_3: luddhānaṃ saddhābāhullasuddhasaṃyamānaṃ vimukhepi lakkhaṇamattapariññāṇena lokavohāresu asammohatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2540_5: Paṭibhānavatā sarasaracanāya accantopakāraṭṭhānocitapaññāvisesavatā lokavohāramanusārinā sakalaloke vohārānurūpamanugatena
anya-e0812n0:2540_6: tato yasmā ocityaṃ nāma hadayato abahi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2540_8: Tasmā paramatisayena ocityasamullāsavedinā ucitabhāvena vattumicchitatthassa uddīpanasseva anurūpappakārena
anya-e0812n0:2540_9: iṭṭhatthassa samullāsanaṃ dittiṃ jānantena kavinā bandhakārakena nibandhāti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:2540_11: tato jātakabbassapi paṭibhāti vuccamānattā ayaṃ paññāviseso racanāya accantopakāroti ñātabbo.
anya-e0812n0:2544_2: Ṭhāyino vakkhamānaratyādayo tehi saha sambandho vibhāvādīhi yoge ratyādīnamassādiyattamānīyamānattā etesamatthīti ṭhāyīsambandhino.
anya-e0812n0:2545_3: tena vāccaratihāsādiatthena vā sambandhupagatā sānubhāvakā vakkhamānānubhāvehi saha pavattā bhāvavibhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2545_4: vakkhamānabhāvavibhāvā nibandhā vuttaguṇopetakavinā bandhitā ekattha āharitvā dassitā sādhunaṃ issādidosarahitānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2545_5: sajjanānaṃ rasassādāya siṅgārādivakkhamānarasassa assādanatthaṃ sampajjanti pavattantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2545_6: Imāya gāthāya ṭhāyībhāvo byabhicārībhāvo kevalabhāvo vibhāvo anubhāvo raso ceti ime uddiṭṭhā bhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:2545_9: tena bhāvassa ṭhāyī ca so bhāvo ceti ca ṭhāyīpadena sambandhattā ṭhāyībhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n0:2545_10: puna byabhicārībhāve sati “ṭhāyībhāvo”ti imassa sādhakattā imasseva ṭhāyībhāvapadassa payogasāmatthiyena gammamāno byabhicārībhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n0:2545_11: puna ṭhāyīpadena samāsamakatvā visuṃ dassitabhāvasaddasutiyā ṭhāyībhāvabyabhicārībhāvehi añño bhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n0:2545_12: tathā eva ṭhāyīpadena vāccaratihāsādiatthassa uppattiuddīpanadvayaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā sajjetvā ṭhitattā
anya-e0812n0:2545_13: tehi ratihāsādīhi atthehi sambandhino ālambaṇauddīpanasaṅkhatavividhavibhāvā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2545_15: “rasassādāyā”ti iminā niddiṭṭharaso cāti evamime ṭhāyībhāvādayo uddiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2550_1: Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhesu ṭhāyādīhi bhāvavibhāvānubhāvarasesu paṭhamaṃ bhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ bhāvasaddamanvatthayati “citta”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2550_8: Ettha hi ṇyanto bhūdhātu karaṇe vattate.
anya-e0812n0:2550_9: Yato cāyaṃ na kevalaṃ karaṇeyeva vattate,
anya-e0812n0:2550_13: Atha vā kavino lokaṭṭhitiñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ adhippāyaṃ bhāvayanti paṭipādentīti bhāvāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:2551_1: Idāni uddiṭṭhesu ṭhāyībhāvādīsu ṭhāyīādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ (ka.) tiṇṇaṃ sādhāraṇo bhāvo nāma esoti dassento anvatthavasena dasseti “citta”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2551_4: thambhādīhi ca ākārehi pavattisaṅkhātā aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarākārasaṅkhātā visesā pana ṭhāyībyabhicārīsāttikā
anya-e0812n0:2551_5: yato yasmā rase siṅgārādirase bhāvayanti nipphādenti karonti. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:2551_6: rase siṅgārādirasavisaye paṇḍitānaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayanti byāpanaṃ karonti. No ce,
anya-e0812n0:2551_7: tasmiṃyeva rasavisaye kavino lokasabhāvaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattañāṇalakkhaṇaṃ adhippāyaṃ bhāvayanti paṭipādanaṃ karonti.
anya-e0812n0:2551_8: Tato bhāvasaddena hetukattari nipphannena ratyādayo ratihāsādayo parikittitā bharatādīhi vuttā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2558_2: Virodhinā aññena jigucchādinā bhāvena yo bhāvo ratyādiko na tirohito nacchādito,
anya-e0812n0:2558_3: eso bhāvo anucchijjamānattā eva tiṭṭhati sīlenāti,
anya-e0812n0:2558_4: ṭhāyī eva bhāvoti ṭhāyībhāvoti saddito kathito.
anya-e0812n0:2559_2: Virodhinā aññabhāvena ratihāsādīnaṃ viruddhena jigucchādinā aññabhāvena yo bhāvo ratihāsādiko tirohito na byavahito na hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2559_3: eso viruddhabhāvena abyavahito bhāvo tiṭṭhati sīlenāti iminā atthena ṭhāyī nāma hotīti katvā ṭhāyībhāvoti saddito kathitoti.
anya-e0812n0:2559_4: Yo vibhāvānubhāvādīhi assādanīyattaṃ pāpito sabbhehi assādanīyattā rasoti vuccati,
anya-e0812n0:2559_6: Añño ca so bhāvo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2559_8: ṭhāyī ca so bhāvo ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2566_2: Samo ceti evaṃ ṭhāyino navāti yojanā.
anya-e0812n0:2566_3: Navevete sakasakavibhāvānubhāvehi samullāsitā visumpi bandhitabbā kavinā,
anya-e0812n0:2566_6: Tattha yadi panāyaṃ rati asesaitthipurisaguṇayuttānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ aññamaññaṃ janitā,
anya-e0812n0:2566_9: sakasakānubhāvasāmatthiyā patīyamānehi anekarūpehi byabhicārīhi cittatā siyā,
anya-e0812n0:2566_12: Evaṃ yathāyogaṃ hāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ hassarasādibhāvāpajjane yuttiṃ samanneyya.
anya-e0812n0:2567_2: Ratihāsā ca soko ca kodhussāhabhayampi ca jigucchāvimhayā ceva samo santaguṇo cāti evaṃ ṭhāyino nava honti.
anya-e0812n0:2567_3: Imesaṃ ratyādīnaṃ navannaṃ sarūpakathanaṃ “siṅgārahassakaruṇā”tiādikāya uddesagāthāya anantare niddese pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2567_5: kodho ca ussāho ca bhayañceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2567_6: jigucchā ca vimhayā ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2567_7: Ime nava ca evaṃ byabhicārībhāvasāttikābhāvo ceti ime yathāsakamanurūpavibhāvānubhāvehi dittaṃ katvā paccekaṃ kavinā bandhitabbā,
anya-e0812n0:2567_9: Imesu tividhabhāvesu ayaṃ rati asesapumitthiguṇehi yuttehi naranārīhi aññamaññaṃ uppāditā,
anya-e0812n0:2567_13: Īdisā’yaṃ rati naṭassa abhinayena ca pasatthabandhasavanena ca sabbhehi assādiyamānasiṅgārādirasattaṃ pāpuṇātīti viññātabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2567_14: Hāsādīnaṃ sesaṭhāyībhāvānaṃ hassarasādibhāvāpattiyaṃ yutti evaṃ yathārahaṃ veditabbāti.
anya-e0812n0:2574_2: Tirobhāvo ṭhāyīnaṃ ekassāpi bhāvassa nibbedādino aciraṭṭhāyitā ca āvibhāvo pākaṭatā ca nānārasanissayattā te ādayo yassa.
anya-e0812n0:2574_7: Tathā hi ratiyaṃ parisamo sukhānuviddho bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:2574_9: Ratiyaṃ sukhasabhāvāpi gilānippabhutayo byabhicārino sakammaṃ dukkhamimaṃ samāropayanteva.
anya-e0812n0:2574_10: Tato tena abhimukhabhāvena ye ete bhāvā sīlena caranti pavattanti,
anya-e0812n0:2575_2: Tirobhāvāvibhāvādivisesena byabhicārībhāvānaṃ attano anekarasaṃ nissāya pavattattā,
anya-e0812n0:2575_3: lokassa bhinnarucikattā ca kismiñci ṭhāyībhāve byabhicārībhāvānamattano guṇassa līnattañca kismiñci tasseva
anya-e0812n0:2575_4: guṇassa pākaṭattañcātiādikena visesena abhimukhyato ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ sukhadukkharūpaṃ attani ca attano sukhadukkharūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2575_5: ṭhāyībhāvesu ca āropanasaṅkhātena abhimukhabhāvena yete bhāvā sīlena caranti pakatiyā pavattanti,
anya-e0812n0:2575_7: Evameva evarūpā (ka.) pīḷā sarūpena eko parisamasaṅkhatabyabhicārībhāvo ratiyaṃ saguṇena līno sukhānuviddho hutvā,
anya-e0812n0:2575_8: soke saguṇena pākaṭo dukkhānuviddho ca hutvā pavattate.
anya-e0812n0:2575_9: Evameva sukhasabhāvaratiyaṃ gilānādayo byabhicārino sakiyaṃ dukkhasarūpaṃ āropentīti katvā tirobhāvavibhāvādivisesena abhimukhaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0812n0:2575_13: te ādayo yassa ṭhāyībhāvesu vijjamānānaṃ sukhadukkhasabhāvānaṃ attani āropanasseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2575_16: Byabhicārīpade visaddo visesatthe abhisaddo abhimukhabhāve vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2586_8: Tañca saha biḷāya vattatīti sabiḷanti ete yathāvuttabyabhicārībhāvā tettiṃsa hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2586_10: Bhīrunā tu sova bhayānakarasavaseneti lokasabhāvassa anekattā tadatthamete byabhicārino ekekassarasassa bahavo vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n0:2586_11: yato taṃvaṇṇanādvārena sabbopi tesu kiñci assādetīti.
anya-e0812n0:2586_12: Tattha yasmā pana māraṇopagataveridassanamekameva taṅkhaṇeyeva bhinnaṃ pakativasena bhīruno bhayassa hetu,
anya-e0812n0:2586_14: Tathā naṭena kataṃ vikatamābharaṇaṃ kriyāvā nīcapakatīnaṃ ṭhāyino hāsassa hetu,
anya-e0812n0:2586_16: tasmā bhāve vaṇṇayatā kavinā bhāvā tathā vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n0:2587_1: Tassa ca itthīnañca nīcānañca dāliddiyaṃ vibhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2588_0: Takko vitakkanaṃ. Tassa sandeho vibhāvo, sirokampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2590_0: Samo khedo. Tattha gatyādi vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2591_0: Dhiti santoso. Ñāṇādi vibhāvo, anubhāvo bhogālolatādi.
anya-e0812n0:2592_0: Jaḷatā appaṭipatti. Tassā iṭṭhāniṭṭhadassanādi vibhāvo, animisanayanālocanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2593_0: Dīnatā cetaso anojatā. Tassā vibhāvo duggatatādi, anubhāvo malinavatthatādi.
anya-e0812n0:2594_0: Uggatā dāruṇattaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo balavāparādhādi, tassa anubhāvo tajjanādi.
anya-e0812n0:2597_0: Tāso cittakkhobho. Vibhāvo assa gajjitādi, kampanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2599_0: Kālakkhamatā ussukaṃ. Vibhāvo tassa ramaṇīyadassanicchādi, anubhāvo turitatādi.
anya-e0812n0:2600_0: Cetopasādo harito. Tatra ussavādi vibhāvo, assusedādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2602_0: Paresamukkaṃsāsahanatā issā. Tassā dujjanattagabbādayo vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2603_0: Visādo khedo. Vibhāvo tassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhādi, bādhayatāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2604_0: Abahitthā kāyasaṃvaraṇaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo lajjādi, anubhāvo’ññavikriyā.
anya-e0812n0:2606_0: Gabbo abhimāno. Vibhāvossa issariyādi, anubhāvo avajānanādi.
anya-e0812n0:2607_0: Apamāro gāharukkhādīhi gāharukkhapatanādīhi (?), bhūpātādayo ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2608_0: Amariso akkhamatā. Vibhāvo assāvamānanādi, sirokampanatajjanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2609_0: Mado pamādukkaṃso. Tassa vibhāvo pānaṃ, calamānaṅgavacogatihāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2610_0: Mati kaṅkhacchedo. Upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhavikāsādi ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2611_0: Asamekkhitakāritā ummādo. Tassa vibhāvo sannipātagahaṇādi, aṭṭhānaruditagītahāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2615_0: Capalatā rāgadosādīhi, sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo. Byādhi pākaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:2616_0: Ye vā panaññe idha niddiṭṭhā cittavuttivisesāpi saṃvijjanti sukhumabhedā,
anya-e0812n0:2616_2: Yathā hi icchāsabhāvā sabbe kāmā ratiyaṃ antogadhā,
anya-e0812n0:2616_12: tathā mohā palayo vakkhamāno aññoti mantabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2617_4: samadhitijaḷatā parisamo santosalakkhaṇā dhiti jaḷatā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2617_16: sabiḷaṃ lajjāsahitaṃ maraṇasacapalābyādhi maraṇañca cāpalyasahitā byādhi ceti.
anya-e0812n0:2617_19: samo ca dhiti ca jaḷatā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2617_20: dīnatā ca uggo ca alasattañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2617_21: ussukañcahariso ca sati ca issā ca visādo ca abahitthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2617_22: amariso ca mado ca mati ca ummādo ca moho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2618_0: Lokasabhāvassa anekavidhattā ekoyeva vīraraso ussāhavatā vīrarasākārena assādanīyo hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2618_2: Tasmā ekekassa rasassa ime bahū byabhicārino vaṇṇetabbā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2618_3: Evaṃ sati anekādhippāyako loko tesu kiñci assādeti.
anya-e0812n0:2618_4: Evaṃ sati bandho sabbajanassa kanto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2618_5: Tassaṃ bhāvavaṇṇanāyaṃ yasmā māretumāgacchantānaṃ sattūnaṃ dassanamekameva taṅkhaṇe janādhippāyato bhijjitvā
anya-e0812n0:2618_6: pakatibhīrūnaṃ purisānaṃ bhayassa ca yuddhalolassa ussāhanassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2618_7: Evaṃ naṭena hasanatthaṃ katavikatamābharaṇañca tādisakiriyā ca uttānapakatikānaṃ purisānaṃ ṭhāyīhāsassa
anya-e0812n0:2618_8: ca gambhīrapakatikānaṃ byabhicārīhāsassa ca hetu bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n0:2618_9: Tasmā bhāve vaṇṇentena kavinā ocityabhaṅgamakatvā sakkaccamocityaṃ sajjetvā bhāvappakāsakāni savibhāvānubhāvakavivacanāni vaṇṇetabbāni.
anya-e0812n0:2618_10: Ettha bhāvāvabodhakavibhāvādīnaṃ jānitabbattā tehi tehi bhāvehi saddhiṃ evaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2620_0: Vitakkassa sandeho uddīpanavibhāvo nāma, sirokampādikaṃ anubhāvo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2621_2: Upari “vibhāvo”ti vutte ālambaṇuddīpanesu dvīsu yaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0812n0:2622_0: Khedalakkhaṇassa samassa gamanādikaṃ vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2623_0: Santosalakkhaṇāya dhitiyā ñāṇādi vibhāvo, bhogesu alolabhāvādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2625_0: Cittassanittejalakkhaṇāya dīnatāya duggatatādi vibhāvo, malinavatthatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2630_0: Pīḷāsaṅkhātassa gilānassa āyāsapipāsādi vibhāvo, dubbaṇṇatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2631_0: Anurūpakālassa anolokanassa ussukkassa rammavatthudassanicchādi vibhāvo, turitatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2632_0: Cetopasādalakkhaṇassa harisassa maṅgalakīḷādi vibhāvo, santosavacanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2633_0: Saraṇalakkhaṇāya satiyā saññāṇadassanādi vibhāvo, bhamukkhepādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2634_0: Parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya dujjanabhāvagabbādi vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādi anubhavo.
anya-e0812n0:2635_0: Khedalakkhaṇassa visādassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhikāriyabyāpattiādi vibhāvo, manosantāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2637_0: Cintāya iṭṭhatthālābhādī vibhāvo, makulitanayanādi adhokhittacakkhādi vā anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2640_0: Akkhamalakkhaṇassa amarisassa avamānanādi vibhāvo, sirokampanatajjanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2642_0: Kaṅkhācchedanalakkhaṇāya matiyā upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhasantosādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2644_0: Muyhanalakkhaṇassa mohassa adhikabhayādi vibhāvo, sabhāvānavabodhanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2645_0: Niddāpagamasaṅkhātassa vibodhassa kālapariṇāmādi ālokasaraṇādi vā vibhāvo, akkhimaddanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2646_0: Manosampīḷanalakkhaṇāya niddāya kassaci acintanaakaraṇādi vibhāvo, akkhipidahanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2647_0: Bhayāgamanalakkhaṇassa āvegassa paccatthikadassanādi vibhāvo, utrāsakampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2648_0: Lajjālakkhaṇāya biḷāya durācārādi vibhāvo, adhomukhatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2650_0: Cāpallassa rāgadosādi vibhāvo, attano sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2651_0: Byādhiyā vātapittādīnaṃ ussadabhāvādi vibhāvo, nitthunanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2652_0: Imasmiṃ subodhālaṅkāre adassitasukhumabhedā aññāpi cittavuttivisesā santi,
anya-e0812n0:2652_5: Evaṃ samānānaṃ saṅgahe satipi tāsato bhayassa ca,
anya-e0812n0:2652_11: mohato vakkhamānapalayassa ca pākaṭavisesena aññathā visuṃ visuṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2657_2: Samāhito ekaggatābhāvāpādanena katasamādhāno attā cittaṃ tato pabhavaṃ uppannaṃ yaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2657_4: Tena sattena upapāditā nibbattitā thambhādayo sāttikā vuccante.
anya-e0812n0:2657_8: Evaṃ satyapi te sāttikā visuṃ puthageva bhāvā bhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:2658_2: Samāhitattappabhavaṃ ekaggatābhāvāpādanena katasamādhānacittato sambhūtaṃ sattaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2658_3: Tena lābhālābhādīsu ekākārassa hetunā thirabhāvena upapāditā nipphāditā thambhādayo sāttikā nāma bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:2658_5: satipi visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti yathāvutta “cittavuttivisesā tu,
anya-e0812n0:2658_6: bhāvayanti rase yato”tiādinā bhāvā nāma hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2658_8: Samāhito ca so attā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2658_10: santo upasanto ca so attā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2666_2: Thambho kāyacittānaṃ avisarabhāvasaṅkhāto ca palayaromañcā niddāya uppajjamānaassāsapassāsamattātirittasuttāvatthā
anya-e0812n0:2666_3: ca pasādādisambhavo romuggamo ca tathā evaṃ sedassuvepathu ca bhayādīhi uppajjamānadāho ca santosādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2666_4: uppajjamānaassu ca kampā ca vevaṇṇiyaṃ virūpatā ca vissaratā virūpasaddatā cāti ete aṭṭha sāttikā bhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2666_9: sedo ca assu ca vepathu cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2672_3: Bhavanti byabhicārinoti yathāyogaṃ yathāsambandhaṃ byabhicārino hontīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:2673_1: Idāni nibbedādayo viya ratihāsādayopi kismiñci kāle byabhicārinopi hontīti dasseti “yadā” iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2673_2: Ratyādayo ratihāsādayo bhāvā nava ṭhāyībhāvā yadā ṭhitisīlā na honti ce virodhīhi tehi tehi bhāvantarehi
anya-e0812n0:2673_3: byavahitattā sabhāvato ṭhitisabhāvā yadi na honti,
anya-e0812n0:2673_4: tadā te bhāvā ratyādayo sabbepi byabhicārino bhavantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2673_7: ṭhiti sīlaṃ yesaṃ ratyādīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2679_3: tathā uddīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena duvidho vibhāvo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2679_6: Tesaṃ bodhako ñāpako kāyiko ca vācasiko ca byāpāro siyā,
anya-e0812n0:2680_2: Tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ uppattiyā ca tathā uddīpane ca uppannānaṃ dīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena duvidho hetu vibhāvo nāma,
anya-e0812n0:2680_3: tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ bodhako kāyikavācasiko yo siyā naṭakavīnaṃ byāpāro atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2680_7: Ettha vibhāvo nāma rativisaye naranārīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2680_10: Anubhāvo nāma ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pakāsakavācasikabyāpārasaṅkhātakavipayogo ca kāyikapayogabhūto
anya-e0812n0:2680_11: naṭānaṃ abhinayasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃbhāvasarūpanirūpako ceti duvidho byāpāro.
anya-e0812n0:2684_2: aññathā “devadattassa sāssulocanayugaṃ sañjāta”miti vutte sokā ānandā rogā ceti ko nāma sakkoti kāraṇaṃ nicchituṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2684_3: cittavuttivisesañca bhāvaṃ vinā vibhāvānubhāvaṃ kavi vaṇṇetuṃ naṭobhinetuṃ sāmajjiko vā viññātuṃ ko sakkotīti dassetumāha “neka”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2684_4: Nekahetuṃ bahuhetuṃ manovuttivisesañca bhāvaṃ vibhāvituṃ pakāsetuṃ vibhāvānubhāvā vuttalakkhaṇā bandhane sabhāvanirūpakapade phuṭaṃ vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n0:2685_1: “Devadattassa cakkhūni assupuṇṇānī”ti vutte sokena santosena rogena vāti yathā assukāraṇakathanaṃ vinā na jānāti,
anya-e0812n0:2685_2: evaṃ cittassa pavattisaṅkhātā ratihāsādayo te te bhāvā attano patītiyānurūpaṃ vibhāvānubhāvakathanaṃ vinā kavīhi vaṇṇetabbā,
anya-e0812n0:2685_4: sabbhehi assādanīyā natthīti ṭhāyīādīnaṃ vaṇṇanameva kātabbanti idāni anusāsento āha “neka”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2685_5: Nekahetuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ uppatyādo ālambaṇavibhāvādibahukāraṇavantaṃ manovuttivisesaṃ bhāvañca
anya-e0812n0:2685_6: cittassa pavattivisesasaṅkhātabhāvañca vibhāvituṃ pakāsetuṃ vibhāvānubhāvā anantaraniddiṭṭhā bandhane
anya-e0812n0:2685_7: rasabhāvappakāsane phuṭaṃ pakāsaṃ katvā vaṇṇiyā kavinā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2685_12: vibhāvo ca anubhāvo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2689_1: Idāni te bhāvā lokasabhāvānatikkamena vibhāvādīhi vaṇṇanīyāti āha “savibhāve”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2689_3: te ca te anubhāvā ca, tehi.
anya-e0812n0:2689_4: Yathārahanti attano sambandhīnaṃ vasena yathārahaṃ vaṇṇanīyā.
anya-e0812n0:2690_1: Idāni vibhāvānubhāve nissāya vaṇṇanīyā te bhāvā lokasabhāvamanatikkamma kātabbāti anusāsanto āha “savibhāvā”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2690_2: Lokarūpānugāminā lokavohāramanuvattamānena te te bhāvā ṭhāyībhāvādayo tayo yathocityaṃ ocityānurūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2690_3: savibhāvānubhāvehi vibhāvasahitehi anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi yathārahaṃ tehi tehi bhāvehi sambandhīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2690_4: vibhāvādīnaṃ vasena anurūpato vaṇṇanīyā vaṇṇetabbā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2690_6: te ca te anubhāvā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2694_4: tasmā mānasā manasi bhavā sāttikā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭehi niggatehi sedādīhi anubhāvehi vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n0:2695_1: Evaṃ sāmaññena bhāvavaṇṇanakkamaṃ dassetvā idāni visesena sāttikabhāvavaṇṇanā īdisāti dasseti “citta”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2695_2: Cittavuttivisesattā cittassa pavattivisesattā mānasā citte bhavā sāttikābhāvā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭasedādianubhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2695_3: bahinikkhantasedādīhi anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi vaṇṇiyā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti,
anya-e0812n0:2695_4: aṅgato bahi nissaṭanti visesanena visiṭṭhabhūtasedādīnameva bhāvānubhāvattaṃ vinā kevalaṃ sedādayo vuttā samānā bhāvādayo nāma na hontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2695_6: sā eva viseso yesaṃ sāttikānamiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2695_10: nissaṭā niggatā ca te sedādayo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2700_1: Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vuttattā rase niddisanto āha “sāmajjikāna”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2700_4: tesaṃ sāmajjikānaṃ sabbhānaṃ manasi yo ānando,
anya-e0812n0:2700_5: ayaṃ lokamadhurādiraso viya bandhe siṅgārādi raso nāma īrito taññūhi rasaññūhi.
anya-e0812n0:2700_8: Yathā nānābyañjanasaṅkhatamannaṃ bhuñjamānā rase assādiyanti sumānasā purisā santosañcādhigacchanti,
anya-e0812n0:2700_9: tathā nānābhinayabyañjite vācaṅgasatthopete ṭhāyībhāve assādenti sumānasāpekkhakā,
anya-e0812n0:2701_1: Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vatvā uddiṭṭhakkamena sampattaṃ rasaṃ dasseti “sāma”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2701_2: Bandhatthānusārinaṃ bandhassa atthānurūpasārīnaṃ buddhiyā pavattānaṃ sāmajjikānaṃ sabbhānaṃ citte bhavo yo ānando santoso atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2701_3: ayaṃ loke madhurādiraso viya assādanīyo hotīti atthayuttena “rasīyatī”ti iminā vacanatthena raso nāmāti taññūhirasaññūhi īrito kathitoti.
anya-e0812n0:2701_8: Yathā nānābyañjanehi abhisaṅkhatamāhāraṃ paribhuñjantā sattā lavaṇambilādayo te te rase assādeyyuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2701_10: evameva nānappakāraabhinayehi pakāsitavaṇṇanāya aṅgabhūtehi anurūpehi satthehi yutte ṭhāyībhāve issādirahitapaññavantā assādenti,
anya-e0812n0:2701_11: tasmā ime ṭhāyībhāvā naṭābhinayehi byañjitattā ca sabbhānaṃ santosasaṅkhatarasassa hetuttā ca naṭarasātipi vuccanti.
anya-e0812n0:2708_2: Ṭhāyeva soti so yathāvutto raso ṭhāyībhāvoyeva,
anya-e0812n0:2709_2: So raso anantaraniddiṭṭho savibhāvānubhāvehi tesaṃ tesaṃ ṭhāyīnaṃ anurūpehi vibhāvasahitehi anubhāvehi ca,
anya-e0812n0:2709_4: ānīyamāno kavino sāmatthiyā pāpuṇiyamāno ṭhāyeva ṭhāyībhāvo evāti kāriyopacārena raso nāmāti veditabboti.
anya-e0812n0:2709_6: savibhāvā ca te anubhāvā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2713_2: Ṭhāyīnanukkamāti “ratihāsā ca soko cā”tiādinā vuttānaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā,
anya-e0812n0:2714_1: Rasāvatthāsampattaratihāsādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ idāni kamena nāmantaraṃ dasseti “siṅgāra”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:2714_2: Ṭhāyīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ ratihāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā paṭipāṭiyā siṅgārahassakaruṇā siṅgāro hasso
anya-e0812n0:2714_3: karuṇā ca ruddavīrabhayānakā ruddo vīro bhayānako ca bībhacchabbhutasantā ca bibhaccho abbhuto santo
anya-e0812n0:2714_6: Siṅgāro ca hasso ca karuṇā ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2714_8: Ime siṅgārādīnaṃ ratyādīhi anaññattā upari ratyādivivaraṇeyeva ñātabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2720_2: Vessantarassa puttadāraviyogā karuṇā sokarūpo dukkhameva ahosi,
anya-e0812n0:2720_3: sampati pana sotūnaṃ sabbhānaṃ ānandoyevāti etthādhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2721_2: sokakodhādilakkhaṇo karuṇāruddādiko kathaṃ raso nāma bhaveyyāti āsaṅkāyamāha “dukkharūpe”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2721_3: Ayaṃ ānando “sāmajjikānamānando”tiādinā niddiṭṭho dukkharūpe dukkhalakkhaṇe karuṇādike karuṇāruddādike visaye kathaṃ bhaveyyāti ce,
anya-e0812n0:2721_4: nesa doso hi tatheva vessantarassa bodhisattassa soko puttadāravirahato jātasoko sotūnaṃ idāni suṇantānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2721_5: sabbhānaṃ ānando siyā ānandassa kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena santoso nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:2721_6: Vattuno sāmatthiyā karuṇārasādikaṃ pāpetvā pakāsiyamānassa sokādikassa dukkharūpena ṭhitattā suṇantānaṃ pīti uppādiyatevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2721_7: Dukkhaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa karuṇādinoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2721_8: karuṇā ādi yassa ruddādinoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2728_4: ādisaddena niddiṭṭhabhāsitamihitādiceti imesaṃ diṭṭhasutamutādīsu diṭṭhādimattamakatvā paññāya tena tenākārena
anya-e0812n0:2728_5: punappunānubhavanena aññoññarattānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nimittānubyañjanasaṅkappavasenātirattānaṃ yuvānaṃ taruṇitthi
anya-e0812n0:2728_6: purisānaṃ pamodo abhiramaṇavasena santoso pīti rati ruccate ruccanato “ratī”ti vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2728_8: Deso ca kalā ca kālo ca veso ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2734_2: Te yathāvuttā bhāvānubhāvā yutyā ālasiyauggatājigucchāvajjitā ye saṅkāussukkādayo bhāvā taṃbyañjakā tadanurūpā
anya-e0812n0:2734_3: anubhāvā ca ayogādike siṅgāre yathā yathā yuñjanti,
anya-e0812n0:2734_4: tādisiyāva yuttiyā nibandhā naṃ ratiṃ samposayanti,
anya-e0812n0:2734_5: soyevamevaṃ posito siṅgāro nāma raso sampajjate.
anya-e0812n0:2734_7: Tattha ayogo nāma pubbe asaṅgatānaṃ anurāgena saṅgamamicchantānaṃ itthipurisānamasaṅgamo.
anya-e0812n0:2735_2: Te bhāvānubhāvā niddiṭṭhabyabhicārībhāvesu ratyānurūpabyabhicārībhāvo tappakāsako anubhāvo ceti ime dve
anya-e0812n0:2735_3: yutyā hetubhūtāya ayogavippayogasambhogasaṅkhatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ siṅgārānaṃ anukūlatthena ratiyā viruddhattā
anya-e0812n0:2735_4: ālasiyauggajigucchādike parivajjetvā saṅkāussukkādīnaṃ ratyānukūlabhāvānaṃ vasena yathāyogaṃ nibandhā
anya-e0812n0:2735_5: kavīhi bandhā naṃ ratiṃ posayanti yathā tappakāsanena pūrenti sajjenti,
anya-e0812n0:2735_6: evaṃ sajjito ratisiṅgāro nāma raso hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2735_7: Sopi sāmaññena niddiṭṭhasiṅgārarasopi ayogavippayogasambhogānaṃ siṅgārānaṃ vasā bhedena tidhā bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2735_8: Tattha ayogo nāma pubbe aññamaññasaṅgamarahitānaṃ abhinavānurāgabalena saṅgamaṃ patthentānaṃ thīpumānaṃ asaṅgamo.
anya-e0812n0:2735_9: Vippayogo nāma saṅgamātisayena viruḷhapemānaṃ thīpumānaṃ aññamaññavisileso.
anya-e0812n0:2735_10: Sambhogo nāma balavakāmataṇhāvisesavasena yuttānaṃ kāminikāmukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanādiassādo.
anya-e0812n0:2735_12: ayogo ca vippayogo ca sambhogo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2736_1: tapodhanānaṃ aññarasāvabodhane payojanābhāvepi lokiyesu tesu tesu vohāresu asammohatthaṃ siṅgārādinavavidharasānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2736_2: lakkhaṇamattasseva dassitattā tadanurūpalakkhiyapariggahe asati lakkhaṇāvabodhassa subyattābhāvato vuttalakkhaṇāvabodhatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2736_3: taṃtaṃlakkhaṇakathanānantaraṃ tassa tassa lakkhiyassa mukhamattaṃ dassetabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2736_4: Heṭṭhā “rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ dharāyā”tiādinā niddiṭṭhasambhogasiṅgārarasābhāseneva hasābhāsādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ rasābhāsarūpassa bhāvābhāsassa,
anya-e0812n0:2736_6: anubhāvābhāsassa ca ñātabbattā siṅgārarasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2741_0: Gītassarena hatthīnaṃ gītikāya piyattā gītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā nettarasmibandhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2741_1: nettasaṅkhātahatthācariyassa rajjunā bandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena soṇḍaggahaṇena vivasañca apagataicchācāraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2741_2: paravasaṃ karaṃ iva hatthaṃ iva gītassarena attano līlopetagītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ netvā
anya-e0812n0:2741_3: nettarasmibandhaṃ attano nayanakantiyā paṭibandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena vivasañca apagatadhitiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2741_4: mūḷhaṃ maṃ yā kantā tādisepi dukkare viniyojayi,
anya-e0812n0:2741_5: sā irandatī irandatī nāma nāgamānavikā mayā ajja vidhinā bhāgyena adhigatā laddhāti.
anya-e0812n0:2742_0: Ettha gītassaranettarasmikaraggahasaṅkhatāhi imāhi padāvalīhi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n0:2742_2: purisassa thī ca ālambaṇaṃ hotīti “sā irandatī mayā”ti iminā ārammaṇavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n0:2742_3: “Upakaḍḍhiya bandhaṃ vivasa”nti imehi kāmena uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhatā rati dassitā.
anya-e0812n0:2742_4: “Tādisepi dukkare viniyojayī”ti imehi ussāhādikā ca “vidhinā adhigatā mayajjā”ti imehi harisādikā ca byabhicārībhāvā dassitā.
anya-e0812n0:2742_5: Ratiyā viruddhe nibbedaālasiyauggatajigucchādike byabhicārībhāve vajjetvā vuttappakāravibhāvādike pakāsanto
anya-e0812n0:2742_6: “gītassarene”ccādikā ratippatītiyā anurūpaṃ payuttā kavippayogā idha anubhāvā nāma honti.
anya-e0812n0:2742_8: Rammadesarammakālarammavesādayo tadabhāve ratiyā anuppajjanato sāmatthiyā gamyā bhavantīti evaṃ lakkhaṇānugatalakkhiyapariggāho sabbattha kātabbo.
anya-e0812n0:2742_9: Evaṃ satibandhatthāvabodhakānaṃ sabbhānaṃ uppajjamānāyapītiyā kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena eso bandho raso nāma hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2751_5: sopi attano sambandhī vā atha parassa sambandhī vā,
anya-e0812n0:2751_8: Yo pana vibhāvadassanā uppannāpi purisassa gambhīrattādinā chādito samāno purisantare hasatyābhibyatto,
anya-e0812n0:2751_12: Paripose sati hasso nāma raso siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2751_13: So hasso bhiyyo itthipabhutīnaṃ siyāti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:2752_3: naccagītaādikehi ca duvidhehi ākatisaṅkhatehi hetubhūtehi attano vā atha parassa vā sambandhī so hāso
anya-e0812n0:2752_5: sutasambandhena teheva niddāsamālasyamucchāsaṅkhatabyabhicārīhi karaṇabhūtehi paripose sati hasso hasso
anya-e0812n0:2752_9: Vikārā ca sā ākati ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2752_11: niddā ca samo ca ālasyañca mucchā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2752_12: te ādi yesaṃ akkhiphandanādīnaṃ anubhāvānanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2752_14: itthī pabhuti yesaṃ nīcapakatīnanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2764_2: Iha hasse vikāsīni nayanāni yassa taṃ sitaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2764_3: kiñci ālakkhiyā dijā dantā yassa taṃ hasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2764_4: Evaṃ madhuro saro saddo yassa taṃ vihasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2764_6: saha jalena assunā vattamānāni akkhīni yassa taṃ apahasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2764_7: Vikkhittāni ito tato pasāritāni aṅgāni yassa taṃ atihasitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2764_8: Esañca sitādīnaṃ majjhe dve dve hassā ādito paṭṭhāya kamaso yathākkamena jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi ca kathitāti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:2765_2: Iha imasmiṃ hassavisaye vikāsinayanaṃ vivaṭanayanaṃ sitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2765_8: Vikkhittaṅgaṃ aṭṭhāne pasāraṇavasena vikkhittahatthapādādiavayavavantaṃ atihasitaṃ nāma bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:2765_9: Esaṃ channaṃ kamaso kamena dve dve jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi visaye kathitā purātanehi bhāsitāti.
anya-e0812n0:2765_11: kiñci īsakaṃ ālakkhiyā dijā yasseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2765_16: saha jalena vattamānāni akkhīni yasseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2765_22: Evaṃ sitādayo anurūpavibhāvādinā payuttā ime rasā’vatthaṃ pāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2771_0: Yo purā pubbe dhamme tassa dhammakathane pasanno kaṇṭhamaṇinā api attano anagghakaṇṭhamaṇināpi taṃ pūjesi,
anya-e0812n0:2771_1: so nāgarājā sabhāvaṃ attano adhippāyaṃ gopentiyā api thiyā vacanena itthiyā vacanena asamadhuraṃ tulyarahitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2771_2: vidhuraṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ hantuṃ vināsanatthaṃ pharuse caṇḍe mayi bhattiṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0812n0:2771_3: Iha ekasmiṃyeva vatthuni nāgarājassa pasādavadhavidhānādiviparītappavatti ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2771_4: paṭhamaṃ anagghapiyavatthūhi pūjitabhāvo ca bodhisattassa atulyabhāvo ca itthivacanassa sampaṭicchanabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2771_5: ca tassādhippāyassa aññātabhāvo ca puṇṇakassa caṇḍabhāvo ceti imehi sabbavacanehi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n0:2771_6: Imehi uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhato hāso vākyasāmatthiyā pakāsito hāsavirodhinibbedādivajjitā samālasiyasantosaassuvepathādikā
anya-e0812n0:2771_7: byabhicārībhāvā sāttikābhāvā ca evaṃ sāmatthiyena dīpitā.
anya-e0812n0:2771_9: Hassabhedena majjhime purise vattabbāpi hasitaupahasitā dve imā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2780_2: Aniṭṭhassa puttaviyogādino desanikkaḍḍhanādino patti ca iṭṭhassa dhammassa,
anya-e0812n0:2780_3: dhanādino vā nāso ca tato vibhāvabhūtehi sampanno sokarūpo sokasabhāvo tu karuṇo raso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2781_3: desacāgādino vā aniṭṭhassa uppatti ca sīlādino,
anya-e0812n0:2781_4: dhanādino vā iṭṭhassa kantivatthuno vināso cāti imehi ālambaṇavibhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi uppanno sokarūpo
anya-e0812n0:2781_5: tu sokasabhāvo pana karuṇo karuṇāraso nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2781_6: Tattha karuṇārase ruditapalayatthambhakādayo rudito palayo thambhotiādayo anubhāvā nāma bhavantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2781_9: Iha puttaviyogādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca sīladhammādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca uttamānaṃ soko uppajjati,
anya-e0812n0:2781_11: Aññesaṃ dhanādivināsanena pana mahākaruṇikattā uttamasseva uppajjati.
anya-e0812n0:2781_12: Tasmiṃ visaye so soko sesānaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0812n0:2781_18: ruditañca palayo ca thambhako ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2781_20: visādo ca ālasyañca maraṇañca cintā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2786_0: Yo ekasatarājapurakkhato rājūnaṃ ekasatena parivārito jino iva buddho iva dhammena madhuradhammakathanena āsanaṃ dhammāsanaṃ alaṃkurute sajjeti,
anya-e0812n0:2786_1: lokatilako lokassa piyatāya tilakālaṅkārabhūto so vidhurapaṇḍito yakkhena puṇṇakena ākaḍḍhito hutvā nīto assavālaṃ avalambiya idāni eko kiṃ kuruteti.
anya-e0812n0:2786_4: uddīpitasokasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo ca visādālasyacintādiko byabhicārībhāvo ca ruditapalayathambhakādikā vibhāvādibodhakaanubhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2791_2: Ettha paṭhamena ādisaddena avikkhepaupahāsādayo vibhāvā gahitā,
anya-e0812n0:2792_2: Kodho macchariyādīhi macchariyaavikkhepaupahāsādīhi ālambaṇādīhi vibhāvehi ca hetubhūtehi tāsamadādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2792_3: tāsamadauggatasambhamādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi ca nayanāruṇatādīhi nettarattasubhaṅgaoṭṭhapīḷanādīhi anubhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2792_4: ca karaṇabhūtehi pose sati ruddo nāma raso bhaveti.
anya-e0812n0:2792_8: nayanāni ca tāni aruṇāni cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2798_0: Bho manussabhakkhena yakkhena adhigatosi gahito asi,
anya-e0812n0:2798_1: assassa vālamavalamba vāladhiṃ gahetvā idāneva puraṃ avekkha tuyhaṃ nagaraṃ olokehi,
anya-e0812n0:2798_2: tatheva hi verambhavātamukhacuṇṇitasabbagatto verambhavātassa abhimukhicuṇṇitasakalasarīro macco manusso jīvalokaṃ sattalokaṃ punapi kathaṃ passatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2798_3: Iha macchariyādivibhāvā ca kodhādisaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo ca vākyasāmatthiyā dīpitā honti,
anya-e0812n0:2804_4: te ādayo yesaṃ balāvikkhepādīnaṃ paṭipuggalagatānaṃ vibhāvānaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2804_5: tehi jāto ussāho rasattamāpanno vīro rasoti saññito,
anya-e0812n0:2804_6: ayaṃ vīro raṇadānadayāyogā tividho bhave yuddhavīro dānavīro dayāvīroti,
anya-e0812n0:2804_7: te yuddhakaraṇādayo eva tattha anubhāvā bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:2805_4: tesameva paramaṇḍalakkamanasaṅkhātavikkamo phalabhedo cetiādīhi uppanno ussāho vīroti vīrarasoti saññito kavīhi ñāto,
anya-e0812n0:2805_5: ayaṃ vīraraso raṇadānadayāyogā yuddhacāgakaruṇāyogena hetubhūtena tividho bhave.
anya-e0812n0:2805_6: Te eva raṇadānadayā eva imā anubhāvā nāma honti.
anya-e0812n0:2805_11: raṇo ca dānañca dayā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2815_0: Kuveraṃ vessavaṇamahārājaṃ viññāpetvā bodhetvā sumahatimapi kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ atimahantiṃ kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2815_1: ekova uttāsetvā bhayaṃ janetvā maṇiratanavaraṃ gahetvā jūte akkhakīḷāyaṃ lakkhaṃ ādhāya ṭhapetvā korabyarājaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2815_2: jetvā raññaṃ satamhā rājasambandhinā satena sacivaratanaṃ amaccaratanaṃ uddhacca uddharitvā etthānetvā
anya-e0812n0:2815_4: ettha yathāvuttesu mama ko bhāro atthīti.
anya-e0812n0:2815_5: Ettha “ko mametthatthi bhāro”ti iminā ussāhasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo pakāsito.
anya-e0812n0:2815_9: “raññaṃ satamhā sacivaratanamuddhaccā”ti ca imehi dhitiuggatagabbādayo ca,
anya-e0812n0:2815_12: “etthānetvā iccādayo”ti ca imehi matyādayo ca byabhicārino bhāvā vibhāvitā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2822_2: Vikāri asabhāvappavatto viruddho sano saddo satto ca,
anya-e0812n0:2822_7: kittimassa vā ukkaṃso bhayānako nāma raso.
anya-e0812n0:2823_3: rakkhasādisattehi vā vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi sañjāto sābhāviko,
anya-e0812n0:2823_4: kittimo vā bhayapaṭibandho ukkaṃso bhayānakaraso nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2823_5: Ettha bhayānakarasavisaye sedādayo dāhasarīrakampanādayo anubhāvā kāyikavācasikappayogasaṅkhatā anubhāvā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2823_6: Tāsādī byabhicārino tāsasaṅkādayo iha byabhicārībhāvā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2823_9: vikārino ca te sanasattā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2823_15: tāso ādi yesaṃ saṅkādīnamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2829_0: Diṭṭhisatthapatanena diṭṭhisallasampātanena paripphurantī kampamānā samantā parisamantato ācakkavāḷanagaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2829_1: cakkavāḷapabbatāvadhi gamitā palāpitā kumbhaṇḍarakkhasacamū kumbhaṇḍarakkhasānaṃ senā yaṃ assagataṃ assapiṭṭhe
anya-e0812n0:2829_2: nisinnakaṃ bhoto bhavataṃ tumhākaṃ purī iva puriyā dassanamiva muhuṃ muhuṃ apassi khaṇe khaṇe apassittha,
anya-e0812n0:2829_4: Ettha “diṭṭhisatthapatanenā”ti diṭṭhisatthāropanena ca “sa puṇṇako aha”nti iminā ca bhayajananassa hetubhūtaviruddhasattasaṅkhātā vibhāvā niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0812n0:2829_6: “kumbhaṇḍarakkhasacamū gamitā samantā ācakkavāḷanaga”nti tāsasaṅkādikā byabhicārino bhāvā jotitā.
anya-e0812n0:2838_2: Rudhirantādīhi pūtikimiādīhi virāgato ca jātā jigucchā garahā kamena khobhano ubbegī karuṇāyuto ca bībhaccho bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:2838_4: saṅkāvegādīhi byabhicārīhi ca assa posanaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2839_4: virāgato virattabhāvena cāti imehi tīhi vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi uppajjamānā jigucchā kamena rudhirādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2839_5: tiṇṇaṃ vibhāvānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā khobhano anavaṭṭhāno asamāhito ubbegī ubbegavā karuṇāyuto sokarūpena sahito
anya-e0812n0:2839_6: cāti evaṃ bībhaccho raso nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2839_7: Nāsāvikunanādīhi nāsasaṅkocanamukhapidahanādīhi anubhāvehi ca saṅkādīhi ca saṅkāāvegādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2839_8: ca karaṇabhūtehi assa bībhaccharasassa posanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2839_10: khobhanādīsu tīsu ca gamyamānattā avuttopi casaddo yojetabbo,
anya-e0812n0:2839_11: tasmā khobhanādīhi tīhi yuttova bībhaccharaso nāmāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:2839_18: saṅkā ādi yesaṃ āvegādīnamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2845_0: Puṇṇakena yakkhena nimmitā maccakaraṅkakaṅkanadharā manussaṭṭhisaṅkhātakarabhūsanadhārino uttaṃsīkatapāṇipallavadharā
anya-e0812n0:2845_2: lohitakuṅkumehi rudhirasaṅkhātakuṅkumakakkehi littā sīsakapālapātihi sīsakapālasaṅkhātehi sarāvehi vasāmajjaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2845_3: vasāsaṅkhātasuraṃ pure abhimukhe pivantā ye yakkhā siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2845_4: ete yakkhā vidhurena paṇḍitena dhuttā viya nagare surādhuttā viya upekkhitā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2845_5: Iha “littā lohitakuṅkumehī”ti ca “uttaṃsīkatapāṇipallavadharā”ti ca “hārīkatantoragā”ti ca imehi cittakkhobhakāraṇabhūto rudhirādivibhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n0:2845_6: “maccakaraṅkakaṅkanaro”ti ca “sīsakapālapātihi vasāmajjaṃ pivantā”ti ca imehi ubbegavantasabhāvassa hetubhūto pūtyādivibhāvo ca pakāsito.
anya-e0812n0:2845_7: Karuṇāyutasabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtavirajjanavibhāvo ca nāsāvikunanādianubhāvo ca saṅkāvegādibyabhicārībhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2845_8: ca bībhacchasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo cāti ime sabbe vākyasāmatthiyena gammāti veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2854_2: Atilokehi lokātivuttīhi māyādibbagehārāmādīhi padatthehi jāto ayaṃ vimhayo cittavikārasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2855_3: uppajjamāno ayaṃ vimhayo cittabyāpanasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso abbhutaraso nāma bhave,
anya-e0812n0:2855_5: tāsāvegadhitippaññā ettha abbhutarasavisaye byabhicārino bhāvā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2855_7: te ca te padatthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2855_9: sedo ca assu ca sādhuvādo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2855_11: tāso ca āvego ca dhiti ca paññā ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2861_0: So vidhurapaṇḍito puṇṇakena yakkhena naṭena iva anekavikāradassanakena nāṭakena viya āhaṭanekabhiṃsanesu
anya-e0812n0:2861_1: bhayattamānītānekavidhabhiṃsanesu vattamānesu suniccalo tena puṇṇakena acalā saṭṭhiyojanubbedhakāḷāgiripabbatamatthakato
anya-e0812n0:2861_2: nipātito avaṃsiropataṃ adhosīsaṃ patanto asantasaṃ evaṃ appatiṭṭhepi anuttasanto taṃ pabbataṃ diṭṭhiyaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n0:2861_5: Ettha bhayahetumhi sati bhītiyā ca tattha parijānanābhāvassa ca lokasabhāvattā tamatikkamma bhayakaraṇe
anya-e0812n0:2861_6: asantāsassa ca diṭṭhiyā pabbataminanassa ca pavattabhāvakathanena lokātikkantapadatthasaṅkhāto vibhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2861_9: tassa sāmatthiyena ca sādhuvādasedaassuādayo anubhāvā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0812n0:2875_2: Mettādayāmodādisambhavo mettākaruṇāpītiādivibhāvehi sambhūto samo kāyacittopasamo ṭhāyībhāvo nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2875_4: apica tassa samassa anurūpehi byabhicārībhāvānubhāvehi tadukkaṃso tassa ṭhāyībhāvassa ukkaṃsayutto santanisevito
anya-e0812n0:2875_5: sādhūhi sevito santo santaraso nāma hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2875_6: Mettā ca dayā ca modo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2881_0: Kesarikarīsu sīhahatthīsu entesu api bhiṃsanākārena samīpamāgacchantesupi nāge veṭhayantepi nāgesu sarīraṃ veṭhayantesupi.
anya-e0812n0:2881_2: veḷugumbaṃ madagaje viya vicālayati madagaḷitahatthimhi cālente iva yakkhe puṇṇake nagaṃ kāḷāgiripabbataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2881_3: vicālayatipi anekappakāre cālentepi vidhuro paṇḍito santiṃ gatova nibbānaṃ ālambaṇakaraṇavasena sampatto
anya-e0812n0:2881_4: viya phalasamāpattisamāpanno iva atha vā diṭṭhadhammanibbānasaṅkhatanirodhasamāpattisamāpanno viya īsakampi
anya-e0812n0:2881_5: appakampi madhurā bhāvā api madhurasabhāvatopi no cali,
anya-e0812n0:2881_7: Ettha dhāvanarodanakampanādīnaṃ karaṇabhūtaṃ sīhādīnamāgamanaṃ nāgaveṭhanaṃ pabbatakampanantiādīsu vattamānesupi
anya-e0812n0:2881_8: nibbikārattena santiṃ gatoti iminā santarasassa pakatibhūte uddese dassito navamo ṭhāyībhāvo dassito hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2881_9: etassa uppattiuddīpanānaṃ kāraṇabhūtā mettādayāmodādivibhāvā sāmatthiyā dassitā hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2881_10: Dhitimatisatiādayo tadanurūpabyabhicārībhāvā ca tādisānubhāvā ca “entesu veṭhayante vicālayatī”ti iminā,
